anya-e0201n0:18: Vaṇṇo, saro, savaṇṇo, dīgho, rasso, byañjano, vaggo, niggahītaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:19: 1. Aādayo titālīsaṃ titālīsa (bahūsu) vaṇṇā ka. 2; rū. 2; nī. 1, 2.
anya-e0201n0:20: Aādayo bindantā tecattālīsakkharā vaṇṇā nāma honti.
anya-e0201n0:21_0: A, ā, i, ī, u, ū, eta, e, ota, o. Ka, kha, ga, gha, ṅa, ca, cha, ja, jha, ña, ṭa,
anya-e0201n0:21_1: ṭha, ḍa, ḍha, ṇa, ta, tha, da, dha, na, pa, pha, ba, bha, ma, ya, ra, la,va sa, ha,
anya-e0201n0:21_2: ḷa, aṃ. Atthaṃ vaṇṇenti pakāsentīti vaṇṇā, akkharāti ca vuccanti, nāmapaññattirūpattā
anya-e0201n0:21_3: nakkharanti khayavayaṃ na gacchantīti akkharā. “Nāmagottaṃ na jīratī”ti saṃ. ni. 1.76 hi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:23: Tesu vaṇṇesu ādimhi dasa vaṇṇā sarā nāma honti. Sayameva laddhasarūpā hutvā rājanti virocantīti sarā.
anya-e0201n0:25: Tesu saresu dve dvesarā savaṇṇā nāma honti.
anya-e0201n0:26: A, ā avaṇṇo, i, ī ivaṇṇo, u, ū uvaṇṇo, eta, e etavaṇṇo, ota, o otavaṇṇo. Samāno vaṇṇo suti etesanti savaṇṇā, sarūpāti ca vuccanti, samānaṃ rūpaṃ suti etesanti sarūpā.
anya-e0201n0:28: Dvīsu dvīsu savaṇṇesu yo yo pubbo hoti, so so rasso nāma hoti. Rassena kālena vattabbāti rassā, rassakālo nāma akkhidalānaṃ ummisananimmisanasamakālo.
anya-e0201n0:29: Tattha eta, ota iti dve ekapadasaṃyoge pare kvaci labbhanti. Eṭṭhi, seṭṭho, oṭṭho, sotthi.
anya-e0201n0:30: Ekapadasaṃyogeti kiṃ? Padantarasaṃyoge pare rassā mā hontūti. Maṃ ce tvaṃ nikhaṇaṃ vane, jā. 2.22.5 putto tyāhaṃ mahārāja jā. 1.1.7.
anya-e0201n0:31: Kvacīti kiṃ? Ekapadasaṃyogepi vaggantesu vā ya, ra, la, vesu vā paresu rassā mā hontūti. Enti, senti, eyya, bhāseyya, meṇḍo, soṇḍo.
anya-e0201n0:33: Dvīsu dvīsu savaṇṇesu yo yo paro hoti, so so dīgho nāma hoti. Dīghena kālena vattabbāti dīghā, dīghakālo nāma rassehi diguṇakālo.
anya-e0201n0:35: Tesu vaṇṇesu kādayo bindantā vaṇṇā byañjanā nāma honti. Atthaṃ byañjayantīti byañjanā. Te pana suddhā addhamattikā, rassayuttā diyaddhamattikā, dīghayuttā tiyaddhamattikā.
anya-e0201n0:37: Tesu byañjanesu kādi-mantā pañcabyañjanapañcakā vaggā nāma honti.
anya-e0201n0:38: Kādi pañcako kavaggo, cādi ca vaggo, ṭādi ṭavaggo, tādi tavaggo, pādi pavaggo. Sesā avaggāti siddhaṃ. Vaṇṇuddese ekaṭṭhānikānaṃ byañjanānaṃ vagge samūhe niyuttāti vaggā.
anya-e0201n0:40: Ante bindumatto vaṇṇo niggahītaṃ nāma. Niggayha gayhati uccāriyatīti niggahītaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:44_0: Cha ṭhānāni – kaṇṭhaṭṭhānaṃ, tāluṭṭhānaṃ, muddhaṭṭhānaṃ, dantaṭṭhānaṃ, oṭṭhaṭṭhānaṃ,
anya-e0201n0:44_1: nāsikaṭṭhānaṃ. Tesu byattaṃ vadantena yattha “akkha”nti vuccati, taṃ kaṇṭhaṭṭhānaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:44_2: Yattha “iccha”nti, taṃ tāluṭṭhānaṃ. Yattha “raṭṭha”nti, taṃ muddhaṭṭhānaṃ. Yattha
anya-e0201n0:44_3: “sattha”nti, taṃ dantaṭṭhānaṃ. Yattha “puppha”nti vuccati, taṃ oṭṭhaṭṭhānaṃ. Nāsapadeso nāsikaṭṭhānaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:45: Katthaci pana uraṭṭhānaṃ, siraṭṭhānaṃ, jivhāmūlaṭṭhānantipi āgataṃ. Tattha siraṭṭhānaṃ nāma muddhaṭṭhānameva. Jivhāmūlaṭṭhānaṃ pana sabbavaṇṇānaṃ sādhāraṇanti vadanti.
anya-e0201n0:46: Karaṇaṃ catubbidhaṃ – jivhāmūlaṃ, jivhopaggaṃ, jivhaggaṃ, sakaṭṭhānanti.
anya-e0201n0:47: Payatanaṃ catubbidhaṃ – saṃvuṭaṃ, vivaṭaṃ, phuṭṭhaṃ, īsaṃphuṭṭhanti. Tattha karaṇānaṃ sakasakaṭṭhānehi saddhiṃ saṃvaraṇādiko visesākāro saṃvuṭādi nāma.
anya-e0201n0:48_0: Tattha kaṇṭhapadesānaṃ aññamaññaṃ saṅghaṭṭanena uppannā avaṇṇa, kavagga, hakārā kaṇṭhajā
anya-e0201n0:48_1: nāma. Tālumhi jivhāmajjhasaṅghaṭṭanena uppannā ivaṇṇa, cavagga, yakārā tālujā nāma.
anya-e0201n0:48_2: Mukhabbhantaramuddhamhi jivhopaggasaṅghaṭṭanena uppannā ṭavagga, ra, ḷakārā muddhajā
anya-e0201n0:48_3: nāma. Upari dantapantiyaṃ jivhaggasaṅghaṭṭanena uppannā tavagga, la, sakārā dantajā
anya-e0201n0:48_4: nāma. Oṭṭhadvayasaṅghaṭṭanena uppannā uvaṇṇa, pavaggā oṭṭhajā nāma. Niggahītaṃ nāsikajaṃ
anya-e0201n0:48_5: nāma. Pañcavaggantā pana nāsikaṭṭhānepi sakaṭṭhānepi jāyanti. Ekāro kaṇṭhatālujo.
anya-e0201n0:48_6: Okāro kaṇṭhoṭṭhajo. Vakāro dantoṭṭhajo. Apica ivaṇṇuvaṇṇā kaṇṭhepi jāyantiyeva. Yadā
anya-e0201n0:48_7: hakāro vaggantehi vā ya, ra, la, vehi vā yutto hoti, tadā urajoti vadanti. Pañho,
anya-e0201n0:48_8: tuṇhi, nhāto, vimhito, gayhate, vulhate, avhānaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:49_0: Kaṇṭhaṃ saṃvaritvā uccārito akāro saṃvuṭo nāma. Sakasakaṭṭhāna, karaṇāni vivaritvā
anya-e0201n0:49_1: uccāritā sesasarā ca sa, hakārā ca vivaṭā nāma. Tāniyeva gāḷhaṃ phusāpetvā uccāritā
anya-e0201n0:49_2: pañcavaggā phuṭṭhā nāma. Thokaṃ phusāpetvā uccāritā ya, ra, la, vā īsaṃphuṭṭhā nāma.
anya-e0201n0:49_3: Tattha oṭṭhajesu tāva pavaggaṃ vadantānaṃ oṭṭhadvayassa gāḷhaṃ phusanaṃ icchitabbaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:49_4: Kasmā? Phuṭṭhapayatanikattā pavaggassa. Uvaṇṇaṃ vadantānaṃ pana oṭṭhadvayassa vivaraṇaṃ
anya-e0201n0:49_5: icchitabbaṃ. Kasmā? Vivaṭapayatanikattā uvaṇṇassa. Esa nayo sesesu sabbesūti.
anya-e0201n0:50_0: Cūḷaniruttiyaṃ pana sabbe rassasarā saṃvuṭā nāma, sabbedīghasarā vivaṭā nāmāti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:50_1: Tathā saddasāratthajāliniyaṃ, katthaci sakkaṭaganthe ca. Idaṃ yuttataraṃ. Aññaṭṭhānikabyañjanehi
anya-e0201n0:50_2: yuttā sarā attano ṭhāna, karaṇāni jahantāpi payatanaṃ na jahanti. Tasmā nānāvaṇṇānaṃ
anya-e0201n0:50_3: saṃsagge payatanānaṃ saṃsaggabhedopi veditabboti. Tattha “suṇātu me”ti vadanto yadi
anya-e0201n0:50_4: ṇā-kāraṃ jivhaggena dantaṭṭhāne katvā vadeyya, dantajo nā-kāro eva bhaveyya. Tu-kārañca
anya-e0201n0:50_5: jivhopaggena muddhaṭṭhāne katvā vadeyya, muddhajo ṭu-kāro eva bhaveyya. Evañca sati
anya-e0201n0:50_6: akkharavipatti nāma siyā. Esa nayo sesesu muddhajadantajesu. Tasmā kammavācaṃ sāventehi
anya-e0201n0:50_7: nāma ṭhāna, karaṇa, payatanesu suṭṭhu kusalehi bhavitabbanti.
anya-e0201n0:51: Sithilañca, dhanitañca, dīghaṃ, rassaṃ, garuṃ, lahuṃ;
anya-e0201n0:52: Niggahītaṃ, vimuttañca, sambandhañca, vavatthitaṃ nī. 9, 10, 11, 12, 13, 14, 15, 16-19, 20, 21 suttesu passitabbaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:53_0: Mudunā vacīpayogena vattabbā vaggapaṭhama, tatiya, pañcamā sithilā nāma. Thaddhena
anya-e0201n0:53_1: vacīpayogena vattabbā vaggadutiya, catutthā dhanitā nāma. Dīgha, rassā pubbe vuttā.
anya-e0201n0:53_2: Dīghā ceva saṃyogapubbā ca niggahītantā ca garukā nāma. Sesā lahukā nāma. Yathā saddasahito
anya-e0201n0:53_3: vāto mukhachiddena bahi anikkhamma nāsasotābhimukho hoti, tathā mukhaṃ avivaṭaṃ katvā
anya-e0201n0:53_4: vattabbaṃ byañjanaṃ niggahītaṃ nāma. Tena yuttāni sabbabyañjanāni niggahītantāni
anya-e0201n0:53_5: nāma. Sesā vimuttā nāma. Padasandhivasena vattabbaṃ sambandhaṃ nāma. Padacchedaṃ
anya-e0201n0:57: 9. Yuvaṇṇā iyuvaṇṇā (bahūsu) jhalā nāmassante ka. 58; rū. 29; nī. 205.
anya-e0201n0:58: Anitthiliṅgassa nāmassa ante ivaṇṇuvaṇṇā kamena jhalasaññā honti.
anya-e0201n0:63: , Ā iti dvipadaṃ. Itthiliṅge ākāro ghasañño hoti.
anya-e0201n0:68: 13. Vidhi visesanaṃ yaṃ tassa caṃ. 1.1.6; pā. 1.1.72; vidhibbisesanantassa (bahūsu).
anya-e0201n0:69: Sutte yaṃ visesanaṃ dissati, tassa vidhi ñātabbo.
anya-e0201n0:70: ‘Ato yonaṃ ṭāṭe’. Narā, nare. Yonanti visesanaṃ. Ṭāṭeti vidhi.
anya-e0201n0:78: Parassa sissamāno dissamāno (mū) vidhi ādivaṇṇassa ñātabbo.
anya-e0201n0:86: 19. Ṭānubandhonekavaṇṇo sabbassa caṃ. 1.1.12; pā. 1.1.55; ṭānubandhānekavaṇṇā sabbassa (bahūsu).
anya-e0201n0:87: Yo ca ṭānubandho ādeso, yo ca anekavaṇṇo ādeso, tadubhayaṃ chaṭṭhīniddiṭṭhassa sabbasseva vaṇṇasamudāyassa ñātabbaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:93: Ñānubandho āgamo ca kānubandho āgamo ca kamena chaṭṭhīniddiṭṭhassa ādimhi ca ante ca ñātabbo.
anya-e0201n0:99: Mānubandho āgamo sarānaṃ antasaramhā paro hoti.
anya-e0201n0:100: ‘Najjāyo svāma’. Najjāyo sandanti. ‘Maṃ vā rudhādīnaṃ’. Rundhati. ‘Jara sadānamīma vā’. Jīrati, sīdati.
anya-e0201n0:101_0: Imasmiṃ byākaraṇe anekasaratā nāma nadī, purisa iccādīsu liṅgapadesu eva atthi, gamu,
anya-e0201n0:101_1: pacaiccādīsu dhātupadesu natthi. Sabbadhātuyo byañjanantā eva honti, dhātvantalopakiccaṃ
anya-e0201n0:101_2: natthi. Tasmā najjāyoti ettha ī-kāro antasaro nāma. Tato ‘najjāyo svāma’ iti suttena
anya-e0201n0:101_3: ā-kārāgamo. Rundhatīti ettha pana u-kāro antasaro nāma, tato “maṃ vā rudhādīna”nti
anya-e0201n0:101_4: suttena bindāgamo. Evaṃ jīrati, sīdati iccādīsu. Mrammapotthakesu pana “mānubandho
anya-e0201n0:101_5: padānamantā paro”ti pāṭho, so sīhaḷapotthakehi na sameti.
anya-e0201n0:103: Samānavisayānaṃ dvinnaṃ vidhīnaṃ aññamaññapaṭisedharahite ṭhāne yebhuyyena paro vidhi okāsaṃ labhati.
anya-e0201n0:104: Cattārome bhikkhave dhammā aṅguttaranikāye -ettha cattārimeti pubbalope sampatte paralopo okāsaṃ labhati.
anya-e0201n0:106: Yo vaṇṇo payogassa avayavo na hoti, suttesu saṅketamatto hoti, so anubandho nāma.
anya-e0201n0:107: ‘Gossāva’. Gavassaṃ-etena padarūpavidhāne anubandho upayogaṃ na gacchatīti ñāpeti.
anya-e0201n0:109: Vaṇṇasaddo paro etasmāti vaṇṇaparo, vaṇṇaparena rassasarena savaṇṇopi gayhati sayañca, avaṇṇoti vutte ā-kāropi gayhati a-kāro cāti vuttaṃ hoti. Evaṃ ivaṇṇuvaṇṇesu.
anya-e0201n0:111: Ntuiti vutte vantu, mantu, āvantu, tavantūnaṃ sambandhībhūto ntukāro gayhati.
anya-e0201n0:112: ‘Ntantūnaṃ nto yomhi paṭhame’. Guṇavanto, satimanto, yāvanto, bhuttavanto.
anya-e0201n0:116: Lopo, dīgho, rasso, vuddhi, ādeso, āgamo, dvibhāvo, vipallāso.
anya-e0201n0:118: 26. Saro lopo sare ka. 12; rū. 13; nī. 30.
anya-e0201n0:119: Luppatīti lopo. Sare pare sarūpo vā asarūpo vā pubbo saro lopo hoti.
anya-e0201n0:121: Avaṇṇe-lokaggo apa. thera 1.12.57, bhavāsavo, dha. sa. 1102 avijjāsavo dha. sa. 1102, avijjānusayo vibha. 949.
anya-e0201n0:123: Uvaṇṇe-bahūpakāro jā. 1.22.588, bahukā ūmi bahūmi, sarabhuyā ūmi sarabhūmi, sarabhuyā udakaṃ sarabhūdakaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:125_0: Sotindriyaṃ vibha. 219, kāmupādānaṃ, bhavesanā dī. ni. 3.305, bhavogho dha. sa. 1156,
anya-e0201n0:125_1: so tuṇhassa pārā. 381, diṭṭhānusayo vibha. 949, diṭṭhupādānaṃ, diṭṭhekaṭṭhaṃ, diṭṭhogho
anya-e0201n0:125_2: dha. sa. 1156, mudindriyaṃ mahāva. 9, puttā matthi dha. pa. 62, urassa dukkho pāci.
anya-e0201n0:125_3: 402, asantettha na dissanti dha. pa. 304 iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:128: Pubbasaramhā sarūpo vā asarūpo vā paro saro kvaci lopo hoti.
anya-e0201n0:130_0: Taṃ kadāssu bhavissati jā. 2.22.144 ādayo; taṃ kudassu, kudāssu nāma dummedho, dukkhassantaṃ
anya-e0201n0:130_1: karissati dha. pa. 376, yadāssa sīlaṃ paññañca jā. 2.22.1474, tadāssu kaṇhaṃ yuñjanti
anya-e0201n0:130_2: jā. 1.1.29 -kaṇhanti mahākaṇhagoṇaṃ, taṇhāssa vippahīnā, māssu kujjha rathesabha,
anya-e0201n0:130_3: satthahārakaṃ vāssa pariyeseyya pārā. 167, 171, āgatāttha tumhe, sotukāmāttha tumhe,
anya-e0201n0:130_4: māyyo evarūpamakāsi, papaṃ avinduṃ jā. 1.1.2 -pavaḍḍhaṃ āpaṃ labhiṃsūtyattho, nālaṃ
anya-e0201n0:130_5: kabaḷaṃ padātave jā. 1.1.27 -pa+ādātaveti chedo, gaṇhituntattho, ruppatīti rūpaṃ,
anya-e0201n0:130_6: bujjhatīti buddho-dīgho, aggīva tappati, itthīva gacchati, nadīva sandati, mātupaṭṭhānaṃ,
anya-e0201n0:130_7: pitupaṭṭhānaṃ, yete dhammā ādikalyāṇā cūḷava. 399 iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:132_0: Itissa pāci. 465, itipi pārā. 1, assamaṇīsi pārā. 135, akataññūsi dha. pa. 383, vandehaṃ,
anya-e0201n0:132_1: sohaṃ, yassadāni mahāva. 242, chāyāva anapāyinī dha. pa. 2, mādisesu kathāva kā,
anya-e0201n0:132_2: kinnumāva samaṇiyo madhuvā maññati bālo dha. pa. 69, cakkhundriyaṃ vibha. 219, dveme
anya-e0201n0:132_3: bhikkhave dhammā a. ni. 2.3, tayome bhikkhave dhammā a. ni. 3.17 iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:133: Kvacīti kiṃ? Katamā cānanda aniccasaññā a. ni. 10.60.
anya-e0201n0:136: Dve pubbaparasarā kvaci lopā na honti vā.
anya-e0201n0:137: Appamādo amataṃ padaṃ dha. pa. 21, ko imaṃ pathaviṃvicessati dha. pa. 44.
anya-e0201n0:140_0: Ito paṭṭhāya yāvasandhikaṇḍāvasānā yuttaṭṭhānesu sabbattha kvacisaddo, vāsaddo ca
anya-e0201n0:140_1: vattante. Tattha kvacisaddo nānāpayogaṃ dasseti. Vāsaddo ekapayogassa nānārūpaṃ dasseti. Lopanisedho.
anya-e0201n0:142: Niggahītamhā parasarassa kvaci lopo hoti vā.
anya-e0201n0:143_0: Tvaṃsi pe. va. 47; jā. 2.22.764, candaṃva vimalaṃ suddhaṃ dha. pa. 413; su. ni. 642,
anya-e0201n0:143_1: cakkaṃva vahato padaṃ dha. pa. 1, halaṃdāni pakāsituṃ mahāva. 8, kinti vadeyyaṃ,
anya-e0201n0:146: Saṃyogassa ādibhūto byañjano kvaci lopo hoti vā.
anya-e0201n0:147_0: Pupphaṃsā uppajjati pārā. 36 – idha pubbasuttena saralopo, evaṃsa te āsavā pahīnā
anya-e0201n0:147_1: honti ma. ni. 1.24, sace bhutto bhaveyyāhaṃ, sājīvo garahito mama mi. pa. 6.1.5 -
anya-e0201n0:148_0: Tīsu byañjanesu sarūpānaṃ dvinnaṃ ādibyañjanassa lopo – agyāgāraṃ pāci. 326, agyāhito,
anya-e0201n0:148_1: vutyassa, vityānubhūyate, ekasataṃ khatyā jā. 2.22.594, ratyo, ratyā, ratyaṃ, sakvāhaṃ
anya-e0201n0:149: Sarūpānanti kiṃ? Titthyā puthuso vadanti su. ni. 897, catutthyantaṃ, chaṭṭhuntaṃ, cakkhvābādhaṃ, vatthvettha.
anya-e0201n0:154_0: Evāhaṃ cintayitvāna bu. vaṃ. 2.27, pupphadānaṃ adāsahaṃ-adāsiṃ+ahanti chedo, bindulopo,
anya-e0201n0:154_1: puna pubbasaralopo, tuyhatthāya mahāmuni, tuyhevetaṃ dukkaṭaṃ dī. ni. 2.178, tāsāhaṃ
anya-e0201n0:154_2: santike pāci. 709, tesāhaṃ evaṃ vadāmi, pañcannetaṃ dhammānaṃ adhivacanaṃ, channetaṃ
anya-e0201n0:154_3: dhammānaṃ adhivacanaṃ, samaṇa tveva pucchāmi jā. 2.22.253 samaṇa teva, brāhmaṇa tveva
anya-e0201n0:154_4: pucchāmi jā. 2.22.258 brāhmaṇa teva -tvaṃ+evāti chedo, vidūnaggamiti.
anya-e0201n0:158: Ariyasaccānadassanaṃ khu. pā. 5.11, etaṃ buddhāna sāsanaṃ dha. pa. 183, khandhānañca paṭipāṭi, dhātuāyatanāna ca dha. sa. aṭṭha. nidānakathā.
anya-e0201n0:160_0: Garuḷo uragāmiva jā. 1.4.124 supaṇṇo, dhammo arahatāmiva dī. ni. 2.348, āloko passatāmiva
anya-e0201n0:160_1: su. ni. 769, bako kakkaṭakāmiva jā. 1.1.38, nabhaṃ tārakitāmiva jā. 2.22.1989 tārācitāmiva,
anya-e0201n0:160_2: padumaṃ hatthagatāmiva jā. 2.22.2336 -etesu māgame bindulopo, byañjane pubbasaradīgho ca.
anya-e0201n0:162: Sārāgo, sāratto, avisāhāro, sārambho, sāraddho, sāketaṃ nagaraṃ, sādhāraṇaṃ, saṃ assa atthīti sāmī.
anya-e0201n0:167: Vicchāyaṃ ekassa vibhatyantassa padassa dvitte kate pubbapadassa syādilopo hoti.
anya-e0201n0:174: Mahāvuttisuttamidaṃ, tadaminādīni padarūpāni iminā nipātanena sijjhantīti attho.
anya-e0201n0:176_0: Lābu=alābu, pidhānaṃ=apidhānaṃ, dvāraṃ pidahitvā=apidahitvā, gini=aggini, ratnaṃ=ratanaṃ,
anya-e0201n0:176_1: nhānaṃ=nahānaṃ, asnāti=asanāti, hanti=hanati, hanti kuddho puthujjano a. ni. 7.64,
anya-e0201n0:176_2: phalaṃ ve kadaliṃ hanti a. ni. 4.68, sakkāro kāpurisaṃ hanti. Katthaci bahuvacanampi
anya-e0201n0:176_3: dissati. Vikkosamānā tibbāhi, hanti nesaṃ varaṃ varaṃ jā. 2.22.2370.
anya-e0201n0:178_0: Ārāmarukkhacetyāni=cetiyāni dha. pa. 188, athatthekasataṃ khatyā jā. 2.22.594 =khattiyā,
anya-e0201n0:178_1: tithyā puthuso vadanti su. ni. 897. Tithyā puthuso niviṭṭhā su. ni. 898 =titthiyā.
anya-e0201n0:182_0: Puttānañhi vadho dukho, mātigho labhate dukhaṃ, appassādā kāmā dukhā, natthi kāmaparaṃ
anya-e0201n0:182_1: dukhaṃ jā. 2.19.118, sekho=sekkho, apekhā=apekkhā, upasampadāpekho=upasampadāpekkho mahāva. 70 iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:184_0: Paṭisaṅkhā yoniso a. ni. 6.58, akkhāti=akkhāyati, gandhaṃ ghāti=ghāyati, abhiññā=abhiññāya,
anya-e0201n0:184_1: pariññā=pariññāya, adhiṭṭhā=adhiṭṭhāya, patiṭṭhā=patiṭṭhāya, āvīkatā hissa phāsu
anya-e0201n0:184_2: mahāva. 134, assavanatā dhammassa parihāyanti mahāva. 8, vipāko tadārammaṇatā uppajjati
anya-e0201n0:184_3: paṭṭhā. 3.1.98, dasāhaparamatā dhāretabbaṃ pārā. 462, nāyaṃ brāhmaṇabhojanatthā,
anya-e0201n0:184_4: tilodano hehiti jā. 1.8.1, visasenova gārayho, yassatthā rukkharopakā jā. 1.3.54
anya-e0201n0:184_5: =visasenovāti evaṃnāmako rājā eva, yassatthā dūramāyanti jā. 1.3.28 – yassāti udarassa,
anya-e0201n0:184_6: pitu atthā candavatī jā. 1.9.66, upādārūpaṃ, anupādā vimutto, saddhāpabbajito, upanidhāpaññatti.
anya-e0201n0:185: Mukharo=mukhakharo, vācākaraṇo=vākkaraṇo, vācāpatho=byappatho=vāssa byattaṃ, rassattañca, evaṃ byākho=evaṃ viya kho=vissa byattaṃ, dīgho ca yalopo ca.
anya-e0201n0:186: Lolupo, momuho, kukkuco, susukho, roruvoiccādīsu pana atisayatthadīpanatthaṃ padadvittaṃ katvā pubbapadesu akkharalopo.
anya-e0201n0:188: Datto=devadatto, assehi yutto ratho=assaratho, rūpabhavo=rūpaṃ, arūpabhavo=arūpaṃ iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:193: Pakkhittamidaṃ suttaṃ. Luttehi vā ādesakatehi vā vaṇṇehi sesā rassasarā kvaci dīghā honti vā.
anya-e0201n0:195_0: Tatrāyamādi bhavatiṃ dha. pa. 375, tatrābhiratimiccheyya dha. pa. 88; saṃ. ni. 5.198,
anya-e0201n0:195_1: buddhānussati, saddhīdha vittaṃ purisassa seṭṭhaṃ su. ni. 183, anāgārehi cūbhayaṃ
anya-e0201n0:195_2: dha. pa. 404; su. ni. 633, dhammūpasaṃhitā dī. ni. 2.349, tathūpamaṃ dhammavaraṃ
anya-e0201n0:195_3: adesayi khu. pā. 6.13, tesaṃ vūpasamo sukho dī. ni. 2.221 iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:197_0: Ajitāti bhagavā avoca su. ni. 1039, 1041, sumedho sājāto cāti, ruppatīti rūpaṃ saṃ.
anya-e0201n0:197_1: ni. 3.79, bujjhatīti buddho, sādhūtipatissuṇitvā dha. pa. aṭṭha. 1.4 kāḷayakkhinīvatthu,
anya-e0201n0:197_2: kiṃsūdha vittaṃ purisassa seṭṭhaṃ su. ni. 184 iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:201: Myāyaṃdhammo mahāva. 7, svāhaṃ pe. va. 485, vityānubhūyate iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:202: Yadipi imāni rūpāni byañjane uparisuttena sijjhanti, luttādesesu pana niccamiva dīghasiddhiñāpanatthaṃ idaṃ suttaṃ pakkhittanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:204: Byañjane pare rassadīghānaṃ kvaci dīgha, rassā honti vā. Tattha dīghavidhi nāma gāthāvasena vā āgamavasena vā vacanasukhavasena vā buddhisukhavasena vā hoti.
anya-e0201n0:206: Madhuvāmaññati bālo dha. pa. 69, khantī ca sovacassatā khu. pā. 5.10, evaṃ gāme munī care dha. pa. 49, sakko ujū ca suhujū ca khu. pā. 9.1 iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:208: Uragāmiva jā. 1.7.30, arahatāmiva dī. ni. 2.348, passatāmiva su. ni. 769 iccādi. Gāthāvasenātipi yujjati.
anya-e0201n0:211_0: Chārattaṃ mānattaṃ cūḷava. 97, pakaṭṭhaṃ vacanaṃ pāvacanaṃ, pāsādo, pākāro, pāvassi
anya-e0201n0:211_1: megho, nagaraṃ pāvisi, pāvekkhi, pārisuddhi, pāṭipado, caturāsītisahassāni dha. sa. aṭṭha. 584 iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:213: Sātthaṃ sabyañjanaṃ pārā. 1, sātthikā dhammadesanā, cakkhumāssa yathā andho iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:214: Bindulutte pana sārāgo, sāratto iccādīni pubbe uddhaṭāniyeva.
anya-e0201n0:217: Yiṭṭhaṃvahutaṃva loke dha. pa. 108, bhovādi nāma so hoti dha. pa. 396; su. ni. 625, yathābhāvi guṇena so iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:219_0: Yathayidaṃ a. ni. 1.1-4, tathayidaṃ, yathariva amhākaṃ bhagavā, tathariva bhikkhusaṅgho,
anya-e0201n0:219_1: sammadeva samācare saṃ. ni. 1.112, sammadakkhāto mayā satisambojjhaṅgo saṃ. ni. 5.194 iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:221_0: Akkamo, parakkamo, akkhāto, aññā, aññindriyaṃ, aññātaṃ bhagavā, aññātaṃ sugata, attharaṇaṃ,
anya-e0201n0:221_1: apphoṭeti, alliyati, acchindati, assādo, ābhassaro, pabhassaro, sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ,
anya-e0201n0:223: Kataññutā, atthaññutā, dhammaññutā, kaññato, nadito, vadhuto.
anya-e0201n0:231: Luttā pubbasaramhā vā parasaramhā vā sesānaṃ ivaṇṇuvaṇṇānaṃ kamena e, oādesā honti vā.
anya-e0201n0:233: Bandhusseva samāgamo, ateva me acchariyaṃ jā. 2.22.1988, vāteritaṃ, jineritaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:235: Gaṅgodakaṃ, pattaṃ vodakaṃ katvā cūḷava. 376, saṅkhyaṃ su. ni. 754 nopeti vedagū mahāni. 6, udakomiva jātaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:237: Veti, apeti, upeti, apekkhā, upekkhā iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:239_0: Rathesabho, janesabho, munelayo iccādi- tattha rathīnaṃ āsabho jeṭṭhakoti rathesabho,
anya-e0201n0:239_1: rathīnanti rathavantānaṃ ratharuḷhānaṃ yodhānanti attho. Janīnaṃ āsabho janesabho,
anya-e0201n0:239_2: janīnanti janavantānaṃ issarānaṃ. Munīnaṃ ālayo vihāro munelayo.
anya-e0201n0:241: Sundarā itthī sotthi, sundaro attho yassāti sotthi, rassattaṃ, maṅgalaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:246: Sare pare ivaṇṇuvaṇṇānaṃ ya, vādesā honti vā.
anya-e0201n0:248_0: Paṭisanthāravutyassa dha. pa. 376, sabbā vityānubhūyate, kyāhaṃ aparajjhāmi pārā.
anya-e0201n0:248_1: 383 – idha paṭhamaṃ bindhulopo, sutā ca paṇḍitātyattha, sutā ca paṇḍitātyamhā jā.
anya-e0201n0:248_2: 2.21.149, ñāto senāpatītyāhaṃ jā. 2.21.94, iccetaṃ kusalaṃ pārā. 411, iccassa vacanīyaṃ
anya-e0201n0:248_3: dīghanikāye, paccuttaritvā, paccāharati pārā. 305-307, pacceti, paccayo, acceti,
anya-e0201n0:248_4: accayo dī. ni. 1.251, accāyaṃ majjhimo khaṇḍo jā. 1.7.33 – atireko ayaṃ majjhimo
anya-e0201n0:248_5: khaṇḍotyattho, apuccaṇḍatā – aputiaṇḍatātyattho, jaccandho, jaccaghānako, jacceḷako,
anya-e0201n0:248_6: abbhuggacchati, abbheti, abbhokāso dī. ni. 1.191, ajjhokāso ajjhāgamā iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:249: Vātveva? Itissa muhuttampi pāci. 465, atisigaṇo, adhīritaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:250_0: Ettha ca iccetantiādīsu iminā suttena iti, pati, atiputi, jāti, abhi, adhisaddānaṃ
anya-e0201n0:250_1: ivaṇṇassa yattaṃ, ‘tavagga, varaṇāna’…nti suttena yamhi tavaggassa cattaṃ, ‘vagga,
anya-e0201n0:250_2: la, sehi te’ti suttena yassa pubbarūpattaṃ, abhi, adhisaddesu pana ‘catutthadutiyesvesa’…nti
anya-e0201n0:252_0: Cakkhvābādhamāgacchati, pātvākāsi ma. ni. 2.308, vatthvettha vihitaṃ niccaṃ, dvākāro
anya-e0201n0:252_1: mahāva. 9, madhvāsavo pāci. 328, anvayo, anveti, svākkhāto mahāva. 26, 62, svākāro
anya-e0201n0:254: Sare pare e, onaṃ ya, vādeso hoti vā.
anya-e0201n0:255_0: Kyassa byapathayo assu su. ni. 967, kyassu idha gocarā su. ni. 967 -ke+assa puggalassāti
anya-e0201n0:255_1: attho, byapathayoti vacanapathā, yathā nāmaṃ tathā jhassa-ce+assāti chedo, tyāhaṃ
anya-e0201n0:255_2: evaṃ vadeyyaṃ ma. ni. 1.30, tyassa pahīnā honti, putto tyāhaṃ mahārāja jā. 1.1.7,
anya-e0201n0:255_3: pabbatyāhaṃ gandhamādane jā. 2.22.397, adhigato kho myāyaṃ dhammo mahāva. 7, yyassa
anya-e0201n0:255_4: vippaṭisārajā, yyassa te honti anatthakāmā, yyassu maññāmi samaṇe-ettha ca avisiṭṭhepi
anya-e0201n0:255_6: yathā taṃ? ‘Yadāssa sīlaṃ paññañca’ jā. 2.22.1474 iccādīsu viya, kvatthosi jīvitena
anya-e0201n0:255_7: me, yāvatakvassa kāyo, tāvatakvassa byāmo dī. ni. 2.35, atha khvassa, atthi khvetaṃ
anya-e0201n0:255_8: brāhmaṇa, yatvādhikaraṇaṃ dī. ni. 1.213, yvāhaṃ, svāhaṃ iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:256: Vātveva? So ahaṃ vicarissāmi su. ni. 194, so ahaṃ bhante.
anya-e0201n0:258: Sare pare ivaṇṇuvaṇṇantānaṃ padānaṃ iyaṅa, uvaṅaādesā honti vā. Ṅānubandho antādesattho. Evaṃ sabbattha.
anya-e0201n0:261_0: Tiyantaṃ tyantaṃ – tattha tiyantanti iminā suttena siddhaṃ, tyantanti ‘yavā sare’ti
anya-e0201n0:261_1: suttena. Evaṃ sesesu. Aggiyāgāre agyāgāre, catutthiyatthe mahāva. 37 catutthyatthe,
anya-e0201n0:261_2: pañcamiyatthe pañcamyatthe, pathaviyākāso pathabyākāso, viyañjanaṃ byañjanaṃ, viyākato
anya-e0201n0:261_3: byākato, viyākaṃsu byākaṃsu, viyatto byatto, viyūḷho byūḷho, dhammaṃ adhiyeti ajjheti,
anya-e0201n0:261_4: patiyeti pacceti pattiyāyati vā, pariyaṅko pallaṅko, vipariyāso vipallāso, idha ekarūpaṃ
anya-e0201n0:261_5: hoti – pariyatti, pariyatto, pariyāyo, pallaṅkoiccādīsu parisadde rassa lattaṃ katvā
anya-e0201n0:261_6: issa ‘yavā sare’ti yatte kate yassa pubbarūpattaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:263: Bhikkhuvāsane, sayambhuvāsane, idhapi rūpadvayaṃ labbhati – duvaṅgikaṃ=dvaṅgikaṃ, bhuvādigaṇo=bhvādigaṇo iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:265: Evasadde pare itisaddassa i-kārassa vo hoti vā.
anya-e0201n0:266_0: Itveva coro aṅgulimālo, samuddotveva saṅkhyaṃ udā. 45 gacchati, mahāudakakkhandhotveva
anya-e0201n0:266_1: saṅkhyaṃ gacchati, mahāsammatotveva paṭhamaṃ akkharaṃ nibbattaṃ dī. ni. 3.131, isigilitveva
anya-e0201n0:267: Vāti kiṃ? Iccevattho, samuddoteva saṅkhyaṃ gacchati.
anya-e0201n0:268_0: Suttavibhattena evasadde pare aññati-kārassa vattaṃ. Vilapatveva so dijo jā. 1.6.103,
anya-e0201n0:268_1: anusetvevassa kāmarāgo, anusetvevassa rūparāgo – anuseti+eva+assāti chedo, hotveva
anya-e0201n0:270: Sarabyañjanabhūte vaṇṇe pare e, onaṃ attaṃ hoti vā. Tattha essa attaṃ yebhuyyena ma, dāgamesveva hoti.
anya-e0201n0:271_0: Akaramhasa te kiccaṃ jā. 1.4.29 – akaramhasetyattho, disvā yācakamāgate jā. 1.7.58;
anya-e0201n0:271_1: 2.22.2261, disvā paṇḍitamāgate jā. 2.22.783, yamāhu natthi vīriyanti jā. 2.18.162
anya-e0201n0:271_2: – ye+āhutyattho. Kadassu – ke+assu, yadeva te jātinissitā, tadeva te jarānissitāye+eva,
anya-e0201n0:271_3: te+evāti chedo, sve bhavo svātanaṃ pārā. 22 – byañjane dīgho.
anya-e0201n0:273_0: Sa sīlavā dha. pa. 84, sa paññavā, sa ve kāsāvamarahati dha. pa. 10, esa attho, esa
anya-e0201n0:273_1: dhammo dha. pa. 5, dinnamāsi janindena jā. 2.22.2161 (dinnamhāti janindena) – dinno+āsīti
anya-e0201n0:273_2: chedo, maggamatthi vibha. aṭṭha. 189 – maggo+atthi, aggamakkhāyati a. ni. 1.47, paccayākārameva
anya-e0201n0:273_3: ca vibha. aṭṭha. 225, saṅgho pabbatamiva, saddo cicciṭamiva, hiyyo bhavo hiyyattanaṃ,
anya-e0201n0:273_4: pāto asanaṃ pātarāso, pātamanusiṭṭho, kakusandha koṇāgamano, thera vādānamuttamo
anya-e0201n0:273_5: – kakusandhoti ca theroti ca chedo, theravādoti attho.
anya-e0201n0:274: Suttavibhattena animittepi hoti. Tuvañca dhanusekha ca jā. 1.16.239, paccayamahāpadeso hesa, ekakoṭṭhāso esa, abhilāpamattabhedo esa iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:276: Sare pare gossa antassa avaṅa hoti.
anya-e0201n0:278: Suttavibhattena byañjanepi. Sagavacaṇḍo a. ni. 4.108, paragavacaṇḍo.
anya-e0201n0:281_0: Puthujjano, puthubhūto-puthūti vā eko pāṭipadiko, puthunā puthunītipi dissati, apekkhiyāno
anya-e0201n0:281_1: apekkhiyānaapekkhitvātyattho. Evaṃ anumodiyāno, marīcikūpamaṃ abhisambuddhāno, mā
anya-e0201n0:281_2: maṃ pisācā khādantu, jīva tvaṃ saradosataṃ jā. 1.2.9, rattidivova so dibbo, mānusaṃ
anya-e0201n0:281_3: saradosataṃ-vassasatantyattho, anuyanti disodisaṃ dī. ni. 3.281, sampatanti disodisaṃ-taṃ
anya-e0201n0:281_4: taṃ disantyattho, parosataṃ, parosahassaṃ, aññoññaṃ aññamaññaṃ, ponopuññaṃ punappunaṃ,
anya-e0201n0:281_5: ponobbhavikā taṇhā-punoti vā eko nipāto, puno tassa mahe sino, puno pattaṃ gahetvāna,
anya-e0201n0:281_6: na ca dāni puno atthi, mama tuyhañca saṅgamo, na puno amatākāraṃ, passissāmi mukhaṃ
anya-e0201n0:283_0: Tadamināpetaṃ pariyāyena veditabbaṃ-taṃ etaṃ atthajātaṃ iminā pariyāyena veditabbanti
anya-e0201n0:283_1: attho, sakiṃ āgacchati sīlenāti sakadāgāmī, itthiyā bhāvo itthattaṃ, evumaṃ – evaṃ+imanti
anya-e0201n0:283_2: chedo, tvaṃ no satthā mahāmune, atthadhammavidū ise.
anya-e0201n0:285_0: Mātito dī. ni. 1.303, pitito, mātipakkho, pitipakkho, mātigho jā. 2.19.118, pitigho,
anya-e0201n0:285_1: mattikaṃ dhanaṃ pārā. 34, pettikaṃ dhanaṃ, api no lacchasi, kacci no tumhe yāpetha,
anya-e0201n0:285_2: kathaṃ no tumhe yāpetha, sotukāmattha no tumhe bhikkhave, na no samaṃ atthi khu.
anya-e0201n0:285_3: pā. 6.3, na hi no saṅkarantena ma. ni. 3.272, natthi no koci pariyāyo jā. 1.5.110
anya-e0201n0:285_4: (na hi no koci pariyāyo) – imesu tīsu nusaddo ekaṃsatthe, sosito sotatto ceva jā.
anya-e0201n0:285_5: 1.1.94 sotatto sosindo ceva; ma. ni. 1.157 – suṭṭhu sītalo suṭṭhu santattotyattho,
anya-e0201n0:287_0: Okandāmasi bhūtāni, pabbatāni vanāni ca jā. 2.22.2173 – avakandāmasetyattho, yaṃ
anya-e0201n0:287_1: karomasi brahmuno, tadajja tuyhaṃ dassāma dī. ni. 2.370, idha hemantagimhisu dha.
anya-e0201n0:287_2: pa. 286, buddhapaccekabuddhisu, cetehi cetaputtihi cariyā. 1.106 – cetaputtehi saddhintyattho.
anya-e0201n0:289_0: Manuññaṃ, na tenatthaṃ abandhisu jā. 1.6.7 – so tena vacanena atthaṃ na abandhi na
anya-e0201n0:289_1: labhītyattho. Avhāyantu su yuddhena jā. 2.22.871 – so pahāravacanena maṃ avhayantotyattho.
anya-e0201n0:289_2: Api nu hanukā santā jā. 1.1.146 – no hanukā ekantaṃ khinnā dukkhapattātyattho.
anya-e0201n0:294: Pañcavaggehi ca la, sehi ca parassa ya-kārassa kvaci te eva vagga la, sā honti vā yathākkamaṃ, ya-kāro pubbarūpattaṃ āpajjatīti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0201n0:295_0: Nipaccatīti nipako, nipakassa bhāvo nepakkaṃ, vipāko eva vepakkaṃ, vattabbanti vākkaṃ,
anya-e0201n0:295_1: vākyaṃ vā. Pamukhe sādhu pāmokkhaṃ – yassa pubbarūpatte kate ādidutiyassa paṭhamattaṃ,
anya-e0201n0:295_2: subhagassa bhāvo sobhaggaṃ, dobhaggaṃ, bhuñjitabbanti bhoggaṃ, yuñjitabbanti yoggaṃ,
anya-e0201n0:295_3: kukkucabhāvo kukkuccaṃ, vattabbanti vāccaṃ, vuccate, paccate, vaṇijānaṃ kammaṃ vāṇijjaṃ,
anya-e0201n0:297: Ādesabhūte vā vibhattibhūte vā paccayabhūte vā ya-kāre pare tavaggānaṃva, ra, ṇānañca cavagga, ba, ya, ñādesā honti vā yathākkamaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:298: Pokkharañño, pokkharaññā, pokkharaññaṃ, samaṇassa bhāvo sāmaññaṃ, evaṃ brahmaññaṃ, iccetaṃ kusalaṃ pārā. 411 iccādīni ‘yavā sare’ti sutte udāhaṭāni.
anya-e0201n0:299_0: Paṇḍitassa bhāvo paṇḍiccaṃ, santassa bhāvo saccaṃ, tathassa bhāvotacchaṃ, yajjevaṃ-yadi+evaṃ,
anya-e0201n0:299_1: najjo, najjā, najjaṃ, suhadassa bhāvo sohajjaṃ, vattabbanti vajjaṃ, jhānaṃ upasampajja
anya-e0201n0:299_2: viharati dha. sa. 160, upasampajjati, ajjhokāso, bojjhaṅgo, bojjhā, bodhiyā vā, bujjhitabbanti
anya-e0201n0:299_3: bojjhaṃ, bujjhati, ponopuññaṃ, thanato sambhūtaṃ thaññaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:301_0: Vappate, luppate, abbhuggato, abbhokāso, usabhassa bhāvo osabbhaṃ, labhiyateti labbhaṃ,
anya-e0201n0:301_1: labbhate, gāme hitaṃ gammaṃ, opammaṃ, sokhummaṃ, āgamma, upagamma, gamiyateti gammo,
anya-e0201n0:302: ‘Tavagga varaṇāna…’nti iminā suttena yamhi rassa yattaṃ –
anya-e0201n0:307: Puthabyā, puthabyaṃ, bhātu apaccaṃ bhātabyo, korabyo, dive bhavaṃ dibbaṃ dibyaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:309_0: Rahasi bhavaṃ rahassaṃ, somanassaṃ, domanassaṃ, sovacassaṃ, dovacassaṃ-manogaṇattā
anya-e0201n0:309_1: majjhe sāgamo, bhāsitabbanti bhassaṃ, ādissa=ādisitvā, uddissa=uddisitvā, upavassa=upavasitvā,
anya-e0201n0:313: Paṭihaññati, paṭaggi dātabbo, paṭicchanno, paṭippanno, byāvaṭo, udāhaṭo, dukkaṭaṃ iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:315: Pīḷanaṭṭho paṭi. ma. 1.17, saṅkhataṭṭho paṭi. ma. 1.17, aṭṭhiṃkatvā suṇeyya jā. 2.17.92, aṭṭhakathā iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:317: Gāmaṃ netīti gāmaṇi, senaṃ netīti senāṇi, paṇidhi, paṇidhānaṃ, paṇihitaṃ, paṇāmo, pariṇāmo, oṇāmo, uṇṇāmo, karaṇīyaṃ, karaṇaṃ, ñāṇaṃ, tāṇaṃ, pamāṇaṃ, saraṇaṃ, gahaṇaṃ iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:319: Paligho, palibodho, palipanno, pallaṅko, taluṇo taruṇo, kalunaṃ paridevayi jā. 2.22.2151, mahāsālo, aṭṭhasālinī, nayasālinī iccādīni.
anya-e0201n0:322: Nikkhamati, nikkhanto, nekkhamo, rājakiccaṃ karotīti khattā, kattā vā.
anya-e0201n0:326: Sayaṃ raṭṭhaṃ hitvāna, pupphadānaṃ dadātīti pupphadāniyo pupphadāniko, sippalivane vasatīti sippalivaniyo sippalivaniko, kumāriyā kumārikā.
anya-e0201n0:330: Lujjatīti loko, ārogyaṃ abhisajjetīti bhisakko, kulūpako kulūpago, khīrūpako khīrūpago, gīvūpakaṃ gīvūpagaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:334: Vinicchayo, acchariyaṃ, macchariyaṃ, raṃsiyo niccharanti-nigacchantīti attho.
anya-e0201n0:336: Atthi sāhassa jīvitaṃ jā. 2.22.314 -chāhaṃ+assāti chedo, saḷāyatanaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:340: Nissāya jāyatīti niyo, niyako vā, niyaṃ puttaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:342: Paṇṇatti paññatti, paṇṇāsaṃ paññāsaṃ. Paṇṇavīsati pañcavīsati.
anya-e0201n0:344: Nāmamattaṃ na nāyati, animittā na nāyare visuddhi. aṭṭha. 1.228 – na paññāyantīti attho.
anya-e0201n0:350: Jino, pino, lino, paṭisallino, paḷino, malino, supino, pahīno, dhuno, puno, luno, āhunaṃ, pāhunaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:354: Pariḷāho, āgantvā chavaṃ dahanti etthāti āḷahanaṃ, susānaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:356: Sugato, tathāgato, kusito, udati pasavatīti utu.
anya-e0201n0:358: Ekamidāhaṃ bhikkhave samayaṃ ma. ni. 1.501 -idhāti vā nipāto.
anya-e0201n0:360: Sāhu dassanamariyānaṃ dha. pa. 206, saṃhitaṃ, vihitaṃ, pihitaṃ, abhihitaṃ, sannihitaṃ, paṇihitaṃ, saddahati, vidahati, pidahati.
anya-e0201n0:362: Upaññāso=upanyāso, ñāyo=nyāyo-niccaṃ eti phalaṃ etenāti ñāyo, ñeyyaṃ=neyyaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:364: Thenassa kammaṃ theyyaṃ, therādhinanti therādheyyaṃ, pātimokkhaṃ, parādheyyakaṃ dukkhaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:368: Sambahulaṃ=sampahulaṃ, bahusanto na bharati su. ni. 98 =pahu santo na bharati.
anya-e0201n0:372: Cirappavāsiṃ dha. pa. 219, hatthippabhinnaṃ dha. pa. 326.
anya-e0201n0:374_0: Dīghāvu kumāro mahāva. 459 =dīghāyu kumāro, āyuṃ dhāretīti āvudhaṃ=āyudhaṃ, āyu assa
anya-e0201n0:374_1: atthīti atthe ‘āvuso’ti nipāto, kasāvo=kasāyo, kāsāvaṃ=kāsāyaṃ, sāliṃ lunātīti sālilāyako, tiṇalāyako.
anya-e0201n0:376: Nīlaṃ jalaṃ etthāti nerañjarā, jalaṃ gaṇhituṃ alanti arañjaro, sassataṃ pareti, ucchedaṃ pareti-paletīti attho.
anya-e0201n0:380_0: Byākato, byatto, byañjanaṃ, sīlabbataṃ, nibbānaṃ, nibbutaṃ, dibbaṃ, dibbati, sibbati,
anya-e0201n0:380_1: kubbati, kubbanto, krubbati, krubbanto, asevitabbattā vāretabboti bālo, pabbajito, pabbajjā iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:382: Ucchiṭṭhaṃ-avasiṭṭhantyattho, “dibbā saddā niccharanti, raṃsiyo vi. va. 730 niccharantī”ti etthāpi sassa chattaṃ icchanti.
anya-e0201n0:384: Uttiṭṭhapattaṃ upanāmenti mahāva. 64, “uttiṭṭhe nappamajjeyyā” ti ettha pana uddissa tiṭṭhanaṃ uttiṭṭhanti attho. “Uddissa ariyā tiṭṭhanti, esā ariyāna yācanā jā. 1.7.59”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:386: Niccaṃ dahati etthāti nidāgho, laghu lahu.
anya-e0201n0:392: Uddhammo, ubbinayo, uppatho, ummaggo, uññā avaññā, uññātaṃ avaññātaṃ, ujjhānasaññī.
anya-e0201n0:396_0: Uposatho – upavasathoti ṭhiti, nonītaṃ navanītaṃ, nivatthakoco nivatthakavaco, ko
anya-e0201n0:396_1: te balaṃ mahārāja, ko nu te rathamaṇḍalaṃ jā. 2.22.1880 – kvati attho. Ko te diṭṭho
anya-e0201n0:396_2: vā suto vā, vānaro dhammiko iti, ko nume gotamasāvakā gatā-kva nu+imeti chedo, soṇṇaṃ suvaṇṇaṃ iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:400_0: Atrajo putto, khetrajo putto attajo, khettajo, gotrabhū, vatrabhū, citraṃ, vicitraṃ,
anya-e0201n0:400_1: cittaṃ, vicittaṃ, utrastamidaṃ cittaṃ saṃ. ni. 1.98, utrāsī palāyī saṃ. ni. 1.249,
anya-e0201n0:400_2: yātrā ca me bhavissati ma. ni. 1.23 iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:402: Indriyaṃ, sukho udayo yassāti sukhudrayaṃ, dukkhudrayaṃ kammaṃ ma. ni. 2.109, pathavī undriyyati saṃ. ni. 1.158 – bhijjatītyattho, mittadrubbho mittaddubbho.
anya-e0201n0:404: Bhadraṃ bhaddaṃ, asso bhadro dha. pa. 143, sadā bhadrāni passati dī. ni. 2.153, sabbe bhadrāni passantu jā. 1.2.105, bhadrāni bhadrāni yānāni yojetvā, ludraṃ dī. ni. 2.43 luddaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:406: Brahāvanaṃ, brahantaṃ vā vanappatiṃ jā. 1.1.14, brahmā, brāhmaṇo – bāhitapāpattā arahā brāhmaṇoti vuccati, brahmuno apaccanti jātibrāhmaṇo vuccati.
anya-e0201n0:408: Byayo=vayo-vināsotyattho, kiccākiccesu byāvaṭo=vāvaṭo, paṅke byasanno=visanno, byamhito=vimhito, byamhaṃ=vimānaṃ-mānassa mhattaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:410: Acchi=akkhi, sacchi=sakkhi-saha akkhinā vattatīti atthe nipāto, paccakkhanti attho. Nibbānaṃ sacchikaroti mi. pa. 5.3.12, macchikā=makkhikā, lacchī=lakkhī-sirīti attho.
anya-e0201n0:412_0: Ācero ācariyo, na mātāpitarasaṃvaḍḍho, anācerakule vasaṃ jā. 1.1.9, āceramhi susikkhitā
anya-e0201n0:412_1: jā. 1.7.82, brahmacero brahmacariyo, tiṇhaṃ tikhiṇaṃ, taṇhā tasiṇā, suṇhā suṇisā,
anya-e0201n0:412_2: abhiṇhaṃ abhikkhaṇaṃ, paṇho pubbaṇho, paṇhe vajjho mahosadho jā. 1.15.324, surāmerayo-surāmereyyo,
anya-e0201n0:412_3: surāmereyyapānāni, yo naro anuyuñjati dha. pa. 247. Kammadhārayo= kammadhāreyyo,
anya-e0201n0:412_4: pāṭihīraṃ pāṭiheraṃ pāṭihāriyaṃ, accheraṃ acchariyaṃ, maccheraṃ maccharaṃ macchariyaṃ iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:414_0: Ekacciyo ekacceyyo ekacco, mātiyo macco, kiccayaṃ kiccaṃ, paṇḍitiyaṃ paṇḍiccaṃ, suvāmi
anya-e0201n0:414_1: sāmi, suvāmini sāmini, suvakehi puttehi sakehi puttehi, sattavo satto, tvañca uttamasattavo
anya-e0201n0:418: Vaggabyañjane pare niggahītassa sakavaggantabyañjanādeso hoti vā.
anya-e0201n0:419_0: Dīpaṅkaro, saṅkhāro, saṅgaho, sañcāro, sañjāto, saṇṭhitaṃ, attantapo, parantapo,
anya-e0201n0:419_1: amatandado, purindado, sandhi, sannidhi, sampatti, sambuddho, sambhavo, sambhāro,
anya-e0201n0:419_2: sambhinno, sammato iccādīsu niccaṃ, taṅkaro, taṃkaro iccādīsu aniccaṃ, buddhaṃ saraṇaṃ
anya-e0201n0:419_3: gacchāmi khu. pā. 1.saraṇattaya, na taṃ kammaṃ kataṃ sādhu iccādīsu dha. pa. 67 natthi.
anya-e0201n0:421: Vaggāvaggesu byañjanesu paresu niggahītaṃ pararūpaṃ gacchati –
anya-e0201n0:422_0: Sakkaroti, sakkato, sakkāro, sakkaccaṃ, takkattā, takkaro, takkhaṇaṃ taṅkhaṇaṃ taṃ
anya-e0201n0:422_1: khaṇaṃ, taggatikaṃ taṃ gatikaṃ, tanninno, tappoṇo, tappabbhāro, tappadhāno, etapparamo,
anya-e0201n0:422_2: yagguṇo yaṃguṇo, talleṇā, malleṇā, sallekho, paṭisallīno, tabbaṇṇanā taṃvaṇṇanā,
anya-e0201n0:422_3: tassamo taṃsamo, idappaccayatā, cirappavāsiṃ, hatthippabhinnaṃ iccādi. Imasmiṃ ganthe
anya-e0201n0:422_4: ekattha siddhampi taṃ taṃ rūpaṃ tattha tattha punappunampi vidhiyyati ñāṇavicittatthaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:424: Sare pare niggahītassa kvaci ma, ya, dā honti vā.
anya-e0201n0:425: Tattha dādeso ya, ta, etasaddehi napuṃsake dissati –
anya-e0201n0:426: Yadabravi jā. 1.2.143, tadaniccaṃ ma. ni. 2.19, etadavoca satthā su. ni. dvayatānupassanāsutta.
anya-e0201n0:428: Yadanantaraṃ, tadanantaraṃ, etadatthā kathā a. ni. 2.68. Etadatthā mantanā a. ni. 2.68 -tattha yassa atthassa vā yassa padassa vā yassā kathāya vā anantaraṃ yadanantaraṃ.
anya-e0201n0:429: Kvacitveva? Yametaṃ vārijaṃ pupphaṃ, adinnaṃ upasiṅghasi jā. 1.6.115.
anya-e0201n0:430: Mādeso ya, ta, etasaddehi pumitthiliṅgesu dissati –
anya-e0201n0:431: Yamāhu devesu sujampatīti jā. 1.15.54, tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā jā. aṭṭha. 1.20.35, etamatthaṃ viditvā mahāva. 2-3.
anya-e0201n0:432: Aññasaddehi pana dve ādesā tiliṅge dissanti –
anya-e0201n0:434: Yādeso idaṃsadde pare tasaddamhā eva kvaci dissati –
anya-e0201n0:435: Tayidaṃ na sādhu jā. 2.22.279, tayidaṃ na suṭṭhu jā. 2.22.279.
anya-e0201n0:437: Ya, eva, hisaddesu paresu niggahītassa ño hoti. Yassa pubbarūpattaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:438_0: Ānantarikaññamāhu khu. pā. 6.5 – ānantarikaṃ + yaṃ + āhūti chedo, yaññadeva-yaṃ +
anya-e0201n0:438_1: yaṃ + eva, taññeva taṃ+eva, purisaññeva, paccattaññeva, tañhi, purisañhi, atthasañhito
anya-e0201n0:440: Yamhi pare saṃ upasaggassa niggahītassa ño hoti. Yassa pubbarūpattaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:441: Saññogo saṃyogo, saññutto saṃyutto. Saṃyojanaṃ saṃyojanaṃ, saññamo saṃyamo, saññato saṃyato, saññamati saṃyamati, saññācikā saṃyācikā kuṭiṃ pārā. 348 iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:448_0: Paṇṇasālaṃ amāpetvā jā. 2.22.1913, paṇṇasālaṃ amāpiya jā. 1.1.148 – māpetvā iccevattho,
anya-e0201n0:448_1: na cāpi apunappunaṃ, hatthibondiṃ pavekkhāmi jā. 1.1.148 -punappunaṃ iccevattho,
anya-e0201n0:448_2: natthi loke anāmataṃ jā. 1.2.31 – amata pubbaṃ ṭhānanti attho, anavajjaṃ, anamataggo,
anya-e0201n0:450: Aḍḍhe ājāyare kule saṃ. ni. 1.49, manussesu paccājāto, āpūrati tassa yaso pari. 386.
anya-e0201n0:452: Dhammikathaṃ katvā pārā. 39, sarantā sapanti gacchantīti sarisapā.
anya-e0201n0:454: Kabaḷīkāro, manasīkāro, manasīkaroti, tappākaṭīkaroti, dūrībhūto, abyayībhāvo.
anya-e0201n0:456: Ñātiparijinassa bhāvo ñātipārijuññaṃ, evaṃ bhogapārijuññaṃ- parijinassāti parihānassa, parikkhayassa.
anya-e0201n0:458: Parosataṃ, saradosataṃ, disodisaṃ dha. pa. 42 iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:459: ‘Atippago kho tāva piṇḍāya caritu’ dī. ni. 3.1 nti ettha pātottho pagosaddo eva.
anya-e0201n0:462: Sare pareva na, ta, ra, gā ca ma, ya, dā ca āgamā honti.
anya-e0201n0:463: Go, to, do, no, mo, yo, ro, vo,
anya-e0201n0:465: Ariyehi puthagevāyaṃ janoti puthujjano mahāniddese, idha pana pagosaddo eva, pageva vutyassa, pageva manussitthiyāti pārā. 55.
anya-e0201n0:467: Ajjatagge dī. ni. 1.250, tasmātiha ma. ni. 1.29, katamo nāma so rukkho, yassa tevaṃ gataṃ phalaṃ jā. 2.18.10 -tevanti evaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:469_0: Udaggo, udabbahi, udapādi, udayo, udāhaṭo, udito, udīrito, dubhato vuṭṭhānaṃ paṭisambhidāmagge;
anya-e0201n0:469_1: visuddhimagge, dubhayāni viceyya paṇḍarāni su. ni. 531, todeyya, kappā dubhayo su.
anya-e0201n0:469_2: ni. 1131 – dve isayoti attho. Kiñcideva, kocideva, kismiñcideva, yāvadeva, tāvadeva,
anya-e0201n0:469_3: valutte-yāvade, tāvadeti siddhaṃ, punadeva, sakideva, sammadeva-dāgame rasso, sammadakkhāto
anya-e0201n0:469_4: saṃ. ni. 5.195, sammadaññā vimutto ma. ni. 2.234, bahudeva rattiṃ a. ni. 3.101, ahudeva
anya-e0201n0:471_0: Ito nāyati, ciraṃ nāyati, kamme sādhu kammaniyaṃ kammaññaṃ, attano idaṃ attaniyaṃ,
anya-e0201n0:471_1: addhānaṃ khamatīti addhaniyaṃ, lobhassa hitaṃ lobhaniyaṃ lobhaneyyaṃ, dosaniyaṃ dosaneyyaṃ,
anya-e0201n0:471_2: mohaniyaṃ mohaneyyaṃ, oghaniyaṃ, yoganiyaṃ, ganthaniyaṃ, niddhunanaṃ, niddhunanako,
anya-e0201n0:473_0: Lahumessati dha. pa. 369, garumessati, maggamatthi vibha. aṭṭha. 189, aggamakkhāyati
anya-e0201n0:473_1: a. ni. 4.34, uragāmiva jā. 1.7.30, arahatāmiva dī. ni. 2.348 iccādīni. Tathā kena
anya-e0201n0:473_2: te idha mijjhati pe. va. 181, rūpāni manupassati dha. sa. aṭṭha. 596, ākāse mabhipūjaye,
anya-e0201n0:473_3: aññamaññassa ma. ni. 3.40, ekamekassa pārā. aṭṭha. 1.23, samaṇamacalo a. ni. 4.87,
anya-e0201n0:475_0: Nayimassa vijjā mayamatthi jā. 1.3.25, yathayidaṃ a. ni. 1.21-22, tathayidaṃ, chayime
anya-e0201n0:475_1: dhammā a. ni. 6.11, navayime dhammā a. ni. 9.9, dasayime dhammā a. ni. 10.16, mamayidaṃ,
anya-e0201n0:475_2: soyeva, teyeva, taṃyeva taññeva, tehiyeva, tesaṃyeva tesaññeva, tasmiyeva, buddhoyeva,
anya-e0201n0:475_3: buddhesuyeva, bodhiyāyeva kāraṇā cariyā. 1.65, hotiyeva, atthiyeva iccādi. Tiyantaṃ,
anya-e0201n0:475_4: aggiyāgāre, catutthīyatthe iccādīni ivaṇṇantarūpāni yāgamenāpi sijjhantiyeva.
anya-e0201n0:477_0: Nirantaraṃ, niratthakaṃ, nirāhāro, nirābādho, nirālayo, nirindhano aggi, nirīhakaṃ,
anya-e0201n0:477_1: nirudakaṃ, nirutti, niruttaro, nirūmikā nadī, nirojaṃ, duratikkamo, durabhisambhavo,
anya-e0201n0:477_2: durāsadā buddhā apa. thera 1.40.270, durākhyāto dhammo dī. ni. 3.166, durāgataṃ,
anya-e0201n0:477_3: duruttaṃ vacanaṃ a. ni. 5.140, pāturahosi mahāva. 8, pāturahu jā. 1.14.202, pāturahesuṃ
anya-e0201n0:477_4: a. ni. 3.71, pātarāso, punareti, dhīratthu jā. 1.1.13, caturaṅgikaṃ jhānaṃ dha. sa.
anya-e0201n0:477_5: 168, caturārakkhā, caturāsītisahassāni, caturiddhilābho, caturoghā, vuddhiresā dī.
anya-e0201n0:477_6: ni. 1.251, pathavīdhāturevesā ma. ni. 3.348-349, āpodhāturevesā ma. ni. 3.350, sabbhireva
anya-e0201n0:477_7: samāsetha, nakkhattarājāriva tārakānaṃ, vijjuriva abbhakūṭe, āraggeriva, usabhoriva
anya-e0201n0:477_8: su. ni. 29, yathariva, tathariva dī. ni. 1.263 -rāgame rasso. Ettha ca yathā “atiriva
anya-e0201n0:477_9: kallarūpā su. ni. 688, ativiya lābhaggayasaggapatto, paraṃviya mattāya” iccādīsu
anya-e0201n0:477_10: iva, viyasaddā evatthe vattanti, tathā “yathariva, tathariva, varamhākaṃ bhusāmiva
anya-e0201n0:477_11: jā. 1.3.108, netaṃ ajjatanāmiva” iccādīsu ivasaddo evatthe vattati.
anya-e0201n0:479_0: Duvaṅgulaṃ, duvaṅgikaṃ, tivaṅgulaṃ, tivaṅgikaṃ, pāguññavujutā, vusitaṃ, vuttaṃ, vuccate,
anya-e0201n0:479_1: āsanā vuṭṭhāti pāci. 547, vuṭṭhānaṃ, vuṭṭhahitvā, bhikkhuvāsane, puthuvāsane, sayambhuvāsane
anya-e0201n0:482: Chaḷaṅgaṃ, chaḷāyatanaṃ, chaḷāsītisahassāni pe. va. 374, atthassa dvārā pamukhā chaḷete jā. 1.1.84, chaḷevānusayā honti abhidhammatthasaṅgaha, chaḷabhiññā mahiddhikā bu. vaṃ. 3.5.
anya-e0201n0:485: Manasikāro, mānasiko, cetasiko, abyaggamanaso naro a. ni. 1.30, putto jāto acetaso, ure bhavo oraso iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:487_0: Māhevaṃ ānanda dī. ni. 2.95, nohetaṃ bhante dī. ni. 1.185-186, nohidaṃ bho gotama
anya-e0201n0:487_1: dī. ni. 1.263, nahevaṃ vattabbe kathā. 1, hevaṃ vattabbe, hevaṃ vadati, ujū ca suhujūca
anya-e0201n0:491_0: Upavassaṃ kho pana pārā. 653, navaṃ pana bhikkhunā cīvaralābhena pāci. 368, appamādo
anya-e0201n0:491_1: amataṃ padaṃ dha. pa. 21, cakkhuṃ udapādi mahāva. 15, aṇuṃthūlāni dha. pa. 265, kattabbaṃ
anya-e0201n0:491_2: kusalaṃ bahuṃ dha. pa. 53, avaṃsirā patanti jā. 1.11.35, yadattho, tadattho, etadattho,
anya-e0201n0:491_3: takkattā, takkaro iccādīni pubbe vuttāneva, tathā taṃsampayutto, tabbohāro, tabbahulo iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:493: Mahāvuttinā padānaṃ ante gata, jāta, anta saddā āgamā honti.
anya-e0201n0:494_0: Rūpagataṃ ma. ni. 2.133 vedanāgataṃ ma. ni. 2.133, saññāgataṃ ma. ni. 2.133, gūthagataṃ
anya-e0201n0:494_1: ma. ni. 2.119, muttagataṃ ma. ni. 2.119, diṭṭhigataṃ mahāva. 66, atthajātaṃ pārā.
anya-e0201n0:494_2: aṭṭha. 1.paṭhamamahāsaṅgītikathā, dhammajātaṃ, suttanto kathā. 226, vananto, sammākammanto,
anya-e0201n0:498_0: Dvibhāvo tividho. Tattha pakkamo, parakkamo iccādi byañjanadvittaṃ nāma. Rukkhaṃ
anya-e0201n0:498_1: rukkhaṃ siñcati iccādi vibhatyantapadadvittaṃ nāma. Titikkhā, tikicchā, jagamā, jagamu
anya-e0201n0:500: Saramhā parassa byañjanassa kvaci dve rūpāni honti.
anya-e0201n0:501: Tattha saramhā pa, pati, paṭīnaṃ passa dvittaṃ –
anya-e0201n0:502: Appamādo, idhappamādo, vippayutto, sammappadhānaṃ, appativattiyaṃ dhammacakkaṃ mahāva. 17, suppatiṭṭhito, appaṭipuggalo, vippaṭisāro, suppaṭipanno iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:504: Kī, kudha, kamu, kusa, gaha, juta, ñā, si, su, sambhu, sara, sasa iccādīnaṃ dhātūnañca, u, du, nipubbānaṃ padānañca ādibyañjanassa dvittaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:510: Abhikkamati, abhikkamo, abhikkanto, akkamati, akkamo, akkanto, parakkamati, parakkamo, vikkamati, vikkamo, okkamati, okkanto.
anya-e0201n0:518: Aññā, paññā, abhiññā, pariññā, viññāṇaṃ, sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ, rattaññū, atthaññū, dhammaññū.
anya-e0201n0:534: Ukkaṃsati, ukkaṃso, uggaho, uccāreti, uccāro, uccayo, samuccayo, ujjalo, samujjalo, uṇṇamati, uttarati iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:536: Dukkaṭaṃ, dukkaraṃ, duggati, duccaritaṃ, duttaro, duddamo, dunnayo, dupposo, dubbalo, dummaggo, dullabho iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:538: Nikkamo, nikkhanto, niggato, niccoro, nijjaro, niddoso, nippāpo, nimmito, nimmāno, niyyānaṃ, nillolo, nibbānaṃ, nissayo iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:540: Kusalattikaṃ, vedanattikaṃ, vatthuttayaṃ, ratanattayaṃ, dvattiṃsaṃ, tettiṃsaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:542: Catubbidhaṃ, catuddasa, catuddisaṃ, catuppadaṃ, chabbidhaṃ, channavuti.
anya-e0201n0:545: Sajjano, sappuriso, saddhammo, santassa bhāvo sattā, sabbhāvo.
anya-e0201n0:547: Sīlabbataṃ, nibbānaṃ, nibbutaṃ iccādi pubbe vuttameva.
anya-e0201n0:549: Vattati, pavattati, nivattati, saṃvattati, vaṭṭati, vivaṭṭati.
anya-e0201n0:553: Sīmaṃ sammanneyya mahāva. 139, sīmaṃ sammannituṃ mahāva. 138, sīmaṃ sammannati mahāva. 139, sampaṭicchannaṃ, cīvaracetāpannaṃ, catunnaṃ, pañcannaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:556_0: Vagge catuttha, dutiyesu paresu kamena tatiya, paṭhamā esaṃ catuttha, dutiyānaṃ dvibhāvaṃ
anya-e0201n0:556_1: gacchanti, dutiyabhāvaṃ gacchantīti attho. ‘Saramhā dve’ti suttena vā ‘vaggalasehi
anya-e0201n0:556_2: te’iccādīhi vā dutiya, catutthānampi sadisatte jāte puna iminā suttena ādidutiyassa
anya-e0201n0:558: Ākkhātaṃ, pakkhittaṃ, pakkhepo, rūpakkhandho, vedanākkhandho, dhātukkhobho, āyukkhayo, nakkhamati.
anya-e0201n0:560: Pamukhe sādhu pāmokkhaṃ, paggharati, ugghosati, nigghoso.
anya-e0201n0:562_0: Acchādeti, acchindati-saṃyoge rassattaṃ, pacchādeti, pacchindati, setacchattaṃ, rukkhacchāyā,
anya-e0201n0:562_1: tathassa bhāvo tacchaṃ, rathassa hitā racchā, pajjhāyati, ujjhāyati, nijjhāyati,
anya-e0201n0:562_2: paṭhamajjhānaṃ, dutiyajjhānaṃ, ajjhokāso, bojjhaṅgo, dummedhassa bhāvo dummejjhaṃ,
anya-e0201n0:562_3: bujjhati, bujjhitabbaṃ, bojjhaṃ, paṭivijjha, paṭivijjhiya, paṭivijjhitvā iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:564: Yatraṭṭhitaṃ, tatraṭṭhito, uṭṭhito, niṭṭhito, thalaṭṭho, jalaṭṭho, vuḍḍho iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:566_0: Sumanatthero, yasatthero, avatthā, avatthānaṃ, vitthāro, abhitthuto, vitthambhito,
anya-e0201n0:566_1: uddharati, uddharaṇaṃ, uddhaṭaṃ, niddhāreti, niddhāraṇaṃ, niddhāritaṃ, niddhano,
anya-e0201n0:568_0: Vippharati, vippharaṇaṃ, vipphāro, apphoṭeti, mahapphalaṃ, nipphalaṃ, madhupphāṇitaṃ,
anya-e0201n0:568_1: vibbhamati, vibbhamo, ubbhataṃ, nibbhayaṃ, dubbharo, sabbhāvo, usabhassa bhāvo osabbhaṃ,
anya-e0201n0:569: Idhapi u, du, nito parapadānaṃ ādibyañjanassa dvittaṃ visesato icchanti.
anya-e0201n0:572: Vicchāyaṃ abhikkhaññe ca anekatthassa ekapadassa dve rūpāni honti. Bhinne atthe kriyāya vā dabbena vā guṇena vā byāpituṃ icchā vicchā. Punappunakriyā abhikkhaññaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:574: Rukkhaṃ rukkhaṃ siñcati. Gāme gāme sataṃkumbhā, gāmo gāmo ramaṇiyo, gehe gehe issaro, rasaṃ rasaṃ bhakkhayati, kriyaṃ kriyaṃ ārabhate.
anya-e0201n0:576_0: Mūle mūle thūlā, agge agge sukhumā, jeṭṭhaṃ jeṭṭhaṃ anupavesetha, imesaṃ devasikaṃ
anya-e0201n0:576_1: māsakaṃ māsakaṃ dehi, mañjūsakarukkho pupphaṃ pupphaṃ pupphati, ime janā pathaṃ pathaṃ
anya-e0201n0:576_2: accenti, sabbe ime aḍḍhā, katarā katarā imesaṃ aḍḍhatā, katamā katamā imesaṃ aḍḍhatā.
anya-e0201n0:578: Bhattaṃ pacati pacati, apuññaṃ pasavati pasavati, bhutvā bhutvā nippajjanti, paṭaṃ paṭaṃ karoti, paṭapaṭāyati, ekamekaṃ, ekamekāni iccādīsu vicchāsu pubbapade syādilopo.
anya-e0201n0:580: Atikkamma haraṇaṃ atihāro, na atihāro vītihāro, aññamaññassa antoyeva haraṇantiattho, vītihāratthe gamyamāne sabbādīnaṃ sabbanāmānaṃ dve rūpāni honti, pubbassekassa ca syādilopo.
anya-e0201n0:581: Ime dve janā aññamaññassa upakārakā, itarītarassa upakārakā, aññamaññaṃ passanti, aññamaññassa denti, aññamaññassa apenti, aññamaññassa dhanaṃ, aññamaññe nissitā.
anya-e0201n0:582: 57. Yāvatātāvaṃ sambhame caṃ. 6.3.14; pā. 8.1.12; yāvabodhaṃ sambhame (bahūsu).
anya-e0201n0:583_0: Yaṃ parimāṇamassāti yāvaṃ. Taṃ parimāṇamassāti tāvaṃ. Punappunaṃ bhamanaṃ pavattanaṃ
anya-e0201n0:583_1: sambhamo. Turitena vacīpayogena taṃ taṃ upāyadīpanaṃ sambhamo, āmeḍitameva vuccati,
anya-e0201n0:583_2: sambhame gamyamāne yāvatā yattakena padena so attho paññāyati, tattakaṃ padaṃ payujjate,
anya-e0201n0:583_3: dvikkhattuṃ vā tikkhattuṃ vā taduttari vā udīriyatetyattho. Yathābodhaṃ sambhametipi pāṭho, soyevattho.
anya-e0201n0:585: Hāse, soke, pasāde ca, kare āmeḍitaṃ budho.
anya-e0201n0:599: Abhikkamatha vāseṭṭhā abhikkamatha vāseṭṭhā dī. ni. 2.210.
anya-e0201n0:601: Kahaṃ ekaputtaka kahaṃ ekaputtaka saṃ. ni. 4.120.
anya-e0201n0:603: Abhikkantaṃ bho gotama abhikkantaṃ bho gotama ma. ni. 2.106 iccādi. Tikkhattuṃudānaṃ udānesi “namo tassa bhagavato” ma. ni. 2.357 iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:610: Yamhi pare hassa pubbāparavipallāso hoti vā.
anya-e0201n0:611: Dayhati, saṅgayhati, sannayhati, vuyhati, duyhati, muyhati.
anya-e0201n0:612: Vātveva? Saṅgaṇhiyati, evaṃ saṅgayha saṅgaṇhitvā, āruyha āruhitvā, ogāyha ogāhitvā. Pasayha pasahitvā.
anya-e0201n0:614: Vamhi pare hassa vipallāso hoti vā.
anya-e0201n0:615: Bavhābādho bahvābādho, bavhettha nhāyatī jano udā. 9 =bahvettha nhāyatī jano.
anya-e0201n0:618: Kuṭi me kayirati pārā. 358, vacanaṃ payirudāhāsi, garuṃ payirūpāsati, vandāmi te ayyire pasannacitto jā. 2.17.54 -yassa dvittaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:620: Nirayamhi apaccisuṃ jā. 2.22.60, te me asse ayācisuṃ jā. 2.22.1863. Imā gāthā abhāsisuṃ.
anya-e0201n0:622_0: Haññayyevāpi koci naṃ jā. 2.22.1193 – haññeyyāti ṭhiti, amūlamūlaṃ gantvā-mūlamūlaṃ
anya-e0201n0:622_1: agantvāti attho. Evaṃ paratra. Anokāsaṃ kārāpetvā pārā 389, animittaṃ katvā, saddhaṃ
anya-e0201n0:622_2: na bhuñjatīti asaddhabhoji, disvā padamanuttiṇṇaṃ jā. 1.1.20 – uttiṇṇaṃ adisvāti attho.
anya-e0201n0:624: Navaṃ pana bhikkhunā cīvaralābhena, nāgakaññā caritaṃ gaṇena jā. 1.15.268 -nāgakaññāgaṇena caritanti ṭhiti.
anya-e0201n0:627_0: Sandhividhānaṃ nāma bahulaṃ hoti, yebhuyyena hotīti attho. Adhikārasuttaṃ. Yāvaganthapariyosānā
anya-e0201n0:627_1: yuttaṭṭhānesu sabbattha vattate. Etena sabbasaddasuttesu aniṭṭhanivatti ca iṭṭhapariggaho ca kato hoti.
anya-e0201n0:633_0: Liṅgaṃ, nāmaṃ, pāṭipadikanti atthato ekaṃ, dabbābhidhānassa purisādikassa pakatirūpassetaṃ
anya-e0201n0:633_1: nāmaṃ. Tañhi sattannaṃ vibhattīnaṃ vasena vibhāgaṃ patvā kiñci visadarūpaṃ hoti,
anya-e0201n0:633_2: kiñci avisadarūpaṃ, kiñci majjhimarūpanti evaṃ tividhena liṅgarūpena yuttattā liṅganti vuccati.
anya-e0201n0:634: Tadeva kiñci saddaliṅgānurūpaṃ, kiñci atthaliṅgānurūpañca pariṇamantaṃ pavattati, tasmā nāmanti ca vuccati.
anya-e0201n0:635: Tadeva dhātu, paccaya, vibhattipadehi cevasaddapadatthakapadehi ca ‘visuṃ bhūtaṃ pada’nti katvā pāṭipadikanti ca vuccati.
anya-e0201n0:636: Tattha dhātupadaṃ nāma brū, bhū, hūiccādi.
anya-e0201n0:637: Paccayapadaṃ nāma ṇa, tabba, anīya iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:638: Vibhattipadaṃ nāma si, yo, aṃ, yo,ti, anti iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:639_0: Saddapadatthakapadāni nāma rājassa, sakhassa, pumassa iccādīni. Ettha ca rājassaiccādīni
anya-e0201n0:639_1: saddasutte saddapadatthakāni honti, payoge atthapadatthakāni. Dhātupaccayavibhattipadāni
anya-e0201n0:639_2: pana niccaṃ saddapadatthakāni eva honti, saddasuttesveva ca labbhanti, na payogeti,
anya-e0201n0:640_0: Yadievaṃ bhussa, brussa, bhūto, hūto, ṇe, tabbe, simhi, timhi iccādinā tehi kathaṃ
anya-e0201n0:640_1: vibhattuppatti hotīti? Anukaraṇapadāni nāma tāni atthissa, karotissa iccādīni viya,
anya-e0201n0:640_2: tasmā tāni ca rājassa iccādīni ca anukaraṇaliṅgabhāvena ettha saṅgayhanti, na ekantaliṅgabhāvenāti.
anya-e0201n0:640_3: Evañca katvā ‘dhātu- paccaya, vibhattivajjitamatthavaṃ liṅga’nti avocuṃ. Tattha atthavanti
anya-e0201n0:640_4: atthapadatthakaṃ vuccati, rājassaiccādikaṃ saddapadatthakaṃ vivajjeti, etena atthapadatthake
anya-e0201n0:640_5: sati taddhita, samāsa, kitakapadānampi ekantaliṅgabhāvaṃ sādhenti. Na hi tesaṃ liṅganāmabyapadesakiccaṃ
anya-e0201n0:640_6: atthi, yāni ca nāmassa visesanāni bhavituṃ arahanti, tāni upasagga, nipātapadāni
anya-e0201n0:641: 61. Dve dvekānekesu nāmasmā si yo aṃyo nā hi sa naṃ smāhi sanaṃsmiṃsu ka. 55; rū. 63; nī. 200.
anya-e0201n0:642: Ekasmiṃ atthe ca anekesu atthesu ca pavattā nāmasmā dve dve si, yo…pe… smiṃ, suvibhattiyo honti.
anya-e0201n0:643_0: Vibhajantīti vibhattiyo, ekamekaṃ pakatināmapadaṃ nānārūpavibhāgavasena kattu, kammādinānāatthavibhāgavasena
anya-e0201n0:643_1: ekatta, bahuttasaṅkhyāvibhāgavasena ca vibhajantīti attho. Si, lo iti paṭhamā nāma…pe…
anya-e0201n0:643_2: smiṃ, su iti sattamī nāma. Dvīsu dvīsu pubbaṃ pubbaṃ ‘ekasmiṃ atthe pavattaṃ vacana’nti
anya-e0201n0:643_3: ekavacanaṃ nāma. Paraṃ paraṃ ‘anekesu atthesu pavattaṃ vacana’nti anekavacanaṃ nāma.
anya-e0201n0:643_4: Bahuvacananti ca puthuvacananti ca etassa nāmaṃ. Sabbamidaṃ iminā suttena siddhaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:644: 62. Paṭhamātthamatte ka. 284; rū. 65; nī. 577; caṃ. 2.1.93; pā. 2.3.46.
anya-e0201n0:645: Kattu, kammādikaṃ bāhiratthaṃ anapekkhitvā liṅgatthamatte pavattā nāmasmā paṭhamāvibhatti hoti.
anya-e0201n0:646: Ayaṃ mama puriso, ime mama purisā.
anya-e0201n0:648: Āmantanaṃ vuccati ālapanaṃ. Āmantanavisaye liṅgatthamatte pavattā nāmasmā paṭhamāvibhatti hoti.
anya-e0201n0:653: 65. Kattukaraṇesu tatiyā ka. 286, 288; rū. 83; nī. 591, 594; caṃ. 2.1.62, 63; pā. 2.3.18.
anya-e0201n0:654: Nāmasmā kattari ca karaṇe ca tatiyāvibhatti hoti.
anya-e0201n0:655: Purisena kataṃ, purisehi kataṃ, purisena kulaṃ sobhati, purisehi kulaṃ sobhati.
anya-e0201n0:656: 66. Catutthī sampadāne ka. 293; rū 85, 301; nī. 605; caṃ. 2.1.73; pā. 2.3.13.
anya-e0201n0:659: 67. Pañcamyāvadhismiṃ ka. 295; rū. 89, 307; nī. 607 caṃ. 2.1.81; pā. 2.3.28; 1.4.24 pañcamyavadhismā (bahūsu).
anya-e0201n0:660: Avadhi vuccati apādānaṃ. Nāmasmā avadhiatthe pañcamīvibhatti hoti.
anya-e0201n0:662: 68. Chaṭṭhī sambandhe ka. 30; rū. 92, 315; nī. 609; caṃ. 2.1.95; pā. 2.3.50.
anya-e0201n0:670: 70. Itthiyamatvā ka. 237; rū. 176; nī. 466; caṃ. 2.3.15; pā. 4.1.4.
anya-e0201n0:671: Itthiyaṃ+ato+āti chedo. Akārantanāmamhā itthiyaṃ āpaccayo hoti.
anya-e0201n0:673: Kaññā, paññā, saññā, nāvā, sālā, taṇhā, icchā, bhikkhā, sikkhā, gīvā, jivhā, vīsā, tiṃsā, cattālīsā, paññāsā iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:674: Bhāsitapumehipi sabbanāmehi tabbā, nīya, tapaccayantehi ca niccaṃ –
anya-e0201n0:675: Sabbā, katarā, katamā, anubhavitabbā, anubhavanīyā, gatā, jātā, bhūtā, hūtā iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:677_0: Kalyāṇā, kalyāṇī, sundarā, sundarī, sobhaṇā, sobhaṇī, kumbhakārā, kumbhakārī, kumbhakārinī,
anya-e0201n0:677_1: atthakāmā, atthakāmī, atthakāminī, paribbājikā, paribbājikinī, ekākā, ekākinī, dīpanā, dīpanī iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:678: Suttavibhattena samāse mātu, dhītu iccādīhi āpaccayo hoti. Nandamātā, uttaramātā, devadhītā, rājadhītā, assamaṇī hoti asakyadhītarā iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:679_0: Ettha ca ‘itthiya’nti katthaci saddamattassa vā, katthaci atthamattassa vā itthibhāve
anya-e0201n0:679_1: jotetabbeti attho. Evañca sati itthipaccayāpi syādayo viya jotakamattā eva honti,
anya-e0201n0:680: 71. Nadādīhi ṅī ka. 238; rū. 187; nī. 467; nadādito vī (bahūsu).
anya-e0201n0:681: Nadādīhi itthiyaṃ ṅī hoti. Ṅānubandho ‘ntantūnaṃ ṅīmhi to vā’ti ettha visesanattho.
anya-e0201n0:682_0: Nadī, mahī, itthī, kumārī, taruṇī, vāseṭṭhī, gotamī, kaccānī, kaccāyanī, māṇavī,
anya-e0201n0:682_1: sāmaṇerī, nāvikī, pañcamī, chaṭṭhī, catuddasī, pañcadasī, sahassī, dasasahassī, satasahassī,
anya-e0201n0:682_2: kumbhakārī, mālakārī, cakkhukaraṇī, ñāṇakaraṇī, dhammadīpanī iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:683: 72. Ntantūnaṃ ṅīmhi to vā ka. 239, 241; rū. 190, 191; nī. 468, 471.
anya-e0201n0:684: Nta, ntūnaṃ to hoti vā ṅīmhi pare.
anya-e0201n0:685_0: Gacchatī, gacchantī, satī, santī, bhavissatī, bhavissantī, guṇavatī, guṇavantī, satimatī,
anya-e0201n0:685_1: satimantī, sabbāvatī, sabbāvantī, yāvatī, yāvantī, tāvatī, tāvantī, bhuttavatī, bhuttavantī.
anya-e0201n0:689: Vāti kiṃ? Gokāṇā pariyantacārinīti pāḷi. Tattha kāṇāti andhā.
anya-e0201n0:690: 74. Yakkhādīhinī ca ka. 238, 240; rū. 287, 193; nī. 467, 469; yakkhāditvinī ca (bahūsu).
anya-e0201n0:691: Yakkhādīhi akārantehi itthiyaṃ vī ca hoti inī ca.
anya-e0201n0:692: Yakkhī, yakkhinī, nāgī, nāginī, mahiṃsī, mahiṃsinī, migī, miginī, sīhī, sīhinī, dīpī, dīpinī, byagghī, byagghinī, kākī, kākinī, kapotī, kapotinī, mānusī, mānusinī iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:695: Ārāmikinī, antarāyikinī, nāvikinī, olumbikinī, paṃsukūlikinī, paribbājikinī, rājinī, ekākinī iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:697: Mānusinī mānusā vā, aññatra mānusī sampatti.
anya-e0201n0:700: Gharaṇī, vetraṇī, pokkharaṇī-esu nassa ṇattaṃ. Ācarinīyalopo, ācariyā vā.
anya-e0201n0:703: Mātubhātā mātulo, tassa bhariyā mātulānī, evaṃ varuṇānī, gahapatānī, ācariyānī, khattiyānī.
anya-e0201n0:706: Ivaṇṇantehi uvaṇṇantehi ca itthiyaṃ nī hoti.
anya-e0201n0:707_0: Chattapāṇinī, daṇḍapāṇinī, daṇḍinī, chattinī, hatthinī, mālinī, māyāvinī, medhāvinī,
anya-e0201n0:707_1: piyapasaṃsinī, brahmacārinī, bhayadassāvinī, atthakāminī, hitacārinī, bhikkhunī,
anya-e0201n0:707_2: khattiyabandhunī, paṭunī, paracittavidunī, mattaññunī, atthaññunī, dhammaññunī iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:710: Ahiṃsāratinī, dhammaratinī, vacchagiddhinī, puttagiddhinī, muṭṭhassatinī, micchādiṭṭhinī, sammādiṭṭhinī, attaguttinī iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:715: Ettha ca ‘ti’ iti suttavibhattena vīsa, tiṃsatopiti hoti vā. Vīsati, vīsaṃ, tiṃsati, tiṃsaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:716: 81. Upamā saṃhita sahita saññata saha sapha vāmalakkhaṇāditūrutvū caṃ. 2.3.79; pā. 4.1.69, 70 tūrutū (bahūsu).
anya-e0201n0:718: Aññapadatthasamāse upamādipubbā ūrusaddamhā itthiyaṃ ū hoti.
anya-e0201n0:719_0: Nāgassa nāsā viya ūrū yassāti nāganāsūrū, saṃhitā sambandhā ūrū yassāti saṃhitorū,
anya-e0201n0:719_1: sahitā ekabaddhā ūrū yassāti sahitorū, saññatā alolā ūrū yassāti saññatorū, ūruyā
anya-e0201n0:719_2: ūrunā? saha vattatīti sahorū, sapho vuccati khuro, saṃsiliṭṭhatāya saphabhūtā ūrū
anya-e0201n0:719_3: yassāti saphorū, vāmā sundarā ūrū yassāti vāmorū, lakkhaṇasampannā ūrū yassāti lakkhaṇorū.
anya-e0201n0:721_0: “Sace maṃ nāganāsūrū, olokeyya pabhāvatī”ti jā. 2.20.14 ca “ekā tuvaṃ tiṭṭhasi sahitūrū”ti
anya-e0201n0:721_1: jā. 1.16.297 ca “saññatūrū mahāmāyā, kumāri cārudassanā”ti jā. 2.17.109 ca “vāmorū
anya-e0201n0:721_2: saja maṃ bhadde”ti dī. ni. 2.348 ca “kāraṇaṃ nappajānāmi, sammatto lakkhaṇūruyā”ti
anya-e0201n0:721_3: dī. ni. 2.348 ca “gārayhassaṃ brahmabandhuyā”ti jā. 2.22.2109 ca pāḷipadāni dissanti.
anya-e0201n0:723: Ettha ca tāpaccayantā sabhāvaitthiliṅgā eva – lahutā, mudutā, gāmatā, janatā, devatā iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:724_0: Tathā tipaccayantā – gati, mati, ratti, sati, tuṭṭhi, diṭṭhi, iddhi, siddhi iccādi,
anya-e0201n0:724_1: tathā yāgu, dhātu, dhenu, kaṇḍu, kacchu, mātu, dhītu, duhitu iccādi, jambū, vadhū,
anya-e0201n0:724_2: camū, sutanū, sarabū iccādi ca. Sakkataganthesu pana sutanū, sarabū iccādīsupi ūpaccayaṃ vidahanti.
anya-e0201n0:725: Tattha itthiliṅgabhūtā sabbe ‘ivaṇṇuvaṇṇā pitthiya’nti suttena niccaṃ pasaññā honti. ‘Ākāro ca ghā’ti suttena niccaṃ ghasañño.
anya-e0201n0:728: Itthiliṅgaṃ chabbidhaṃ ākārantaṃ, ikārantaṃ, īkārantaṃ, ukārantaṃ, ūkārantaṃ, okārantaṃ. Tattha kaññāsaddamhā atthamatte paṭhamā.
anya-e0201n0:730: Kenaci suttena aladdhavidhīnaṃ gasīnaṃ lopo hotīti silopo.
anya-e0201n0:733: Jantu, hetūhi ca punnapuṃsakesu īkārantehi ca ghato ca pasaññehi ivaṇṇuvaṇṇehi ca yonaṃ lopo hoti vā.
anya-e0201n0:737: Ghato ca brahmādito ca gassa e hoti vā. Ādisaddena isi, muni, revatī, kattu, khattuiccāditopi.
anya-e0201n0:738_0: Bhoti kaññe, bhoti kaññā, bhotiyo kaññāyo, bhotī kaññāyo, “uṭṭhehi puttika pabbajjā
anya-e0201n0:738_1: dukkarā puttika” iti therīpāḷi therīgā. 465, tasmā ge pare mahāvuttinā rassopi yujjati.
anya-e0201n0:738_2: Kusajātake “na me akāsi vacanaṃ, atthakāmāya puttike”tipi jā. 2.20.47 atthi.
anya-e0201n0:740: Kaññaṃ passati, kaññā passati, kaññāyo passati.
anya-e0201n0:742: 85. Ghapatekasmiṃ nādīnaṃ yayā ka. 111, 112; rū. 179, 183 nī. 283, 284.
anya-e0201n0:743: Ghato ca pasaññehi ivaṇṇuvaṇṇehi ca ekatte pavattānaṃ nādīnaṃ pañcannaṃ ekavacanānaṃ kamena ya, yā honti.
anya-e0201n0:744_0: Kaññāya kataṃ, kaññāhi kataṃ. Ettha ca ghatopi yāādeso dissati. “Te ca tattha nisīditvā,
anya-e0201n0:744_1: tassa rukkhassa chāyayā” jā. 1.14.182 ti ca “samantā parivāriṃsu, tassa rukkhassa
anya-e0201n0:744_2: chāyayā” jā. 1.14.189 ti ca pāḷi, tathā “sakkharopamayā vade” saccasaṅkhepa 176 gāthā,
anya-e0201n0:744_3: “bāladārakalīlayā”ti vibhāvinī 154 ca dissanti. Mahāvuttinā ghassa rasso.
anya-e0201n0:746: Tesaṃ kamena mhā, bhi, mhi honti vā. Ete ādesā gāthāsu bahulaṃ dissanti.
anya-e0201n0:748: Sampadāne catutthī, kaññāya deti, kaññānaṃ deti, kaññāya ābhataṃ vatthaṃ, kaññānaṃ ābhataṃ vatthaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:749: Apādāne pañcamī, kaññāya apeti, kaññamhā apetirassattaṃ, kaññāhi kaññābhi apeti.
anya-e0201n0:750: Sambandhe chaṭṭhī, kaññāya santakaṃ, kaññānaṃ santakaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:753: Ghato ca pasaññehi ivaṇṇuvaṇṇehi ca smiṃno yaṃ hoti vā.
anya-e0201n0:754: Kaññāyaṃ tiṭṭhati, kaññāya tiṭṭhati, kaññāsu tiṭṭhati.
anya-e0201n0:755: Saddhā medhā paññā vijjā, cintā mantā vīṇā taṇhā.
anya-e0201n0:756: Icchā mucchā ejā māyā, mettā mattā sikkhā bhikkhā.
anya-e0201n0:757: Jaṅghā gīvā jivhā vācā, chāyā āsā gaṅgānāvā.
anya-e0201n0:758: Gāthā senā lekhā sākhā, mālā velā pūjā khiḍḍā.
anya-e0201n0:760: Devatā vaṭṭakā godhā, balākā parisā sabhā.
anya-e0201n0:761: Ūkā sephālikā laṅkā, salākā vālikā sikhā.
anya-e0201n0:762: Visākhā visikhā sākhā, gacchā vañjhā jaṭā ghaṭā.
anya-e0201n0:763: Jeṭṭhā soṇḍā vitaṇḍā ca, varuṇā vanitā latā.
anya-e0201n0:764: Kathā niddā sudhā rādhā, vāsanā sīsapā papā.
anya-e0201n0:765: Pabhā sīmā khamā jāyā, khattiyā sakkharā surā.
anya-e0201n0:766: Dolā tulā silā līlā, lāle’lā mekhalā kalā.
anya-e0201n0:767: Vaḷavā’ lambusā mūsā, mañjūsā sulasā disā.
anya-e0201n0:768: Nāsā juṇhā guhā īhā, lasikā vasudhādayo.
anya-e0201n0:770: Gasaññehi amba, anna, ammaiccetehi gassa e na hoti.
anya-e0201n0:772: Ambādīnaṃ rasso hoti vā ge pare.
anya-e0201n0:773: Bhoti amba, bhoti ambā, bhoti anna, bhoti annā, bhoti amma, bhoti ammā, sesaṃ kaññāsamaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:776: Sabhāparisāhi smiṃnoti hoti. ‘Gho ssaṃssāssāya tīsū’ti suttena timhi rasso.
anya-e0201n0:777_0: Sabhati, sabhāya, sabhāyaṃ, sabhāsu, parisati, parisāya, parisāyaṃ, parisāsu, tamaddasa
anya-e0201n0:777_1: mahābrahmā, nisinnaṃ samhi parisati, iti bhagavā tasmiṃ parisati suvaṇṇavaṇṇaṃ kāyaṃ
anya-e0201n0:779_0: Acchariyaṃ nandamāte, abbhutaṃ nandamāte a. ni. 7.53, bhoti devadhīte, bhoti sakyadhītare-mahāvuttinā
anya-e0201n0:779_1: samāse syādīsu ārattaṃ rassattañca. Ltupaccayantā pana yebhuyyena tīsu liṅgesu samānarūpā
anya-e0201n0:779_2: honti, “atthadhammaṃ paripucchitā ca uggahetā ca dhammānaṃ sotā ca payirūpāsitā cā”ti
anya-e0201n0:779_3: therīpāḷi. Tathā kvaci gacchantādisaddāpi. Tamokhandhaṃ padālayaṃ, evaṃ dubbhāsitaṃ
anya-e0201n0:779_4: bhaṇaṃ iccādi-tattha padālayanti padālayantī, bhaṇanti bhaṇantīti attho.
anya-e0201n0:780: Vīsā, tiṃsā, cattālīsā, paññāsā iccete saṅkhyārāsimhi āgamissanti.
anya-e0201n0:786: Tiliṅge yonaṃ lope ca niādese ca rassānaṃ dīgho hoti.
anya-e0201n0:789: Vibhattibhūte vibhattādesabhūte ca yakāre pare pasaññassa ivaṇṇassa lopo hoti. Gāthāsuyeva idaṃ vidhānaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:791: 63. Ayunaṃ vā dīgho ka. 88; rū. 147; nī. 245.
anya-e0201n0:792: Ge pare tiliṅge aiunaṃ dīgho hoti vā.
anya-e0201n0:793: He rattī, he ratti. Bahuvacane he rattī, he rattiyo, he ratyo.
anya-e0201n0:794: Aṃvacane ‘paro kvacī’ti suttena parasare lutte niggahītaṃ pubbe ivaṇṇuvaṇṇesu tiṭṭhati.
anya-e0201n0:795_0: Rattiṃ, tathā itthiṃ, dhenuṃ, vadhuṃ, aggiṃ, daṇḍiṃ, bhikkhuṃ, sayambhuṃ iti. Rattiyaṃ,
anya-e0201n0:795_1: ‘bujjhassu jinabodhiya’nti pāḷi bu. vaṃ. 2.182, rattinaṃ vā, ‘yāvanto purisassatthaṃ,
anya-e0201n0:796: Rattī, rattiyo, ratyo-‘ghapatekasmiṃ nādīnaṃ yayā’ti nādīnaṃ yā hoti, rattiyā, yakāre pare ivaṇṇalopo, ratyā.
anya-e0201n0:798: Su, naṃ, hisu rassānaṃ dīgho hoti.
anya-e0201n0:799: Rattīhi, rattībhi, rattiyā, ratyā, rattīnaṃ, rattiyā, ratyā, rattīhi, rattībhi, rattiyā, ratyā, rattīnaṃ, rattiyā, ratyā, rattiyaṃ, ratyaṃ, rattīsu.
anya-e0201n0:800: Ettha garū su, naṃ, hisu dīghattaṃ aniccaṃ icchanti, taṃ gāthāsu yujjati.
anya-e0201n0:801: Patti yutti vutti kitti, mutti titti khanti kanti.
anya-e0201n0:802: Santi tanti siddhi suddhi, iddhi vuddhi buddhi bodhi.
anya-e0201n0:803: Bhūmi jāti pīti suti, nandi sandhi sāṇi koṭi.
anya-e0201n0:804: Diṭṭhi vuḍḍhi tuṭṭhi yaṭṭhi, pāḷi āḷi nāḷi keḷi.
anya-e0201n0:805: Sati mati gati muti, dhīti yuvati vikati.
anya-e0201n0:806: Rati ruci rasmi asani vasani osadhi aṅguli dhūli dudrabhi
anya-e0201n0:809: 95. Rattādīhi ṭo smiṃno ka. 69; rū. 186; nī. 218, 219; rattyādīhi ṭo smino (bahūsu) ratyādīhi (katthaci).
anya-e0201n0:810: Rattisadda, ādisaddehi smiṃno ṭo hoti vā.
anya-e0201n0:811_0: Divā ca ratto ca khu. pā. 6.2; jā. 1.9.92, ādo, ādimhi, pādādo, pādādimhi, gāthādo,

anya-e0201n0:812_3: jā. 2.18.61 -katanti kataṃ nāmaṃ, susādhūti atisundaraṃ. ‘Anuññāto ahaṃ matyā, sañcatto
anya-e0201n0:812_4: pitarā aha’nti jā. 2.22.29 pāḷipadāni. ‘Mātīnaṃ dohaḷo nāma janinda vuccatī’ jā.
anya-e0201n0:812_5: 2.22.1347 ti ca pāḷi, vīsati, tiṃsati, saṭṭhi, sattati, asīti, navuti, koṭi, pakoṭi
anya-e0201n0:815: 96. Simhi nānapuṃsakassa ka. 85; rū. 150; nī. 239 moga-du. 66; sismiṃ (bahūsu).
anya-e0201n0:816: Simhi pare anapuṃsakassa pumitthīnaṃ dīghassa rasso na hoti.
anya-e0201n0:819: Gho ca o ca gho, na gho agho. Ekavacanesu ca yosu ca paresu gha, ovajjitānaṃ sabbesaṃ dīghānaṃ rasso hoti.
anya-e0201n0:822: Ge pare gha, ovajjitānaṃ sabbesaṃ dīghānaṃ rasso hoti vā.
anya-e0201n0:823: Bhoti itthi, bhoti itthī, bhotiyo itthī, bhotiyo itthiyo, bhotiyo ithyo, itthiṃ passati.
anya-e0201n0:825: Yo pasañño īkāro, tato aṃvacanassa yaṃ hoti vā.

anya-e0201n0:826_2: itthībhi, itthiyā, ithyā, itthīnaṃ, itthiyā, itthimhā, ithyā, itthīhi, itthībhi,
anya-e0201n0:826_3: itthiyā, ithyā, itthīnaṃ, itthiyā, ithyā, itthiyaṃ, ithyaṃ, itthimhi, itthīsu.
anya-e0201n0:827: Nadī sandati, nadī sandanti, nadiyo sandanti.

anya-e0201n0:828_2: 262-3-4, nādyekavacanesu najjā kataṃ, najjā deti, najjā apeti, najjā santakaṃ, najjā
anya-e0201n0:829_0: Evaṃ gacchatī gacchantī, satī santī, asatī asantī, mahatī mahantī, brahmatī brantī,
anya-e0201n0:829_1: bhotī bhontī, bhavissatī bhavissantī, gamissatī gamissantī, guṇavatī guṇavantī, sīlavatī

anya-e0201n0:829_3: bhuttāvantī, sabbāvatī sabbāvantī, yāvatī yāvantī, tāvatī tāvantī. Kamhi āgame rasso, yāvatikā, tāvatikā.
anya-e0201n0:830: Gāvī, yakkhī, yakkhinī, ārāmikinī, daṇḍapāṇinī, daṇḍinī, bhikkhunī, paracittavidunī, muṭṭhassatinī, gharaṇī, pokkharaṇī, ācarinī, mātulānī, gahapatānī iccādayo. Nadādi.
anya-e0201n0:833: Yosu paresu nadiyā ante āmaāgamo hoti vā.
anya-e0201n0:834_0: Najjāyo sandanti saṃ. ni. 3.224, najjāyo supatitthāyo jā. 2.22.1414 ti pāḷi, nimijātake
anya-e0201n0:834_1: pana najjonupariyāyati, nānāpupphadumāyutāti ca najjo cānupariyātīti jā. 2.22.537
anya-e0201n0:834_2: ca pāḷi, tattha mahāvuttinā sissa ottaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:835_0: Uṭṭhehi revate supāpakamme vi. va. 863, dāsā ca dāsyo ca, anujīvino jā. 1.10.101,
anya-e0201n0:835_1: bārāṇasyaṃ mahārāja, kākarājā nivāsako jā. 1.3.124, bārāṇasyaṃ ahu rājā jā. 1.16.178,
anya-e0201n0:835_2: rañño mano ummādantyā niviṭṭho, ummādantyā ramitvāna, sivirājā tato siyaṃ jā. 2.18.70,
anya-e0201n0:835_3: dārakeva ahaṃ nessaṃ. Brāhmaṇyā paricārake jā. 2.22.2111. Tathā yosu pokkharañño.
anya-e0201n0:835_4: Nādīsu pathabyā, puthabyā, pokkharaññā. Smiṃmhi pathabyā, pathabyaṃ, puthabyā, puthabyaṃ,
anya-e0201n0:835_5: pokkharaññā, pokkharaññaṃ, vetraññā, vetraññaṃ ve traraññā, (nissaya) iccādīni dissanti.

anya-e0201n0:838_1: bhoti dhenū, bhotiyo dhenuyo, bhotiyo dhenū, dhenuṃ passati, dhenuyo passati, dhenū
anya-e0201n0:838_2: passati, dhenuyā, dhenūhi, dhenūbhi, dhenuyā, dhenūnaṃ, dhenuyā, dhenumhā, dhenūhi,
