anya-e0201n0:839: Evaṃ yāgu, kāsu, daddu, kaṇḍu, kacchu, rajju, kareṇu, piyaṅgu, sassu iccādayo. Dhenvādi.
anya-e0201n0:840: Dhātusaddo pana pāḷinaye itthiliṅgo, saddasatthanaye pumitthiliṅgo.
anya-e0201n0:841: Mātu, dhītu, duhitusaddā itthi liṅgā, tesaṃ rūpaṃ pitādigaṇe āgamissati.
anya-e0201n0:844_0: Vadhū gacchati, vadhū gacchanti, yosu rasso, vadhuyo gacchanti, bhoti vadhu, bhoti
anya-e0201n0:844_1: vadhū, bhotiyo vadhū, vadhuyo, vadhuṃ, vadhū, vadhuyo, vadhuyā, vadhūhi, vadhūbhi,
anya-e0201n0:844_2: vadhuyā, vadhūnaṃ, vadhuyā, vadhumhā, vadhūhi, vadhūbhi, vadhuyā, vadhūnaṃ, vadhuyā,
anya-e0201n0:844_3: vadhuyaṃ, vadhūsu. Evaṃ jambū, sarabhū, sutanū, nāganāsūrū, saṃhitorū, vāmorū, lakkhaṇūrū,
anya-e0201n0:845: Sāhaṃ gantvā manussattaṃ, vadaññū vītamaccharāti vi. va. 634 ca kodhanā akataññū cāti jā. 1.1.63 ca pāḷiyo, tasmā nīpaccayaṃ vināpi kvaci ūkārantakitakasaddā itthiliṅgā bhavanti.
anya-e0201n0:848_0: Gosaddo dviliṅgo. Tassa rūpāni kānici dviyatthavasena itthiyampi vattanti pumepi
anya-e0201n0:848_1: vattanti missakepi vattanti, kānici itthiyaṃ kānici pume. Idha pana sabbāni yāni
anya-e0201n0:849: Silopo, gogacchati-ettha ca goti abhinnasaddaliṅgattā goṇotipi yujjati, gāvītipi yujjati.
anya-e0201n0:851: Ga, si, hi, naṃvajjitāsu vibhattīsu gosaddassa gāva, gavādesā honti.
anya-e0201n0:854: Gāvo, gavo, he go, he gāvo, he gavo, gāvaṃ, gavaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:859: Gossa gāva, gavādesato nāvacanassa ā hoti vā.
anya-e0201n0:860: Gāvā, gavā, gohi, gobhi, gāvassa, gavassa.
anya-e0201n0:862: Sena saha gossa gavaṃ hoti vā.
anya-e0201n0:865: Naṃnā saha gossa gunnañca hoti gavañca.
anya-e0201n0:866_0: Gunnaṃ, gavaṃ, gāvasmā, gavasmā, gāvamhā, gavamhā, gāvā, gavā, gohi, gobhi, gāvassa,
anya-e0201n0:866_1: gavassa, gavaṃ, gonaṃ, gunnaṃ, gavaṃ, gāvasmiṃ, gāvamhi, gāve, gavasmiṃ, gavamhi,
anya-e0201n0:867_0: Yosu gāva, gavādese kate ato yonaṃ ṭā, ṭe ca honti, usabhā rukkhā gāviyo gavā ca
anya-e0201n0:867_1: jā. 1.1.77. Balagavā dammagavā vā gaṅgāya pāraṃ agamiṃsu. Athāpare patāresi balagāve
anya-e0201n0:867_2: dammagāve ma. ni. 1.352 (thokaṃ visadisaṃ) ti pāḷipadāni.
anya-e0201n0:868_0: Ettha ca gāvo no paramā mittā, yāsu jāyanti osadhā su. ni. 298 ti ca, gavā khīraṃ,
anya-e0201n0:868_1: khīramhā dadhi, dadhimhā navanītaṃ, navanītamhā sappi, sappimhā sappimaṇḍoti ca itthiyaṃ
anya-e0201n0:868_2: vattanti. Gāviyo gavāti ca balagavā dammagavā balagave dammagaveti ma. ni. 1.351
anya-e0201n0:868_3: ca gāvuṃ vā te dammi gāviṃ vā te dammīti ca gavaṃva siṅgino siṅganti jā. 1.12.39
anya-e0201n0:868_4: ca pume bhavanti. Atittheneva gāvo patāresi, atha kho tā gāvo majjhe gaṅgāya anayabyasanaṃ
anya-e0201n0:868_5: āpajjiṃsū ma. ni. 1.350 ti ca annadā baladā cetā, vaṇṇadā sukhadā ca tā, etamatthavasaṃ
anya-e0201n0:868_6: ñatvā, nāssu gāvo haniṃsu teti su. ni. 298 ca bhaddavasena itthiyaṃ atthavasena missake
anya-e0201n0:868_7: vattanti. Gunnaṃ ce taramānānaṃ, gavaṃ ce taramānānaṃ, ujuṃ gacchati puṅgavo, sabbā
anya-e0201n0:868_8: tā ujuṃ gacchantīti jā. 1.4.135; 2.18.104 ca missake eva. Balagava, dammagavasaddā
anya-e0201n0:868_9: jaraggava, puṅgava, sagava, paragava, dāragavasaddā viya akārantā samāsasaddātipi yujjati.
anya-e0201n0:869: Missakaṭṭhānesu pana itthibahulattā tā gāvo etā gāvotiādinā itthiliṅgameva dissati.
anya-e0201n0:875: Sattavidhaṃ pulliṅgaṃ – adantaṃ, ādantaṃ, idantaṃ, īdantaṃ, udantaṃ, ūdantaṃ, odantaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:879: 108. Ato yonaṃ ṭāṭe ka. 107; rū. 69; nī. 275, 277.
anya-e0201n0:880: Ato paṭhamāyonaṃ dutiyāyonañca kamena ṭā, ṭe honti puṃ, napuṃsakesu. Ṭānubandho sabbādesattho.
anya-e0201n0:882: ‘Gasīna’nti silopo, bho purisa, ‘ayunaṃ vā dīgho’ti dīgho, bho purisā, bhonto purisā, purisaṃ, purise.
anya-e0201n0:884: Ato nāvacanassa enādeso hoti puṃ, napuṃsakesu.
anya-e0201n0:887: Su, hisu paresu assa e hoti puṃ, napuṃsakesu.
anya-e0201n0:890: Sassa ādimhi sāgamo hoti. Ukāro uccāraṇattho, ñānubandho ādimhīti dīpanattho.
anya-e0201n0:893: Ato smā, smiṃnaṃ kamena ṭā, ṭe honti puṃ, napuṃsakesu.
anya-e0201n0:894: Purisā, purisehi, purisebhi, purisassa, purisānaṃ, purisasmiṃ, purisamhi, purise, purisesu.
anya-e0201n0:895: Evaṃ buddho, dhammo, saṅgho, sakko, devo, satto, naro, goṇo, puṅgavo, jaraggavo, sagavo, paragavo, rājagavo, mātugāmo, orodho, dāroiccādi.
anya-e0201n0:898: Ato sissa kvaci e hoti vā puṃ, napuṃsakesu.
anya-e0201n0:900_0: Vanappagumbe yatha phussitagge khu. pā. 6.13; su. ni. 236, “ke gandhabbe rakkhase
anya-e0201n0:900_1: ca nāge, ke kimpurise cāpi mānuse. Ke paṇḍite sabbakāmadade. Dīgharattaṃ bhattā me
anya-e0201n0:900_2: bhavissati” jā. 2.22.1352. Natthi attakāre natthi parakāre natthi purisakāre dī.
anya-e0201n0:900_3: ni. 1.168, eke ekatthe, same samabhāge, nahevaṃ vattabbe kathā. 1, ke chave siṅgāle,
anya-e0201n0:900_4: ke chave pāthikaputte dī. ni. 3.29-31 iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:902: Bhogavatī nāma mandire, nagare nimmite kañcanamaye jā. 2.22.1370 iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:905_0: Mahāvuttinā paṭhamāyonañca kvaci ṭe hoti. Bāle ca paṇḍite ca sandhāvitvā saṃsaritvā
anya-e0201n0:905_1: dukkhassantaṃ karissanti dī. ni. 1.168, kvaci yonaṃ pakati hoti, vane vāḷamigā ceva,
anya-e0201n0:905_2: acchakokataracchayo, bahūhi paripanthayo jā. 2.22.255, kyassa byapathayo assu iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:909: Ādisaddena asa bhuvi, niccaṃ vāgamo. Ayyasaddamhā mahāvuttinā ālapane ga, yonaṃ ṭo hoti vā. Bho ayyo ayya vā, bhonto ayyo ayyā vā. Sesaṃ purisasamaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:912: Mano, manā, bho mana, bho manā, bhonto manā.
anya-e0201n0:913: 115. Manādīhi smiṃsaṃnāsmānaṃ sisoosāsā ka. 181-2, 184; rū. 95-97; nī. 373-4, 376-7.
anya-e0201n0:914: Tehi smiṃ, sa, aṃ, nā, smānaṃ kamena si, so, o, sā, sā honti vā.
anya-e0201n0:915_0: Manaṃ, mano, mane, manena, manasā, manehi, manebhi, manassa, manaso, manānaṃ, manasmā,
anya-e0201n0:915_1: manamhā, manasā, manā, manehi, manebhi, manassa, manaso, manānaṃ, manasmiṃ, manamhi,
anya-e0201n0:916: Tamo, tapo, tejo, siro, uro, vaco, rajo, ojo, ayo, payo, vayo, saro, yaso, ceto, chando, radhatā, aho iccādi manogaṇo.
anya-e0201n0:917: Idaṃ manogaṇalakkhaṇaṃ. Kriyākamme odanto, nādīnaṃ sāditā, samāsataddhitamajjhe odanto cāti.
anya-e0201n0:918: Yo ve dassanti vatvāna, adāne kurute mano jā. 1.15.61, kassapassa vaco sutvā, tapo idha pakrubbati saṃ. ni. 1.204, ceto paricca jānāti dī. ni. 1.242, siro te bādhayissāmi iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:919_0: Manasā ce pasannena dha. pa. 2, vippasannena cetasā jā. 2.22.551, vacasā manasā ceva,
anya-e0201n0:919_1: vandā me te tathāgate parittapāḷi āṭānāṭiyasutta. Ekūnatiṃso vayasā dī. ni. 2.214,
anya-e0201n0:919_2: tejasā yasasā jalaṃ vi. va. 857, tapasā uttamo satto, ghatena vā bhuñjassu payasā
anya-e0201n0:919_3: vā, vandāmi sirasā pāde jā. 2.20.68, ye etā upasevanti, chandasā vā dhanena vā jā.
anya-e0201n0:919_4: 2.21.350, urasā panudissāmi jā. 2.22.1833, ayasā paṭikujjhito a. ni. 3.36 iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:920: Na mayhaṃ manaso piyo jā. 1.10.11, cetaso parivitakko udapādi pārā. 18, cetaso samannāhāro, sādhu khalu payaso pānaṃ, sāvittī chandaso mukhaṃ ma. ni. 2.400 iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:921: Sādhukaṃ manasi karotha dī. ni. 2.3, etamatthaṃ cetasi sannidhāya, sirasi añjaliṃ katvā apa. thera 1.41.82, urasilomo, pāpaṃ akāsi rahasi iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:922_0: Manodhātu, manomayaṃ, tamokhandhaṃ padālayi, tapodhano, tejodhātu, siroruhā kesā,
anya-e0201n0:922_1: saroruhaṃ padumaṃ, rajoharaṇaṃ vatthaṃ, ojoharaṇā sākhā, ayopatto, vayoguṇā anupubbaṃ
anya-e0201n0:922_2: jahanti, yasodharā devī, cetoyuttā dhammā, chandovicitipakaraṇaṃ, rahogato cintesi,
anya-e0201n0:923: Mahāvuttinā ahamhā smiṃno ni ca u ca hoti, tadahani, tadahu. Rahamhā smiṃno o hoti, mātugāmena saddhiṃ eko ekāya raho nisīdati pārā. 452, raho tiṭṭhati, raho manteti.
anya-e0201n0:935_0: Tattha kodhādiko pulliṅgo, padādiko napuṃsako. Tattha keci saddā samāsa, taddhitamajjhe
anya-e0201n0:935_1: odantā honti ka. 183; rū. 48; nī. 375, āpodhātu, āpomayaṃ, vāyodhātu, vāyomayaṃ,
anya-e0201n0:935_2: jīva tvaṃ saradosataṃ jā. 1.2.9, anuyanti disodisaṃ dī. ni. 3.281 iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:936_0: Keci nāssa sādesaṃ labhanti, kodhasā usunā vijjhi jā. 2.22.352, daḷhaṃ gaṇhāhi thāmasā
anya-e0201n0:936_1: jā. 1.7.30, padasāva agamāsi, mākāsi mukhasā pāpaṃ, saccena danto damasā upeto-damasāti
anya-e0201n0:936_2: indriyadamanena, suciṃ paṇītaṃ rasasā upetaṃ jā. 1.7.18, vegasā gantvāna, āyusā ekaputtamanurakkhe
anya-e0201n0:937: Keci smiṃno syādesaṃ labhanti, padasi, bilasi iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:938: Kehici mahāvuttinā nā, smānaṃ so hoti, atthaso, akkharaso, suttaso, byañjanaso, hetuso, yoniso, upāyaso, ṭhānaso, dīghaso, oraso, bahuso, puthuso, mattaso, bhāgaso iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:939: “Padaso dhammaṃ vāceyya pāci. 45, bilaso vibhajitvā nisinno assa” dī. ni. 2.378 iccādīsu pana vicchāyaṃ sopaccayo.
anya-e0201n0:940_0: Yadā pana samāsante mahāvuttinā syādīsu vibhattīsu sāgamo hoti, tadā purisādigaṇopi
anya-e0201n0:940_1: hoti, byāsattamanaso, abyaggamanaso a. ni. 3.29, putto jāto acetaso jā. 2.22.4, sumedhaso
anya-e0201n0:940_2: a. ni. 4.62, bhūrimedhaso su. ni. 1137 iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:949: 121. Ntantūnaṃ nto yomhi paṭhame ka. 92; rū. 100; nī. 249.
anya-e0201n0:950: Paṭhame yomhi savibhattīnaṃ nta, ntūnaṃ nto hoti.
anya-e0201n0:953: Ge pare savibhattīnaṃ nta, ntūnaṃ ṭa, ṭā, aṃ honti.
anya-e0201n0:954: Bho guṇava, bho guṇavā, bho guṇavaṃ, bhonto guṇavantā, bhonto guṇavanto, guṇavantaṃ, guṇavante, guṇavantena.
anya-e0201n0:956: Sa, smā, smiṃ, nāsu savibhattīnaṃ nta, ntūnaṃ kamena to, tā,ti, tā honti vā.
anya-e0201n0:958: 124. Naṃmhi taṃ vā ka. 128; rū. 104; nī. 304.
anya-e0201n0:959: Naṃmhi savibhattīnaṃ nta, ntūnaṃ taṃ hoti vā.
anya-e0201n0:960_0: Guṇavantānaṃ, guṇavataṃ, guṇavantasmā, guṇavantamhā, guṇavantā, guṇavatā, guṇavantehi,
anya-e0201n0:960_1: guṇavantebhi, guṇavantassa, guṇavato, guṇavantānaṃ, guṇavataṃ, guṇavantasmiṃ, guṇavantamhi,
anya-e0201n0:961: Evaṃ bhagavā, sīlavā, paññavā, balavā, dhanavā, vaṇṇavā, bhogavā, sutavā iccādi. Ettha ca ālapane bhagavāti niccaṃ dīgho.
anya-e0201n0:962: Sabbāvā, sabbāvanto, sabbāvantaṃ, sabbāvante, sabbāvantena, sabbāvatā, sabbāvantehi…pe… sabbāvantesu.
anya-e0201n0:963_0: Evaṃ yāvā, yāvanto, tāvā, tāvanto, ettāvā, ettāvanto, kiṃvā, kiṃvanto, kittāvā, kittāvanto
anya-e0201n0:963_1: iccādi. Tathā bhojanaṃ bhuttavā, bhuttavanto, dhammaṃ buddhavā, buddhavanto, kammaṃ
anya-e0201n0:964_0: Satimā, satimantā, satimanto, bho satima, bho satimā, bho satimaṃ, bhonto satimantā,
anya-e0201n0:964_1: bhonto satimanto, satimantaṃ, satimante, satimantena, satimatā, satimantehi, satimantebhi,
anya-e0201n0:964_2: satimantassa, satimato, satimantānaṃ, satimataṃ, satimantasmā, satimantamhā, satimantā,
anya-e0201n0:964_3: satimatā, satimantehi, satimantebhi, satimantassa, satimato, satimantānaṃ, satimataṃ,
anya-e0201n0:965: Evaṃ matimā, gatimā, pāpimā, jātimā, bhāṇumā, āyumā, āyasmā, sirimā, hirimā, dhitimā, kittimā, iddhimā, jutimā, mutimā, thutimā, buddhimā, cakkhumā, bandhumā, gomā iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:967: 125. Himavato vā o ka. 94; rū. 105; nī. 252.
anya-e0201n0:968: Simhi himavantasaddassa o hoti vā. ‘Gasīna’nti lopo.
anya-e0201n0:969: Himavanto pabbato dha. pa. 304, himavā pabbato.
anya-e0201n0:970: 126. Ntassa ca ṭa vaṃse ka. 93; rū. 106; nī. 251.
anya-e0201n0:971: Aṃ, sesu ntassa ca ntussa ca sabbassa ṭa hoti vā.
anya-e0201n0:972: “Ajjhogāhetvā himava”nti apa. thera 2.47.59 pāḷi. Satimaṃ, bandhumaṃ, guṇavassa, satimassa, bandhumassa.
anya-e0201n0:973_0: Mahāvuttinā kvaci simhi ge ca pare ntussa attaṃ hoti, “atulo nāma nāmena, paññavanto
anya-e0201n0:973_1: jutindharo”ti bu. vaṃ. 21.10 ca “gatimanto satimanto, dhitimanto ca yo isī”ti theragā.
anya-e0201n0:973_2: 1052 ca “cakkhumanto mahāyaso”ti ca “tuyhaṃ pitā mahāvīra, paññavanta jutindharā”ti
anya-e0201n0:974_0: Paṭhamāyomhi kvaci ntussa ṭa hoti, vaggumudātīriyā pana bhikkhū vaṇṇavā honti pārā.
anya-e0201n0:974_1: 194, etha tumhe āvuso sīlavā hotha a. ni. 5.114, cakkhumā andhakā honti, ye itthīnaṃ
anya-e0201n0:974_2: vasaṃ gatā jā. aṭṭha. 2.3.36, saṃsuddhapaññā kusalā mutimā bhavanti su. ni. 887 (saṃsuddhapaññā kusalā mutīmā).
anya-e0201n0:978: Simhi ntassa aṃ hoti vā. Silopo.
anya-e0201n0:979_0: Gacchaṃ, gacchanto, gacchantā, gacchanto, bho gaccha, bho gacchā, bho gacchaṃ, bhonto
anya-e0201n0:979_1: gacchantā, bhonto gacchanto, gacchantaṃ, gacchante, gacchantena, gacchatā, gacchantehi,
anya-e0201n0:979_2: gacchantebhi, gacchantassa, gacchato, gacchantānaṃ, gacchataṃ, gacchantasmā, gacchantamhā,
anya-e0201n0:979_3: gacchantā, gacchatā, gacchantehi, gacchantebhi, gacchantassa, gacchato, gacchantānaṃ,
anya-e0201n0:979_4: gacchataṃ, gacchantasmiṃ, gacchantamhi, gacchati, gacchante, gacchantesu.
anya-e0201n0:980_0: Evaṃ karaṃ, kubbaṃ, caraṃ, cavaṃ, jayaṃ, jahaṃ, jānaṃ, jiraṃ, dadaṃ, dahaṃ, juhaṃ,
anya-e0201n0:980_1: suṇaṃ, pacaṃ, saraṃ, bhuñjaṃ, muñcaṃ, sayaṃ, saraṃ, haraṃ, tiṭṭhaṃ, bhavissaṃ, karissaṃ, gamissaṃ iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:982_0: ‘Ntassa ca ṭa vaṃse’ti aṃ, sesu ntassa ṭattaṃ, yaṃ yañhi rāja bhajati, santaṃ vā
anya-e0201n0:982_1: yadi vā asaṃ. Sīlavantaṃ visīlaṃ vā, vasaṃ tasseva gacchati jā. 1.15.181. Kiccānukrubbassa
anya-e0201n0:982_2: kareyya kiccaṃ jā. 1.2.145 – anukrubbassāti puna karontassa.
anya-e0201n0:983_0: Mahāvuttinā paṭhamāyomhi ca savibhattissa ntassa aṃ hoti, api nu tumhe ekantasukhaṃ
anya-e0201n0:983_1: lokaṃ jānaṃ passaṃ viharatha dī. ni. 1.425, kasaṃ khettaṃ bījaṃ vapaṃ, dhanaṃ vindanti
anya-e0201n0:983_2: māṇavā therīgā. 112, bharanti mātāpitaro, pubbe katamanussaraṃ a. ni. 5.39.
anya-e0201n0:985: Simhi etesaṃ ntassa ṭā hoti vā.
anya-e0201n0:986: Mahā, mahaṃ, mahanto, mahantā, mahanto, bho maha, bho mahā, bho mahaṃ, bhonto mahantā, bhonto mahanto, mahantaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:987: ‘Ntassa ca ṭa vaṃse’ti aṃmhi ntassa ṭattaṃ, “sumahaṃ puraṃ, parikkhipissa”nti jā. 2.22.792 pāḷi-suṭṭhu mahantaṃ bārāṇasipuranti attho. Sesaṃ gacchantasamaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:988_0: Arahā tiṭṭhati. ‘Ntassaṃ simhī’ti simhi ntassa aṃ, arahaṃ sugato loke saṃ. ni. 1.161,
anya-e0201n0:988_1: arahaṃ sammāsambuddho pārā. 1, arahantā, arahanto, arahantaṃ, arahante, arahantena,
anya-e0201n0:988_2: arahatā, arahantehi, arahantebhi, arahantassa, arahato, arahantānaṃ, arahataṃ iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:989: Mahāvuttinā brahmantassa ca ntassa ṭā hoti simhi, brahā, brahanto, brahantā, brahanto, brahantaṃ, brahante iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:990_0: “Sā parisā mahā hoti, sā senā dissate mahā”ti jā. 2.22.771 ca “mahā bhante bhūmicālo”ti
anya-e0201n0:990_1: a. ni. 8.70 ca “mahā te upāsaka pariccāgo”ti jā. aṭṭha. 4.13.akittijātakavaṇṇanā
anya-e0201n0:990_2: ca “mahā me bhayamāgata”nti ca “bārāṇasirajjaṃ nāma mahā”ti jā. aṭṭha. 1.1.mahāsīlavajātakavaṇṇanā
anya-e0201n0:990_3: ca “mahāssa honti parivārā brāhmaṇagahapatikā, mahāssa honti parivārā bhikkhū bhikkhuniyo”ti
anya-e0201n0:990_4: dī. ni. 3.204 ca “mahā vahanti dudiṭṭhiṃ, saṅkappā rāganissitā”ti ca pāḷī. Atra mahāsaddo
anya-e0201n0:992: Bhūdhātusiddhato ntassa aṃ hoti simhi. Suddhe niccaṃ, upapade aniccaṃ.

anya-e0201n0:998_0: Bho, bhanteti dve vuddhiatthe siddhā āmantanatthe nipātā eva, tehi paraṃ ga, yonaṃ
anya-e0201n0:998_1: lopo, ito bho sugatiṃ gaccha itivu. 83, ummujjabho puthusile, kuto nu āgacchatha

anya-e0201n0:998_3: te bhikkhū khamāpesi “khamatha bhante”ti. Tathā bhaddante, bhaddantāti dve “tuyhaṃ
anya-e0201n0:998_4: bhaddaṃ hotu, tumhākaṃ bhaddaṃ hotū”ti atthe siddhā āmantananipātāva, “bhaddante”ti

anya-e0201n0:999_0: Santasaddo pana sappurise vijjamāne samāne ca pavatto idha labbhati. Sameti asatā

anya-e0201n0:1001: Bhe pare santassa sabaādeso hoti vā.

anya-e0201n0:1003: Khede nirodhe ca pavatto santo purisādigaṇādiko, dīghaṃ santassa yojanaṃ dha. pa. 61, santā honti samitā niruddhā iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:1007: Rājādīhi yuvādīhi ca sissa ā hoti.

anya-e0201n0:1024: Su, naṃ, hisu rājassa uhoti vā.

anya-e0201n0:1118: Upaddhavācako addhasaddo idha na labbhati, ekaṃsatthavācako ca nipāto eva. “Addhānamaggappaṭipanno”tiādīsu addhānasaddo pana visuṃ siddho napuṃsakaliṅgova.

anya-e0201n0:1120: Asmā vuccati pāsāṇo, usmā vuccati kāyaggi, bhismā vuccati bhayānako mahākāyo.

anya-e0201n0:1122: Cūḷamoggallāne muddha, gāṇḍīvadhanva, aṇima, laghimādayo ca asmasadisāti vuttaṃ.

anya-e0201n0:1151: Pulliṅge yosu jhasaññassa i-kārassa ṭa hoti vā.
anya-e0201n0:1155: Bho muni, ‘ayunaṃ vā dīgho’ti dīgho, bho munī, bhonto munī, bhonto munayo, muniṃ, munī, munayo, muninā, munīhi, munībhi, munissa, munino, munīnaṃ, munismā, munimhā.
anya-e0201n0:1157: Jha, lato smāssa nā hoti vā.

anya-e0201n0:1160: Aggi jalati, aggī, aggayo, bho aggi, bho aggī, bhonto aggī, bhonto aggayo iccādi.

anya-e0201n0:1161_1: yati, ñāti, sāti, vatthi, atithi, sārathi, bondi, ādi, upādi, nidhi, vidhi, odhi,

anya-e0201n0:1163_0: Mahāvuttinā akatarassehipi kehici jhasaññehi yonaṃ no hoti, “cha munino agāramunino,
anya-e0201n0:1163_1: anagāramunino, sekhamunino, asekhamunino, paccekamunino, munimunino”ti mahāni. 14
anya-e0201n0:1163_2: ca “ñāṇupapannā munino vadantī”ti ca “ekamekāya itthiyā, aṭṭhaṭṭha patino siyu”nti
anya-e0201n0:1163_3: ca jā. 2.21.344 “patino kiramhākaṃ visiṭṭhanārīna” vi. va. 323 nti ca “haṃsādhipatino
anya-e0201n0:1164_0: Gāthāsu ‘ghabrahmāditve’ti munito gassa ettañca hoti, porohicco tavaṃ mune apa. thera
anya-e0201n0:1164_1: 1.1.540, dhammadasso tavaṃ mune apa. thera 1.1.540, ciraṃ jīva mahāvīra, kappaṃ tiṭṭha
anya-e0201n0:1164_2: mahāmune apa. thera 1.2.168, paṭiggaṇha mahāmune apa. thera 1.41.83. Tuyhatthāya
anya-e0201n0:1165_0: Tehiyeva aṃvacanassa nañca hoti, tamāhu ekaṃ muninaṃ carantaṃ su. ni. 210, muninaṃ
anya-e0201n0:1165_1: monapathesu sikkhamānaṃ jā. 1.8.44, pitaraṃ puttagiddhinaṃ jā. 2.22.2377, sabbakāmasamiddhinaṃ jā. 1.13.103.
anya-e0201n0:1169_0: Yo no’jja vinaye kaṅkhaṃ, atthadhammavidū ise jā. 2.22.1164. ‘Ghabrahmāditve’ti gassa
anya-e0201n0:1169_1: ettañca hoti, nisīdāhi mahāise jā. 2.20.114, tvaṃ no’si saraṇaṃ ise jā. 2.22.1326,
anya-e0201n0:1171: Isimhā dutiyassa yossa ṭe hoti vā.
anya-e0201n0:1172: Samaṇe brāhmaṇe vande, sampannacaraṇe ise jā. 1.16.314.
anya-e0201n0:1173_0: Samāse pana mahesi gacchati, mahesī gacchanti, mahesayo, mahesino. Aṃvacane mahesinanti
anya-e0201n0:1173_1: sijjhati. “Saṅgāyiṃsu mahesayo vi. va. ganthārambhakathā pe. va. ganthārambhakathā,
anya-e0201n0:1173_2: vānamuttā mahesayo”ti abhidhammatthasaṅgahe 113 piṭṭhe ca “na taṃ sammaggatā yaññaṃ,
anya-e0201n0:1173_3: upayanti mahesino, etaṃ sammaggatā yaññaṃ, upayanti mahesino saṃ. ni. 1.120, pahantā
anya-e0201n0:1173_4: mahesino kāme, yena tiṇṇā mahesino”ti ca “mahesiṃ vijitāvina”nti ma. ni. 2.459 ca
anya-e0201n0:1173_5: “saṅghañcāpi mahesinaṃ, kuñjaraṃva mahesinaṃ, upagantvā mahesinaṃ bu. vaṃ. 9.1, khippaṃ
anya-e0201n0:1173_6: passa mahesinaṃ jā. 2.19.70, katakiccaṃ mahesina”nti jā. 2.19.102 ca suttapadāni dissanti.
anya-e0201n0:1175: 170. Sissaggito ni ka. 95; rū. 145; nī. 254; ‘sissāggito ni’ (bahūsu).
anya-e0201n0:1177: Aggi jalati, aggini jalati, aggī jalanti, aggayo iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:1178_0: Pāḷiyaṃ pana “aggi, gini, agginī”ti tayo aggipariyāyā dissanti – “rāgaggi, dosaggi,
anya-e0201n0:1178_1: mohaggī”ti a. ni. 7.46 ca “channā kuṭi āhito gini, vivaṭā kuṭi nibbuto gini su. ni.
anya-e0201n0:1178_2: 19, mahāgini sampajjalito theragā. 702 (thokaṃ visadisaṃ), yasmā so jāyate ginī”ti
anya-e0201n0:1178_3: jā. 1.10.58 ca “agginiṃ sampajjalitaṃ pavisantī”ti su. ni. 675 ca. Tesaṃ visuṃ visuṃ rūpamālā labbhati.
anya-e0201n0:1179_0: Seṭṭhi, pati, adhipati, senāpati, atithi, sārathisaddehi ca yonaṃ no hoti, aṃvacanassa
anya-e0201n0:1179_1: naṃ hoti vā, seṭṭhino, seṭṭhinaṃ, patino, patinaṃ, adhipatino, adhipatinaṃ, senāpatino,
anya-e0201n0:1179_2: senāpatinaṃ, atithino, atithinaṃ, sārathino, sārathinanti. Gahapatayo, jānipatayo
anya-e0201n0:1181_0: ‘Ratthyādīhi ṭo smiṃno’ti smiṃno ṭo hoti, ādismiṃ, ādimhi, ādo, gāthādo, pādādo.
anya-e0201n0:1181_1: “Ādiṃ, gāthādiṃ, pādādiṃ” iccādīsu pana ādhāratthe dutiyā eva “imaṃ rattiṃ, imaṃ
anya-e0201n0:1181_2: divasaṃ, purimaṃ disaṃ, pacchimaṃ disaṃ, taṃ khaṇaṃ, taṃ layaṃ, taṃ muhuttaṃ” iccādīsu viya.
anya-e0201n0:1184: Pume aññapadatthasamāse i-kāramhā paṭhamā, dutiyāyonaṃ kamena no, ne honti vā. Suttavibhattena uttarapadatthasamāsepi kvaci yonaṃ no, ne honti.
anya-e0201n0:1186_0: Micchādiṭṭhino, sammādiṭṭhino, muṭṭhassatino, upaṭṭhitassatino, asāre sāramatino
anya-e0201n0:1186_1: dha. pa. 11, nimmānaratino devā, ye devā vasavattino saṃ. ni. 1.168, aṭṭhete cakkavattino,
anya-e0201n0:1186_2: dhamme dhammānuvattino saṃ. ni. 5.34, saggaṃ sugatino yanti dha. pa. 126, tomara’ṅkusapāṇino
anya-e0201n0:1186_3: jā. 2.22.223, daṇḍamuggarapāṇino, ariyavuttino, nipakā santavuttino iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:1188: Muṭṭhassatine, upaṭṭhitassatine, ariyavuttine, tomara’ṅkusapāṇine jā. 2.22.190 iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:1189: Vātveva? Micchādiṭṭhī janā gacchanti, micchādiṭṭhī jane passati.
anya-e0201n0:1190: Garū pana “tomara’ṅkusapāṇayo, atthe visāradamatayo”ti ka. 253 rūpāni idha icchanti.
anya-e0201n0:1191: Aññattheti kiṃ? Micchādiṭṭhiyo dhammā, micchādiṭṭhiyo dhamme.
anya-e0201n0:1192: Pumeti kiṃ? Micchādiṭṭhiniyo itthiyo, micchādiṭṭhīni kulāni.
anya-e0201n0:1194: Pume aññatthe ito smiṃno kvaci ne hoti.
anya-e0201n0:1195: Kataññumhi ca posamhi, sīlavante ariyavuttine jā. 1.10.78. Sabbakāmasamiddhine kule, chattapāṇine, daṇḍapāṇine, tomara’ṅkusapāṇine jā. 2.22.190 iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:1196: Suttavibhattena ītopi smiṃno kvaci ne hoti, mātaṅgasmiṃ yasassine jā. 2.19.96, devavaṇṇine, brahmavaṇṇine, arahantamhi tādine theragā. 1182 iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:1199_0: Īkārante ‘simhi nā’napuṃsakassā’ti suttena simhi rassattaṃ natthi, ‘ge vā’ti ge pare
anya-e0201n0:1199_1: vikappena rasso, yosu ca aṃ, nā, sa, smā, smiṃ su ca ‘ekavacanayosvaghona’nti niccaṃ
anya-e0201n0:1199_2: rasso, daṇḍī gacchati. ‘Jantu hetu’ iccādisuttena vikappena yonaṃ lopo, daṇḍī gacchanti.
anya-e0201n0:1201: 173. Yonaṃ none pume ka. 225; rū. 151; nī. 452, 453.
anya-e0201n0:1202: Pume jhasaññamhā ī-kārato paṭhamā, dutiyāyonaṃ kamena no, ne honti vā.
anya-e0201n0:1203: Daṇḍino gacchanti, bhodaṇḍi, bho daṇḍī, bhonto daṇḍino, daṇḍiṃ.
anya-e0201n0:1205: Pume jhasaññamhā ī-kārato aṃvacanassa naṃ hoti vā.
anya-e0201n0:1208: Pume jhīto dutiyāyossa no hoti vā.
anya-e0201n0:1209: Daṇḍī, daṇḍino, daṇḍine, daṇḍinā, daṇḍīhi, daṇḍībhi, daṇḍissa, daṇḍino, daṇḍīnaṃ, daṇḍismā, daṇḍimhā, daṇḍinā, daṇḍīhi, daṇḍībhi, daṇḍissa, daṇḍino, daṇḍīnaṃ, daṇḍismiṃ, daṇḍimhi.
anya-e0201n0:1213: ‘Ne smiṃno kvacī’ti vibhattasuttena smiṃno ne ca hoti, daṇḍine, daṇḍīsu.
anya-e0201n0:1214_0: Evaṃ cakkī, pakkhī, sukhī, sikhī, cāgī, bhāgī, bhogī, yogī, saṅghī, vācī, dhajī,
anya-e0201n0:1214_1: bhajī, kuṭṭhī, raṭṭhī, dāṭhī, ñāṇī, pāṇī, gaṇī, guṇī, cammī, dhammī, sīghayāyī, pāpakārī,
anya-e0201n0:1214_2: brahmacārī, māyāvī, medhāvī, bhuttāvī, bhayadassāvī, yasassī, tejassī, chattī, pattī,
anya-e0201n0:1214_3: dantī, mantī, sattughātī, sīhanādī, sāmī, piyappasaṃsī. Atthadassī, dhammadassī iccādayo.
anya-e0201n0:1214_4: Gāmaṇī, senānī, sudhī iccādīsu pana smiṃno nittaṃ natthi.
anya-e0201n0:1216: Mahāvuttinā yosu jhī-kārassapi kvaci ṭattaṃ hoti,
anya-e0201n0:1217: “Haṃsā koñcā mayūrā ca, hatthayo pasadā migā;
anya-e0201n0:1218: Sabbe sīhassa bhāyanti, natthi kāyasmiṃ tulyatā jā. 1.2.103.
anya-e0201n0:1219_0: Purisālū ca hatthayo, saññatā brahmacārayo a. ni. 6.37, apace brahmacārayo”ti dissanti.
anya-e0201n0:1220: Sussapi kvaci nesu hoti, susukhaṃ vata jīvāma, verinesu averino dha. pa. 197, verinesu manussesu, viharāma averino. Tattha ‘verinesū’ti verīcittavantesu.
anya-e0201n0:1221_0: Samāsepi paṭhamāyossa nottaṃ, dutiyāyossa nottaṃ nettañca hoti. Tattha dve nottāni
anya-e0201n0:1221_1: pākaṭāni. Nettaṃ pana vuccate, “assamaṇe samaṇamānine a. ni. 8.10, nare pāṇātipātine
anya-e0201n0:1221_2: itivu. 93, mañjuke piyabhāṇine jā. 2.22.1721, māladhārine jā. 2.22.1727, kāsikuttamadhārine
anya-e0201n0:1221_3: jā. 2.22.195, vaṇṇavante yasassine dī. ni. 2.282, cāpahatthe kalāpine, ubho bhassaravaṇṇine
anya-e0201n0:1221_4: jā. 2.21.111, brāhmaṇe devavaṇḍine, samuddharati pāṇine apa. therī 2.3.137, evaṃ
anya-e0201n0:1221_5: jarā ca maccu ca, adhivattanti pāṇine”ti saṃ. ni. 1.136 dissanti. Tattha ‘bhassaravaṇṇine’ti
anya-e0201n0:1221_6: pabhassaravaṇṇavante. Smiṃno nette pana “mātaṅgasmiṃ yasassine” iccādīni jā. 2.19.96 pubbe vuttāneva.
anya-e0201n0:1225: ‘Gasīna’nti silopo, bhikkhu. Yonaṃ lope dīgho, bhikkhū.
anya-e0201n0:1227: 177. Lā yonaṃ vo pume ka. 119; rū. 155; nī. 294.
anya-e0201n0:1228: Pume lasaññehi uvaṇṇehi yonaṃ vo hoti vāti yonaṃ vo.
anya-e0201n0:1230: Pume ve, vosu paresu lasaññassa u-kārassa ṭa hoti.
anya-e0201n0:1233: Bho bhikkhu, bho bhikkhū, bhonto bhikkhū.
anya-e0201n0:1235: Pume ālapane lasaññamhā u-kārato yossa ve, vo honti vā.
anya-e0201n0:1236_0: Bhonto bhikkhave, atha kho bhagavā bhikkhū āmantesi “bhikkhavo”ti ma. ni. 1.1, devakāyā
anya-e0201n0:1236_1: abhikkantā, te vijānātha bhikkhavo dī. ni. 2.334, bhikkhuṃ, bhikkhū, bhikkhavo, bhikkhunā.
anya-e0201n0:1236_2: ‘Sunaṃhisū’ti dīgho, bhikkhūhi, bhikkhūbhi, bhikkhussa, bhikkhuno, bhikkhūnaṃ, bhikkhusmā,
anya-e0201n0:1236_3: bhikkhumhā, bhikkhunā, bhikkhūhi, bhikkhūbhi, bhikkhussa, bhikkhuno, bhikkhūnaṃ,
anya-e0201n0:1237: Evaṃ maṅku, maccu, ucchu, paṭu, bhāṇu, setu, ketu, sattu, sindhu, bandhu, kāru, neru, meru, ruru, veḷu iccādayo.
anya-e0201n0:1239: Hetu, jantu, kurusaddesu ‘jantuhetu’ iccādisuttena vikappena yonaṃ lopo, hetu dhammo, hetū dhammā, atīte hetavo pañca.
anya-e0201n0:1240: 180. Yomhi vā kvaci ka. 97; rū. 156; nī. 260.
anya-e0201n0:1241: Yosu lasaññino u-kārassa kvaci ṭa hoti vā.
anya-e0201n0:1245: Bho hetu, bho hetū, bhonto hetū, hetavo, hetayo, hetuyo vā, hetuṃ, hetū, hetavo, hetayo, hetuyo vā. Sesaṃ bhikkhusamaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:1246: Jantu gacchati, jantū, jantayo, jantuyo vā.
anya-e0201n0:1247: 181. Jantādito no ca ka. 119; rū. 155; nī. 294; ‘jantvādito’ (bahūsu).
anya-e0201n0:1248: Pume jantādito yonaṃ no ca hoti vo ca.
anya-e0201n0:1249: Jantuno, jantavo, bhojantu, bhojantū, bhonto jantū, jantayo, jantuyo, jantuno, jantavo, jantuṃ, jantū, jantayo, jantuyo, jantuno, jantavo. Sesaṃ bhikkhusamaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:1250: Kuru, kurū, kurayo, kuruyo, kuruno, kuravoti sabbaṃ jantusamaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:1251: “Ajjeva taṃ kurayo pāpayātu jā. 2.22.1632, nandanti taṃ kurayo dassanena jā. 2.22.1641, ajjeva taṃ kurayo pāpayāmī”ti jā. 2.22.1634 dissanti.
anya-e0201n0:1252_0: Mahāvuttinā latopi aṃvacanassa kvaci naṃ hoti, “kimatthinaṃ bhikkhunaṃ āhu, bhikkhunamāhu
anya-e0201n0:1252_1: maggadesiṃ, bhikkhunamāhu maggajīviṃ, buddhaṃ ādiccabandhuna”nti dissanti, tathā
anya-e0201n0:1252_2: “roganiḍḍaṃ pabhaṅgunaṃ, bhogānañca pabhaṅgunaṃ dha. pa. 139, viññāṇañca virāguna”nti
anya-e0201n0:1252_5: ‘virāguna’nti virajjanasīlaṃ. Katthaci paṭhamantampi dissati, tattha nāgamo.
anya-e0201n0:1257: Simhi pare ltupaccayantānaṃ satthu, kattuiccādīnaṃ pitādīnañca u-kāro ā hoti. ‘Gasīna’nti lopo.
anya-e0201n0:1260: Samhā aññasmiṃ vibhattigaṇe pare ltu, pitādīnaṃ u-kāro āraṅa hoti.
anya-e0201n0:1265: Ge pare ltu, pitādīnaṃ u-kāro hoti a ca ā ca. Bhosattha, bho satthā, bhonto satthāro, satthāraṃ.
anya-e0201n0:1267: Āraṅato yonaṃ kamena ṭo, ṭe honti vā. Ettha ca vāsaddo sakhasadde vikappanattho tattha vidhyantarasabbhāvā. Puna ṭoggahaṇaṃ lahubhāvatthaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:1276: Naṃmhi pare ltu, pitādīnaṃ u-kāro āraṅa hoti vā. Imesaṃ mahānāma tiṇṇaṃ satthārānaṃ ekā niṭṭhā udāhu puthu niṭṭhāti a. ni. 3.127. Satthūnaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:1278: Naṃmhi pare ltu, pitādīnaṃ u-kāro ā hoti vā.
anya-e0201n0:1279: Satthānaṃ, satthārā, satthārehi, satthārebhi, satthu, satthussa, satthuno, satthūnaṃ, satthārānaṃ, satthānaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:1285: Bahulādhikārā nā, smāsu satthunāti ca sumhi satthūsūti ca siddhaṃ. “Dhammarājena satthunā, pūjaṃ labbhati bhattusū”ti jā. 2.22.1517 pāḷi. ‘Bhattusū’ti sāmīsu, ‘bhattāsū’tipi pāṭho.
anya-e0201n0:1286: ‘Ltupitādīnamase’ti aseggahaṇena tomhi āraṅa hoti nī. 414, “satthārato satthāraṃ gacchanti, satthārato satthāraṃ ghaṭentī”ti mahāni. 27 pāḷi.
anya-e0201n0:1287_0: Evaṃ kattā, bhattā, gantā, jetā, janetā, chettā, cheditā, viññātā, viññāpetā, uṭṭhātā,
anya-e0201n0:1287_1: uṭṭhāpetā, taritā, tāretā, dātā, dāpetā, sandhātā, sandhāpetā, netā, nettā, posetā,
anya-e0201n0:1287_2: bhettā, yātā, vattā, setā, hantā, sakamandhātā, mahāmandhātā iccādayo.
anya-e0201n0:1289: Mahāvuttinā yonaṃ ā hoti, avitakkitā gabbhamupavajanti jā. 1.13.138 (visadisaṃ), te bhikkhū brūhetā suññāgārānaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:1290: Amaccavācīhi kattu, khattusaddehi gassa ettaṃ, uṭṭhehi katte taramāno jā. 2.22.1690, natthi bho khatte paroloko dī. ni. 2.408.
anya-e0201n0:1291: Ge pare āraṅa ca hoti, pucchāma kattāra anomapañña, “kattāraṃ anomapañña”ntipi jā. 1.10.28 yujjati.
anya-e0201n0:1292_0: Aṃmhi pare pubbassaralopo ca hoti, anukampakaṃ pāṇasamampi bhattuṃ jahanti itthiyo.
anya-e0201n0:1292_1: “So patīto pamuttena, bhattunā bhattugāravo”ti jā. 2.21.48 diṭṭhattā kattunā, gantunā
anya-e0201n0:1293: Nettumhā smiṃno ettaṃ nī. 430, nette ujuṃ gate sati jā. 1.4.133, ete saddā tīsu liṅgesu samānarūpā honti, kattā itthī, kattā puriso, kattā kulaṃ iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:1299: Pitaro, bho pita, bho pitā, bhonto pitaro. Pitaraṃ, pituṃ vā. “Mātuṃ pituñca vanditvā”ti jā. 2.22.1859 dissati.

anya-e0201n0:1300_1: pituno, pitūnaṃ, pitarānaṃ, pitarā, pitunā, pitarehi, pitarebhi, pitūhi, pitūbhi,
anya-e0201n0:1300_2: pitu, pitussa, pituno, pitūnaṃ, pitarānaṃ, pitānaṃ, pitusmiṃ, pitumhi, pitari, pitaresu, pitūsu.
anya-e0201n0:1301: Anaṇo ñātinaṃ hoti, devānaṃ pitunañca so jā. 2.22.126, mātāpitūnaṃ accayena, dhammaṃ cara mahārāja, mātāpitūsu khattiya jā. 2.17.39.
anya-e0201n0:1303: Anattādīnanti kiṃ? Nattā, nattāro, nattāraṃ, nattāro, nattāre iccādi. Tathā panattusaddopi.
anya-e0201n0:1304_0: Mātu, dhītu, duhitusaddā pana itthiliṅgā eva, mātā, mātaro, bhoti māta, bhoti mātā,
anya-e0201n0:1304_1: bhoti māte vā, “acchariyaṃ nandamāte, abbhutaṃ nandamāte”ti a. ni. 7.53 dissati.
anya-e0201n0:1304_2: ‘Ghabrahmāditve’ti gassa ettaṃ. Bhotiyo mātaro, mātaraṃ, mātuṃ, mātaro, mātare, mātuyā,
anya-e0201n0:1304_3: mātarā, mātarehi, mātarebhi, mātūhi, mātūbhi, mātu, mātussa, mātuyā. “Mātussa sarati,
anya-e0201n0:1304_4: pitussa saratī”ti rū. 169; nī. 160 piṭṭhe satthe dissati. “Buddhamātussa sakkāraṃ,
anya-e0201n0:1304_5: karotu sugatoraso”ti apa. therī. 2.2.259 ca dissati. Mātūnaṃ, mātānaṃ, mātarānaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:1304_6: Pañcamīrūpaṃ tatiyāsamaṃ. Chaṭṭhīrūpaṃ catutthīsamaṃ. Mātusmiṃ, mātumhi, mātari,
anya-e0201n0:1304_7: mātuyā, mātuyaṃ, mātaresu, mātūsu. Evaṃ dhītu, duhitusaddā.
anya-e0201n0:1305_0: Visesavidhimhi gāthāsu mahāvuttinā mātu, pitusaddehi nādīnaṃ pañcannaṃ ekavacanānaṃ
anya-e0201n0:1305_1: yā hoti, smiṃno pana yañca hoti, antalopo ca. Matyā kataṃ, matyā deti, matyā apeti,
anya-e0201n0:1305_2: matyā dhanaṃ, matyā ṭhitaṃ. Matyaṃ ṭhitaṃ. Evaṃ petyā kataṃiccādi, idha vuddhi.
anya-e0201n0:1306_0: Anuññāto ahaṃ matyā, sañcatto pitarā ahaṃ jā. 2.22.29. Matyā ca petyā ca kataṃ susādhu
anya-e0201n0:1306_1: jā. 2.18.61, ahañhi jānāmi janinda etaṃ, matyā ca petyā ca jā. 2.18.59, sabbaṃ pubbepi vuttameva.
anya-e0201n0:1307: Satthu, pitādīnaṃ samāse vidhānaṃ samāsakaṇḍe āgamissati.
anya-e0201n0:1312: ‘Gasīna’nti lopo, sayambhū gacchati. ‘Lopo’ti yonaṃ lopo, sayambhū gacchanti.
anya-e0201n0:1314: ‘Jantādito no cā’ti yonaṃ vo, no, sayambhuvo, sayambhuno.
anya-e0201n0:1315: ‘Ge vā’ti ge pare vikappena rasso, bho sayambhu, bho sayambhū, bhonto sayambhū, sayambhuvo, sayambhuno.
anya-e0201n0:1316: ‘Ekavacanayosvaghona’nti amādīsu ekavacanesu niccaṃ rasso, sayambhuṃ, gāthāyaṃ ‘sayambhuna’ntipi yujjati.
anya-e0201n0:1317_0: Sayambhū, sayambhuvo, sayambhuno. Sayambhunā, sayambhūhi, sayambhūbhi, sayambhussa,
anya-e0201n0:1317_1: sayambhuno, sayambhūnaṃ. Sayambhusmā, sayambhumhā, sayambhunā, sayambhūhi, sayambhūbhi,
anya-e0201n0:1317_2: sayambhussa, sayambhuno, sayambhūnaṃ. Sayambhusmiṃ, sayambhumhi, sayambhūsu.
anya-e0201n0:1318: Evaṃ abhibhū, parābhibhū, vessabhū, gotrabhū, vatrabhū iccādi. Sesesu pana yonaṃ no eva labbhati, cittasahabhuno dhammā dha. sa. dukamātikā 61.
anya-e0201n0:1320: Pume kūpaccayantehi yonaṃ no hoti vā.
anya-e0201n0:1322: Viññū, vadaññū, atthaññū, dhammaññū, mattaññū, vidū. Idha kūsaddena rūpaccayantāpi gayhanti, vedagū, pāragū. Tathā bhīrū, pabhaṅgū, virāgūiccādi ca.
anya-e0201n0:1324: Okāranto pana gosaddo eva, so pubbe vuttoyeva.
anya-e0201n0:1328: Atha napuṃsakaliṅgaṃ dīpiyate. Taṃ pana pañcavidhaṃ adantaṃ, idantaṃ īdantaṃ, udantaṃ, ūdantanti.
anya-e0201n0:1333: Napuṃsake ato yonaṃ ni hoti. ‘Yolopanīsū’ti nimhi dīgho.
anya-e0201n0:1335: 197. Nīnaṃ vā ka. 107; rū. 69; nī. 275; ‘nīna vā’ (bahūsu).
anya-e0201n0:1336: Ato nīnaṃ ṭā, ṭe honti vā.
anya-e0201n0:1337: Cittā, he citta, he cittā, he cittāni, he cittā vā, cittaṃ, cittāni, citte, cittena. Sesaṃ purisasamaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:1338_0: Evaṃ dakaṃ, udakaṃ, sukhaṃ, dukkhaṃ, mukhaṃ, aṅgaṃ, liṅgaṃ, siṅgaṃ, aghaṃ, saccaṃ,
anya-e0201n0:1338_1: naccaṃ, rajjaṃ, pajjaṃ, ambujaṃ, dhaññaṃ, thaññaṃ, araññaṃ, puññaṃ, kiliṭṭhaṃ, piṭṭhaṃ,
anya-e0201n0:1338_2: bhaṇḍaṃ, tuṇḍaṃ, ñāṇaṃ, tāṇaṃ, leṇaṃ, karaṇaṃ, caraṇaṃ, chattaṃ, khettaṃ, nettaṃ,

anya-e0201n0:1338_4: dhanaṃ, vanaṃ, pāpaṃ, dumaṃ, hadayaṃ, cīraṃ, cīvaraṃ, kulaṃ, mūlaṃ, balaṃ, maṅgalaṃ,
anya-e0201n0:1345: ‘Pumakammathāmaddhāna’nti suttena nā, smāsu uttaṃ, kammunā, kammassa, kammuno, kammasmā, kammamhā, kammanā, kammunā, kammassa, kammuno.
anya-e0201n0:1348: Kammasmiṃ, kammamhi, kammani, kamme. Sesaṃ cittasamaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:1349_0: Kamma camma ghamma asma vesma addha muddha aha brahma attaātumā kammādi. Kammani,
anya-e0201n0:1349_1: cammani. “Kiṃ chando kimadhippāyo, eko sammasi ghammanī”ti jā. 1.16.1 ca “kiṃ patthayaṃ
anya-e0201n0:1349_2: mahābrahme, eko sammasi ghammanī”ti jā. 1.13.83 ca “mā tvaṃ cande khali asmanī”ti
anya-e0201n0:1349_3: ca “tamaddasa mahābrahmā, nisinnaṃ samhi vesmanī”ti ca dissanti. Addhani, muddhani,
anya-e0201n0:1349_4: ahani, brahmani, attani, ātumani, sabbametaṃ pubbepi vuttameva ca. Tattha ‘sammasī’ti
anya-e0201n0:1349_5: acchasi, ‘ghammanī’ti gimhakāle ātape vā, ‘asmanī’ti pāsāṇe, ‘vesmanī’ti ghare.
anya-e0201n0:1351: 200. Aṃ napuṃsake ka. 125; rū. 198; nī. 300; ‘aṃṅaṃ napuṃsake’ (bahūsu)?.
anya-e0201n0:1352: Napuṃsake simhi ntussa aṃ hoti vā. Silopo.
anya-e0201n0:1355: Simhi mahāvuttinā ntussa anto a hoti, tato sissa aṃ hoti, guṇavantaṃ kulaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:1356_0: ‘Yvādo ntussā’ti yvādīsu ntussantassa attaṃ, guṇavantāni, guṇavantā, he guṇava, he
anya-e0201n0:1356_1: guṇavā, he guṇavantāni, he guṇavantā, guṇavaṃ, guṇavantaṃ, guṇavantāni, guṇavante,
anya-e0201n0:1358: Gacchaṃ kulaṃ, gacchantaṃ kulaṃ, gacchantāni kulāni iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:1363: Napuṃsake jha, lato yonaṃ ni hoti vā. ‘Yolopanīsū’ti dīgho.
anya-e0201n0:1364: Aṭṭhīni, he aṭṭhi, he aṭṭhī, he aṭṭhīni, he aṭṭhī vā, aṭṭhiṃ, aṭṭhinaṃ, aṭṭhīni, aṭṭhī, aṭṭhinā, aṭṭhīhi, aṭṭhībhi. Sesaṃ munisamaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:1365: Samāsepi sammādiṭṭhi kulaṃ, sammādiṭṭhīni kulāni iccādi, yonaṃ no, ne natthi.
anya-e0201n0:1366: Smiṃmhi sammādiṭṭhismiṃ, sammādiṭṭhimhi, sammādiṭṭhini, sammādiṭṭhine kule, ariyavuttine kule iti vattabbaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:1367: Evaṃ akkhi, acchi, satthi, dadhi, vāri iccādayo.
anya-e0201n0:1370: Īkārante ‘ekavacanayosvaghona’nti suttena simhi rasso, daṇḍi kulaṃ, daṇḍīni kulāni, yonaṃ lope daṇḍī.
anya-e0201n0:1371: ‘Ge vā’ti rasso, he daṇḍi, he daṇḍī vā, he daṇḍīni, he daṇḍī, daṇḍiṃ, daṇḍinaṃ, daṇḍīni, daṇḍī, daṇḍinā, daṇḍīhi, daṇḍībhi. Pulliṅgasamaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:1372: Samāsepi sīghayāyi cittaṃ, sīghayāyīni, sīghayāyī, he sīghayāyi, he sīghayāyī vā, he sīghayāyīni, he sīghayāyī, sīghayāyiṃ, sīghayāyinaṃ, sīghayāyīni iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:1373: Evaṃ sukhakāri dānaṃ, cakkī, pakkhī, sukhī, sikhī iccādayo kulasambandhino ca veditabbā.
anya-e0201n0:1376: Āyu tiṭṭhati, ‘jhalā vā’ti yonaṃ nitte lope ca dīgho, āyūni, āyū, he āyu, he āyū, he āyūni, he āyū, āyuṃ, āyunaṃ, āyūni, āyū. Sesaṃ bhikkhusamaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:1377_0: Āyusaddo pulliṅgepi vattati, “punarāyu ca me laddho dī. ni. 2.369, āyuñca vo kīvatako
anya-e0201n0:1377_1: nu samma jā. 1.15.205, āyu nu khīṇo maraṇañca santike, na cāyu khīṇo maraṇañca dūre”ti pāḷipadāni.
anya-e0201n0:1378: Evaṃ cakkhu, hiṅgu, siggu, jatu, vatthu, matthu, madhu, dhanu, tipu, dāru, vasu, assu iccādayo.
anya-e0201n0:1380: Ambu, paṃsuiccādīhi smiṃno ni hoti vā.
anya-e0201n0:1381: Phalaṃ patati ambuni, pupphaṃ yathā paṃsuni ātape gataṃ. Sesaṃ āyusamaṃ. Citragu, vahagu, digu iccādayopi ukārantapakatikā evāti.
anya-e0201n0:1384_0: Simhi rasso, gotrabhu ñāṇaṃ, gotrabhūni, gotrabhū, he gotrabhu, he gotrabhū, he gotrabhūni,
anya-e0201n0:1384_1: hegotrabhū, gotrabhuṃ, gotrabhunaṃ, gotrabhūni, gotrabhū. Sesaṃ pulliṅgasamaṃ. Evaṃ
anya-e0201n0:1389_0: Sabba, katara, katama, ubhaya, itara, añña, aññatara, aññatama, pubba, para, apara,
anya-e0201n0:1389_1: dakkhiṇa, uttara, adhara, ya, ta, tya, eta, ima, amu, kiṃ, eka, ubha, dvi,ti, catu,
anya-e0201n0:1389_2: tumha, amha imāni aṭṭhavīsati sabbanāmāni nāma. Sabbesaṃ liṅgatthānaṃ sādhāraṇāni nāmāni sabbanāmāni.
anya-e0201n0:1399_0: Etasaddo parammukhe samīpavacano, sammukhe dūravacano. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “eteti
anya-e0201n0:1399_1: cakkhupathaṃ atikkamitvā dūragate sandhāyāhā”ti jā. aṭṭha 4.15.104 vuttaṃ, tasmā
anya-e0201n0:1401: Amusaddo dūravacano. Samīpa, dūratā ca parikappabuddhivasenāpi hoti.
anya-e0201n0:1405_0: Tattha tyasaddopi bahulaṃ dissati. Khiḍḍā paṇihitā tyāsu, rati tyāsu patiṭṭhitā,
anya-e0201n0:1405_1: bījāni tyāsu ruhanti jā. 2.21.120, kathaṃ nu vissase tyamhi jā. 1.16.288, atha vissasate
anya-e0201n0:1406: ‘Itthiyamatvā’ti āpaccayo, ghasañño, silopo, sabbā itthī, sabbā, sabbāyo, he sabbe, he sabbā, he sabbāyo, sabbaṃ, sabbā, sabbāyo, sabbāya, sabbāhi, sabbābhi, sabbāya.
anya-e0201n0:1407: 203. Ghapāsassa ssā vā ka. 179, 62; rū. 204, 206; nī. 365, 209.
anya-e0201n0:1408: Gha, pasaññehi sabbanāmehi sassa ssā hoti vā.
anya-e0201n0:1414: Sabbāsaṃ, sabbāsānaṃ, sabbāya, sabbāhi, sabbābhi, sabbāya, sabbassā, sabbāsaṃ, sabbāsānaṃ, sabbāya, sabbāyaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:1418_0: Saddanītiyaṃ nā, smā, smiṃnampi ssādeso vutto nī. 366. “Tassā kumārikāya saddhiṃ
anya-e0201n0:1418_1: pārā. 443, kassāhaṃ kena hāyāmī”ti pārā. 290 pāḷi. Idha pana suttavibhattena sādhiyati.
anya-e0201n0:1418_2: Sabbassā kataṃ, sabbassā apeti, sabbassā ṭhitaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:1424: He sabba, he sabbā, he sabbe, sabbaṃ, sabbe, sabbena.
anya-e0201n0:1425: 208. Sabbādīnaṃ naṃmhi ca ka. 102; rū. 202; nī. 270.
anya-e0201n0:1426: Naṃmhi ca su, hisu ca sabbādīnaṃ assa e hoti.
anya-e0201n0:1427: Sabbehi, sabbebhi, sabbassa, sabbesaṃ, sabbesānaṃ, sabbasmā, sabbamhā, sabbehi, sabbebhi, sabbassa, sabbesaṃ, sabbesānaṃ, sabbasmiṃ, sabbamhi, sabbesu.
anya-e0201n0:1428_0: Cūḷaniruttiyaṃ pana smā, smiṃnaṃ ā, ettaṃ vuttaṃ, sabbā apeti, sabbe patiṭṭhitanti.
anya-e0201n0:1428_1: “Sabbā ca savati, sabbathā savatī”ti ca “tyāhaṃ mante paratthaddho”ti jā. 2.22.835
anya-e0201n0:1428_2: ca pāḷī. Tattha ‘tyāha’nti te+ahaṃ, tasmiṃ manteti attho.
anya-e0201n0:1429_0: Sabbanāmehi catutthiyā āyādesopi dissati, “yāya no anukampāya, amhe pabbājayī muni.
anya-e0201n0:1429_1: So no attho anuppatto”ti theragā. 176 ca “yāyeva kho panatthāya āgaccheyyātha, tameva
anya-e0201n0:1429_2: atthaṃ sādhukaṃ manasi kareyyāthā”ti ca dī. ni. 1.263 “neva mayhaṃ ayaṃ nāgo, alaṃ
anya-e0201n0:1434_0: Bahulādhikārā kvaci nissa ṭā, ṭepi honti. Pāḷiyaṃ pana nissa ṭā, ṭepi dissanti- “yā
anya-e0201n0:1434_1: pubbe bodhisattānaṃ, pallaṅkavaramābhuje. Nimittāni padissanti, tāni ajja padissare
anya-e0201n0:1434_2: bu. vaṃ. 2.82. Kiṃ māṇavassa ratanāni atthi, ye taṃ jinanto hare akkhadhutto”ti jā.
anya-e0201n0:1435_0: Ubhayasadde itthi, pumesu ubhayā, ubhayoti paṭhamekavacanarūpaṃ appasiddhaṃ. Mahāvuttinā
anya-e0201n0:1435_1: yonaṃ ṭo vā hoti, ubhayo itthiyo, ubhayaṃ itthiṃ, ubhayo itthiyo, ubhayāya, ubhayāhi,
anya-e0201n0:1436: Ubhayo purisā, ubhaye purisā, ubhayaṃ, ubhayo, ubhaye, ubhayena, ubhayehi, ubhayebhi, ubhayassa, ubhayesaṃ, ubhayesānaṃ. Sabbasamaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:1437_0: Ubhayaṃ kulaṃ tiṭṭhati, ubhayāni, ubhayaṃ, ubhayāni. Sabbasamaṃ. “Ekarattena ubhayo,
anya-e0201n0:1437_1: tuvañca dhanusekha ca jā. 1.16.239, todeyya, kappā ubhayo, idhekarattiṃ ubhayo vasema,
anya-e0201n0:1439: Ssamādīsu itarā, ekā, aññā, etā, imāsaddānaṃ i hoti.
anya-e0201n0:1440: Itarissā kataṃ, itarissā deti, itarissā apeti, itarissā dhanaṃ, itarissā, itarissaṃ ṭhitaṃ. Sesaṃ sabbasamaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:1441_0: Aññā, aññā, aññāyo, aññaṃ, aññā, aññāyo, aññāya, aññissā, aññāhi, aññābhi, aññāya,
anya-e0201n0:1441_1: aññissā, aññāsaṃ, aññāsānaṃ, aññissā, aññāhi, aññābhi, aññāya, aññissā, aññāsaṃ,
anya-e0201n0:1441_2: aññāsānaṃ, aññāya, aññissā, aññāyaṃ, aññissaṃ, aññāsu. Sesaliṅgesu sabbasamaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:1442: “Aññatarissā itthiyā paṭibaddhacitto hotī”ti pārā. 73 pāḷi, idha suttavibhattena sijjhati. Sesaṃ aññatara, aññatamesu sabbasamaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:1444_0: Pubbā itthī, pubbā, pubbāyo, pubbaṃ, pubbā, pubbāyo, pubbāya, pubbassā, pubbāhi,
anya-e0201n0:1444_1: pubbābhi, pubbāya, pubbassā, pubbāsaṃ, pubbāsānaṃ, sattamiyaṃ pubbāya, pubbassā,
anya-e0201n0:1445: 211. Pubbādīhi chahi ka. 164; rū. 200; nī. 347; caṃ. 2.1.15; pā. 1.1.34.
anya-e0201n0:1446: Tehi chahi yonaṃ eṭa hoti vā.
anya-e0201n0:1447_0: Pubbe, pubbā, pare, parā, apare, aparā, dakkhiṇe, dakkhiṇā, uttare, uttarā, adhare,
anya-e0201n0:1447_1: adharā. Tattha ‘pubbe pubbā’ti puratthimadisābhāgā, tatraṭṭhakā vā atthā, purātanā
anya-e0201n0:1447_2: vā sattā saṅkhārā ca. “Pubbabuddhā, pubbadevā, pubbācariyā”tiādīsu “pubbe buddhā
anya-e0201n0:1447_3: pubbabuddhā, pubbā buddhā vā pubbabuddhā”tiādinā attho veditabbo. Evaṃ sesesu.
anya-e0201n0:1448: Pubbesaṃ, pubbesānaṃ, paresaṃ, paresānaṃ, aparesaṃ, aparesānaṃ, dakkhiṇesaṃ, dakkhiṇesānaṃ, uttaresaṃ, uttaresānaṃ, adharesaṃ, adharesānaṃ. Sesaṃ ñeyyaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:1452_0: Suddhanāmabhūtā ca samāse appadhānabhūtā ca sabbādito pubbe vuttaṃ sabbādikāriyaṃ
anya-e0201n0:1452_1: aññañca upari vuccamānaṃ sabbādikāriyaṃ na hoti. Tattha suddhanāmabhūtaṃ sabbādināma
anya-e0201n0:1452_2: na jānātīti atthena bālavācako aññasaddo, ājānātīti atthena majjhemaggaphalañāṇavācako
anya-e0201n0:1452_4: atirekaparamādivācako parasaddo, disākālādito aññesu atthesu pavattā dakkhiṇu’ttarasaddā
anya-e0201n0:1452_5: ca saṅkhyatthavācito añño ekasaddo cāti sabbametaṃ suddhanāmaṃ nāma, tato sabbādikāriyaṃ natthi.
anya-e0201n0:1453_0: Appadhāne diṭṭhapubba, gatapubba, piyapubba iccādi. Tattha pubbe diṭṭho diṭṭhapubbo
anya-e0201n0:1453_1: buddho purisena. Pubbe diṭṭho yenāti vā diṭṭhapubbo puriso buddhaṃ. Evaṃ gatapubbo
anya-e0201n0:1453_2: maggo purisena, gatapubbo vā puriso maggaṃ. Piyā vuccati bhariyā, piyā pubbā purāṇā
anya-e0201n0:1453_3: etassāti piyapubbo, piyo vuccati pati, piyo pubbo yassāti piyapubbā. Etehi ca sabbādikāriyaṃ natthi.
