anya-e0201n0:1606: 247. Caturo catussa ka. 78, 205, 31; rū. 160; nī. 234; ‘caturo vā catussa’ (bahūsu).
anya-e0201n0:1608: Caturo purisā, caturo purise. Kathaṃ caturo nimitte nādassiṃ, caturo phalamuttameti? “Liṅgavipallāsā”ti vuttiyaṃ vuttaṃ, tīhi, tībhi, catūhi, catūbhi, catubbhi.
anya-e0201n0:1609: 248. Iṇṇaṃiṇṇannaṃ tito jhā ka. 87; rū. 231; nī. 243; ‘ṇṇaṃṇṇannaṃtiko jhā’ (bahūsu).
anya-e0201n0:1610: Jhasaññamhā timhā naṃvacanassa iṇṇaṃ, iṇṇannaṃ honti.
anya-e0201n0:1611: Tiṇṇaṃ, tiṇṇannaṃ, catunnaṃ, tīhi, tībhi, catūhi, catūbhi, catubbhi, tiṇṇaṃ, tiṇṇannaṃ, catunnaṃ, tīsu, catūsu.
anya-e0201n0:1613: Napuṃsake yosu savibhattīnanti, catunnaṃ tīṇi, cattāri honti.
anya-e0201n0:1614: Tīṇi cittāni, cattāri cittāni. Sesaṃ pulliṅgasamaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:1615_0: Vacanasiliṭṭhatte pana sati visadisaliṅgavacanānampi padānaṃ aññamaññasaṃyogo hoti,
anya-e0201n0:1615_1: cattāro satipaṭṭhānā dī. ni. 3.145, cattāro sammappadhānā dī. ni. 3.145, tayomahābhūtā,
anya-e0201n0:1615_2: tayo mahābhūte paṭṭhā. 1.1.58, sabbe mālā upenti maṃ dhu. 3.6, sabbe kaññā upenti
anya-e0201n0:1615_3: maṃ dhu. 3.6, sabbe ratanā upenti maṃ dhu. 3.6, sabbe yānā upenti maṃ dhu. 3.6, avijjāya
anya-e0201n0:1615_4: sati saṅkhārā honti, saṅkhāresu sati viññāṇaṃ hoti saṃ. ni. 2.50 iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:1616_0: Gāthāsu vipallāsāpi bahulaṃ dissanti, aññe dhammāni desenti, evaṃ dhammāni sutvāna,
anya-e0201n0:1616_1: satañca dhammāni sukittitāni sutvā, atthāni cintayitvāna, uttamatthāni tayi labhimhā,
anya-e0201n0:1616_2: kiṃ tvaṃ atthāni jānāsi, iccheyyāmi bhante sattaputtāni, siviputtāni avhaya jā. 2.22.2235,
anya-e0201n0:1618: 250. Ṭa pañcādīhi cuddasahi ka. 134; rū. 251; nī. 247.
anya-e0201n0:1619: Pañcādīhi aṭṭhārasantehi saṅkhyāsaddehi yonaṃ ṭa hoti.
anya-e0201n0:1620: Pañca itthiyo, pañca purisā, purise, pañca cittāni, cha itthiyo.
anya-e0201n0:1621: Ḷāgame pana “itthibhāvā na muccissaṃ, chaḷāni gatiyo imā”ti pāḷi.
anya-e0201n0:1622: Cha purisā, cha purise, cha cittāni. Evaṃ satta, aṭṭha, nava, dasa, ekādasa…pe… aṭṭhārasa.
anya-e0201n0:1624: Su, naṃ, hisu pañcādīnaṃ cuddasannaṃ assa attameva hoti, na ettaṃ vā dīghattaṃ vā hoti.
anya-e0201n0:1625_0: Pañcahi, pañcannaṃ, pañcasu, chahi, channaṃ, chasu, sattahi, sattannaṃ, sattasu,
anya-e0201n0:1625_1: aṭṭhahi, aṭṭhannaṃ, aṭṭhasu, navahi, navannaṃ, navasu, dasahi, dasannaṃ, dasasu,
anya-e0201n0:1625_2: ekādasahi, ekādasannaṃ, ekādasasu…pe… aṭṭhārasahi, aṭṭhārasannaṃ, aṭṭhārasasu.
anya-e0201n0:1627_0: ‘Itthiyamatvā’ti vīsa, tiṃsa, cattālīsa, paññāsehi āpaccayo, mahāvuttinā simhi rasso
anya-e0201n0:1627_1: silopo ca, ‘niggahīta’nti vikappena niggahītāgamo, vikappena aṃlopo, nādīnaṃ ekavacanānaṃ
anya-e0201n0:1627_2: yādeso, vīsa itthiyo, vīsaṃ itthiyo, vīsa purisā, vīsaṃ purisā, vīsa purise, vīsaṃ
anya-e0201n0:1627_3: purise, vīsa cittāni, vīsaṃ cittāni, vīsāya itthīhi kammaṃ kataṃ, vīsāya purisehi
anya-e0201n0:1627_4: kammaṃ kataṃ, vīsāya kulehi kammaṃ kataṃ, vīsāya itthīnaṃ, purisānaṃ, kulānaṃ, sattamiyaṃ
anya-e0201n0:1628_0: Tipaccaye vīsati, tiṃsatisaddāpi saṭṭhi, sattati, asīti, navutisaddā viya niccaṃ
anya-e0201n0:1628_1: itthi liṅgekavacanantā eva, si, aṃlopo, vīsati itthiyo, vīsati purisā, purise, vīsati
anya-e0201n0:1628_2: kulāni, vīsatiyā itthīhi, itthīnaṃ, purisehi, purisānaṃ, kulehi, kulānaṃ, vīsatiyā,
anya-e0201n0:1628_3: vīsatiyaṃ itthi, purisa, kulesu, evaṃ yāvanavutiyā veditabbā. Vaggabhede pana sati
anya-e0201n0:1628_4: bahuvacanampi vikappena dissati, dve vīsatiyo iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:1629_0: Sataṃ, sahassaṃ, dasasahassaṃ, satasahassaṃ, dasasatasahassanti ime napuṃsakaliṅgāyeva.
anya-e0201n0:1629_1: Saṅkhyeyyapadhāne pana itthiliṅge vattabbe sahassī, dasasahassī, satasahassīti itthiliṅgaṃ
anya-e0201n0:1629_2: bhavati. Vaggabhede pana dve satāni, tīṇi satāni, dve sahassāni, tīṇi sahassāni iccādīni
anya-e0201n0:1629_3: bhavanti. Koṭi, pakoṭi, koṭipakoṭi, akkhobhiṇīsaddā itthiliṅgā eva. Sesaṃ sabbaṃ
anya-e0201n0:1630: Sahassaṃ kāsi nāma, dasasahassaṃ nahutaṃ nāma, satasahassaṃ lakkhaṃ nāma.
anya-e0201n0:1631_0: Duvidhaṃ padhānaṃ saṅkhyāpadhānaṃ, saṅkhyeyyapadhānañca. Purisānaṃ vīsati hoti, purisānaṃ
anya-e0201n0:1631_1: navuti hoti, purisānaṃ sataṃ hoti, sahassaṃ hoti iccādi saṅkhyāpadhānaṃ nāma, vīsati
anya-e0201n0:1631_2: purisā, navuti purisā, sataṃ purisā, sahassaṃ purisā iccādi saṅkhyeyyapadhānaṃ nāma.
anya-e0201n0:1632: Etthapi vīsatisaddo itthiliṅgekavacano eva. Sata, sahassasaddā napuṃsakekavacanā eva. Saṅkhyāsaddānaṃ pana padavidhānañca guṇavidhānañca samāsakaṇḍe āgamissati.
anya-e0201n0:1638: Yosu savibhattissa amhassa kamena mayaṃ, asmā honti vā.
anya-e0201n0:1642: 254. Tumhassa tuvaṃtvaṃmhi ca ka. 146; rū. 236; nī. 324; ‘tumhassa tuvaṃtvamamhica’ (bahūsu).
anya-e0201n0:1643: Simhi ca aṃmhi ca savibhattissa tumhassa tuvaṃ, tvaṃ honti.
anya-e0201n0:1644: Tuvaṃ buddho tuvaṃ satthā, tuvaṃ mārābhibhū muni theragā. 839, tvaṃ no satthā anuttaro, tumhe gacchatha, tuvaṃ passati, tvaṃ passati.
anya-e0201n0:1645: 255. Aṃmhi taṃ maṃ tavaṃ mamaṃ ka. 143-4; rū. 234-5; nī. 322.
anya-e0201n0:1646: Aṃmhi savibhattīnaṃ tumhā’mhānaṃ taṃ, maṃ, tavaṃ, mamaṃ honti.
anya-e0201n0:1647: Maṃ passati, mamaṃ passati, taṃ passati, tavaṃ passati, amhe passati, tumhe passati.
anya-e0201n0:1648: 256. Dutiyāyomhi vā ka. 162; rū. 237; nī. 345; ‘dutiye yomhi vā’ (bahūsu).
anya-e0201n0:1649: Dutiyāyomhi savibhattīnaṃ tumhā’mhānaṃ ṅānubandhā aṃ, ākaṃādesā honti vā.
anya-e0201n0:1650: Amhaṃ, amhākaṃ passati, tumhaṃ, tumhākaṃ passati.
anya-e0201n0:1652: Nā, smāsu savibhattīnaṃ tumhā’mhānaṃ tayā, mayā honti.
anya-e0201n0:1653: Mayā kataṃ, tayā kataṃ, mayā apeti, tayā apeti.
anya-e0201n0:1654: 258. Tayātayīnaṃ tva vā tassa ka. 210; rū. 239; nī. 435.
anya-e0201n0:1655: Tayā, tayīnaṃ tassa tva hoti vā.
anya-e0201n0:1656: Tvayā kataṃ, tvayā apeti, amhehi kataṃ, tumhehi kataṃ.
anya-e0201n0:1659: Mama dīyate, mayhaṃ dīyate, tava dīyate, tuyhaṃ dīyate.
anya-e0201n0:1661: Naṃ, sesu savibhattissa amhassa kamena asmākaṃ, mamaṃ honti.
anya-e0201n0:1664: Naṃmhi savibhattīnaṃ tumhā’mhānaṃ ṅānubandhā aṃ, ākaṃādesā honti vā.
anya-e0201n0:1665: Amhaṃ dīyate, amhākaṃ dīyate, tumhaṃ dīyate, tumhākaṃ dīyate. Pañcamiyaṃ mayā, tayā, tvayā, pubbe vuttāva.
anya-e0201n0:1668: Tvamhā apeti, amhehi, tumhehi, mama, mamaṃ, mayhaṃ, tava, tuyhaṃ, amhaṃ, amhākaṃ, asmākaṃ, tumhaṃ, tumhākaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:1669: 263. Smiṃmhi tumhamhānaṃ tayimayi ka. 139; rū. 245; nī. 318.
anya-e0201n0:1670: Smiṃmhi savibhattīnaṃ tumhā’mhānaṃ tayi, mayi honti.
anya-e0201n0:1671: Tayi, mayi, tvatte tvayi, amhesu, tumhesu.
anya-e0201n0:1675_0: Mahāvuttinā yo, hisu amhassa asmādeso, yonaṃ ettañca, asmā gacchāma, asme passati,
anya-e0201n0:1675_1: asmāhi kataṃ, asmākaṃ dīyate, asmāhi apeti, asmākaṃ dhanaṃ, asmāsu ṭhitaṃ. “Asmābhijappanti
anya-e0201n0:1675_2: janā anekā”ti jā. 1.7.68 pāḷi-asme abhijappanti patthentīti attho. “Asmābhi pariciṇṇosi,
anya-e0201n0:1675_3: mettacittā hi nāyakā”ti apa. therī 2.2.230 therīpāḷi – ‘pariciṇṇo’ti paricārito.
anya-e0201n0:1676: Catutthiyaṃ asmākaṃ adhipannānaṃ, khamassu rājakuñjara jā. 2.21.181 – ‘adhipannāna’nti dukkhābhibhūtānaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:1677: Chaṭṭhiyaṃ esasmākaṃ kule dhammo jā. 1.4.147, esā asmākaṃ dhammatā.
anya-e0201n0:1678_0: Sattamiyaṃ yaṃ kiccaṃ parame mitte, katamasmāsu taṃ tayā. Pattā nissaṃsayaṃ tvamhā,
anya-e0201n0:1678_1: bhattirasmāsu yā tava jā. 2.21.81 – tattha ‘yaṃ kicca’nti yaṃ kammaṃ kattabbaṃ, tava
anya-e0201n0:1678_2: asmāsu yā bhatti, tāya mayaṃ tvamhā nissaṃsayataṃ pattāti attho.
anya-e0201n0:1680: Apādādimhi pavattānaṃ padato paresaṃ ekavākye ṭhitānaṃ tumhā’mhānaṃ vidhi hoti. Adhikārasuttamidaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:1682: Pañcamīvajjitesu yo, naṃ, hisu paresu apādādopavattānaṃ padato paresaṃ ekavākye ṭhitānaṃ savibhattīnaṃ tumhā’mhasaddānaṃ vo, no honti vā.
anya-e0201n0:1683_0: Gacchatha vo, gacchatha tumhe, gacchāma no, gacchāma amhe, passeyya vo, passeyya
anya-e0201n0:1683_1: tumhe, passeyya no, passeyya amhe, dīyate vo, dīyate tumhākaṃ, dīyate no, dīyate
anya-e0201n0:1683_2: amhākaṃ, dhanaṃ vo, dhanaṃ tumhākaṃ, dhanaṃ no, dhanaṃ amhākaṃ, kataṃ vo puññaṃ,
anya-e0201n0:1683_3: kataṃ tumhehi puññaṃ, kataṃ no puññaṃ, kataṃ amhehi puññaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:1684: Apañcamyāti kiṃ? Nissaṭaṃ tumhehi, nissaṭaṃ amhehi.
anya-e0201n0:1685: Apādādotveva? Balañca bhikkhūnamanuppadinnaṃ, tumhehi puññaṃ pasutaṃ anappakaṃ khu. pā. 7.12.
anya-e0201n0:1687: Ekavākyetveva? Devadatto tiṭṭhati gāme, tumhe tiṭṭhatha nagare.
anya-e0201n0:1690: Nā, sesu tādisānaṃ savibhattīnaṃ tumha, amhasaddānaṃ te, me honti vā.
anya-e0201n0:1691_0: Kataṃ te puññaṃ, kataṃ tayā puññaṃ, kataṃ me puññaṃ, kataṃ mayā puññaṃ, dinnaṃ te
anya-e0201n0:1691_1: vatthaṃ, dinnaṃ tuyhaṃ vatthaṃ, dinnaṃ me vatthaṃ, dinnaṃ mayhaṃ vatthaṃ, idaṃ te
anya-e0201n0:1691_2: raṭṭhaṃ, idaṃ tava raṭṭhaṃ, idaṃ me raṭṭhaṃ, idaṃ mama raṭṭhaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:1693: Anvādesaṭṭhāne tumhā’mhasaddānaṃ vo, no, te, meādesā niccaṃ bhavanti punabbidhānā.
anya-e0201n0:1694: Gāmo tumhākaṃ pariggaho, atho nagarampi vo pariggaho. Evaṃ sesesu.
anya-e0201n0:1695: 269. Sapubbā paṭhamantā vā ‘saṃpubbā paṭhamanthā vā’ (mūlapāṭhe) caṃ. 6.1.21; pā. 8.1.26.
anya-e0201n0:1696: Saṃvijjati pubbapadaṃ assāti sapubbaṃ, sapubbā paṭhamantapadamhā paresaṃ savibhattīnaṃ tumhā’mhasaddānaṃ vo, no, te, meādesā vikappena honti anvādesaṭṭhānepi.
anya-e0201n0:1697: Gāme paṭo tumhākaṃ, atho nagare kambalaṃ vo, atho nagare kambalaṃ tumhākaṃ vā. Evaṃ sesesu.
anya-e0201n0:1699: Ca, vā, ha, aha, evasaddehi yoge tumhā’mhānaṃ vo, no, te, meādesā na honti.
anya-e0201n0:1700: Gāmo tava ca mama ca pariggaho, gāmo tava vā mama vā pariggaho iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:1701: Cādiyogeti kiṃ? Gāmo ca te pariggaho, nagarañca me pariggaho.
anya-e0201n0:1703: Ālocanaṃ olokanaṃ, ālocanato aññasmiṃ dassanatthe payujjamāne tumhā’mhānaṃ vo, no, te, meādesā na honti.
anya-e0201n0:1704: Gāmo tumhe uddissa āgato, gāmo amhe uddissa āgato – ‘gāmo’ti gāmavāsī mahājano.
anya-e0201n0:1705: Anālocaneti kiṃ? Gāmo vo passati, gāmo no passati.
anya-e0201n0:1707: Āmantanabhūtaṃ pubbapadaṃ asantaṃ viya hoti, padatoti saṅkhyaṃ na gacchati.
anya-e0201n0:1710: Tulyādhikaraṇabhūte pade sati pubbaṃ sāmaññavacanabhūtaṃ āmantanapadaṃ asantaṃ viya na hoti, padatoti saṅkhyaṃ gacchati.
anya-e0201n0:1712: Sāmaññavacananti kiṃ? Māṇavaka devadatta! Tuyhaṃ pariggaho.
anya-e0201n0:1713: Ekattheti kiṃ? Devadatta! Yaññadatta! Tumhākaṃ pariggaho.
anya-e0201n0:1715: Bahūsu janesu pavattamānaṃ sāmaññavacanabhūtampi āmantanapadaṃ ekatthe pade sati asantaṃ viya na hoti vā.
anya-e0201n0:1716: Brāhmaṇā guṇavanto vo pariggaho, brāhmaṇā guṇavanto tumhākaṃ pariggaho.
anya-e0201n0:1720: Vibhatyatthānaṃ jotakattā vibhattiṭṭhāne ṭhitā paccayā vibhattipaccayā.
anya-e0201n0:1723_0: Tomhi dīghānaṃ rasso, kaññato, rattito, itthito, dhenuto. Mahāvuttinā tomhi mātāpitūnaṃ
anya-e0201n0:1723_1: ittaṃ, mātito, pitito, vadhuto, purisato, munito, daṇḍito, bhikkhuto, satthārato,
anya-e0201n0:1726: Ito, ato, etto, kutoti ete saddā topaccayantā nipaccante.
anya-e0201n0:1727_0: Imamhā imehīti vā ito, etasmā etehīti vā ato, etto, kasmā kehīti vā kuto. Ettha ca
anya-e0201n0:1727_1: imamhā, imehītiādikaṃ atthavākyaṃ disvā pakatiliṅgaṃ veditabbaṃ. Iminā suttena imassa
anya-e0201n0:1727_2: ittaṃ, etassa attaṃ ettañca, ‘saramhā dve’ti esaramhā dvittaṃ, kiṃsaddassa kuttaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:1732: Ubhato gāmaṃ gāmassa ubhosu passesūti attho.
anya-e0201n0:1736: Ādito, majjhato, purato, passato, piṭṭhito, orato, parato, pacchato, puratthimato, dakkhiṇatoiccādīsu bahulaṃ sattamyatthe dissati.
anya-e0201n0:1737: Tathā tatiyatthepi rūpaṃ attato samanupassati saṃ. ni. 3.44, pañcakkhandhe aniccato vipassati iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:1738: Yatonidānaṃ su. ni. 275, yatvādhikaraṇaṃ, yatodakaṃ tadādittamiccādīsu jā. 1.9.58 paṭhamatthe icchanti.
anya-e0201n0:1739: Ito ehi, ito balāke āgaccha, caṇḍo me vāyaso sakhā iccādīsu dutiyatthe.
anya-e0201n0:1740: Paratoghoso, nādiṭṭhā parato dosaṃ iccādīsu chaṭṭhyatthe.
anya-e0201n0:1741: 279. Sabbādito sattamyā tratthā ka. 249; rū. 266; nī. 494; caṃ. 4.1.10; pā. 5.3.10.
anya-e0201n0:1742: Sabbādināmakehi sabbanāmehi sattamiyā atthe tra, tthā honti.
anya-e0201n0:1743: Sabbasmiṃ sabbesūti vā sabbatra, sabbattha, sabbassaṃ sabbāsu vātipi. Evaṃ kataratra, katarattha, aññatra, aññattha iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:1745: 280. Katthetthakutrātrakvehidha ka. 251; rū. 269; nī. 499; caṃ. 4.1.11; pā. 5.3.11, 12.
anya-e0201n0:1746: Kattha, ettha, kutra, atra, tva, iha, idhāti ete saddāttha, tra,va ha, dhāpaccayantā sattamyatthe sijjhanti.
anya-e0201n0:1747: Kasmiṃ kesūti vā kattha, kutra, kva. ‘Kuva’ntipi sijjhati, “kuvaṃ sattassa kārako, kuvaṃ satto samuppanno saṃ. ni. 1.171, kuvaṃ asissaṃ, kuvaṃ khādissa”nti pāḷi.
anya-e0201n0:1748: Etasmiṃ etesūti vā ettha, atra, imasmiṃ imesūti vā iha, idha.
anya-e0201n0:1749: 281. Dhi sabbā vā ka. 250; rū. 268; nī. 502.
anya-e0201n0:1751: Namo te buddha vīra’tthu, vippamuttosi sabbadhi saṃ. ni. 1.90.
anya-e0201n0:1757: Tahiṃ, tahaṃ. Dutiyatthepi dissati “tahaṃ tahaṃ olokento gacchatī”ti.
anya-e0201n0:1759: Kiṃmhā sattamyatthe hiṃ, taṃ hoti. Kiṃssa kuttaṃ kattañca hoti.
anya-e0201n0:1760: Kuhiṃ gacchati, kuhaṃ gacchati. Kahaṃ ekaputtaka kahaṃ ekaputtaka saṃ. ni. 2.63. Kuhiñci, kuhiñcananti dve ci, cana-nipātantā sijjhanti.
anya-e0201n0:1764: Sabba, eka, añña, ya, tasaddehi kāle dā hoti.
anya-e0201n0:1765: Sabbasmiṃ kāle sabbadā, ekasmiṃ kāle ekadā, aññasmiṃ kāle aññadā, yasmiṃ kāle yadā, tasmiṃ kāle tadā.
anya-e0201n0:1767: Etepi sattamyatthe kāle dā, dhunā, dānipaccayantā sijjhanti.
anya-e0201n0:1768: Kiṃsmiṃ kāle kadā, kudā, sabbasmiṃ kāle sadā, imasmiṃ kāle adhunā, idāni.
anya-e0201n0:1770: Etepi kāle jja, jju, rahi, raha paccayantā sijjhanti.
anya-e0201n0:1772: Samāne kāle sajju-‘samāne’ti vijjamāne. Na hi pāpaṃ kataṃ kammaṃ, sajju khīraṃva muccati dha. pa. 71, sajjukaṃ pāhesi – tattha ‘sajjū’ti tasmiṃ divase.
anya-e0201n0:1774_0: Imasmiṃ kāle etarahi, kiṃsmiṃ kāle karaha. Kutoci, kvaci, katthaci, kuhiñci, kadāci,
anya-e0201n0:1774_1: karahacisaddā pana ci-nipātantā honti, tathā yato kutoci, yattha katthaci, yadā kadācīti.
anya-e0201n0:1779_0: Chabbidhāni abyayapadāni upasaggapadaṃ, nipātapadaṃ, vibhattipaccayantapadaṃ, abyayībhāvasamāsapadaṃ,
anya-e0201n0:1779_1: abyayataddhitapadaṃ, tvādipaccayantapadanti. Byayo vuccati vikāro, nānāliṅgavibhattivacanehi
anya-e0201n0:1779_2: natthi rūpabyayo etesanti abyayā, asaṅkhyāti ca vuccanti.
anya-e0201n0:1780: Tattha vibhattipaccayantapadato puna vibhattuppatti nāma natthi. Abyayībhāvasamāsamhi vibhattīnaṃ vidhi samāsakaṇḍe vakkhati, tasmā tāni dve ṭhapetvā sesāni cattāri idha vuccante.
anya-e0201n0:1782_0: Asaṅkhyehi padehi yathārahaṃ sabbāsaṃ vibhattīnaṃ lopo hoti, kehici padehi paṭhamāya
anya-e0201n0:1782_1: lopo, kehici padehi dutiyāya lopo…pe… kehici sattamiyā, kehici dvinnaṃ, kehici tissannaṃ…pe…
anya-e0201n0:1783: Tattha āvuso, bho, bhanteiccādīhi āmantananipātehi atthi, natthi, sakkā, labbhā, siyā, siyuṃ, sādhu, tuṇhīiccādīhi ca paṭhamāya lopo.
anya-e0201n0:1784: Ciraṃ, cirassaṃ, niccaṃ, satataṃ, abhiṇhaṃ, abhikkhaṇaṃ, muhuttaṃ iccādīhi accantasaṃyogalakkhaṇe dutiyāya.
anya-e0201n0:1785: Yathā, tathā, sabbathā, sabbaso, musā, micchāiccādīhi tatiyāya.
anya-e0201n0:1788: Pure, purā, pacchā, uddhaṃ, upari, adho, heṭṭhā, antarā, anto, raho, āvi, hiyyo, suveiccādīhi sattamiyā lopo.
anya-e0201n0:1789: Namosaddamhā “namo te buddha vīra’tthū”ti ettha paṭhamāya. “Namo karohi nāgassā”ti ettha dutiyāya.
anya-e0201n0:1790: Sayaṃsaddamhā “kusūlo sayameva bhijjate”ti ettha paṭhamāya. “Sayaṃ kataṃ sukhadukkha”nti dī. ni. 3.191, 193 ettha tatiyāya, iccādinā yathārahavibhāgo veditabbo.
anya-e0201n0:1791: Iti, evaṃsaddehi payogānurūpaṃ sattannaṃ vibhattīnaṃ lopaṃ icchanti.
anya-e0201n0:1793: Rūpasiddhiyaṃ pana “tehi paṭhamekavacanameva bhavatī”ti rū. 131 (piṭṭhe) vuttaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:1794_0: Tattha “abhikkamati, abhidhammo” iccādīsu dhātuliṅgāni upecca tesaṃ atthaṃ nānāppakāraṃ
anya-e0201n0:1794_1: karontā sajjanti saṅkharontīti upasaggā. Te hi kvaci tadatthaṃ visiṭṭhaṃ karonti
anya-e0201n0:1794_2: “jānāti, pajānāti, sañjānāti, avajānāti, abhijānāti, parijānāti, susīlo, dussīlo,
anya-e0201n0:1795: Kvaci tadatthaṃ nānāppakāraṃ katvā vibhajjanti “gacchati, āgacchati, uggacchati, ogacchati”iccādīsu.
anya-e0201n0:1796: Kvaci tadatthaṃ bādhetvā tappaṭiviruddhe vā tadaññasmiṃ vā atthe tāni yojenti.
anya-e0201n0:1798: Jeti, parājeti, omuñcati, paṭimuñcati, gilati, uggilati, nimmujjati, ummujjati, dhammo, uddhammoiccādi.
anya-e0201n0:1800: Dadāti, ādadāti, dadhāti, vidheti, pidheti, nidheti, sandhiyati, saddahati, abhidhātiiccādi.
anya-e0201n0:1801: Kvaci pana padasobhaṇaṃ katvā tadatthaṃ anuvattanti, “vijjati, saṃvijjati, labhati, paṭilabhati” iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:1802: Te vīsati honti-pa, ā, u, o, du, ni, vi, su, saṃ, ati, adhi, anu, apa, api, abhi, ava, upa, pati, parā, pari.
anya-e0201n0:1803: Kaccāyane pana osaddo avakāriyamattanti taṃ aggahetvā nīsaddaṃ gaṇhāti, idha pana nīsaddo nissa dīghamattanti taṃ aggahetvā osaddaṃ gaṇhāti.
anya-e0201n0:1805_1: passāso. Viyoge-pavāso. Tappare-pācariyo. Tadanubandhe-putto, paputto, nattā, panattā.
anya-e0201n0:1809: Uggate-uggacchati. Uddhaṃkamme-uṭṭhāti. Padhāne-uttaro. Viyoge-upavāso. Sambhave-ubbhūto. Atthalābhe-rūpassa uppādo. Sattiyaṃ-ussahati gantuṃ. Sarūpakhyāne-uddeso.
anya-e0201n0:1811: Antobhāve-ocarako, orodho. Adhokamme-okkhitto. Niggahe-ovādo. Antare, dese ca-okāso. Pātubhāve-opapātiko. Yesu atthesu avasaddo vattati, tesupi osaddo vattati.
anya-e0201n0:1813: Asobhaṇe-duggandho. Abhāve-dubbhikkhaṃ, dussīlo, duppañño. Kucchite-dukkaṭaṃ. Asamiddhiyaṃ-dusassaṃ. Kicche-dukkaraṃ. Virūpe-dubbaṇṇo, dummukho.
anya-e0201n0:1817: Visese-vipassati. Vividhe-vicittaṃ. Viruddhe-vivādo. Vigate-vimalo. Viyoge-vippayutto. Virūpe-vippaṭisāro.
anya-e0201n0:1821_0: Samodhāne-sandhi. Sammā, samatthesu-samādhi, sampayutto. Samantabhāve-saṃkiṇṇo. Saṅgate-samāgamo,
anya-e0201n0:1823: Atikkame-atirocati, accayo, atīto. Atikkante-accantaṃ. Atissaye-atikusalo. Bhusatthe-atikodho. Antokamme-mañcaṃ vā pīṭhaṃ vā atiharitvā ṭhapeti.
anya-e0201n0:1825_2: adhiṭṭhāti, cīvaraṃ adhiṭṭhāti, iddhivikubbanaṃ adhiṭṭhāti. Nicchaye-adhimuccati.
anya-e0201n0:1829: Apagate-apeti, apāyo. Garahe-apagabbho, apasaddo. Vajjane-apasālāya āyanti. Pūjāyaṃ-vuḍḍha-mapacāyanti. Padussane-aparajjhati.
anya-e0201n0:1831_0: Sambhāvane-apipabbataṃ bhindeyya, merumpi vinivijjheyya. Apekkhāyaṃ-ayampi dhammo
anya-e0201n0:1831_1: aniyato. Samuccaye-itipi arahaṃ, chavimpi dahati, cammampi dahati, maṃsampi dahati.
anya-e0201n0:1831_2: Garahāyaṃ-api amhākaṃ paṇḍitaka. Pucchāyaṃ-api bhante bhikkhaṃ labhittha, api nu tumhe sotukāmāttha.
anya-e0201n0:1833: Abhimukhe-abhikkanto. Visiṭṭhe-abhiññā. Adhike-abhidhammo. Uddhaṃkamme-abhirūhati. Kule-abhijāto. Sāruppe-abhirūpo. Vandane-abhivādeti. Sesaṃ kārakakaṇḍe vakkhati.
anya-e0201n0:1835: Adhobhāge-avakkhitto. Viyoge-avakokilaṃ vanaṃ. Paribhave-avajānāti. Jānane-avagacchati. Suddhiyaṃ-vodāyati, vodānaṃ. Nicchaye-avadhāraṇaṃ. Dese-avakāso. Theyye-avahāro.
anya-e0201n0:1837_0: Upagame-upanisīdati. Samīpe-upacāro, upanagaraṃ. Upapattiyaṃ-saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjati.
anya-e0201n0:1837_1: Sadise-upamāṇaṃ, upameyyaṃ. Adhike-upakhāriyaṃ doṇo. Uparibhāve – upasampanno, upacayo.
anya-e0201n0:1837_2: Anasane-upavāso. Dosakkhāne-paraṃ upavadati. Saññāyaṃ-upadhā, upasaggo. Pubbakamme-upakkamo,
anya-e0201n0:1844: Nīsaddo pana nīharaṇa, nīvaraṇādīsu vattati, nīharaṇaṃ, nīvaraṇaṃiccādi.
anya-e0201n0:1847: Niccaṃ ekarūpena vākyapathe patantīti nipātā. Padānaṃ ādi, majjhā’vasānesu nipatantīti nipātātipi vadanti.
anya-e0201n0:1848_0: Asatvavācakā cādisaddā nipātā nāma. Te pana vibhattiyuttā, ayuttā cāti duvidhā honti.
anya-e0201n0:1848_1: Tattha vibhattiyuttā pubbe dassitā eva. Cādayo ayuttā nāma. Te pana anekasatappabhedā
anya-e0201n0:1850: Abyayataddhitapaccayantā nāma yathā, tathā, ekadhā, ekajjhaṃ, sabbaso, kathaṃ, itthaṃ iccādayo. Tehi tatiyālopo.
anya-e0201n0:1852_0: Tvādipaccayantā nāma katvā, katvāna, kātuna, kātuṃ, kātave, dakkhitāye, hetuye, ādāya,
anya-e0201n0:1852_1: upādāya, viceyya, vineyya, sakkacca, āhacca, upasampajja, samecca, avecca, paṭicca,
anya-e0201n0:1852_2: aticca, āgamma, ārabbhaiccādayo. Tesu tvā, tvānantehi paṭhamālopo. Tuṃ, tave, tāye,
anya-e0201n0:1864: Ettha ca mattasaddena kattu, kammādike vibhatyatthe nivatteti. Tasmā atthamattanti liṅgatthoyeva vuccati.
anya-e0201n0:1865: Tattha anuccārite sati suṇantassa avidito attho līnattho nāma. Taṃ līnamatthaṃ gameti bodhetīti liṅgaṃ, uccāritapadaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:1866: Taṃ pana pakatiliṅgaṃ, nipphannaliṅganti duvidhaṃ. Tattha vibhattirahitaṃ pakatiliṅgaṃ idhādhippetaṃ liṅga, vibhattīnaṃ visuṃ visuṃ vibhāgaṭṭhānattā.
anya-e0201n0:1867: Līnaṃ aṅganti liṅgaṃ. Tattha ‘līna’nti apākaṭaṃ. ‘Aṅga’nti avayavo. Liṅgaṃ, nāmaṃ, pāṭipadikanti atthato ekaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:1868: Liṅgassa attho paramattho, paññattiatthoti duvidho. Tathā visesanattho, visesyatthoti.
anya-e0201n0:1869_0: Tattha visesanattho nāma sakattho, tassa tassa saddassa paṭiniyato pāṭipuggalikatthoti
anya-e0201n0:1869_1: vuttaṃ hoti. Soyeva tasmiṃ tasmiṃ atthe ādimhi sadduppattiyā cirakālañca saddapavattiyā
anya-e0201n0:1869_2: nibaddhakāraṇattā nimittatthoti ca vuccati. So suti, jāti, guṇa, dabba, kriyā, nāma,
anya-e0201n0:1870_0: Visesyattho nāma sāmaññattho, bahunimittānaṃ sādhāraṇatthoti vuttaṃ hoti, soyeva
anya-e0201n0:1870_1: taṃtaṃnimittayogā nemittakatthoti ca vuccati, so jāti, guṇa, dabba, kriyā, nāmavasena
anya-e0201n0:1870_2: pañcavidho. Go, sukko, daṇḍī, pācako, tissoti.
anya-e0201n0:1871: Tattha gosaddo yadā jātimattaṃ vadati go jātīti, tadā suti visesanaṃ. Yadā dabbaṃ vadati go gacchatīti, tadā suti ca jāti ca visesanaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:1872_0: Sukkasaddo yadā guṇamattaṃ vadati sukko guṇoti, tadā suti visesanaṃ. Yadā guṇavisesaṃ
anya-e0201n0:1872_1: vadati gossa sukkoti, tadā suti ca guṇajāti ca visesanaṃ. Yadā guṇavantaṃ dabbaṃ
anya-e0201n0:1872_2: vadati sukko goti, tadā suti ca guṇajāti ca guṇaviseso ca sambandho ca visesanaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:1873_0: Daṇḍīsaddo yadā jātimattaṃ vadati daṇḍī jātīti, tadā suti ca dabbañca visesanaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:1873_1: Yadā dabbavantaṃ dabbaṃ vadati daṇḍī purisoti, tadā suti ca dabbañca jāti ca sambandho ca visesanaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:1874_0: Pācakasaddo yadā jātimattaṃ vadati pācako jātīti, tadā suti ca kriyā ca visesanaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:1874_1: Yadā kriyānipphādakaṃ dabbaṃ vadati pācako purisoti, tadā suti ca kriyā ca jāti ca
anya-e0201n0:1875: Tissasaddo yadā nāmamattaṃ vadati tisso nāmanti, tadā suti visesanaṃ. Yadā nāmavantaṃ dabbaṃ vadati, tisso bhikkhūti, tadā suti ca nāmajāti ca sambandho ca visesanaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:1876_0: Sabbattha yaṃ yaṃ vadatīti vuttaṃ, taṃ taṃ visesyanti ca dabbanti ca veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:1876_1: Ettha ca suti nāma saddasabhāvā eva hoti, saddapakkhikā eva. Sabbo saddo paṭhamaṃ
anya-e0201n0:1876_2: sattābhidhāyakoti ca ñāse vuttaṃ. Tasmā sabbattha sutiṭṭhāne sattā eva yuttā vattunti.
anya-e0201n0:1876_3: Sattāti ca tassa tassa atthassa vohāramattenapi loke vijjamānatā vuccati, taṃ taṃ
anya-e0201n0:1876_4: saddaṃ suṇantassa ca ñāṇaṃ taṃtadatthassa atthitāmattaṃ sabbapaṭhamaṃ jānāti, tato
anya-e0201n0:1876_5: paraṃ jātisadde jātiṃ jānāti. Guṇasadde guṇanti evamādi sabbaṃ vattabbaṃ. Liṅga,
anya-e0201n0:1877_0: Tattha liṅgaṃ nāma ye itthi, purisānaṃ liṅga, nimitta, kuttā’kappā nāma abhidhamme
anya-e0201n0:1877_1: vuttā, ye ca napuṃsakānaṃ liṅga, nimitta, kuttā’kappā nāma avuttasiddhā, ye ca saddesu
anya-e0201n0:1877_2: ceva atthesu ca visadā’visadākāra, majjhimākārā sandissanti, sabbametaṃ liṅgaṃ nāma.
anya-e0201n0:1878: Evaṃ visesana, visesyavasena duvidho attho pubbe vuttassa saddaliṅgassa attho nāma, so saliṅgo, sasaṅkhyo, saparimāṇo cāti tividho hoti.
anya-e0201n0:1879: Tattha saliṅgo yathā? Saññā, phasso, cittaṃ. Kaññā, puriso, kulaṃ. Mālā, rukkho, dhananti.
anya-e0201n0:1880: Sasaṅkhyo yathā? Eko, dve, tayo, bahū iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:1881: Saparimāṇo yathā? Vidatthi, hattho, doṇo, āḷhakaṃ iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:1882_0: Api ca suddho, saṃsaṭṭhoti duvidho liṅgattho. Tattha kammādisaṃsaggarahito suddho
anya-e0201n0:1882_1: nāma. So saliṅgo, sasaṅkhyo, saparimāṇo, upasaggattho, nipātattho, pāṭi-padikatthoti
anya-e0201n0:1882_2: chabbidho. Atthi, sakkā, labbhāiccādi idha pāṭipadikaṃ nāma. Tuna, tvāna, tvā, tave,
anya-e0201n0:1883_0: Saṃsaṭṭho vuttasaṃsaṭṭho, avuttasaṃsaṭṭhoti duvidho. Tattha vuttasaṃsaṭṭho catubbidho
anya-e0201n0:1883_1: samāsena vuttasaṃsaṭṭho, taddhitena, ākhyātena, kitenāti. Tattha samāsena vutto chakārakasambandhavasena
anya-e0201n0:1883_2: sattavidho, bhāvena saddhiṃ aṭṭhavidho vā, tathā taddhitena vutto. Ākhyātena vutto
anya-e0201n0:1883_3: kattu, kamma, bhāvavasena tividho. Kitena vutto chakāraka, bhāvavasena sattavidho.
anya-e0201n0:1883_4: Sabbo suddho ceva vuttasaṃsaṭṭho ca paṭhamāya visayo.
anya-e0201n0:1884_0: Avuttasaṃsaṭṭhopi kattusaṃsaṭṭho, kammasaṃsaṭṭhotiādinā anekavidho. So dutiyādīnaṃ
anya-e0201n0:1884_1: eva visayoti. Ettha ca vibhattiyā vinā kevalo saddo payogaṃ nārahatīti katvā payogārahatthameva
anya-e0201n0:1884_2: chabbidhe suddhe catubbidhe ca vuttasaṃsaṭṭhe paṭhamā payujjati, na atthajotanatthaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:1885_0: Kenaci vācakena avuttāni pana kammādīni vibhattīhi vinā viditāni na hontītikatvā
anya-e0201n0:1885_1: atthajotanatthampi kammādīsu dutiyādayo payujjanti. Tasmā atthamatteti idha desantarāvacchedake
anya-e0201n0:1885_2: visayamatte bhummaṃ. Kamme dutiyāiccādīsu pana nipphādetabbe payojane bhummanti evaṃ
anya-e0201n0:1886: 290. Āmantane ka. 285; rū. 70; nī. 578; caṃ. 2.1.94; pā. 2.3.47; āmantaṇe (bahūsu).
anya-e0201n0:1887_0: Pageva siddhassa vatthuno nāmena vā nipātena vā attano abhimukhīkaraṇaṃ āmantanaṃ
anya-e0201n0:1887_1: nāma. Adhikāmantane atthamatte paṭhamā hoti. Ettha ca āmantanapadaṃ nāma kriyāpekkhaṃ
anya-e0201n0:1887_2: na hoti, tasmā kārakasaññaṃ na labhati.
anya-e0201n0:1888: Taṃ pana duvidhaṃ sādarā’nādaravasena. Ehi samma, ehi jeti.
anya-e0201n0:1889: Tathā sajīva, nijjīvavasena, bho purisa, vadehi bho saṅkha, vadehi bho saṅkha dī. ni. 2.426. Ummujja bho puthusile, ummujja bho puthusileti saṃ. ni. 4.358.
anya-e0201n0:1890: Tathā paccakkhā’paccakkhavasena, bho purisa, kahaṃ ekaputtaka, kahaṃ ekaputtakāti saṃ. ni. 2.63; dha. pa. aṭṭha. 1.2.
anya-e0201n0:1891_0: Tathā niyamā’niyamavasena, bho purisa, acchariyaṃ vata bho abbhutaṃ vata bho dī.
anya-e0201n0:1891_1: ni. 2.192. Yatra hi nāma saññī samānotiādi dī. ni. 2.192. Idaṃ āmantanaṃ nāma pageva
anya-e0201n0:1891_2: siddhe eva hoti, na vidhātabbe, na hi pageva rājabhāvaṃ vā bhikkhubhāvaṃ vā appattaṃ
anya-e0201n0:1891_3: janaṃ “bho rājā”ti vā “bho bhikkhū”ti vā āmantentīti.
anya-e0201n0:1896: Kammatthe dutiyā hoti. Kariyateti kammaṃ, taṃ nibbattikammaṃ, vikatikammaṃ, pattikammanti tividhaṃ hoti.
anya-e0201n0:1897_0: Tattha nibbattikammaṃ yathā? Iddhimā hatthivaṇṇaṃ māpeti, rājā nagaraṃ māpeti, mātā
anya-e0201n0:1897_1: puttaṃ vijāyati, bījaṃ rukkhaṃ janeti, kammaṃ vipākaṃ janeti, āhāro balaṃ janeti,
anya-e0201n0:1897_2: jano puññaṃ karoti, pāpaṃ karoti, buddho dhammaṃ desesi, vinayaṃ paññapesi, bhikkhu
anya-e0201n0:1898_0: Vikatikammaṃ yathā? Gehaṃ karoti, rathaṃ karoti, ghaṭaṃ karoti, paṭaṃ vāyati, odanaṃ
anya-e0201n0:1898_1: pacati, bhattaṃ pacati, kaṭṭhaṃ aṅgāraṃ karoti, suvaṇṇaṃ kaṭakaṃ karoti, gehaṃ jhāpeti,
anya-e0201n0:1898_2: rukkhaṃ chindati, pākāraṃ bhindati, vihayo lunāti, pāṇaṃ hanati, bhattaṃ bhuñjati iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:1899: Pattikammaṃ yathā? Gāmaṃ gacchati, gehaṃ pavisati, rukkhaṃ ārohati, nadiṃ tarati, ādiccaṃ passati, dhammaṃ suṇāti, buddhaṃ vandati payirupāsati iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:1900_0: Pakatikammaṃ, vikatikammanti duvidhaṃ. Suvaṇṇaṃ kaṭakaṃ karoti, kaṭṭhaṃ aṅgāraṃ karoti,
anya-e0201n0:1900_1: purisaṃ ṭhitaṃ passati, purisaṃ gacchantaṃ passati, bhikkhuṃ passati sataṃ, sampajānaṃ,
anya-e0201n0:1900_2: abhikkamantaṃ, paṭikkamantaṃ, ālokentaṃ, vilokentaṃ, samiñjentaṃ, pasārentaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:1902: Dhātukammaṃ, kāritakammanti duvidhaṃ. Gāmaṃ gacchati, purisaṃ gāmaṃ gameti.
anya-e0201n0:1903_0: Dhātukammañca dvikammikadhātūnaṃ duvidhaṃ padhānakammaṃ, appadhānakammanti. Ajapālo
anya-e0201n0:1903_1: ajaṃ gāmaṃ neti, puriso bhāraṃ gāmaṃ vahati, harati, gāmaṃ sākhaṃ kaḍḍhati, gāviṃ
anya-e0201n0:1903_2: khīraṃ dohati, brāhmaṇaṃ kambalaṃ yācati, brāhmaṇaṃ bhattaṃ bhikkhati, gāviyo vajaṃ
anya-e0201n0:1903_3: avarundhati, bhagavantaṃ pañhaṃ pucchati, rukkhaṃ phalāni ocināti, sissaṃ dhammaṃ
anya-e0201n0:1903_4: bravīti, bhagavā bhikkhū etadavoca udā. 23 (thokaṃ visadisaṃ), sissaṃ dhammaṃ anusāsati iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:1904: Ettha ca ‘ajaṃ, khīraṃ’ iccādi padhānakammaṃ nāma kattārā pariggahetuṃ iṭṭhatarattā. ‘Gāmaṃ, gāviṃ’iccādi appadhānakammaṃ nāma tathā aniṭṭhatarattā.
anya-e0201n0:1905_0: Tattha padhānakammaṃ kathinakammaṃ nāma, kammabhāve thirakammanti vuttaṃ hoti. Appadhānakammaṃ
anya-e0201n0:1905_1: akathinakammaṃ nāma, athirakammanti vuttaṃ hoti. Tañhi kadāci sampadānaṃ hoti, kadāci
anya-e0201n0:1905_2: apādānaṃ, kadāci sāmi, kadāci okāso. Yathā – so maṃ dakāya neti, gāvito khīraṃ dohati,
anya-e0201n0:1905_3: gāviyā khīraṃ dohahi, gāviyaṃ khīraṃ dohati iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:1907: 292. Gatibodhāhārasaddatthā kammaka bhajjādīnaṃ payojje ka. 300; rū. 286; nī. 587; caṃ. 2.1.44; pā. 1.4.52.
anya-e0201n0:1908_0: Niccavidhisuttamidaṃ. Gamanatthānaṃ bodhanatthānaṃ āhāratthānaṃ saddatthānaṃ akammakānaṃ
anya-e0201n0:1908_1: bhajjādīnañca dhātūnaṃ payojje kammani dutiyā hoti. Ettha ca payojjakammaṃ nāma kāritakammaṃ vuccati.
anya-e0201n0:1909_0: Puriso purisaṃ gāmaṃ gamayati, sāmiko ajapālaṃ ajaṃ gāmaṃ nayāpeti, ācariyo sissaṃ
anya-e0201n0:1909_1: dhammaṃ bodheti, puriso purisaṃ bhattaṃ bhojeti, ācariyo sissaṃ dhammaṃ pāṭheti,
anya-e0201n0:1909_2: puriso purisaṃ sayāpeti, acchāpeti, uṭṭhāpeti, puriso purisaṃ dhaññaṃ bhajjāpeti,
anya-e0201n0:1910: Etesamīti kiṃ? Puriso purisena odanaṃ pāceti.
anya-e0201n0:1911_0: Ettha ca gamanatthādīnaṃ payojje tatiyāpi rūpasiddhiyaṃ 141 piṭṭhe saddanītiyañca
anya-e0201n0:1911_1: sutta-148 piṭṭhe vuttā. Saddanītiyaṃ tatiyāpayogepi kammatthameva icchati. Ñāsādīsu
anya-e0201n0:1912: Yadā pana paṭhamaṃ payojakaṃ añño dutiyo payojeti, tadā paṭhamo payojjo nāma. Tasmiṃ tatiyāevāti vuttiyaṃ vuttaṃ. Attanā vippakataṃ kuṭiṃ parehi pariyosāpeti pārā. 363.
anya-e0201n0:1914: Harādīnaṃ payojje kammani vikappena dutiyā hoti.
anya-e0201n0:1915_0: Sāmiko purisaṃ bhāraṃ hāreti purisena vā, purisaṃ āhāraṃ ajjhohāreti purisena vā,
anya-e0201n0:1915_1: purisaṃ kammaṃ kāreti purisena vā, rājā purisaṃ attānaṃ dasseti purisena vā, purisaṃ
anya-e0201n0:1917: Khādādīnaṃ payojje kammani na dutiyā hoti.
anya-e0201n0:1918_0: Sāmiko purisena khajjaṃ khādāpeti, ada-bhakkhane, bhattaṃ ādeti, sāmiko dāsena purisaṃ
anya-e0201n0:1918_1: avhāpeti, saddāyāpeti, kandayati, nādayati. Ettha ca ‘saddāyāpetī’ti saddaṃ kārāpeti,
anya-e0201n0:1919: 295. Vahissāniyantuke ka. 300; rū. 286; nī. 587; caṃ. 2.1.48; pā. 1.4.52.
anya-e0201n0:1920_0: Vahissāti dhātuniddeso i-kāro, niyāmeti payojetīti niyantā, natthi niyantā etassāti
anya-e0201n0:1920_1: aniyantuko. Yassa aññena payojakena kiccaṃ natthi, sayameva ñatvā vahati, so aniyantuko
anya-e0201n0:1920_2: nāma, vahadhātussa tādise aniyantuke payojje kammani dutiyā na hoti.
anya-e0201n0:1923: 296. Bhakkhissāhiṃsāyaṃ ka. 300; rū. 286; nī. 587; caṃ. 2.1.49; pā. 1.4.5.
anya-e0201n0:1924: Bhakkhituṃ icchantassa bhakkhāpanaṃ hiṃsā nāma na hoti, anicchantassa bhakkhāpanaṃ hiṃsā nāma, bhakkhadhātussa payojje kammani ahiṃsāvisaye dutiyā na hoti.
anya-e0201n0:1926: Ahiṃsāyanti kiṃ? Balībadde sassaṃ bhakkhāpeti. Ettha ‘sassa’nti thūlataraṃ sassanti vadanti.
anya-e0201n0:1927: Pāḷiyaṃ “sabbesaṃ viññāpetvāna apa. thera 1.1.438, tosenti sabbapāṇinaṃ apa. thera 1.1.300. Therassa patto dutiyassa gāhetabbo” iccādinā pārā. 615 payojje chaṭṭhīpi dissati.
anya-e0201n0:1929: Dhīiccādīhi nipātopasaggehi yuttā liṅgamhā dutiyā hoti.
anya-e0201n0:1930_0: Dhī brāhmaṇassa hantāraṃ dha. pa. 389, dhīratthu’maṃ pūtikāyaṃ jā. 1.3.129, dhīratthu
anya-e0201n0:1930_1: taṃ dhanalābhaṃ jā. 1.4.36, dhīratthu bahuke kāme. Tatiyāpi dissati, dhīratthu jīvitena
anya-e0201n0:1930_2: me jā. 2.17.135. Antarā ca rājagahaṃ antarā ca nāḷandaṃ dī. ni. 1.1, abhito gāmaṃ
anya-e0201n0:1930_3: vasati, paritogāmaṃ vasati, nadiṃ nerañjaraṃ pati su. ni. 427, etesu chaṭṭhyatthe dutiyā.
anya-e0201n0:1931_0: Tathā paṭibhāti maṃ bhagavā udā. 45; saṃ. ni. 1.217, apissu maṃ tisso upamāyo paṭibhaṃsu
anya-e0201n0:1931_1: ma. ni. 1.374, paṭibhātu taṃ bhikkhu dhammo bhāsituṃ mahāva. 258. Paṭibhantu taṃ
anya-e0201n0:1931_2: cunda bojjhaṅgā saṃ. ni. 3.79 – ‘ma’nti mama, ‘ta’nti tava, sampadānatthe dutiyā.
anya-e0201n0:1931_3: ‘Ma’nti mamañāṇe, ‘ta’nti tavañāṇetipi vaṇṇesuṃ. Na upāyamantarena atthassa siddhi,
anya-e0201n0:1931_4: natthi samādānamantarena sikkhāpaṭilābho, nevidha na huraṃ na ubhayamantarena, esevanto
anya-e0201n0:1931_5: dukkhassa ma. ni. 3.393; udā. 74. Tattha ‘antarenā’ti nipātapadametaṃ, vajjetvātyattho.
anya-e0201n0:1931_6: Pubbena gāmaṃ, dakkhiṇena gāmaṃ, uttarena gāmaṃ, gāmassa pubbeti attho.
anya-e0201n0:1932_0: Upasaggapubbānaṃ akammakadhātūnaṃ payoge ādhāre dutiyā, pathaviṃ adhisessati, gāmaṃ
anya-e0201n0:1932_1: adhitiṭṭhati, rukkhaṃ ajjhāvasati, mañcaṃ vā pīṭhaṃ vā abhinisīdeyya vā abhinipajjeyya
anya-e0201n0:1932_2: vā pāci. 130, gāmaṃ upavasati, gāmaṃ anuvasati, pabbataṃ adhivasati, gharaṃ āvasati,
anya-e0201n0:1932_3: agāraṃ ajjhāvasati dī. ni. 1.258; pārā. 519, uposathaṃ upavasati, kāmāvacaraṃ upapajjati,
anya-e0201n0:1932_4: rūpāvacaraṃ upapajjati, arūpāvacaraṃ upapajjati, sakkassa sahabyataṃ upapajjati,
anya-e0201n0:1932_5: nipannaṃ vā upanipajjeyya dī. ni. 3.282, nisinnaṃ vā upanisīdeyya dī. ni. 3.282,
anya-e0201n0:1932_6: ṭhitaṃ vā upatiṭṭheyya dī. ni. 3.282 iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:1933: Tappāna, cārepi dutiyā, nadiṃ pivati, samuddaṃ pivati, gāmaṃ carati, araññaṃ carati, nadiyaṃ, gāmeti attho.
anya-e0201n0:1934_0: Kāla, disāsupi ādhāre eva dutiyā, taṃ khaṇaṃ, taṃ muhuttaṃ, taṃ kālaṃ, ekamantaṃ
anya-e0201n0:1934_1: khu. pā. 5.1, ekaṃ samayaṃ khu. pā. 5.1; dī. ni. 1.1, pubbaṇhasamayaṃ pārā. 16, sāyanhasamayaṃ,
anya-e0201n0:1934_2: taṃ divasaṃ, imaṃ rattiṃ dī. ni. 3.285, dutiyampi, tatiyampi, catutthaṃ vā pañcamaṃ
anya-e0201n0:1934_3: vā appeti, tato pubbaṃ, tato paraṃ, purimaṃ disaṃ dī. ni. 2.336, dakkhiṇaṃ disaṃ
anya-e0201n0:1934_4: dī. ni. 2.336, pacchimaṃ disaṃ dī. ni. 2.336, uttaraṃ disaṃ dī. ni. 2.336, imā dasa
anya-e0201n0:1934_5: disāyo, katamaṃ disaṃ tiṭṭhati nāgarājā jā. 1.16.104, imāsu disāsu katamāya disāya
anya-e0201n0:1935: 298. Lakkhaṇitthambhūtavicchāsvabhinā ka. 299; rū. 288; nī. 582, 586; caṃ. 2.1.54; pā. 1.4.90, 91; 2.3.8.
anya-e0201n0:1936: Lakkhaṇādīsu atthesu pavattena abhinā yuttā liṅgamhā dutiyā hoti.
anya-e0201n0:1937: Lakkhīyati lakkhitabbaṃ anenāti lakkhaṇaṃ. Ayaṃ pakāro itthaṃ, īdiso visesoti attho. Itthaṃ bhūto pattoti itthambhūto. Bhinne atthe byāpituṃ icchā vicchā.
anya-e0201n0:1939: Rukkhamabhi vijjotate vijju, rukkhaṃ abhi byāpetvā vijjotateti attho, vijjobhāsena byāpito rukkho vijjuppādassa lakkhaṇaṃ saññāṇaṃ hoti.
anya-e0201n0:1941_0: Sādhu devadatto mātaramabhi, mātaraṃ abhi visiṭṭhaṃ katvā sādhūti attho, devadatto
anya-e0201n0:1941_1: sakkaccaṃ mātupaṭṭhāne aggapurisoti vuttaṃ hoti. Taṃ kho pana bhavantaṃ gotamaṃ evaṃ
anya-e0201n0:1941_2: kalyāṇo kittisaddo abbhuggato pārā. 1. Ettha ca ‘abbhuggato’ti abhi visiṭṭhaṃ katvā
anya-e0201n0:1941_3: uggatoti attho, ayaṃ kittisaddo bhoto gotamassa sakalalokaggabhāvaṃ pakāsetvā uggatoti
anya-e0201n0:1941_4: vuttaṃ hoti, kittisaddasambandhe pana tassa kho pana bhoto gotamassāti attho.
anya-e0201n0:1943: Rukkhaṃ rukkhaṃ abhi vijjotate cando, byāpetvā vijjotatetyattho.
anya-e0201n0:1944: Ettha ca lakkhaṇādiatthā abhisaddena jotanīyā piṇḍatthā eva, na vacanīyatthā, byāpanādiatthā eva vacanīyatthāti.
anya-e0201n0:1945: 299. Patiparīhi bhāge ca ka. 299; rū. 288; nī. 582, 586; caṃ. 2.1.55; pā. 1.4.90.
anya-e0201n0:1946: Lakkhaṇi’tthambhūta, vicchāsu ca bhāge ca pavattehi pati, parīhi yuttā liṅgamhā dutiyā hoti.
anya-e0201n0:1948: Rukkhaṃ pati vijjotate vijju, rukkhaṃ pari vijjotate vijju. Tattha ‘patī’ti paṭicca, ‘parī’ti pharitvā.
anya-e0201n0:1950: Sādhu devadatto mātaraṃ pati, sādhu devadatto mātaraṃ pari.
anya-e0201n0:1952: Rukkhaṃ rukkhaṃ pati vijjotate cando, rukkhaṃ rukkhaṃ pari vijjotate cando.
anya-e0201n0:1954_0: Taṃ dīyatu, yadettha maṃ pati siyā, taṃ dīyatu, yadettha maṃ pari siyā. Tattha ‘patī’ti
anya-e0201n0:1954_1: paṭicca, ‘parī’ti paricca, uddissāti attho, ‘ṭhapita’nti pāṭhaseso. Ettha maṃ uddissa
anya-e0201n0:1954_2: yaṃ vatthu ṭhapitaṃ siyā, taṃ me dīyatūtyattho, etesu bahūsu bhāgesu yo mama bhāgo,
anya-e0201n0:1956: Lakkhaṇi’tthambhūta, vicchāsu ca bhāge ca pavattena anunā yuttā liṅgamhā dutiyā hoti.
anya-e0201n0:1958_0: Rukkhaṃ anu vijjotate vijju, rukkhaṃ anu pharitvāti attho. Caturāsītisahassāni, sambuddhamanupabbajuṃ
anya-e0201n0:1958_1: bu. vaṃ. 21.5, ‘sambuddha’nti bodhisattaṃ, anu gantvā pabbajiṃsūti attho, vipassibodhisatte
anya-e0201n0:1958_2: pabbajite sati tānipi caturāsītikulaputtasahassāni pabbajiṃsūti vuttaṃ hoti. Saccakriyamanu
anya-e0201n0:1958_3: vuṭṭhi pāvassi, ‘anū’ti anvāya, paṭiccāti attho, saccakriyāya sati saccakriyahetu
anya-e0201n0:1958_4: devo pāvassīti vuttaṃ hoti. “Hetu ca lakkhaṇaṃ bhavatī”ti vuttiyaṃ vuttaṃ. Saccakriyāya
anya-e0201n0:1958_5: sahevātipi yujjati. “Saha sacce kate mayha”nti cariyā. 3.82 hi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:1960: Sādhu devadatto mātaramanu. Tattha ‘anū’ti anvāya paṭicca.
anya-e0201n0:1962: Rukkhaṃ rukkhaṃ anu vijjotate cando. Tattha ‘anū’ti anu pharitvā.
anya-e0201n0:1964: Yadettha maṃ anu siyā, taṃ dīyatu. Tattha ‘anū’ti anvāya. Sesaṃ vuttanayameva.
anya-e0201n0:1966: Sahatthe anunā yuttā liṅgamhā dutiyā hoti.
anya-e0201n0:1967: Pabbataṃ anu tiṭṭhati pabbatamanusenā tiṭṭhati (moggallānavuttiyaṃ). Nadiṃ anvāvasitā bārāṇasī. ‘Anū’ti anugantvā, nadiyā saha ābaddhā tiṭṭhatīti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0201n0:1969: Hīne pavattena anunā yuttā liṅgamhā dutiyā hoti.
anya-e0201n0:1970: Anu sāriputtaṃ paññavanto, anugatā pacchato gatāti attho, sabbe paññavanto sāriputtato hīnāti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0201n0:1972: Hīne upena yuttā liṅgamhā dutiyā hoti.
anya-e0201n0:1973: Upa sāriputtaṃ paññavanto, upecca gatā samīpe gatāti attho, hīnātveva vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0201n0:1974_0: Ettha ca abhiiccādayo kammappavacanīyāti saddasatthesu vuttā. Tattha pakārena vuccatīti
anya-e0201n0:1974_1: pavacanīyaṃ, pakāro ca lakkhaṇi’tthambhūta, vicchādiko piṇḍattho vuccati, kammanti
anya-e0201n0:1974_2: byāpanādikriyā, kammaṃ pavacanīyaṃ yehi te kammappavacanīyā.
anya-e0201n0:1975: Tattha byāpanādikriyāvisesavācīhi upasaggehi sambandhesati kammatthe dutiyā hoti, asambandhe pana ādhāra, sāmyādiatthesu hoti, lakkhaṇādayo pana sāmatthiyasiddhā piṇḍatthā evāti.
anya-e0201n0:1977: Kālassa vā addhuno vā dabba, guṇa, kriyāhi accantaṃ nirantaraṃ saṃyoge kāla’ddhānavācīhi liṅgehi paraṃ dutiyā hoti.
anya-e0201n0:1979: Sattāhaṃ gavapānaṃ, māsaṃ maṃsodanaṃ, saradaṃ ramaṇīyā nadī, sabbakālaṃ ramaṇīyaṃ nandanaṃ, māsaṃ sajjhāyati, vassasataṃ jīvati, tayo māse abhidhammaṃ deseti.
anya-e0201n0:1981: Yojanaṃ vanarāji, yojanaṃ dīgho pabbato, kosaṃ sajjhāyati.
anya-e0201n0:1982: Accantasaṃyogeti kiṃ? Māse māse bhuñjati, yojane yojane vihāro.
anya-e0201n0:1983: Ettha ca kriyāvisesanampi kattārā sādhetabbattā kammagatikaṃ hoti, tasmā tampi ‘kamme dutiyā’ti ettha kammasaddena gayhati.
anya-e0201n0:1984_0: Sukhaṃ seti, dukkhaṃ seti, sīghaṃ gacchati, khippaṃ gacchati, dandhaṃ gacchati, muduṃ
anya-e0201n0:1984_1: pacati, garuṃ essati, lahuṃ essati, sannidhikārakaṃ bhuñjati, samparivattakaṃ otāpeti,
anya-e0201n0:1984_2: kāyappacālakaṃ gacchati pāci. 590, hatthappacālakaṃ gacchati, sīsappacālakaṃ gacchati
anya-e0201n0:1984_3: pāci. 594-595, surusurukārakaṃ bhuñjati pāci. 627, avagaṇḍakārakaṃ bhuñjati pāci.
anya-e0201n0:1984_4: 622, piṇḍukkhepakaṃ bhuñjati pāci. 620, hatthaniddhunakaṃ bhuñjati pāci. 623, hatthanillehakaṃ
anya-e0201n0:1984_5: bhuñjati pāci. 628, candimasūriyā samaṃ pariyāyanti, visamaṃ pariyāyanti iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:1989_0: Kattari karaṇe ca tatiyā hoti. Kattāti ca kārakoti ca atthato ekaṃ “karotīti kattā,
anya-e0201n0:1989_1: karotīti kārako”ti, tasmā “kattukārako”ti vutte dvinnaṃ pariyāyasaddānaṃ vasena ayameva
anya-e0201n0:1989_2: kriyaṃ ekantaṃ karoti, sāmī hutvā karoti, attappadhāno hutvā karotīti viññāyati,
anya-e0201n0:1989_3: tato kriyā nāma kattuno eva byāpāro, na aññesanti ca, aññe pana kriyāsādhane kattuno
anya-e0201n0:1989_4: upakārakattā kārakā nāmāti ca, tathā anupakārakattā akārakā nāmāti ca viññāyantīti.
anya-e0201n0:1990: Tattha kattā tividho sayaṃkattā, payojakakattā, kammakattāti.
anya-e0201n0:1991: Tattha dhātvatthaṃ sayaṃ karonto sayaṃkattā nāma, puriso kammaṃ karoti.
anya-e0201n0:1992: Paraṃ niyojento payojakakattā nāma, puriso dāsaṃ kammaṃ kāreti.
anya-e0201n0:1993_0: Kammakattā nāma payojjakakattāpi vuccati, puriso dāsena kammaṃ kāreti dāsassa vā,
anya-e0201n0:1993_1: yo ca aññena kataṃ payogaṃ paṭicca kammabhūtopi sukarattā vā kammabhāvena avattukāmatāya
anya-e0201n0:1993_2: vā ajānanatāya vā vañcetukāmatāya vā kattubhāvena voharīyati, so kammakattā nāma,
anya-e0201n0:1993_3: kusūlo sayameva bhijjati, ghaṭo sayameva bhijjati. Apica sukaro vā hotu dukkaro vā,
anya-e0201n0:1993_4: yo kammarūpakriyāpade paṭhamanto kattā, so kammakattāti vuccati. Saddarūpena kammañca
anya-e0201n0:1993_5: taṃ attharūpena kattā cāti kammakattā, kusūlo bhijjati, ghaṭo bhijjati, paccati munino
anya-e0201n0:1993_6: bhattaṃ, thokaṃ thokaṃ ghare ghare iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:1994_0: Ettha ca saddattho duvidho paramattho, paññattatthoti. Tattha paramattho ekantena
anya-e0201n0:1994_1: vijjamānoyeva. Paññattattho pana koci vijjamānoti sammato. Yathā? Rājaputto, govisāṇaṃ,
anya-e0201n0:1994_2: campakapupphanti. Koci avijjamānoti sammato. Yathā? Vañjhāputto, sasavisāṇaṃ, udumbarapupphanti.
anya-e0201n0:1994_3: Saddo ca nāma vatticchāpaṭibaddhavuttī hoti, vattamāno ca saddo atthaṃ na dīpetīti
anya-e0201n0:1994_4: natthi, saṅkete sati suṇantassa atthavisayaṃ buddhiṃ na janetīti natthīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0201n0:1994_5: Iti avijjamānasammatopi attho saddabuddhīnaṃ visayabhāvena vijjamāno eva hoti. Itarathā
anya-e0201n0:1994_6: ‘vañjhāputto’ti padaṃ suṇantassa tadatthavisayaṃ cittaṃ nāma na pavatteyyāti, saddabuddhīnañca
anya-e0201n0:1994_7: visayabhāvena vijjamāno nāma attho saddanānātte buddhinānātte ca sati nānā hoti,
anya-e0201n0:1994_8: visuṃ visuṃ vijjamāno nāma hotīti adhippāyo. Evaṃ saddabuddhivisayabhāvena vijjamānañca

anya-e0201n0:2029_0: Puna anirākaraṇaṃ, anumati, ārādhananti tividhaṃ hoti. Tattha na nirākaroti na nivāretīti

anya-e0201n0:2029_3: nāma. Vividhehi āyācanavacanehi parassa cittaṃ ārādhetvā sampaṭicchantaṃ ārādhanaṃ
anya-e0201n0:2029_4: nāma. Bodhirukkhassa jalaṃ deti, bhikkhussa annaṃ deti, yācakassa annaṃ deti.

anya-e0201n0:2034: Chattaggāho rañño chattaṃ dhāreti, sampatijātassa bodhisattassa devā chattaṃ dhārayiṃsu.
anya-e0201n0:2035_0: Buddhassa silāghate, thometīti attho, tuyhaṃ hanute, tuṇhibhāvena vañcetīti attho,
anya-e0201n0:2035_1: bhikkhunī bhikkhussa bhuñjamānassa pānīyena vā vidhūpanena vā upaṭṭhāti pāci. 816
anya-e0201n0:2035_2: (visadisaṃ). Dutiyāpi hoti, rañño upaṭṭhāti, rājānaṃ upaṭṭhāti, ahaṃ bhotiṃ upaṭṭhissaṃ
anya-e0201n0:2035_3: jā. 2.22.1934, ahaṃ taṃ upaṭṭhissāmi, mātāpituupaṭṭhānaṃ khu. pā. 5.6, tuyhaṃ sapate,
anya-e0201n0:2035_4: sapassu me vepacitti saṃ. ni. 1.253, sapathampi te samma ahaṃ karomi jā. 2.21.407,
anya-e0201n0:2035_5: tava mayi saddahanatthaṃ saccaṃ karomīti attho, rañño sataṃ dhāreti, idha kulaputto
anya-e0201n0:2035_6: na kassaci kiñci dhāreti a. ni. 4.62, tassa rañño mayaṃ nāgaṃ dhārayāma. Tattha ‘rañño
anya-e0201n0:2035_7: sataṃ dhāretī’ti sataṃ balidhanaṃ vā daṇḍadhanaṃ vā nidetīti nidhetīti, nidhema (keci)
anya-e0201n0:2035_8: attho, “iṇaṃ katvā gaṇhātī”ti ca vadanti. ‘Dhārayāmā’ti puna nidema nidhetīti, nidhema
anya-e0201n0:2035_9: (keci), tuyhaṃ saddahati, mayhaṃ saddahati, saddahāsi siṅgālassa, surāpītassa brāhmaṇa jā. 1.1.113.

anya-e0201n0:2062: Avadhiyati vavatthiyati padattho etasmāti avadhi, tasmiṃ pañcamī hoti, avadhīti ca apādānaṃ vuccati.
anya-e0201n0:2063: Apanetvā ito aññaṃ ādadāti gaṇhātīti apādānaṃ. Taṃ tividhaṃ niddiṭṭhavisayaṃ, uppāṭavisayaṃ, anumeyyavisayanti.
anya-e0201n0:2064: Tattha yasmiṃ apādānavisayabhūto kriyāviseso sarūpato niddiṭṭho hoti, taṃ niddiṭṭhavisayaṃ. Yathā? Gāmā apenti munayo, nagarā niggato rājā.
anya-e0201n0:2065_0: Yasmiṃ pana so pāṭhasesaṃ katvā ajjhāharitabbo hoti, taṃ uppāṭavisayaṃ. Yathā? Valāhakā
anya-e0201n0:2065_1: vijjotate vijju, agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajitoti mahāva. 30. Ettha hi ‘nikkhamitvā’ti
anya-e0201n0:2066_0: Yasmiṃ pana so niddiṭṭho ca na hoti, ajjhāharituñca na sakkā, atha kho atthato anumānavasena
anya-e0201n0:2066_1: so viññeyyo hoti, taṃ anumeyyavisayaṃ. Yathā? Māthurā pāṭaliputtakehi abhirūpatarā,
anya-e0201n0:2066_2: sīlameva sutā seyyo jā. 1.5.65, mayā bhiyyo na vijjati, aggohamasmi lokassa, jeṭṭhohamasmi
anya-e0201n0:2066_3: lokassa, seṭṭhohamasmi lokassa iccādi ma. ni. 3.207. Kriyaṃ vinā kārakaṃ nāma na
anya-e0201n0:2066_4: sijjhatītikatvā ukkaṃsanakriyā ettha anumetabbā hoti. Evaṃ kriyāpadarahitesu dūrayogādīsupi
anya-e0201n0:2068_0: Calaṃ yathā? Puriso dhāvatā assā patati, dve meṇḍā yujjhitvā aññamaññato apasakkanti.
anya-e0201n0:2068_1: Ettha ca yadi calaṃ siyā, kathaṃ avadhi nāma bhaveyya. Accutilakkhaṇo hi avadhīti?
anya-e0201n0:2068_2: Vuccate-dve meṇḍā sakasakakriyāya calanti, itarītarakriyāya avadhī hontīti natthi
anya-e0201n0:2069: Acalaṃ yathā? Gāmā apenti munayo, nagarā niggato rājā.
anya-e0201n0:2070_0: Puna kāyasaṃsaggapubbakaṃ, cittasaṃsaggapubbakanti duvidhaṃ hoti, gāmā apenti munayo,
anya-e0201n0:2070_1: corā bhayaṃ jāyate. Ettha ca “kiṃva dūro ito gāmo, ito sā dakkhiṇā disā dī. ni. 3.279.
anya-e0201n0:2070_2: Ito ekanavutikappe”ti dī. ni. 2.4 ādīsu vadantassa cittasaṃsaggapubbakampi veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:2070_3: “Na mātā puttato bhāyati, na ca putto mātito bhāyati, bhayā bhīto na bhāsasī”ti jā.
anya-e0201n0:2070_4: 2.21.138 pāḷi. Atthi te ito bhayaṃ ma. ni. 2.350, natthi te ito bhayaṃ, yato khemaṃ
anya-e0201n0:2070_5: tato bhayaṃ jā. 1.9.58, corā bhāyati, corā bhīto. Chaṭṭhī ca, corassa bhāyati, corassa
anya-e0201n0:2070_6: bhīto. Dutiyā ca, “kathaṃ paralokaṃ na bhāyeyya, evaṃ paralokaṃ na bhāyeyya, bhāyasi
anya-e0201n0:2070_7: maṃ samaṇa su. ni. sūcilomasutta, nāhaṃ taṃ bhāyāmi su. ni. sūcilomasutta, bhāyitabbaṃ
anya-e0201n0:2070_8: na bhāyati, nāhaṃ bhāyāmi bhoginaṃ jā. 2.22.835, na maṃ migā uttasantī”ti jā. 2.22.307
anya-e0201n0:2070_9: pāḷipadāni dissanti. Tattha “bhogina’nti nāgaṃ, corā tasati uttasati corassa vā,
anya-e0201n0:2070_10: sabbe tasanti daṇḍassa dha. pa. 129, pāpato ottappati jigucchati harāyati pāpena vā.
anya-e0201n0:2071_0: Yato kiñci sippaṃ vā vijjaṃ vā dhammaṃ vā gaṇhāti, tasmiṃ akkhātari pañcamī, upajjhāyā
anya-e0201n0:2071_1: adhīte, upajjhāyā sippaṃ gaṇhāti, dvāsīti buddhato gaṇhiṃ, dve sahassāni bhikkhuto.
anya-e0201n0:2072: Yato suṇāti, tasmiṃ pañcamī, chaṭṭhī ca, ito sutvā, imassa sutvā vā, yamhā dhammaṃ vijāneyya, sammāsambuddhadesitaṃ dha. pa. 392.
anya-e0201n0:2073: Yato labhati, tasmiṃ pañcamī, saṅghato labhati, gaṇato labhati.
anya-e0201n0:2074_0: Yato parājayati, yato pabhavati, yato jāyati, tasmiṃ pañcamī, buddhasmā parājayanti
anya-e0201n0:2074_1: aññatitthiyā, pāḷiyaṃ pana parājiyoge apādānaṃ pāṭhasesavasena labbhati, tasmiṃ kho
anya-e0201n0:2074_2: pana saṅgāme devā jiniṃsu, asurā parājiniṃsu. Ettha devehi parājiniṃsūti pāṭhaseso.
anya-e0201n0:2074_3: “Mayaṃ jitāmhā ambakāya. Himavantā pabhavanti pañca mahānadiyo a. ni. aṭṭha. 3.8.19,
anya-e0201n0:2074_4: ayaṃ bhāgīrathī gaṅgā, himavantā pabhāvitā”ti pāḷi apa. thera 1.1.255, corā bhayaṃ
anya-e0201n0:2074_5: jāyate, kāmato jāyate bhayaṃ dha. pa. 215, jātaṃ saraṇato bhayaṃ jā. 1.1.36; 1.2.13;
anya-e0201n0:2074_6: 1.9.56, 57, 59, yaṃkiñci bhayaṃ vā veraṃ vā upaddavo vā upasaggo vā jāyati, sabbaṃ
anya-e0201n0:2074_7: taṃ bālato jāyati, no paṇḍitato, kāmato jāyatī soko dha. pa. 214, ubhato sujāto putto
anya-e0201n0:2074_8: dī. ni. 1.311, urasmā jāto, ure jāto vā, cīvaraṃ uppajjeyya saṅghato vā gaṇato vā
anya-e0201n0:2075: Aññatthānaṃ yoge pañcamī, tato aññaṃ, tato paraṃ mahāva. 346, tato aparena samayena pārā. 195.
anya-e0201n0:2078: Vajjane pavattehi apa, parīhi yoge pañcamī hoti.
anya-e0201n0:2079_0: Apapabbatā vassati devo, paripabbatā vassati devo, apasālāya āyanti vāṇijā, parisālāya
anya-e0201n0:2079_1: āyanti vāṇijā, pabbataṃ sālaṃ vajjetvāti attho. Kaccāyane pana “uparipabbatā devo
anya-e0201n0:2079_2: vassatī”ti pāṭho porāṇapāṭho, paripabbatāti yutto. Upariyoge pana sattamīyeva dissati
anya-e0201n0:2079_3: – “tasmiṃ uparipabbate ma. ni. 3.216; jā. 1.8.16, uparipāsāde dī. ni. 2.408, uparivehāse,
anya-e0201n0:2079_4: uparivehāsakuṭiyā”ti, pāci. 130 tattha pabbatassa upari uparipabbatanti attho.
anya-e0201n0:2080: 314. Paṭinidhipaṭidānesu patinā ka. 272; rū. 309; nī. 558, 568; caṃ. 2.1.83; pā. 2.3.11; 1.4.9.2.
anya-e0201n0:2081: Paṭinidhi nāma paṭibimbaṭṭhapanaṃ, paṭidānaṃ nāma paṭibhaṇḍadānaṃ tesu pavattena patinā yoge pañcamī hoti.
anya-e0201n0:2082: Buddhasmā pati sāriputto dhammaṃ deseti, telasmā pati ghataṃ deti.
anya-e0201n0:2084: Ritesaddena yoge pañcamī hoti dutiyā ca.
anya-e0201n0:2086: 316. Vināññatrehi tatiyā ca ka. 272; rū. 309; nī. 558, 568; caṃ. 2.1.85; pā. 2.3.32; ‘vināññatra tatiyāca’ (bahūsu).
anya-e0201n0:2087: Vajjane pavattehi vinā, aññatrasaddehi yoge pañcamī, dutiyā, tatiyā ca honti.
anya-e0201n0:2088: Vinā saddhammā, vinā saddhammaṃ, vinā saddhammena, aññatra saddhammā, aññatra saddhammaṃ, aññatra saddhammena.
anya-e0201n0:2089: 317. Puthunānāhi ca ka. 272; rū. 309; nī. 558, 568; caṃ. 2.1.86; pā. 2.3.32; ‘puthanānāhi ca’ (bahūsu).
anya-e0201n0:2090: Vajjane pavattehi puthu, nānāsaddehi ca yoge pañcamī, tatiyā ca honti.
anya-e0201n0:2091_0: Puthageva janasmā, puthageva janena, nānā saddhammā, nānā saddhammena, piyehi manāpehi
anya-e0201n0:2091_1: nānābhāvo vinābhāvo dī. ni. 2.183; cūḷava. 437. “Te bhikkhū nānākulā pabbajitā”ti
anya-e0201n0:2091_2: ettha pana nānāppakārattho nānāsaddo, na vajjanattho, ettha ca vajjanattho nāma viyogattho asammissattho.
anya-e0201n0:2092: Mariyādā’bhividhīsu pavattehi āsadda, yāvasaddehi yogepi pañcamī, dutiyā ca.
anya-e0201n0:2093: Tattha yassa avadhino sambandhinī kriyā, taṃ bahikatvā pavattati, so mariyādo. Yathā? Āpabbatā khettaṃ tiṭṭhati āpabbataṃ vā, yāvapabbatā khettaṃ tiṭṭhati yāvapabbataṃ vā.
anya-e0201n0:2094_0: Yassa sambandhinī kriyā, taṃ antokatvā byāpetvā pavattati, so abhividhi. Yathā? Ābhavaggā
anya-e0201n0:2094_1: bhagavato kittisaddo abbhuggato ābhavaggaṃ vā, bhavato ābhavaggaṃ dhammato āgotrabhuṃ
anya-e0201n0:2094_2: savantīti āsavā, yāvabhavaggā yāvabhavaggaṃ vā, tāvadeva yāvabrahmalokā saddo abbhuggato.
anya-e0201n0:2095_0: Ārabbhe, sahatthe ca pañcamī, yatohaṃ bhagini ariyāya jātiyā jāto ma. ni. 2.351,
anya-e0201n0:2095_1: yato paṭṭhāyāti attho. Yato sarāmi attānaṃ, yato pattosmi viññutaṃ jā. 2.22.307.
anya-e0201n0:2097: Saha sabbaññutaññāṇappaṭilābhā, saha parinibbānā dī. ni. 2.220, saha dassanuppādā.
anya-e0201n0:2098: “Uppādā vā tathāgatānaṃ anuppādā vā tathāgatāna”nti saṃ. ni. 2.20, ettha bhāvalakkhaṇe pañcamī.
anya-e0201n0:2099: “Sahatthā dānaṃ deti, sahatthā paṭiggaṇhātī”ti ettha karaṇe.
anya-e0201n0:2100: “Ajjatagge pāṇupetaṃ dī. ni. 1.250, tadagge kho vāseṭṭha”iccādīsu dī. ni. 3.130, ārabbhe sattamī.
anya-e0201n0:2101: “Yatvādhikaraṇaṃ dī. ni. 1.213, yatonidānaṃ su. ni. 275, tatonidānaṃ” iccādīsu ma. ni. 1.238 vākye icchite sati hetvatthe pañcamī, samāse icchite sati atthamatte pañcamī.
anya-e0201n0:2102_0: Dvinnaṃ kārakānaṃ kriyānañca majjhe pavattakāladdhānavācīhi pañcamī, luddako pakkhasmā
anya-e0201n0:2102_1: migaṃ vijjhati, kosā kuñjaraṃ vijjhati. Ettha ca luddako sakiṃ migaṃ vijjhitvā pakkhabbhantaramhi
anya-e0201n0:2102_2: na vijjhi, pakkhe paripuṇṇe puna vijjhati, pakkhasaddo dvinnaṃ vijjhanavārānaṃ majjhe
anya-e0201n0:2102_3: kālavācī hoti, dvepi vijjhanakriyā kārakehi saheva sijjhantīti kārakānañca majjheti
anya-e0201n0:2102_4: vuccati. Vuttiyaṃ pana “ajja bhutvā devadatto dvihe bhuñjissati, dvihā bhuñjissati,
anya-e0201n0:2102_5: atraṭṭho’yamissāso kose lakkhaṃ vijjhati, kosā lakkhaṃ vijjhatī”ti moga. 79 evaṃ
anya-e0201n0:2102_6: sattamīvasena paripuṇṇavākyampi vuttaṃ. Pāḷiyaṃ “anāpatti chabbassā karoti pārā.
anya-e0201n0:2104_0: Yañca vatthuṃ guttaṃ icchiyate, yato ca guttaṃ icchiyate, tattha pañcamī, yavehi
anya-e0201n0:2104_1: gāvo rakkhati vāreti, taṇḍulā kāke rakkhati vāreti, taṃ maṃ puññā nivāresi, pāpā
anya-e0201n0:2104_2: cittaṃ nivāraye dha. pa. 116, na naṃ jāti nivāreti, duggatyā garahāya vā su. ni.
anya-e0201n0:2104_3: 141 (na ne). Rājato vā corato vā ārakkhaṃ gaṇhantu.
anya-e0201n0:2106_0: Yassa adassanaṃ icchiyati, tasmiṃ pañcamī, upajjhāyā antaradhāyati sisso, nilīyatīti
anya-e0201n0:2106_1: attho. Pāḷiyaṃ pana yassa adassanaṃ icchiyati, tasmiṃ chaṭṭhī eva- “antaradhāyissāmi
anya-e0201n0:2106_2: samaṇassa gotamassa, antaradhāyissāmi samaṇassa gotamassā”ti. “Na sakkhi me antaradhāyitu”nti
anya-e0201n0:2106_3: pāḷi, ‘antaradhāyissāmī’ti antarite acakkhuvisaye ṭhāne attānaṃ ṭhapessāmītyattho,
anya-e0201n0:2107_0: Yasmiṃ ṭhāne antaradhāyati, tasmiṃ sattamī eva dissati, atikhippaṃ loke cakkhu antaradhāyissati
anya-e0201n0:2107_1: dī. ni. 2.224 (visadisaṃ), jetavane antaradhāyitvā, brahmaloke antaradhāyitvā, maddakucchismiṃ
anya-e0201n0:2107_2: antaradhāyitvā, tatthevantaradhāyī saṃ. ni. 1.1 iccādi. “Bhagavato purato antaradhāyitvā”ti
anya-e0201n0:2107_3: etthapi tosaddo sattamyatthe eva. “Sakko nimissa rañño sammukhe antarahito”ti pāḷi.
anya-e0201n0:2107_4: ‘Dhajatavane antaradhāyitvā’ti jetavane aññesaṃ adassanaṃ katvā, aññesaṃ acakkhuvisayaṃ
anya-e0201n0:2107_5: katvāti attho. “Andhakāro antaradhāyati, āloko antaradhāyati, saddhammo antaradhāyati,
anya-e0201n0:2107_6: sāsanaṃ antaradhāyati” iccādīsu pana chaṭṭhī, sattamiyo yathāsambhavaṃ veditabbā.
anya-e0201n0:2109_0: Kiṃva dūro ito gāmo, kacci ārā pamādamhā su. ni. 156, atho ārā pamādamhā su. ni.
anya-e0201n0:2109_1: 157, gāmato avidūre, ārakā te moghapurisā imasmā dhammavinayā, ārakā tehi bhagavā,
anya-e0201n0:2109_2: kilesehi ārakāti arahaṃ, ārā so āsavakkhayā dha. pa. 253. Dutiyā ca tatiyā ca chaṭṭhī
anya-e0201n0:2109_3: ca, ārakā imaṃ dhammavinayaṃ iminā dhammavinayena vā, ārakā mandabuddhīnaṃ visuddhi ṭī. 1.130.
anya-e0201n0:2111_0: Dūratova namassanti, addasā kho bhagavantaṃ dūratova āgacchantaṃ dī. ni. 1.409, kinnu
anya-e0201n0:2111_1: tiṭṭhatha ārakā, tasmā tiṭṭhāma ārakā. Dutiyā ca tatiyā ca, dūraṃ gāmaṃ āgato, dūrena
anya-e0201n0:2111_2: gāmena āgato, dūrā gāmā āgato iccevattho, dūraṃ gāmena vā.
anya-e0201n0:2113: Antikaṃ gāmā, āsannaṃ gāmā, samīpaṃ gāmā. Dutiyā ca tatiyā ca chaṭṭhī ca, antikaṃ gāmaṃ, antikaṃ gāmena, antikaṃ gāmassa.
anya-e0201n0:2115_0: Ito mathurāya catūsu yojanesu saṅkassaṃ, rājagahato pañcacattālīsayojane sāvatthi,
anya-e0201n0:2115_1: ito ekanavutikappe dī. ni. 2.4, ito ekatiṃse kappe dī. ni. 2.4, ito sattame divase,
anya-e0201n0:2115_2: ito tiṇṇaṃ māsānaṃ accayena parinibbāyissāmi dī. ni. 2.168; udā. 51 iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:2117_0: Āyāmato ca vitthārato ca yojanaṃ, parikkhepato navayojanasataparimāṇo majjhimadeso
anya-e0201n0:2117_1: parikkhepena vā, dīghaso navavidatthiyo pāci. 548, yojanaṃ āyāmena yojanaṃ vitthārena
anya-e0201n0:2117_2: yojanaṃ ubbedhena sāsaparāsi saṃ. ni. 2.129 iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:2118_0: Tvālopepi pañcamī. Ettha ca tvālopo nāma paripuṇṇavākye laddhabbassa tvāntapadassa
anya-e0201n0:2118_1: aparipuṇṇavākye natthi bhāvo, yañca padaṃ tvāntapade sati kammaṃ vā hoti adhikaraṇaṃ
anya-e0201n0:2118_2: vā. Taṃ tvāntapade asati padantare avadhi hoti, tasmiṃ pañcamī, pāsādā vā pāsādaṃ
anya-e0201n0:2118_3: saṅkameyya saṃ. ni. 1.132, hatthikkhandhā vā hatthikkhandhaṃ saṅkameyya saṃ. ni.
anya-e0201n0:2118_4: 1.132 iccādi. Ettha ca paṭhamaṃ ekaṃ pāsādaṃ abhirūhitvā puna aññaṃ pāsādaṃ saṅkameyyāti
anya-e0201n0:2118_5: vā paṭhamaṃ ekasmiṃ pāsāde nisīditvā puna aññaṃ pāsādaṃ saṅkameyyāti vā evaṃ paripuṇṇavākyaṃ
anya-e0201n0:2118_6: veditabbaṃ. “Andhakārā vā andhakāraṃ gaccheyya, tamā vā tamaṃ gaccheyyā”ti saṃ. ni.
anya-e0201n0:2118_7: 1.132 pāḷi. Tathā raṭṭhā raṭṭhaṃ vicarati, gāmā gāmaṃ vicarati, vanā vanaṃ vicarati,
anya-e0201n0:2118_8: vihārato vihāraṃ gacchati, pariveṇato pariveṇaṃ gacchati, bhavato bhavaṃ gacchati,
anya-e0201n0:2118_9: kulato kulaṃ gacchati iccādi. Tathā vinayā vinayaṃ pucchati, abhidhammā abhidhammaṃ
anya-e0201n0:2118_10: pucchati, vinayā vinayaṃ katheti, abhidhammā abhidhammaṃ katheti. Etthapi paṭhamaṃ
anya-e0201n0:2118_11: ekaṃ vinayavacanaṃ pucchitvā vā ekasmiṃ vinayavacane ṭhatvā vā puna aññaṃ vinayavacanaṃ
anya-e0201n0:2118_12: pucchatīti paripuṇṇavākyaṃ veditabbaṃ. Vuttiyaṃ pana “pāsādaṃ āruyha pekkhati, pāsādā
anya-e0201n0:2118_13: pekkhati, āsane pavisitvā pekkhati, āsanā pekkhatī”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:2119_0: Disatthayoge disatthe ca pañcamī, ito sā purimā disā dī. ni. 3.278, ito sā dakkhiṇā
anya-e0201n0:2119_1: disā dī. ni. 3.278, avīcito upari, uddhaṃ pādatalā, adho kesamatthakā dī. ni. 2.377; ma. ni. 1.110.
anya-e0201n0:2121_0: Purimato gāmassa, dakkhiṇato gāmassa, uparito pabbatassa, heṭṭhato pāsādassa, puratthimato,
anya-e0201n0:2121_1: dakkhiṇato, yato khemaṃ, tato bhayaṃ jā. 1.9.58, yato yato sammasati, khandhānaṃ
anya-e0201n0:2122: Pubbādiyogepi pañcamī, pubbeva me sambodhā a. ni. 3.104, ito pubbe, tato pubbe, ito parā paccantimā janapadā mahāva. 259, tato pure, tato pacchā, tato uttari pārā. 499 iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:2123_0: Vibhattatthe ca pañcamī chaṭṭhī ca. Vibhatti nāma pageva visuṃbhūtassa atthassa kenaci
anya-e0201n0:2123_1: adhikena vā hīnena vā bhāgena tadaññato puthakkaraṇaṃ, māthurā pāṭaliputtakehi abhirūpatarā,
anya-e0201n0:2123_2: yato paṇītataro vā visiṭṭhataro vā natthi, attadanto tato varaṃ dha. pa. 322, channavutīnaṃ
anya-e0201n0:2123_3: pāsaṇḍānaṃ pavaraṃ yadidaṃ sugatavinayo, sadevakassa lokassa, satthā loke anuttaro,
anya-e0201n0:2123_4: aggohamasmi lokassa ma. ni. 3.207, jeṭṭhohamasmi lokassa ma. ni. 3.207, seṭṭhohamasmi
anya-e0201n0:2123_5: lokassa ma. ni. 3.207, paññavantā nāma sāriputtato hīnā sāriputtassa vā, tato adhikaṃ
anya-e0201n0:2123_6: vā ūnaṃ vā na vaṭṭati iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:2125: Āratī viratī pāpā khu. pā. 5.8, pāṇātipātā veramaṇi khu. pā. 2.1 iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:2128_0: Mocanatthayoge pañcamī tatiyā ca, so parimuccati jātiyā jarāya maraṇena sokehi paridevehi
anya-e0201n0:2128_1: dukkhehi domanassehi upāyāsehi, parimutto so dukkhasmāti vadāmi saṃ. ni. 3.29, mokkhanti
anya-e0201n0:2128_2: mārabandhanā dha. pa. 37, na te muccanti maccunā iccādi, sabbattha avadhiattho veditabbo.
anya-e0201n0:2130_0: Kasmā hetunā, kena hetunā, kasmā nu tumhaṃ kule daharā na miyyare jā. 1.10.92 (mīyare),
anya-e0201n0:2130_1: tasmātiha bhikkhave saṃ. ni. 2.157. Dutiyā tatiyā chaṭṭhī ca, kiṃkāraṇaṃ jā. aṭṭha.
anya-e0201n0:2130_2: 6.22.umaṅgajātakavaṇṇanā, yatvādhikaraṇaṃ dī. ni. 1.213, yatonidānaṃ su. ni. 275,
anya-e0201n0:2130_3: tatonidānaṃ ma. ni. 1.238, kena kāraṇena jā. aṭṭha. 4.20.mātaṅgajātakavaṇṇanā, taṃ
anya-e0201n0:2130_4: kissahetu ma. ni. 1.2, kissa tumhe kilamatha iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:2132: Vivicceva kāmehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi dī. ni. 1.226, vivitto pāpakā dhammā.
anya-e0201n0:2138: Ajjhattabhūto hetu guṇo nāma, aguṇopi idha guṇotveva vuccati, tasmiṃ pañcamī hoti vā.
anya-e0201n0:2139_0: Jaḷattā bandho naro jaḷattena vā, attano bālattāyeva bandhoti attho, paññāya bandhanā
anya-e0201n0:2139_1: mutto, vācāya marati, vācāya muccati, vācāya piyo hoti, vācāya desso, issariyā janaṃ
anya-e0201n0:2139_2: rakkhati rājā issariyena vā, sīlato naṃ pasaṃsanti a. ni. 4.6 sīlena vā, hutvā abhāvato
anya-e0201n0:2139_3: aniccā, udayabbayapīḷanato dukkhā, avijjānirodhā saṅkhāranirodho udā. 2, saṅkhāranirodhā
anya-e0201n0:2139_4: viññāṇanirodho udā. 2, catunnaṃ ariyasaccānaṃ anaññā appaṭivedhā dīghamaddhānaṃ saṃsaranti
anya-e0201n0:2140: Pañhā, kathanesupi pañcamī, kuto bhavaṃ, ahaṃ pāṭaliputtato iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:2141_0: Thokatthepi asatvavacane pañcamī, satvaṃ vuccati dabbaṃ, thokā muccati thokena vā,
anya-e0201n0:2141_1: muccanamattaṃ hotīti vuttaṃ hoti “nadiṃ taranto manaṃ vuḷho”ti mahāva. 148 ettha
anya-e0201n0:2141_2: viya. Appamattakā muccati appamattakena vā, kicchā muccati kicchena vā, kicchā laddho
anya-e0201n0:2141_3: piyo putto jā. 2.22.353, kicchā muttā’mha dukkhasmā, yāma dāni mahosadha jā. 2.22.700.
anya-e0201n0:2142: Asatvavacaneti kiṃ? Paccati munino bhattaṃ, thokaṃ thokaṃ ghare ghareti theragā. 248 (kule kule).
anya-e0201n0:2143: “Anupubbena medhāvī, thokaṃ thokaṃ khaṇe khaṇe dha. pa. 239” iccādīsu kriyāvisesane dutiyā.
anya-e0201n0:2144_0: Akattaripi pañcamī, tassa kammassa katattā upacitattā ussannattā vipulattā tathāgato
anya-e0201n0:2144_1: suppatiṭṭhitapādo hoti dī. ni. 3.201. Ettha ca ‘akattarī’ti akārake ñāpakahetumhīti
anya-e0201n0:2144_2: vadanti. Ñāse pana “akattarīti hetvatthe saṅgaṇhāti. Yattha hi kattubuddhi sañjāyate,
anya-e0201n0:2144_3: sova kattā na hotīti vattuṃ sakkā”ti vuttaṃ. Etena kattusadiso janakahetu akattā
anya-e0201n0:2144_4: nāmāti dīpeti, kammassa katattāiccādi ca janakahetu evāti.
anya-e0201n0:2146_0: Yodha sītañca uṇhañca, tiṇā bhiyyo na maññati dī. ni. 3.253, sukhā bhiyyo somanassaṃ
anya-e0201n0:2146_1: dī. ni. 2.287, khantyā bhiyyo na vijjati saṃ. ni. 1.250, mayā bhiyyo na vijjati,
anya-e0201n0:2146_2: sotukāmāttha tumhe bhikkhave bhiyyosomattāya pubbenivāsakathaṃ, attamano tvaṃ hohi
anya-e0201n0:2146_3: paraṃ viya mattāya, ahampi attamano homi paraṃ viya mattāya.
anya-e0201n0:2150: 320. Chaṭṭhī sambandhe ka. 301; rū. 315; nī. 609; caṃ. 2.1.95; pā. 2.3.50.
anya-e0201n0:2151: Dvinnaṃ sambandhīnaṃ kenaci pakārena āyattabhāvo sambandho nāma, sambandhe jotetabbe visesanasambandhimhi chaṭṭhī hoti.
anya-e0201n0:2152_0: Tattha kriyākārakasañjāto assedambhāvahetuko sambandho nāmāti vuttaṃ. Tattha dve
anya-e0201n0:2152_1: sambandhino aññamaññaṃ taṃtaṃkriyaṃ karonti, taṃ disvā “ime aññamaññasambandhino”ti
anya-e0201n0:2152_2: jānantassa dvinnaṃ kārakānaṃ dvinnaṃ kriyānañca saṃyogaṃ nissāya sambandhopi vidito
anya-e0201n0:2152_3: hoti, evaṃ sambandho kriyākārakasañjāto, ‘imassa aya’nti evaṃ pavattabuddhiyā hetubhūtattā
anya-e0201n0:2153: Tattha sambandho tividho sāmisambandho, nānāttasambandho, kriyākārakasambandhoti.
anya-e0201n0:2154: Tattha ‘sāmī’ti yassa kassaci visesanasambandhino nāmaṃ, tasmā visesyapadatthassa taṃtaṃvisesanabhāvena sambandho sāmisambandho nāma.
anya-e0201n0:2156: Tattha tassa mātā, tassa pitāiccādi janakasambandho nāma.
anya-e0201n0:2157: Tassā putto, tassā dhītā iccādi jaññasambandho nāma.
anya-e0201n0:2158: Tassa bhātā, tassa bhaginī iccādi kulasambandho nāma.
anya-e0201n0:2159: Sakko devānamindo saṃ. ni. 1.248 iccādi sāmisambandho nāma.
anya-e0201n0:2160: Pahūtaṃ me dhanaṃ sakka jā. 1.15.72, bhikkhussa pattacīvaraṃ iccādi saṃsambandho nāma.
anya-e0201n0:2161: Ambavanassa avidūre, nibbānasseva santike dha. pa. 32 iccādi samīpasambandho nāma.
anya-e0201n0:2162: Suvaṇṇassa rāsi, bhikkhūnaṃ samūho iccādi samūhasambandho nāma.
anya-e0201n0:2163: Manussasseva te sīsaṃ jā. 1.4.81, rukkhassa sākhā iccādi avayavasambandho nāma.
anya-e0201n0:2164: Suvaṇṇassa bhājanaṃ, alābussa kaṭāhaṃ, bhaṭṭhadhaññānaṃ sattu iccādi vikārasambandho nāma.
anya-e0201n0:2165: Yavassa aṅkuro, meghassa saddo, pupphānaṃ gandho, phalānaṃ raso, aggissa dhūmo iccādi kāriyasambandho nāma.
anya-e0201n0:2166: Khandhānaṃ jāti, khandhānaṃ jarā, khandhānaṃ bhedo saṃ. ni. 2.1 iccādi avatthāsambandho nāma.
anya-e0201n0:2167: Suvaṇṇassa vaṇṇo, vaṇṇo na khīyyetha tathāgatassa dī. ni. aṭṭha. 1.304, buddhassa kittisaddo, sippikānaṃ sataṃ natthi jā. 1.1.113, tilānaṃ muṭṭhi iccādi guṇasambandho nāma.
anya-e0201n0:2168: Pādassa ukkhipanaṃ, hatthassa samiñjanaṃ, dhātūnaṃ gamanaṃ ṭhānaṃ iccādi kriyāsambandho nāma.
anya-e0201n0:2169_0: Cātumahārājikānaṃ ṭhānaṃ iccādi ṭhānasambandho nāma. Evamādinā nayena sāmisambandho
anya-e0201n0:2169_1: anekasahassappabhedo, so ca kriyāsambandhābhāvā kārako nāma na hoti. Yadi evaṃ “pādassa
anya-e0201n0:2169_2: ukkhipanaṃ” iccādi kriyāsambandho nāmāti idaṃ na yujjatīti? Vuccate – kriyāsambandhābhāvāti
anya-e0201n0:2169_3: idaṃ sādhakabhāvena sambandhābhāvaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, siddhāya pana kriyāya sambandhaṃ
anya-e0201n0:2170_0: Nānāttasambandhe pana nānāatthesu chaṭṭhī hoti. Tattha ṇī, āvīpaccayānaṃ kamme niccaṃ
anya-e0201n0:2170_1: chaṭṭhī, jhānassa lābhī, cīvarassa lābhī, dhanassa lābhī, ādīnavassa dassāvī, atthi
anya-e0201n0:2170_2: rūpānaṃ dassāvī, atthi samavisamassa dassāvī, atthi tārakarūpānaṃ dassāvī, atthi
anya-e0201n0:2171: Tu, aka, ana, ṇapaccayānaṃ yoge kvaci kammatthe chaṭṭhī.
anya-e0201n0:2173: Tassa bhavanti vattāro ma. ni. 2.173, sahasā kammassa kattāro, amatassa dātā ma. ni. 1.203, bhinnānaṃ sandhātā dī. ni. 1.9, 164, sahitānaṃ vā anuppadātā dī. ni. 1.9, 164 iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:2174_0: Kvacīti kiṃ? Gambhīrañca kathaṃ kattā a. ni. 7.37, gādhaṃ kattā novasitā a. ni. 4.107,
anya-e0201n0:2174_1: kālena dhammīkathaṃ bhāsitā, sarasi tvaṃ evarūpaṃ vācaṃ bhāsitā, paresaṃ puññaṃ anumodetā,
anya-e0201n0:2176: Kammassa kārako natthi, vipākassa ca vedako visuddhi 2.689, avisaṃvādako lokassa dī. ni. 1.9 iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:2177: Kvacīti kiṃ? Mahatiṃ mahiṃ anusāsako, janaṃ aheṭhako, kaṭaṃ kārako, pasavo ghātako iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:2179: Pāpassa akaraṇaṃ sukhaṃ dha. pa. 61, bhārassa ukkhipanaṃ, hatthassa gahaṇaṃ, hatthassa parāmasanaṃ, aññatarassa aṅgassa parāmasanaṃ pārā. 270 iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:2180: Kvacīti kiṃ? Bhagavantaṃ dassanāya udā. 23 iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:2182: Acchariyo arajakena vatthānaṃ rāgo, agopālakena gāvīnaṃ doho, appapuññena lābhānaṃ lābho, hatthassa gāho, pattassa paṭiggāho iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:2183: Tvāpaccayepi kvaci kammani chaṭṭhī, alajjīnaṃ nissāya, āyasmato nissāya vacchāmi, catunnaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ upādāya pasādo dha. sa. 596-599 (upādāya) iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:2184: Kattari ta, tavantu, tāvī, māna’ntānaṃ yoge pana kammani dutiyā eva, sukhakāmo vihāraṃ kato, gāmaṃ gato, odanaṃ bhuttavā bhuttāvī, kammaṃ kurumāno, kammaṃ karonto iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:2185: Kvaci chaṭṭhīpi dissati, dhammassa gutto medhāvī dha. pa. 257 iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:2186_0: Sara, isu, cinta, isa, dayadhātūnaṃ kammani chaṭṭhī vā, mātussa sarati, mātaraṃ sarati,
anya-e0201n0:2186_1: pitussa sarati, pitaraṃ sarati, na rajjassa sarissasi jā. 2.22.1721, na tesaṃ koci
anya-e0201n0:2186_2: sarati, sattānaṃ kammapaccayā khu. pā. 7.2, āpattipariyantaṃ nassarati, rattipariyantaṃ
anya-e0201n0:2186_3: nassarati cūḷava. 157, puttassa icchati puttaṃ vā, mātussa cinteti mātaraṃ vā, therassa
anya-e0201n0:2186_4: ajjhesati theraṃ vā, telassa dayati telaṃ vā, rakkhatīti attho.
anya-e0201n0:2187: Karadhātussa abhisaṅkharaṇatthavācino kamme chaṭṭhī, udakassa paṭikurute udakaṃ vā, kaṇḍassa paṭikurute kaṇḍaṃ vā iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:2188_0: Tapaccaye pūjanatthādidhātūnaṃ kattari chaṭṭhī vā, rañño sammato raññā vā, gāmassa
anya-e0201n0:2188_1: pūjito gāmena vā, rañño sakkato raññā vā, rañño apacito raññā vā, rañño mānito dī.
anya-e0201n0:2188_2: ni. 1.303 raññā vā, tathā suppaṭividdhā buddhānaṃ dhammadhātu, amataṃ tesaṃ paribhuttaṃ,
anya-e0201n0:2188_3: yesaṃ kāyagatāsati paribhuttā a. ni. 1.603, amataṃ tesaṃ viraddhaṃ, yesaṃ kāyagatāsati
anya-e0201n0:2189: Tipaccayepi kvaci kattari chaṭṭhī vā, sobhaṇā kaccāyanassa pakati kaccāyanena vā, sobhaṇā buddhaghosassa pakati buddhaghosena vā iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:2190_0: Pūjanatthānaṃ pūraṇatthānañca karaṇe chaṭṭhī, pupphassa buddhaṃ pūjeti pupphena vā,
anya-e0201n0:2190_1: ghatassa aggiṃ juhoti ghatena vā, pattaṃ udakassa pūretvā, pūraṃ nānāppakārassa asucino
anya-e0201n0:2190_2: dī. ni. 2.377, bālo pūrati pāpassa dha. pa. 121, dhīro pūrati puññassa dha. pa. 121
anya-e0201n0:2190_3: pūrati dhaññānaṃ vā muggānaṃ vā māsānaṃ vā iccādi. Tatiyā vā, khemā nāma pokkharaṇī,
anya-e0201n0:2191_0: Tabba, rujādiyoge pana sampadāne catutthī eva, yakkhasenāpatīnaṃ ujjhāpetabbaṃ vikkanditabbaṃ
anya-e0201n0:2191_1: viravitabbaṃ dī. ni. 3.283 (visadisaṃ), devadattassa rujjati, rajakassa vatthaṃ dadāti iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:2192_0: Bhayatthādīnaṃ apādāne bahulaṃ chaṭṭhī, kiṃ nu kho ahaṃ tassa sukhassa bhāyāmi, sabbe
anya-e0201n0:2192_1: tasanti daṇḍassa, sabbe bhāyanti maccuno dha. pa. 129, bhīto catunnaṃ āsīvisānaṃ
anya-e0201n0:2192_2: saṃ. ni. 4.238, mā bhikkhave puññānaṃ bhāyittha udā. 22, saṅkhātuṃ nopi sakkomi,
anya-e0201n0:2192_3: musāvādassa ottapaṃ saṃ. ni. 1.184 iccādi. Tattha ‘ottapa’nti ottappanto. Tathā aggohamasmi
anya-e0201n0:2192_4: lokassa, jeṭṭhohamasmi lokassa ma. ni. 3.207 iccādi ca.
anya-e0201n0:2193_0: Kusala, kovida, pasādatthānaṃ ādhāre chaṭṭhī, kusalā naccagītassa jā. 2.22.94, kusalo
anya-e0201n0:2193_1: tvaṃ rathassa aṅgapaccaṅgānaṃ ma. ni. 2.87, amacce tāta jānāhi, dhīre atthassa kovide
anya-e0201n0:2193_2: jā. 1.17.13, narā dhammassa kovidā jā. 1.1.37, maggāmaggassa kovidā, “keci iddhīsu
anya-e0201n0:2193_3: kovidā”tipi atthi, santi yakkhā buddhassa pasannā dī. ni. 3.276 (visadisaṃ), dhammassa
anya-e0201n0:2193_4: pasannā, saṅghassa pasannā, buddhe pasannā, dhamme pasannā, saṅghe pasannā vā. Tathā
anya-e0201n0:2193_5: cetopariyañāṇassa, vasī homi mahāmuni. Jhānassa vasimhi iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:2194: 321. Chaṭṭhī hetvatthehi rū. 163 piṭṭhe; nī. 650; caṃ. 2.1.71; pā. 2.3.26.
anya-e0201n0:2196: Taṃ kissa hetu ma. ni. 1.2; caṃ. 2.1.96; pā. 2.3.72, aṅgavarassa hetu, udarassa hetu, udarassa kāraṇā pārā. 228 iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:2198: Tulyatthena yoge chaṭṭhī hoti tatiyā vā.
anya-e0201n0:2199: Tulyo pitu pitarā vā, sadiso pitu pitarā vā. Iti nānāttasambandho.
anya-e0201n0:2200_0: Kriyākārakasambandho nāma kārakānaṃ kriyāya saha sādhaka, sādhyabhāvena aññamaññāpekkhatā
anya-e0201n0:2200_1: avinābhāvitā vuccati, na hi kriyaṃ vinā kārakaṃ nāma sijjhati, na ca kārakaṃ vinā
anya-e0201n0:2200_2: kriyā nāma sijjhatīti, sā pana chaṭṭhīvisayo na hotīti.
anya-e0201n0:2204: 323. Sattamyādhāre ka. 302; rū. 313; nī. 630; caṃ. 2.1.88; pā. 1.3.45.
anya-e0201n0:2205: Ādhāro, okāso, adhikaraṇanti atthato ekaṃ, ādhāratthe sattamī hoti. Kattukammaṭṭhaṃ kriyaṃ bhuso dhāretīti ādhāro.
anya-e0201n0:2206: Kaṭe nisīdati puriso, thāliyaṃ odanaṃ pacati. Tattha kaṭo kattubhūte purise ṭhitaṃ nisīdanakriyaṃ dhāreti, thālī kammabhūte taṇḍule ṭhitaṃ pacanakriyaṃ dhāreti.
anya-e0201n0:2207: So catubbidho byāpikādhāro, opasilesikādhāro, sāmīpikādhāro, vesayikādhāroti.
anya-e0201n0:2208_0: Tattha yasmiṃ ādheyyavatthu sakale vā ekadese vā byāpetvā tiṭṭhati, so byāpiko. Yathā?
anya-e0201n0:2208_1: Tilesu telaṃ tiṭṭhati, ucchūsu raso tiṭṭhati, jalesu khīraṃ tiṭṭhati, dadhimhi sappi tiṭṭhatīti.
anya-e0201n0:2209_0: Yasmiṃ ādheyyavatthu allīyitvā vā tiṭṭhati, adhiṭṭhitamattaṃ hutvā vā tiṭṭhati, so
anya-e0201n0:2209_1: opasilesiko. Yathā? Ukkhaliyaṃ ācāmo tiṭṭhati, ghaṭesu udakaṃ tiṭṭhati, āsane nisīdati
anya-e0201n0:2210_0: Yo pana attho ādheyyassa avatthubhūtopi tadāyattavuttidīpanatthaṃ ādhārabhāvena vohariyati,
anya-e0201n0:2210_1: so sāmīpiko nāma. Yathā? Gaṅgāyaṃ ghoso tiṭṭhati, sāvatthiyaṃ viharati bhagavāti a. ni. 1.1.
anya-e0201n0:2211_0: Yo ca attho attanā vinā ādheyyassa aññatthattaṃ kriyaṃ sampādetuṃ asakkuṇeyyattā
anya-e0201n0:2211_1: ādhārabhāvena vohariyati, yo ca ādheyyassa anaññābhimukhabhāvadīpanatthaṃ ādhārabhāvena
anya-e0201n0:2211_2: vohariyati, so vesayiko nāma. Yathā? Ākāse sakuṇā pakkhanti, bhūmīsu manussā caranti,
anya-e0201n0:2211_3: udake macchā caranti, bhagavantaṃ pādesu vandati, pādesu patitvā rodati, pāpasmiṃ
anya-e0201n0:2211_4: ramatī mano dha. pa. 116, pasanno buddhasāsaneti dha. pa. 368.
anya-e0201n0:2213: Niminanti sañjānanti etenāti nimittaṃ, nemittakasahabhāvino saññāṇakāraṇassetaṃ nāmaṃ, tasmiṃ nimitte sattamī hoti.
anya-e0201n0:2214: Dīpi cammesu haññate, kuñjaro dantesu haññate, musāvāde pācittiyaṃ pāci. 2, omasavāde pācittiyaṃ pāci. 14 iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:2215: 325. Yambhāvo bhāvalakkhaṇaṃ ka. 313; rū. 327; nī. 644; caṃ. 2.1.90; pā. 2.3.37; ‘yabbhā vo’ (bahūsu).
anya-e0201n0:2216_0: Yādiso bhāvo yambhāvo, lakkhiyati etenāti lakkhaṇaṃ, bhāvantarassa lakkhaṇaṃ bhāvalakkhaṇaṃ,
anya-e0201n0:2216_1: yambhāvo bhāvantarassa lakkhaṇaṃ hoti, tasmiṃ bhāve gamyamāne sattamī hoti, chaṭṭhīpi dissati.
anya-e0201n0:2217: Acirapakkantassa sāriputtassa brāhmaṇo kālamakāsi ma. ni. 2.452 (visadisaṃ), appamattassa te viharato itthāgāropi te appamatto viharissati saṃ. ni. 1.129 (visadisaṃ) iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:2218_0: Imasmiṃ sati idaṃ hoti, imasmiṃ asati idaṃ na hoti saṃ. ni. 2.21, acirapakkante bhagavati
anya-e0201n0:2218_1: brāhmaṇo kālamakāsi, sabbe maggā vivajjanti, gacchante lokanāyake ma. ni. aṭṭha.
anya-e0201n0:2218_2: 2.22. Gāvīsu duyhamānāsu gato, gāvīsu duddhāsu āgato iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:2219: Kvaci paṭhamāpi bahulaṃ dissati, gacchanto so bhāradvājo, addasā accutaṃ isiṃ jā. 2.22.2007 (addassa). Yāyamāno mahārājā, addā sīdantare nage jā. 2.22.566 iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:2220: Pubbaṇhasamaye gato, sāyanhasamaye āgato iccādi vesayikādhāro eva.
anya-e0201n0:2221: Tathā akāle vassatī tassa, kāle tassa na vassati jā. 1.2.88; 1.8.48. Ito satasahassamhi, kappe uppajji nāyako apa. thera 2.54.28 iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:2222: 326. Chaṭṭhī cānādare ka. 305; rū. 323; nī. 633; caṃ. 2.1.91; pā. 2.3.38.
anya-e0201n0:2223: ‘Anādaro’ti dvinnaṃ lakkhaṇa, lakkhitabbakriyānaṃ ekappahārena pavattiyā adhivacanaṃ, anādarabhūte bhāvalakkhaṇe gamyamāne sattamī chaṭṭhī ca hoti.
anya-e0201n0:2224_0: Maccu gacchati ādāya, pekkhamāne mahājane. Ākoṭayanto so neti, sivirājassa pekkhato
anya-e0201n0:2224_1: jā. 2.22.2122 (teneti). Akāmakānaṃ mātāpitūnaṃ rudantānaṃ pabbaji, anagāriyupetassa,
anya-e0201n0:2224_2: vippamuttassa te sato. Samaṇassa na taṃ sādhu, yadaññamanusocati jā. 1.7.107 (yaṃ petamanusocasi).
anya-e0201n0:2225: 327. Yato niddhāraṇaṃ ka. 304; rū. 322; nī. 632; caṃ. 2.1.92; pā. 2.3.41.
anya-e0201n0:2226: Jāti, guṇa, kriyā, nāmehi samudāyato ekadesassa puthakkaraṇaṃ niddhāraṇaṃ, yato taṃ niddhāraṇaṃ jāyati, tasmiṃ samudāye chaṭṭhī, sattamiyo honti.
anya-e0201n0:2228: Manussānaṃ khattiyo sūratamo, manussesu khattiyo sūratamo.
anya-e0201n0:2232: Addhikānaṃ dhāvanto sīghatamo, addhikesu dhāvanto sīghatamo.
anya-e0201n0:2234: Āyasmā ānando arahataṃ aññataro, arahantesu aññataro iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:2236: Kammatthe sattamī, bhikkhūsu abhivādenti pārā. 517, puttaṃ muddhani cumbitvā, purisaṃ nānābāhāsu gahetvā saṃ. ni. 2.63 iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:2237: Atha vā ‘muddhani, bāhāsū’ti ādhāre eva bhummaṃ. Yathā? Rukkhaṃ mūle chindati, rukkhaṃ khandhe chindati, purisaṃ sīse paharati, bhagavantaṃ pādesu vandati.
anya-e0201n0:2238: Karaṇe ca sattamī, hatthesu piṇḍāya caranti mahāva. 119, pattesu piṇḍāya caranti, pathesu gacchanti, sopi maṃ anusāseyya, sampaṭicchāmi matthake mi. pa. 6.4.8.
anya-e0201n0:2239_0: Sampadāne ca sattamī, saṅghe dinne mahapphalaṃ, saṅghe gotamī dadeyyāsi, saṅghe dinne
anya-e0201n0:2239_1: ahañceva pūjito bhavissāmi ma. ni. 3.376, viceyya dānaṃ dātabbaṃ, yattha dinnaṃ mahapphalaṃ
anya-e0201n0:2239_2: pe. va. 329. Etesu pana visayasattamīpi yujjati.
anya-e0201n0:2240: Apādāne ca sattamī, gadalīsu gaje rakkhantiiccādi.
anya-e0201n0:2241_0: Sāmissarādiyoge pana chaṭṭhī sattamī ca hoti, gunnaṃ sāmi, gosu sāmi, gunnaṃ issaro,
anya-e0201n0:2241_1: gosu issaro, gunnaṃ adhipati, gosu adhipati, gunnaṃ dāyādo, gosu dāyādo, gunnaṃ sakkhi,
anya-e0201n0:2241_2: gosu sakkhi, gunnaṃ patibhū, gosu patibhū, gunnaṃ pasuto, gosu pasuto, āyutto kaṭakaraṇassa,
anya-e0201n0:2241_3: āyutto kaṭakaraṇeti, etesu pana sambandhe chaṭṭhī, visayādhāre sattamī. Ñāṇasmiṃ
anya-e0201n0:2241_4: pasanno, ñāṇasmiṃ ussukkoti visayādhāre sattamī. Ñāṇena pasanno, ñāṇena ussukkoti karaṇe tatiyā.
anya-e0201n0:2243: Adhikabhāvatthe upena yuttā liṅgamhā sattamī hoti.
anya-e0201n0:2244: Upa khāriyaṃ doṇo, upa nikkhe kahāpaṇaṃ, atirekadoṇā khārī, atirekakahāpaṇaṃ nikkhanti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0201n0:2246: Sāmibhāvatthe adhinā yuttā liṅgamhā sattamī hoti.
anya-e0201n0:2247_0: Adhi brahmadatte pañcālā, adhi pañcālesu brahmadatto, adhi devesu buddho. Tattha
anya-e0201n0:2247_2: vā janapadanāmattā bahuvacanaṃ, kadāci pañcālarājā brahmadatte kāsiraññe issaro,
anya-e0201n0:2249: Hetvatthehi yoge sabbādīhi sabbanāmehi hetvatthe sabbā vibhattiyo honti.
anya-e0201n0:2250_0: Kiṃ kāraṇaṃ, kena kāraṇena jā. aṭṭha. 4.15 mātaṅgajātakavaṇṇanā, kiṃ nimittaṃ, kena
anya-e0201n0:2250_1: nimittena, kiṃ payojanaṃ, kena payojanena, kenaṭṭhena dha. sa. aṭṭha. nidānakathā,
anya-e0201n0:2250_2: kena vaṇṇena saṃ. ni. 1.234, kimatthaṃ, kuto nidānaṃ pārā. 42, kissa hetu pārā. 39,
anya-e0201n0:2250_3: kasmiṃ nidāne, etasmiṃ nidāne pārā. 42, etasmiṃ pakaraṇe pārā. 42 iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:2255_0: Atha yuttatthānaṃ syādyantapadānaṃ ekatthībhāvo vuccate. Ekatthībhāvoti ca idha samāso
anya-e0201n0:2255_1: vuccati. So ca samāso chabbidho abyayībhāvo, tappuriso, kammadhārayo, digu, bahubbīhi, dvandoti.
anya-e0201n0:2257_0: Tattha abyayībhāvo paṭhamaṃ vuccate. Byayo vuccati vikāro, natthi byayo etassāti
anya-e0201n0:2257_1: abyayo, abyayo hutvā bhavatīti abyayībhāvo, nānāliṅga, vibhatti, vacanesu rūpavikārarahito
anya-e0201n0:2257_2: hutvā bhavatīti attho, sabbaliṅga,-vibhatti, vacanesupi yebhuyyena ekarūpena pavattatīti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0201n0:2258: Abyayanti vā upasagganipātānaṃ eva nāmaṃ, ayaṃ pana pakati abyayaṃ na hoti, asaṅkhyehi saha ekatthatāvasena abyayaṃ hoti, iti anabyayampi abyayaṃ bhavatīti abyayībhāvo.
anya-e0201n0:2259: 331. Syādisyādinekatthaṃ ka. 316; rū. 331; nī. 675; caṃ. 2.2.1; pā. 2.1.4.
anya-e0201n0:2260: Adhikārasuttamidaṃ. Syādi vuccati syādyantapadaṃ, ‘syādinā’ti syādyantapadena, eko attho yassa taṃ ekatthaṃ, syādipadaṃ syādipadena saha ekatthaṃ hotīti attho.
anya-e0201n0:2261: Ettha ca ‘syādī’ti vacanena upasagga, nipātehi saddhiṃ sabbāni nāmikapadāni nāmapaṭirūpakāni ca saṅgaṇhāti, tyādyantapadāni nivatteti.
anya-e0201n0:2262_0: Tattha nāmapaṭirūpakāni nāma ‘yevāvanakadhammā’ iccādīni. Tathā saññāsaddabhāvaṃ
anya-e0201n0:2262_1: pattāni “atthipaccayo, natthipaccayo, atthikhīrā brāhmaṇī, aññāsikoṇḍañño, makkhaligosālo”
anya-e0201n0:2263: ‘Ekattha’nti etena dvandasamāsepi padānaṃ ekakattu, ekakammādibhāvena ekatthībhāvo vutto hotīti.
anya-e0201n0:2264: 332. Asaṅkhyaṃ vibhattisampattisamīpasākalyābhāvayathāpacchāyugapadatthe ka. 319; rū. 330; nī. 696; caṃ. 2.2.2; pā. 2.1.6.
anya-e0201n0:2265_0: ‘Asaṅkhya’nti upasaggapadaṃ nipātapadañca vuccati. Taṃ dvayampi hi ekatta, bahuttasaṅkhyaṃ
anya-e0201n0:2265_1: paṭicca rūpavikārarahitattā ‘asaṅkhya’nti vuccati. Vibhatyatthe, sampatyatthe, samīpatthe,
anya-e0201n0:2265_2: sākalyatthe, abhāvatthe, yathātthe, pacchātthe, yugapadatthe pavattaṃ asaṅkhyaṃ nāma
anya-e0201n0:2265_3: syādipadaṃ aññena syādipadena saha ekatthaṃ hoti. Ayañca samāso anvatthavasena ‘asaṅkhyo’ti
anya-e0201n0:2267_0: Adhitthi. Ettha ca adhito si, tassa ‘asaṅkhyehi sabbāsa’nti suttena lopo, itthito
anya-e0201n0:2267_1: su, ‘adhi itthīsū’ti vākyaṃ, tassa ca atthaṃ kathentena niccasamāsattā aññapadena
anya-e0201n0:2267_2: viggaho kātabbo “itthīsu pavattā kathā”ti vā “itthīsu pavatto vacanapatho”ti vā “itthīsu
anya-e0201n0:2267_3: pavattaṃ vacana”nti vā, tato purimasuttena ekatthasaññā, iminā suttena asaṅkhyekatthasaññā
anya-e0201n0:2267_4: ca kariyate, ekatthasaññāya pana katāya vākyatthāya payuttānaṃ vibhattīnaṃ attho
anya-e0201n0:2267_5: ekatthapadena vutto hoti, tadā vibhattiyo vuttatthā nāma.
anya-e0201n0:2270_0: Eko attho yesaṃ tāni ekatthāni, ‘attho’ti cettha padantare kattu, kammādibhāvena
anya-e0201n0:2270_1: vidheyyo padhānattho eva veditabbo. Tathā hi ‘rājaputto’ti ettha puttasaddattho eva
anya-e0201n0:2270_2: tathāvidheyyo hoti, na rājasaddattho, sabbañca vacanavākyaṃ nāma vidheyyatthehi eva
anya-e0201n0:2270_3: sijjhati, no aññathā, yasmā ca ‘rājaputto’ti etaṃ puttasaddatthasseva nāmaṃ hoti,
anya-e0201n0:2270_4: na rājasaddatthassa, tasmā eko padhānabhūto puttasaddattho eva tesaṃ dvinnaṃ saddānaṃ
anya-e0201n0:2270_5: attho nāma hoti, na rājasaddatthoti, ekatthānaṃ bhāvo ekatthatā, ekatthībhāvoti vuttaṃ
anya-e0201n0:2270_6: hoti. So tividho samāso, taddhito, dhātupaccayanto cāti. Tissaṃ tividhāyaṃ ekatthatāyaṃ
anya-e0201n0:2270_7: sabbāsaṃ vuttatthānaṃ syādivibhattīnaṃ lopo hotīti iminā sussa lopo. Bahulādhikārattā
anya-e0201n0:2271: 334. Taṃ napuṃsakaṃ ka. 320; rū. 335; nī. 698; caṃ. 2.2.15; pā. 2.4.18.
anya-e0201n0:2272: Taṃ asaṅkhyaṃ nāma ekatthaṃ napuṃsakaṃ hotīti iminā adhitthīsaddassa napuṃsakabhāvaṃ katvā tato syādyuppatti.
anya-e0201n0:2274: Napuṃsakassa ekatthassa rasso hoti syādīsu vibhattīsūti iminā īkārassa rasso.
anya-e0201n0:2275: 336. Pubbasmāmādito ka. 343; rū. 338; nī. 375; caṃ. 2.1.40; pā. 1.1.41.
