anya-e0201n0:2276_0: Pubbaamādi nāma pubbapadatthapadhānabhūto asaṅkhyasamāso vuccati, tato parāsaṃ sabbāsaṃ
anya-e0201n0:2276_1: vibhattīnaṃ lopo hoti, ādisaddena cettha paṭhamāvibhattipi gayhati. Atha vā amādi
anya-e0201n0:2276_2: vuccati tappuriso, tato pubbaṃ nāma asaṅkhyasamāso, iti amādito pubbabhūtā asaṅkhyekatthā
anya-e0201n0:2276_3: parāsaṃ sabbāsaṃ vibhattīnaṃ lopo hotīti iminā adhitthisaddato sabbavibhattīnaṃ lopo.
anya-e0201n0:2277_0: Adhitthi tiṭṭhati, itthīsu pavattā kathā tiṭṭhatīti attho. Adhitthi tiṭṭhanti, itthīsu
anya-e0201n0:2277_1: pavattā kathāyo tiṭṭhantīti attho. Esa nayo sesavibhattīsu sesavacanesu sesaliṅgesu
anya-e0201n0:2277_2: ca. Evaṃ sabbaliṅgesu sabbavibhattīsu sabbavacanesu ca ekeneva rūpena tiṭṭhati, tasmā
anya-e0201n0:2278_0: Ettha ca vibhatyattho nāma “adhitthi, bahigāmaṃ, uparigaṅga” miccādīsu sampatyādīhi
anya-e0201n0:2278_1: visesatthehi rahito kevalo vibhattīnaṃ attho vuccati. Viggahe pana “kathā, pavattā”
anya-e0201n0:2278_2: iccādīni samāsasāmatthiyena viditāni atthapadāni nāma, adhisaddassa atthapadānītipi
anya-e0201n0:2279: Attani pavatto dhammo, pavattā vādhammāti atthe vibhattīnaṃ lope kate adhiattasaddassa napuṃsakabhāvaṃ katvā tato syādyuppatti, ‘pubbasmāmādito’ti syādīnaṃ lope sampatte –
anya-e0201n0:2281: Akārantamhā asaṅkhyekatthā paraṃ sabbāsaṃ vibhattīnaṃ lopo na hoti, pañcamīvajjitānaṃ vibhattīnaṃ aṃ hoti.
anya-e0201n0:2282: Ajjhattaṃ dhammo jāyati, ajjhattaṃ dhammā jāyanti, ajjhattaṃ dhammaṃ passati, ajjhattaṃ dhamme passanti.
anya-e0201n0:2283: Apañcamiyāti kiṃ? Ajjhattā apeti, ajjhattehi apeti.
anya-e0201n0:2284: 338. Vā tatiyāsattamīnaṃ ka. 341; rū. 336; nī. 733; caṃ. 2.1.42; pā. 2.4.84; mu. 4.3.375.
anya-e0201n0:2285: Akārantamhā asaṅkhyekatthā paraṃ tatiyā, sattamīnaṃ vikappena aṃ hoti.
anya-e0201n0:2286_0: Ajjhattaṃ dhammena vattati ajjhattena vā, ajjhattaṃ dhammehi vattati ajjhattehi vā,
anya-e0201n0:2286_1: ajjhattaṃ dhammassa deti, ajjhattaṃ dhammānaṃ deti, ajjhattā dhammā apeti, ajjhattehi
anya-e0201n0:2286_2: dhammehi apeti, ajjhattaṃ dhammassa santakaṃ, ajjhattaṃ dhammānaṃ santakaṃ, ajjhattaṃ
anya-e0201n0:2286_3: dhamme tiṭṭhati ajjhatte vā, ajjhattaṃ dhammesu tiṭṭhati ajjhattesu vā. Ettha ca
anya-e0201n0:2286_4: ‘ajjhattaṃ dhammo’ti ajjhattabhūto dhammo, ‘ajjhattaṃ dhammā’ti ajjhattabhūtā dhammā
anya-e0201n0:2286_5: iccādinā attho veditabbo. Attānaṃ adhikicca pavatto pavattāti vā vuttepi attassa
anya-e0201n0:2286_6: ādhārabhāvo sijjhatiyeva. Evaṃ adhicittaṃ, attani visuṃ visuṃ pavattaṃ pavattāni
anya-e0201n0:2286_7: vā paccattaṃ. Ettha ca “ajjhattaṃ abhinivisitvā ajjhattaṃ vuṭṭhāti, bahiddhā abhinivisitvā
anya-e0201n0:2286_8: ajjhattaṃ vuṭṭhātī”ti dha. sa. aṭṭha. 350; saṃ. ni. aṭṭha. 2.2.32 pāṭho atthi, tasmā
anya-e0201n0:2286_9: pañcamiyā aṃbhāvavajjanaṃ appakattāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. “Ajjhattā dhammā, bahiddhā dhammā”ti
anya-e0201n0:2286_10: dha. sa. tikamātikā 20 pāṭho atthi, tasmā paṭhamādīnampi vikappo labbhatīti.
anya-e0201n0:2288_0: Sampannaṃ brahmaṃ sabrahmaṃ, ‘brahma’nti vedo vuccati. Ettha ca ‘akāle sakatthassā’ti
anya-e0201n0:2288_1: suttena sahasaddassa sādeso, bhikkhānaṃ samiddhi subhikkhaṃ, ‘syādīsu rasso’ti suttena
anya-e0201n0:2290: Nagarassa samīpaṃ upanagaraṃ, kumbhassa samīpaṃ upakumbhaṃ, maṇikāya samīpaṃ upamaṇikaṃ, vadhuyā samīpaṃ upavadhu, gunnaṃ samīpaṃ upagu, ‘gossū’ti suttena ossa uttaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:2292: Tiṇena saha sakalaṃ satiṇaṃ, tiṇena saddhiṃ sakalaṃ vatthuṃ ajjhoharatīti attho. Sahasaddassa sādeso.
anya-e0201n0:2294_0: Makkhikānaṃ abhāvo nimmakkhikaṃ, darathānaṃ abhāvo niddarathaṃ, bhikkhānaṃ abhāvo
anya-e0201n0:2294_1: dubbhikkhaṃ, abhāvatthopi dusaddo atthi. Yathā? Dussīlo duppaññoti. Ettha ca ‘sampannaṃ
anya-e0201n0:2294_3: pana imesaṃ padānaṃ yuttaṃ abhidheyyatthaṃ ñatvā tadanurūpaṃ atthavacanampi veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:2296_0: Rūpassa sabhāvassa yogyaṃ anurūpaṃ, attānaṃ attānaṃ paṭicca pavattaṃ paccattaṃ, aḍḍhamāsaṃ
anya-e0201n0:2296_1: aḍḍhamāsaṃ anugataṃ anvaḍḍhamāsaṃ, gharaṃ gharaṃ anugataṃ anugharaṃ, vassaṃ vassaṃ
anya-e0201n0:2296_2: anugataṃ anuvassaṃ, jeṭṭhānaṃ anupubbaṃ anujeṭṭhaṃ, sattiyā anurūpaṃ yathāsatti,
anya-e0201n0:2296_3: balassa anurūpaṃ yathābalaṃ, kamassa anurūpaṃ yathākkamaṃ. Evaṃ yathāsaṅkhyaṃ, yathālābhaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:2299_0: Yugabhūto padattho yugapadattho, sahabhāvīatthadvayassetaṃ nāmaṃ. Tattha asaniphalena
anya-e0201n0:2299_1: saha pavattaṃ cakkaṃ sacakkaṃ, gadāvudhena yugaḷapavattaṃ vāsudevassa cakkāvudhantipi
anya-e0201n0:2299_2: vadanti yugapadatthe sacakkaṃ nidhehi, (moggallānavuttiyaṃ). cakkena yugapata dhehi
anya-e0201n0:2299_3: sacakkaṃ, (mugdhabodhavuttiyaṃ). he bisaṇu! cakkena saha yugapadekakāle gadaṃ dhāraya.
anya-e0201n0:2300: 339. Yathā natulye ka. 319; rū. 330; nī. 696; caṃ. 2.2.3; pā. 2.1.7.
anya-e0201n0:2301: Tulyato aññasmiṃ atthe pavatto yathāsaddo syādinā saha ekattho hoti moggallāne aññathāvutti dassitā.
anya-e0201n0:2302: Yathāsatti, yathābalaṃ, yathākkamaṃ, ye ye vuḍḍhā yathāvuḍḍhaṃ, vuḍḍhānaṃ paṭipāṭi vā yathāvuḍḍhaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:2303: Natulyeti kiṃ? Yathā devadatto, tathā yaññadatto.
anya-e0201n0:2304: 340. Yāvāvadhāraṇe ka. 319; rū. 330; nī. 696; caṃ. 2.2.4; pā. 2.1.8.
anya-e0201n0:2305: Avadhāraṇaṃ vuccati paricchindanaṃ, avadhāraṇe pavatto yāvasaddo syādinā saha ekattho bhavati.
anya-e0201n0:2306: Yattakaṃ attho vattatīti yāvadatthaṃ, dāgamo. Yattakaṃ jīvo vattatīti yāvajīvaṃ, yattakaṃ āyu vattatīti yāvatāyukaṃ, takāra, kakārā āgamā.
anya-e0201n0:2307: 341. Parāpābahitiropurepacchā vā pañcamyā ka. 319; rū. 330; nī. 696; caṃ. 2.2.7; pā. 2.1.12, 13; ‘payyapā…’ (bahūsu).
anya-e0201n0:2308: Pari, apa, āiccādayo saddā pañcamyantena syādinā saha ekatthā bhavanti vā.
anya-e0201n0:2309_0: Pabbatato pari samantā vassīti devo paripabbataṃ paripabbatā vā, pabbataṃ vajjetvā
anya-e0201n0:2309_1: vassīti attho. Pabbatato bahiddhā apapabbataṃ apapabbatā vā, pāṭaliputtato bahiddhā
anya-e0201n0:2309_2: vassīti devo āpāṭaliputtaṃ āpāṭaliputtā vā, ākumārehi kaccāyanassa yaso vattatīti
anya-e0201n0:2309_3: ākumāraṃ ākumārā vā, ābhavaggā bhagavato yaso vattatīti ābhavaggaṃ ābhavaggā vā,
anya-e0201n0:2309_4: āpāṇakoṭiyā saraṇagamanaṃ vattatīti āpāṇakoṭikaṃ, kāgamo. Gāmato bahi bahigāmaṃ bahigāmā
anya-e0201n0:2309_5: vā, evaṃ bahinagaraṃ, bahileṇaṃ, pabbatato tiro tiropabbataṃ tiropabbatā vā, evaṃ
anya-e0201n0:2309_6: tiropākāraṃ, tirokuṭṭaṃ. Ettha ca ‘tiro’ti parabhāgo vuccati. Bhattamhā pure purebhattaṃ
anya-e0201n0:2309_7: purebhattā vā, aruṇamhā pure purāruṇaṃ purāruṇā vā, bhattassa pacchā pacchābhattaṃ pacchābhattā vā.
anya-e0201n0:2310: 342. Samīpāyāmesvanu ka. 319; rū. 330; nī. 696; caṃ. 2.2.9; pā. 2.1.15, 16.
anya-e0201n0:2311: Samīpe āyāme ca pavatto anusaddo syādinā saha ekattho bhavati vā.
anya-e0201n0:2312: Vanassa samīpaṃ anuvanaṃ, asani anuvanaṃ gatā, gaṅgaṃ anuyātā anugaṅgaṃ, bārāṇasī.
anya-e0201n0:2313: 343. Oro pari paṭi pāre majjhe heṭṭhuddhādhonto vā chaṭṭhiyā ka. 319; rū. 330; nī. 696; caṃ. 2.2.11; pā. 2.1.18; ‘orepari…’ (bahūsu).
anya-e0201n0:2314: Orādayo saddā chaṭṭhīyantena syādinā saha ekatthā bhavanti vā.
anya-e0201n0:2315_0: Ettha ca ore, pāre, majjhesaddesu ‘tadaminādīnī’ti suttena ekāro, gaṅgāya oraṃ oregaṅgaṃ,
anya-e0201n0:2315_1: sikharassa upari uparisikharaṃ. Evaṃ uparipāsādaṃ, uparimañcaṃ, uparipabbataṃ, sotassa
anya-e0201n0:2315_2: paṭilomaṃ paṭisotaṃ. Evaṃ paṭivātaṃ, yamunāya pāraṃ pāreyamunaṃ, gaṅgāya majjhaṃ
anya-e0201n0:2315_3: majjhegaṅgaṃ, pāsādassa heṭṭhā heṭṭhāpāsādaṃ, heṭṭhāmañcaṃ, gaṅgāya uddhaṃ uddhaṃgaṅgaṃ,
anya-e0201n0:2315_4: gaṅgāya adho adhogaṅgaṃ, pāsādassa anto antopāsādaṃ. Evaṃ antogāmaṃ, antonagaraṃ, antovassaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:2317: 344. Tiṭṭhagvādīni ka. 319; rū. 330; nī. 697; caṃ. 2.2.10; pā. 2.1.17.
anya-e0201n0:2319_0: Tiṭṭhanti gāvo yasmiṃ kāle tiṭṭhagu, vahanti gāvoyasmiṃ kāle vahagu, ‘gossū’ti suttena
anya-e0201n0:2319_1: ossa uttaṃ. Āyatiṃ yavo yasmiṃ kāleti āyatiyavo, khale yavo yasmiṃ kāleti khaleyavaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:2319_2: Pubbapade vibhattialopo. Lunā yavā yasmiṃ kāleti lunayavaṃ, ettha ‘lunā’ti lāvitā,
anya-e0201n0:2320_0: Tathā pāto nahānaṃ yasmiṃ kāleti pātanahānaṃ. Evaṃ sāyanahānaṃ, pāto kammakaraṇakālo
anya-e0201n0:2320_1: yasminti pātakālaṃ. Evaṃ sāyakālaṃ, pāto vassati megho yasminti pātameghaṃ. Evaṃ
anya-e0201n0:2320_2: sāyameghaṃ, pāto gantabbo maggo yasminti pātamaggaṃ. Evaṃ sāyamaggaṃ iccādi. Mahāvuttinā
anya-e0201n0:2320_3: pātosaddassa pātattaṃ. Ettha ca ‘tiṭṭhagu’ iccādīni viggahatthavasena aññapadatthe
anya-e0201n0:2320_4: siddhāni viya dissanti, aññapadassa pana liṅgādīnaṃ vasena tesaṃ rūpavikāro nāma
anya-e0201n0:2320_5: natthi, tasmā abyayarūpattā idha gahitāni, sabbañcetaṃ asaṅkhyasamāsapadaṃ nāma napuṃsakaṃ
anya-e0201n0:2320_6: eva hoti, rassantameva hoti. Sabbavibhattīnañca akārantamhā bahulaṃ aṃ hoti, ikārukārantehi lopo hoti.
anya-e0201n0:2324_0: Atha amādisamāso vuccate, so tappurisoti ca vuccati. Tassa puriso tappuriso, tappurisasaddena
anya-e0201n0:2324_1: sadisattā ayaṃ samāso tappurisoti vuccati. Yathā hi tappurisasaddo visesanapadatthaṃ
anya-e0201n0:2324_2: jahitvā visesyapadatthe tiṭṭhati, evaṃ ayaṃ samāsopīti.
anya-e0201n0:2326_0: Amādivibhattiyuttaṃ syādyantapadaṃ paṭhamantena syādyantapadena saha ekatthaṃ bhavati,
anya-e0201n0:2326_1: ayañca samāso anvatthavasena “amādisamāso”ti ca “tappurisasamāso”ti ca vuccati. Iminā
anya-e0201n0:2326_2: amādisahitassa vākyassa amādekatthasaññaṃ katvā vuttatthānaṃ vibhattīnaṃ lopo, tato
anya-e0201n0:2327_0: So pana samāso dutiyātappuriso, tatiyātappuriso, catutthītappuriso, pañcamītappuriso,
anya-e0201n0:2328: Tattha dutiyātappuriso kattuvācakesu gata, nissita,-atīta, atikkanta, patta, āpannaiccādīsu paresu hoti.
anya-e0201n0:2329_0: Gāmaṃ gatoti gāmagato gāmaṃ gato vā. Evaṃ araññagato, bhūmigato, rājānaṃ nissitoti
anya-e0201n0:2329_1: rājanissito. Evaṃ atthanissito, dhammanissito. Bhavaṃ atīto bhavātīto. Evaṃ bhayātīto,
anya-e0201n0:2329_2: kālātīto, khaṇātīto, pamāṇaṃ atikkantoti pamāṇātikkanto, sukhaṃ pattoti sukhappatto.
anya-e0201n0:2329_3: Evaṃ dukkhappatto, sotaṃ āpannoti sotāpanno. Evaṃ nirodhasamāpanno, addhānamaggaṃ
anya-e0201n0:2329_4: paṭipannoti addhānamaggappaṭipanno, rukkhaṃ ārūḷhoti rukkhārūḷho, rathārūḷho, oghaṃ
anya-e0201n0:2329_5: tiṇṇoti oghatiṇṇo oghaṃ tiṇṇo vā iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:2330_0: Kammupapadavihitehi kitantapadehi pana niccasamāsoyeva, kumbhaṃ karotīti kumbhakāro,
anya-e0201n0:2330_1: rathakāro, pattaṃ gaṇhātīti pattaggāho, atthaṃ kāmetīti atthakāmo, dhammakāmo, vinayaṃ
anya-e0201n0:2330_2: dhāretīti vinayadharo, dhammadharo, brahmaṃ carati sīlenāti brahmacārī, bhavapāraṃ
anya-e0201n0:2330_3: gacchati sīlenāti bhavapāragū, sabbaṃ jānātīti sabbaññū, atthaññū, dhammaññūiccādi.
anya-e0201n0:2331_0: Bahulādhikārattā ta, tavantu, tāvī, anta, māna, tuna, tvāna, tvā, tuṃ, tavepaccayantesu
anya-e0201n0:2331_1: paresu samāso na hoti, vassaṃ vuttho, odanaṃ bhutto, odanaṃ bhuttavā, odanaṃ bhuttāvī,
anya-e0201n0:2331_2: dhammaṃ suṇanto, dhammaṃ suṇamāno dhammaṃ sotuna, dhammaṃ sutvāna, dhammaṃ sutvā,
anya-e0201n0:2334: Tatiyātappuriso kammavācakesu kitantesu ca sampanna, sahagatādīsu ca pubba, sadisa, sama, ūnattha, kalaha, nipuṇa,-missaka, sakhilādīsu ca paresu hoti.
anya-e0201n0:2335_0: Buddhena bhāsito buddhabhāsito. Evaṃ buddhadesito, buddhapaññatto, buddharakkhito,
anya-e0201n0:2335_1: satthārā vaṇṇito satthuvaṇṇito, viññūhi garahito viññugarahito, viññupasattho, issarena
anya-e0201n0:2335_2: kataṃ issarakataṃ, attanā kataṃ sayaṃkataṃ, parehi kataṃ paraṃkataṃ, bindāgamo. Sukehi
anya-e0201n0:2335_3: āhaṭaṃ sukāhaṭaṃ, raññā hato rājahato, rogena pīḷito rogapīḷito, agginā daḍḍho aggidaḍḍho,
anya-e0201n0:2335_4: sappena daṭṭho sappadaṭṭho, sallena viddho sallaviddho, icchāya apakato abhibhūto icchāpakato.
anya-e0201n0:2336_0: Sīlena sampanno sīlasampanno. Evaṃ sukhasahagataṃ, ñāṇasampayuttaṃ, mittasaṃsaggo,
anya-e0201n0:2336_1: piyasampayogo, piyavippayogo, jātiyā andho jaccandho, guṇahīno, guṇavuḍḍho, catuvaggena
anya-e0201n0:2336_2: saṅghena karaṇīyaṃ kammaṃ catuvaggakaraṇīyaṃ. Evaṃ pañcavaggakaraṇīyaṃ, kākehi peyyā kākapeyyā, nadī.
anya-e0201n0:2337: Ekakkharesu parapadesu niccasamāso, urena gacchatīti urago, pādena pivatīti pādapo iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:2338_0: Kvaci majjhepadalopo, guḷena saṃsaṭṭho odano guḷodano. Evaṃ khīrodano, assena yutto
anya-e0201n0:2338_1: ratho assaratho. Evaṃ ājaññaratho, maggena sampayuttaṃ cittaṃ maggacittaṃ, jambuyā
anya-e0201n0:2338_2: paññāto dīpo jambudīpo, ekena adhikā dasa ekādasa iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:2339_0: Pubbādīsu – māsena pubbo māsapubbo, mātarā sadiso mātusadiso. Evaṃ mātusamo, pitusamo,
anya-e0201n0:2339_1: ekena ūnā vīsati ekūnavīsati, sīlena vikalo sīlavikalo, asinā kalaho asikalaho, vācāya
anya-e0201n0:2339_2: nipuṇo vācānipuṇo. Evaṃ yāvakālikasammissaṃ, vācāsakhilo, satthārā sadiso satthukappo,
anya-e0201n0:2339_3: puññena attho puññattho, puññena atthiko puññatthiko. Evaṃ seyyatthiko, mahagghatthiko,
anya-e0201n0:2340: Bahulādhikārā kvaci samāso na hoti, pharasunā chinnaṃ, kākehi pātabbā, dassanena pahātabbā dhammā, bhāvanāya pahātabbā dhammā iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:2343: Catutthītappuriso tadatthe vā attha, hita, deyyādīsu vā paresu hoti.
anya-e0201n0:2344_0: Kathinassa dussaṃ kathinadussaṃ, kathinatthāya ābhaṭaṃ dussanti attho. Evaṃ kathinacīvaraṃ,
anya-e0201n0:2344_1: kathināya dussaṃ, kathināya cīvarantipi yujjati, kathinatthārāyāti attho. Cīvarāya
anya-e0201n0:2344_2: dussaṃ cīvaradussaṃ. Evaṃ cīvaramūlaṃ cīvaramūlyaṃ, saṅghassa ābhaṭaṃ bhattaṃ saṅghabhattaṃ,
anya-e0201n0:2344_3: saṅghatthāya vā paṭiyattaṃ bhattaṃ saṅghabhattaṃ. Evaṃ āgantukabhattaṃ, gamikabhattaṃ, gilānabhattaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:2345_0: Saṅghassa attho saṅghattho, lokassa hito lokahito, buddhassa deyyaṃ buddhadeyyaṃ,
anya-e0201n0:2345_1: buddhassa paṇāmo buddhappaṇāmo. Evaṃ buddhathomanā, buddhupaṭṭhānaṃ, suttassa anulomaṃ
anya-e0201n0:2345_2: suttānulomaṃ. Evaṃ suttānurūpaṃ, suttānukūlaṃ, suttānuguṇaṃ, ṭhānassa arahaṃ ṭhānārahaṃ,
anya-e0201n0:2345_3: rañño arahaṃ rājārahaṃ. Evaṃ rājagghaṃ, rājadeyyaṃ, kattuṃ kāmetīti kattukāmo. Evaṃ
anya-e0201n0:2345_4: gantukāmo, kathetukāmo, daṭṭhukāmo, sotukāmo. Ettha ca tumantassa asaṅkhyattā ‘asaṅkhyehi
anya-e0201n0:2345_5: sabbāsa’nti tato niccaṃ catutthīlopo hoti, samāse kate niccaṃ niggahītalopo ca. “Saṅghassa
anya-e0201n0:2345_6: dātabbaṃ, saṅghassa dātuṃ” iccādīsu samāso na hoti.
anya-e0201n0:2348: Pañcamītappuriso apagamana, bhaya, virati, mocanādiatthesu paresu hoti.
anya-e0201n0:2349_0: Methunā apetoti methunāpeto, palāsato apagatoti palāsāpagato, nagaramhā niggatoti
anya-e0201n0:2349_1: nagaraniggato, piṇḍapātato paṭikkantoti piṇḍapātappaṭikkanto. Evaṃ gāmanikkhanto,
anya-e0201n0:2349_2: rukkhapatito, sāsanamhā cutoti sāsanacuto, āpattiyā vuṭṭhānaṃ āpattivuṭṭhānaṃ, udakato
anya-e0201n0:2349_3: uggato udakuggato, bhavato nissaṭo bhavanissaṭo, khandhasaṅgahato nissaṭanti khandhasaṅgahanissaṭaṃ,
anya-e0201n0:2349_4: coramhā bhītoti corabhīto, pāpato bhāyati sīlenāti pāpabhīruko, pāpato jigucchati
anya-e0201n0:2349_5: sīlenāti pāpajigucchī, vaṭṭato nibbindatīti vaṭṭanibbinno, kāyaduccaritato virati
anya-e0201n0:2349_6: kāyaduccaritavirati. Evaṃ vacīduccaritavirati, bandhanā mutto bandhanamutto. Evaṃ
anya-e0201n0:2349_7: bandhanamokkho, kammato samuṭṭhitaṃ kammasamuṭṭhitaṃ. Evaṃ kammajātaṃ, kammasambhūtaṃ,
anya-e0201n0:2349_8: kammanibbattaṃ, lokato aggo lokaggo. Evaṃ lokajeṭṭho, lokuttamo, sabbehi jeṭṭho sabbajeṭṭho,
anya-e0201n0:2349_9: sabbehi kaniṭṭho sabbakaniṭṭho. Evaṃ sabbahīno, sabbapacchimo, ukkaṭṭhato ukkaṭṭhoti
anya-e0201n0:2350: Kvaci niccasamāso hoti, mātito jāto mātujo. Evaṃ pitujo, kammajaṃ, cittajaṃ, utujaṃ iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:2353_0: Rañño putto rājaputto. Evaṃ rājapuriso, buddhasāvako, samuddaghoso, dhaññānaṃ rāsi
anya-e0201n0:2353_1: dhaññarāsi, mattikāya pattoti mattikāpatto, vikārasambandhe chaṭṭhī, mattikāmayapattoti
anya-e0201n0:2353_2: attho. Evaṃ suvaṇṇakaṭāhaṃ, suvaṇṇabhājanaṃ, pānīyassa thālakaṃ pānīyathālakaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:2354_0: Samāsamajjhe ī, ūnaṃ bahulaṃ rassattaṃ, daṇḍino kulaṃ daṇḍikulaṃ, hatthipadaṃ, itthirūpaṃ,
anya-e0201n0:2354_1: nadikūlaṃ, naditīraṃ, bhikkhunīnaṃ saṅgho bhikkhunisaṅgho, jambuyā sākhā jambusākhā iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:2355_0: Anta, māna, niddhāraṇiya, pūraṇa, bhāva, suhitatthehi samāso na hoti, mamaṃ anukubbanto,
anya-e0201n0:2355_1: mamaṃ anukurumāno, gunnaṃ kaṇhā sampannakhīratamā. Vibhattāvadhichaṭṭhiyā pana hotiyeva,
anya-e0201n0:2355_2: narānaṃ uttamo naruttamo, naraseṭṭho, naravaro, gaṇānaṃ uttamo gaṇuttamo, dvipadānaṃ
anya-e0201n0:2355_3: uttamo dvipaduttamo iccādi. Sissānaṃ pañcamo sisso, kappassa tatiyo bhāgo, pakkhassa
anya-e0201n0:2355_4: aṭṭhamī, paṭassa sukkatā, rūpassa lahutā, rūpassa mudutā, rūpassa kammaññatā. Kvaci
anya-e0201n0:2355_5: hoti, kāyalahutā, cittalahutā, buddhasubuddhatā. Dhammasudhammatā, phalānaṃ suhito,
anya-e0201n0:2355_6: phalānaṃ titto, phalānaṃ asito, karaṇatthe chaṭṭhī.
anya-e0201n0:2356_0: “Bhaṭo rañño putto devadattassā”ti ettha ‘rājaputto’ti na hoti aññamaññānapekkhattā.
anya-e0201n0:2356_1: “Devadattassa kaṇhā dantā”ti ettha ‘devadattakaṇhadantā’ti na hoti aññasāpekkhattā
anya-e0201n0:2356_2: nī. 690. Aññasāpekkhattepi niccaṃ sambandhīpekkhasaddānaṃ samāso hoti vākye viya
anya-e0201n0:2356_3: samāsepi sambandhassa viditattā. Vuttañca “satipi sāpekkhatte gamakattā samāso hotī”ti
anya-e0201n0:2356_4: ka. 328; rū. 352; nī. 691, devadattagurukulaṃ, rājadāsīputto, devadāsīputto iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:2356_5: Tattha devadattassa guru devadattaguru, tassa kulaṃ devadattagurukulanti viggaho.
anya-e0201n0:2356_6: Guruno kulaṃ gurukulaṃ, devadattassa gurukulaṃ devadattagurukulantipi vadanti. “Rañño
anya-e0201n0:2356_7: māgadhassa bimbisārassa putto”ti etthapi aññasāpekkhattā ‘bimbisāraputto’ti na hoti,
anya-e0201n0:2356_8: rañño go ca asso ca puriso cāti atthe ‘rājagavassapurisā’ti hoti dvandato pubbapadassa
anya-e0201n0:2356_9: dvandapadehipi paccekaṃ sambandhassa viditattā. Tathā dvandato parapadassapi, narānañca
anya-e0201n0:2359_0: Sattamītappurise rūpe saññā rūpasaññā. Ettha ca kārakānaṃ kriyāsādhanalakkhaṇattā
anya-e0201n0:2359_1: kriyāpadeheva sambandho hoti, tasmā akriyavācakena parapadena saddhiṃ samāse jāte
anya-e0201n0:2359_2: majjhe anurūpaṃ kriyāpadaṃ viññāyati, yathā ‘assena yutto ratho assaratho’ iti ‘rūpe
anya-e0201n0:2359_3: saññā’ti rūpe uppannā saññāti attho. Cakkhusmiṃ viññāṇaṃ cakkhuviññāṇaṃ, dhamme rato
anya-e0201n0:2359_4: dhammarato. Evaṃ dhammaruci, dhammagāravo, dāne ajjhāsayo dānajjhāsayo. Evaṃ dānādhimutti,
anya-e0201n0:2359_5: vaṭṭe bhayaṃ vaṭṭabhayaṃ, vaṭṭadukkhaṃ, gāme sūkaro gāmasūkaro, vanamahiṃso, samuddamaccho,
anya-e0201n0:2360_0: Upapadakitantesu niccasamāso nī. 682, vane caratīti vanacaro, kāmāvacaro, kucchimhi
anya-e0201n0:2360_1: sayatīti kucchissayo, gabbhe setīti gabbhaseyyo, thale tiṭṭhatīti thalaṭṭho, jalaṭṭho,
anya-e0201n0:2360_2: pabbataṭṭho, paṅke jātaṃ paṅkajaṃ. Evaṃ atrajo, khetrajo iccādi. Idha na hoti nī.
anya-e0201n0:2360_3: 681, bhojane mattaññutā, indriyesu guttadvāro, āsane nisinno, āsane nisīditabbaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:2364_0: Uparigaṅgā, heṭṭhānadī, antovihāro, antosamāpatti, haṃsānaṃ rājā rājahaṃso haṃsarājā
anya-e0201n0:2364_1: vā, māsassa aḍḍhaṃ aḍḍhamāsaṃ, kahāpaṇassa aḍḍhaṃ aḍḍhakahāpaṇaṃ, aḍḍhamāsaṃ, rattiyā
anya-e0201n0:2364_2: aḍḍhaṃ aḍḍharattaṃ. Evaṃ pubbarattaṃ, pararattaṃ, issa attaṃ. Kāyassa pubbabhāgo
anya-e0201n0:2364_3: pubbakāyo, parakāyo, ahassa pubbo pubbaṇho, majjhaṇho, sāyanho, pubbediṭṭho diṭṭhapubbo,
anya-e0201n0:2364_4: tathāgataṃ diṭṭhapubbo thero, tathāgato diṭṭhapubbo therena iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:2368_0: Dīpaṅkaro, pabhaṅkaro, amatandado, purindado, vessantaro, attantapo, parantapo, raṇañjaho,
anya-e0201n0:2368_1: jutindharo, vijjandharo, dassanenapahātabbadhammo, kutojo, tatojo, itojo, bhayato
anya-e0201n0:2368_2: upaṭṭhānaṃ bhayatupaṭṭhānaṃ, kaṭattākammaṃ, kaṭattārūpaṃ, parassapadaṃ, attanopadaṃ,
anya-e0201n0:2368_3: devānamindo, devānaṃpiyatisso, gavampatitthero, pubbenivāso, majjhekalyāṇaṃ, dūrerūpaṃ,
anya-e0201n0:2368_4: santikerūpaṃ, dūrenidānaṃ, santikenidānaṃ, antevāsiko, janesuto, kāmesumicchācāro
anya-e0201n0:2370: Sabbo cāyaṃ amāditappuriso abhidheyyavacano parapadaliṅgo ca.
anya-e0201n0:2374_0: Kammamiva dvayaṃ dhāretīti kammadhārayo. Yathā kammaṃ kriyañca payojanañca dvayaṃ
anya-e0201n0:2374_1: dhāreti kamme sati tassa dvayassa sambhavato, tathā ayaṃ samāso ekassa atthassa dve
anya-e0201n0:2374_2: nāmāni dhāreti imasmiṃ samāse sati ekatthajotakassa nāmadvayassa sambhavatoti ka.
anya-e0201n0:2375_0: Api ca kattabbanti kammaṃ, dhāretabbanti dhāriyaṃ, kammañca taṃ dhāriyañcāti kammadhāriyaṃ,
anya-e0201n0:2375_1: yaṃkiñci hitakammaṃ, kammadhāriyasaddasadisattā sabbo cāyaṃ samāso kammadhārayoti
anya-e0201n0:2375_2: vuccati issa attaṃ katvā. Yathā hi kammadhāriyasaddo ekassa atthassa dve nāmāni dhāreti,
anya-e0201n0:2375_3: tathā ayaṃ samāsopīti. So eva uttarapadatthapadhānatāsaṅkhātena tappurisalakkhaṇena
anya-e0201n0:2375_4: yuttattā ‘tappuriso’ti ca vuccati. Bhinnapavattinimittānaṃ dvinnaṃ padānaṃ visesanavisesitabbabhāvena
anya-e0201n0:2375_5: ekasmiṃ atthe pavatti tulyādhikaraṇatā nāma, tena tulyādhikaraṇalakkhaṇena yuttattā
anya-e0201n0:2375_6: ‘tulyādhikaraṇasamāso’ti ca vuccati. So eva ca visesanapadavasena guṇavisesadīpanattā
anya-e0201n0:2376: 346. Visesanamekatthena ka. 324; rū. 339; nī. 702; caṃ. 2.2.18; pā. 2.1.57.
anya-e0201n0:2377: Visesanabhūtaṃ syādyantapadaṃ ekatthena visesyabhūtena syādyantapadena saddhiṃ ekatthaṃ hoti.
anya-e0201n0:2378_0: Ettha ca visesīyati dabbaṃ visiṭṭhaṃ karīyati etenāti visesanaṃ. Eko attho yassāti
anya-e0201n0:2378_1: ekatthaṃ, ‘eko’ti samāno, ‘attho’ti abhidheyyattho, nemittakattho, soyeva dvinnaṃ
anya-e0201n0:2378_3: adhiṭṭhānatte sati padānampi adhiṭṭhānatā siddhā hoti. Iti ekatthanti tulyādhikaraṇaṃ,
anya-e0201n0:2378_4: samānādhikaraṇanti vuttaṃ hoti, tena ekatthena. ‘Ekatthaṃ hotī’ti ekatthībhūtaṃ hotīti attho.
anya-e0201n0:2379_0: So ca samāso navavidho visesanapubbapado, visesanuttarapado, visesanobhayapado, upamānuttarapado,
anya-e0201n0:2379_1: sambhāvanāpubbapado, avadhāraṇapubbapado, nanipātapubbapado, kunipātapubbapado, pādipubbapado cāti.
anya-e0201n0:2380_0: Tattha visesanapubbapado yathā? Mahāpuriso, mahānadī, mahabbhayaṃ. Ettha ca “sā senā
anya-e0201n0:2380_1: dissate mahā jā. 2.22.771, bārāṇasirajjaṃ nāma mahā”ti jā. aṭṭha. 1.1.mahāsīlavajātakavaṇṇanā
anya-e0201n0:2380_2: pāḷi dissati. Tasmā samāsepi tiliṅge nipātarūpo mahāsaddo yujjati. Mahā ca so puriso
anya-e0201n0:2380_3: cāti mahāpuriso, mahā ca sā nadī cāti mahānadī, mahā ca taṃ bhayañcāti mahabbhayaṃ,
anya-e0201n0:2380_4: dvittaṃ saṃyoge ca rassattaṃ. Mahāsaddavevacanena mahantasaddenapi vākyaṃ dassetuṃ
anya-e0201n0:2380_5: yujjati, mahanto puriso mahāpuriso, mahantī nadī mahānadī, mahantaṃ bhayaṃ mahabbhayanti.
anya-e0201n0:2380_6: Ca, tasaddehi ca saddhiṃ paripuṇṇaṃ katvā dassetuṃ yujjati, mahanto ca so puriso
anya-e0201n0:2380_7: cāti mahāpuriso, mahantī ca sā nadī cāti mahānadī, mahantañca taṃ bhayañcāti mahabbhayanti.
anya-e0201n0:2380_8: Mahantasaddo vā mahā hoti, ‘ṭa ntantūna’nti suttena uttarapade pare ntassa sabbassa
anya-e0201n0:2381_0: Ettha ca dvīhi casaddehi dvinnaṃ padānaṃ sakatthanānāttaṃ dīpeti. Taṃsaddena sakatthanānāttepi
anya-e0201n0:2381_1: sakatthānaṃ adhikaraṇabhūtassa dabbatthassa ekattaṃ dīpeti. Imasmiṃ byākaraṇe visuṃ
anya-e0201n0:2381_2: rūpavidhānakiccaṃ nāma natthi, taṃtaṃsuttavidhānañca tadanurūpaṃ dassitaviggahavākyañca
anya-e0201n0:2381_3: disvā tassa tassa siddhapadassa atthabyañjanavinicchaye ñāte rūpavidhānakiccaṃ siddhaṃ
anya-e0201n0:2381_4: hoti, santo ca so puriso cāti sappuriso, setahatthī, nīluppalaṃ, lohitacandanaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:2382_0: Visadisaliṅga, vacanāpi saddā ekatthā honti, vinayo ca so pariyatti cāti vinayapariyatti,
anya-e0201n0:2382_1: vinayo ca so piṭakañcāti vinayapiṭakaṃ, avijjā ca sā paccayo cāti avijjāpaccayo,
anya-e0201n0:2382_2: avijjā ca sā nīvaraṇañcāti avijjānīvaraṇaṃ. Evaṃ itthiratanaṃ, sīlañca taṃ guṇo cāti
anya-e0201n0:2382_3: sīlaguṇo, sīlañca taṃ patiṭṭhā cāti sīlapatiṭṭhā iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:2383_0: Tathā vīsati ca sā purisā cāti vīsatipurisā, satañca taṃ purisā cāti satapurisā,
anya-e0201n0:2383_1: saṅkhārā ca te paccayo cāti saṅkhārapaccayo, aṅgā ca te janapadañcāti aṅgajanapadaṃ,
anya-e0201n0:2383_2: magadhā ca te raṭṭhañcāti magadharaṭṭhaṃ. Evaṃ kāsiraṭṭhaṃ iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:2384: Idha na hoti rū. 341; nī. 681, puṇṇo mantānīputto, citto gahapati, sakko devarājā, brahmā sahampati iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:2386: Visesanuttarapado yathā? Sāriputtatthero, buddhaghosācariyo, ācariyaguttilo vā, mahosadhapaṇḍito, purisuttamo, purisavaro, purisaviseso iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:2387_0: Visesanobhayapado yathā? Chinnañca taṃ parūḷhañcāti chinnaparūḷhaṃ, sītañca taṃ uṇhañcāti
anya-e0201n0:2387_1: sītuṇhaṃ, khañjo ca so khujjo cāti khañjakhujjo. Evaṃ andhabadhiro, katañca taṃ akatañcāti
anya-e0201n0:2387_2: katākataṃ, chiddāvachiddaṃ, chinnabhinnaṃ, sittañca taṃ sammaṭṭhañcāti sittasammaṭṭhaṃ,
anya-e0201n0:2387_3: santassa bhāvo saccaṃ, akhemaṭṭhena dukkhañca taṃ aviparītaṭṭhena saccañcāti dukkhasaccaṃ iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:2388_0: Upamānuttarapado yathā? Sīho viyāti sīho, muni ca so sīho cāti munisīho. Evaṃ munipuṅgavo,
anya-e0201n0:2388_1: buddhanāgo, buddhādicco, raṃsi viyāti raṃsi, saddhammo ca so raṃsi cāti saddhammaraṃsi.
anya-e0201n0:2389_0: Sambhāvanāpubbapado yathā? Hetu hutvā paccayo hetupaccayo. Evaṃ ārammaṇapaccayo,
anya-e0201n0:2389_1: manussabhūto, devabhūto, dhammo iti saṅkhāto dhammasaṅkhāto, dhammasammato, dhammasaññito,
anya-e0201n0:2389_2: dhammalakkhito, eva iti saṅkhāto saddo evasaddo. Evaṃ casaddo, vāsaddo, ariyabhūto
anya-e0201n0:2389_3: saṅgho ariyasaṅgho. Evaṃ buddhamuni, paccekamuni iccādi. Ettha ca sambhāvanā nāma
anya-e0201n0:2389_4: sāmaññabhūtassa uttarapadatthassa daḷhaṃ katvā thomanā sarūpavisesadīpanā, na guṇamattadīpanāti
anya-e0201n0:2389_5: adhippāyo. Garū pana “dhammo iti buddhi dhammabuddhi. Evaṃ dhammasaññā, aniccasaññā,
anya-e0201n0:2389_6: dhātusaññā, mātusaññā, pāṇasaññitā, attadiṭṭhi” iccādīnipi ettha āharanti, imāni
anya-e0201n0:2389_7: pana “saraṇaṃ iti gato upagato saraṇaṅgato”ti padaṃ viya itiluttāni paṭhamātappurisapadāni
anya-e0201n0:2390_0: Avadhāraṇapubbapado yathā? Guṇo eva dhanaṃ na maṇisuvaṇṇādīti guṇadhanaṃ. Evaṃ saddhādhanaṃ,
anya-e0201n0:2390_1: sīladhanaṃ, cakkhu eva dvāraṃ na gāmadvārādīti cakkhudvāraṃ. Evaṃ cakkhuvatthu, cakkhundriyaṃ,
anya-e0201n0:2390_2: cakkhāyatanaṃ, cakkhudhātu, khandhā eva bhārā khandhabhārā. Ettha ca yadi bharitabbaṭṭhena
anya-e0201n0:2390_3: bhārā nāma siyuṃ, pañcakkhandhā eva bhārā nāma siyuṃ, na sīsabhāra, aṃsabhārādayo.
anya-e0201n0:2390_4: Khandhā hi niccabhārā honti, itare tāvakālikā, khandhamūlikā cāti. Evaṃ atisayatthasambhāvanatthaṃ
anya-e0201n0:2390_5: khandhā eva bhārāti avadhāraṇavākyaṃ payujjati, na sīsabhārādīnaṃ sabbaso bhārabhāvapaṭikkhipanatthanti.
anya-e0201n0:2390_6: Evaṃ sabbattha, avijjā eva malaṃ na kaṃsamalādikanti avijjāmalaṃ, avijjā eva āsavo
anya-e0201n0:2390_7: na madhvāsavādikoti avijjāsavo. Evaṃ taṇhāsallaṃ, paññāsatthaṃ, paññāloko, paññāpajjoto,
anya-e0201n0:2390_8: rāgaggi, dosaggi, mohaggi iccādi. Garū pana “dhanaṃ viyāti dhanaṃ, saddhā eva ariyānaṃ
anya-e0201n0:2390_9: dhanaṃ saddhādhanaṃ, satthaṃ viyāti satthaṃ, paññā eva satthaṃ paññāsattha”nti yojenti,
anya-e0201n0:2390_10: evaṃ sati atisayasambhāvanattho na sijjhati rū. 343; nī. 702.
anya-e0201n0:2392: Ñānubandho paṭisedhamhā aññanakāra nivattanattho, nauiccetaṃ syādyantaṃ aññena syādyantena saha ekatthaṃ hoti. Iminā nañe katthasaññaṃ katvā –
anya-e0201n0:2393: 348. Ṭa naussa ka. 333; rū. 344; nī. 717; caṃ. 2.2.20; pā. 2.2.6; “nau” (bahūsu).
anya-e0201n0:2394: Uttarapade pare nauiccetassa ṭānubandho a hotīti nassa attaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:2395_0: Na brāhmaṇo abrāhmaṇo. Ettha siyā – kiṃ vijjamānassa vāyaṃ nisedho, udāhu avijjamānassa
anya-e0201n0:2395_1: vāti, kiñcettha – yadi vijjamānassa nisedho, evaṃ sati loke vijjamānā sabbe brāhmaṇā
anya-e0201n0:2395_2: abrāhmaṇā nāma bhaveyyuṃ. Tasmā “idha jano na brāhmaṇo, tattha jano na brāhmaṇo”tiādinā
anya-e0201n0:2395_3: desādiniyamaṃ vinā loke vijjamānassa brāhmaṇassa nisedho na yujjati, atha loke avijjamānassa
anya-e0201n0:2395_4: nisedho, evañca sati kiṃ avijjamānassa nisedhena nisedhanīyasseva avijjamānattāti?
anya-e0201n0:2395_5: Vuccate – taṃsadisādiatthesu tabbohārassevāyaṃ nisedho. Tathā hi brāhmaṇasadise abrāhmaṇe
anya-e0201n0:2395_6: kesañci brāhmaṇasaññā saṇṭhāti, saññānurūpañca brāhmaṇavohāro tasmiṃ pavattati, evaṃ
anya-e0201n0:2395_7: pavattassa abrāhmaṇe brāhmaṇavohārassa ayaṃ paṭisedho hoti. Yathā taṃ? Lokasmiṃ bālajanānaṃ
anya-e0201n0:2395_8: micchāsaññāvasena micchāvohāro pavattatiyeva “rūpaṃ attā, vedanā attā” iccādi, tesaṃ
anya-e0201n0:2395_9: tassa micchābhāvakhyāpanatthaṃ paṭisedho yojiyati “rūpaṃ anattā, vedanā anattā” mahāva.
anya-e0201n0:2395_10: 20 iccādi. Ettāvatā suddhabrāhmaṇasaddassapi micchāvasena taṃsadise atthe pavattisambhavo
anya-e0201n0:2395_11: siddho hoti, nakārassa ca tadatthajotakamattatā siddhā hoti, evañca sati uttarapadatthapadhānatāsaṅkhātaṃ
anya-e0201n0:2395_12: tappurisalakkhaṇampi idha na virujjhati, tasmā abrāhmaṇoti brāhmaṇasadisoti vuttaṃ
anya-e0201n0:2395_13: hoti. Esa nayo tadañña, tabbiruddha, tadabhāvatthādīsu.
anya-e0201n0:2397: Saṅkhatā dhammā asaṅkhatā dhammā dha. sa. dukamātikā 8. Ettha ca na saṅkhatā asaṅkhatā, saṅkhatadhammehi aññe dhammāti attho.
anya-e0201n0:2401: Na katvā akatvā, karaṇena sabbaso vināti attho.
anya-e0201n0:2403_0: Tattha attanā yuttapadatthaṃ pasajja laggetvā paṭisedhetīti pasajjapaṭisedho, tadabhāvamattajotako
anya-e0201n0:2403_1: nakāro, kriyāmattanisedhoti vuttaṃ hoti. Akatvā, akātuṃ, akaronto, na karoti, na kātabbaṃ iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:2404_0: Pasajjamatte aṭṭhatvā taṃsadisādike paritobhāge uggayha nisedhetabbaṃ atthaṃ asati
anya-e0201n0:2404_1: khipati chaḍḍetīti payirudāso, taṃsadisādijotako, dabbanisedhoti vuttaṃ hoti. Abrāhmaṇo
anya-e0201n0:2404_2: iccādi. Evaṃ asamaṇo, asakyaputtiyo, amitto, mittadhammavidhuroti attho.
anya-e0201n0:2407_0: Na ariyo anariyo, ariyadhammavimukhoti attho. Na āvāso anāvāso, na issaro anissaro.
anya-e0201n0:2407_1: Na īti anīti, ‘ītī’ti upaddavo, na yutto upāyo anupāyo, na ūmi anūmi, na yuttā esanā
anya-e0201n0:2407_2: anesanā, na yutto okāso anokāso, na atikkamma anatikkamma, anādāya, anoloketvā iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:2408_0: Bahulādhikārā ayuttatthānampi samāso hoti ka. 336; rū. 347; nī. 689, puna na gāyitabbāti
anya-e0201n0:2408_1: apunageyyā, gāthā, candaṃ na ullokentīti acandamullokikāni, mukhāni, sūriyaṃ na passantīti
anya-e0201n0:2408_2: asūriyapassā, rājakaññā, saddhaṃ na bhuñjati sīlenāti asaddhabhojī. Evaṃ alavaṇabhojī,
anya-e0201n0:2408_3: atthaṃ na kāmentīti anatthakāmā. Evaṃ ahitakāmā, okāsaṃ na kāresīti anokāsaṃkāretvā.
anya-e0201n0:2408_4: Evaṃ animittaṃkatvā, mūlamūlaṃ na gacchatīti amūlamūlaṃgantvā iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:2409_0: “Puna gāyitabbāti punageyyā, na punageyyā apunageyyā. Atthaṃ kāmentīti atthakāmā,
anya-e0201n0:2409_1: na atthakāmā anatthakāmā. Atha vā na attho anattho, anatthaṃ kāmentīti anatthakāmā”
anya-e0201n0:2409_2: iccādinā vākye yojite pana yuttasamāsā honti. Garū pana “atthaṃ na kāmenti anatthameva
anya-e0201n0:2409_3: kāmentīti anatthakāmā, hitaṃ na kāmenti ahitameva kāmentīti ahitakāmā, phāsuṃ na
anya-e0201n0:2409_4: kāmenti aphāsumeva kāmentīti aphāsukāmā”ti yojesuṃ, dvādhippāyapadaṃ nāmetaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:2410: Kunipātapubbapade niccasamāsattā aññapadena viggaho, khuddakā nadī kunnadī, khuddako sombho kusombho, khuddakaṃ vanaṃ kubbanaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:2411: 350. Sare kada kussuttaratthe ka. 335; rū. 346; nī. 719.
anya-e0201n0:2412: Sarādike uttarapade pare uttarapadatthe vattamānassa kunipātassa kadi hoti.
anya-e0201n0:2413: Kucchitaṃ annaṃ kadannaṃ, kucchitaṃ asanaṃ kadasanaṃ, kucchito ariyo kadariyo, maccharī.
anya-e0201n0:2415: Uttarattheti kiṃ? Kucchito oṭṭho yassāti kuoṭṭho.
anya-e0201n0:2417: Uttarapade pare uttarapadatthe ṭhitassa appatthe vattamānassa kunipātassa kā hoti vā.
anya-e0201n0:2419_0: Pādipubbapado ca niccasamāsova, pakaṭṭhaṃ vacanaṃ pāvacanaṃ, dīghattaṃ, pakaṭṭhaṃ
anya-e0201n0:2419_1: hutvā nītaṃ paṇītaṃ, pamukhaṃ hutvā dhānaṃ padhānaṃ. Evaṃ paṭṭhānaṃ, vividhā mati
anya-e0201n0:2419_2: vimati, adhiko devo adhidevo, atireko viseso vā dhammo abhidhammo, sundaro gandho
anya-e0201n0:2419_3: sugandho, kucchito gandho duggandho. Sobhaṇaṃ kataṃ sukataṃ, kucchitaṃ kataṃ dukkaṭaṃ,
anya-e0201n0:2419_4: viparīto patho uppatho. Evaṃ ummaggo, uddhammo, ubbinayoiccādi.
anya-e0201n0:2424: Dve gāvo digu, saṅkhyāpubbattena napuṃsakekattena ca digusaddasadisattā sabbo cāyaṃ samāso digūti vuccati.
anya-e0201n0:2426: Samāhārekatthe saṅkhyāpubbakaṃ ekatthaṃ napuṃsakaṃ hoti, samāhāravacaneneva ekattañca siddhaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:2427_0: Dve gāvo digu, ‘gossū’ti suttena ossa uttaṃ, tayo lokā tilokaṃ, tayo lokā ñāṇasmiṃ
anya-e0201n0:2427_1: samāhaṭā sampiṇḍitāti tilokaṃ, tiṇṇaṃ lokānaṃ samāhāroti tilokaṃ, tayo ca te lokā
anya-e0201n0:2427_2: cāti tilokaṃ. Evaṃ tibhavaṃ, tipurisaṃ, tīṇi malāni timalaṃ, tiratanaṃ, tisso saññāyotisaññaṃ,
anya-e0201n0:2427_3: ‘syādīsu rasso’ti rassattaṃ. Cattāro pathā catuppathaṃ, cattāri saccāni catusaccaṃ,
anya-e0201n0:2427_4: catasso disā catuddisaṃ. Evaṃ pañcasikkhāpadaṃ, saḷāyatanaṃ, sattāhaṃ, aṭṭhapadaṃ,
anya-e0201n0:2428: Imasmiṃ samāhāradigumhi sabbaṃ napuṃsakameva rassantameva ekavacanantameva cāti.
anya-e0201n0:2429: Asamāhāradigu rū. 350 nī. 703 yathā? Eko puggalo ekapuggalo, tayo bhavā tibhavā, catasso disā catuddisā iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:2430_0: Saṅkhyāṭhāne pana ka. 392; rū. 418; nī. 831 dve satāni dvisataṃ. Evaṃ tisataṃ, catusataṃ,
anya-e0201n0:2430_1: pañcasataṃ, chasataṃ, sattasataṃ, aṭṭhasataṃ, navasataṃ, dasasataṃ, dvisahassaṃ,
anya-e0201n0:2431_0: Dve satasahassāni dvisatasahassaṃ. Evaṃ “tisatasahassaṃ, catusatasahassaṃ, pañcasatasahassa”nti
anya-e0201n0:2431_1: vā “dvisatāni, dve satāni, tisatāni, tīṇi satāni, catusatāni, cattāri satāni, dvisahassāni,
anya-e0201n0:2431_2: dve sahassāni, tisahassāni, tīṇi sahassāni, dvisatasahassāni, dve satasahassānī”ti
anya-e0201n0:2431_3: vā evaṃ vacanadvayañca vākyañca veditabbaṃ. Evaṃ satasahassepīti.
anya-e0201n0:2432: Ettha siyā – digu nāma saṅkhyāpubbameva siyā, imesu ca sabbaṃ saṅkhyāpadameva hotīti? Digumhi pubbaṃ saṅkhyāpadameva siyā, parapadaṃ pana saṅkhyāpadampi aññampi yujjatīti.
anya-e0201n0:2436_0: Bahavo vīhayo yasmiṃ dese soyaṃ bahubbīhi, tādiso gāmo vā deso vā janapado vā, bahubbīhisaddasadisattā
anya-e0201n0:2436_1: sabbo cāyaṃ samāso bahubbīhīti vuccati. Yathā hi bahubbīhisaddo samāsapadatthe atikkamma
anya-e0201n0:2436_2: gāma, desa, janapadaiccādīnaṃ aññesaṃ padānaṃ atthesu tiṭṭhati, tathā ayaṃ samāsopi.
anya-e0201n0:2437: So saṅkhepena duvidho tagguṇasaṃviññāṇo, atagguṇasaṃviññāṇo cāti.
anya-e0201n0:2438_0: Tattha ‘guṇo’ti appadhānabhūto samāsapadānaṃ attho, so aññapadatthassa visesanabhūtattā
anya-e0201n0:2438_1: tassa aññapadatthassa guṇoti atthena tagguṇoti vuccati, viññātabboti viññāṇo, aññapadattho,
anya-e0201n0:2438_2: tagguṇaṃ amuñcitvā tagguṇena saheva viññāṇo aññapadattho yasminti tagguṇasaṃviññāṇo,
anya-e0201n0:2438_3: na tagguṇasaṃviññāṇo atagguṇasaṃviññāṇo, yattha samāsapadattho avayavabhāvena vā
anya-e0201n0:2438_4: sahavidheyyabhāvena vā aññapadatthe antogadho hoti, so tagguṇasaṃviññāṇo. Yathā?
anya-e0201n0:2438_5: Chinnahattho puriso, buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa bhattaṃ deti, saputtadāro
anya-e0201n0:2439_0: Ettha ca ‘buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa bhattaṃ detī’ti bhikkhusaṅghassa ca
anya-e0201n0:2439_1: bhattaṃ deti, pamukhabhūtassa buddhassa ca bhattaṃ detīti attho. ‘Saputtadāro āgato’ti
anya-e0201n0:2439_2: puttadārā ca āgatā, puriso ca āgatoti attho. ‘Pādayo upasaggā nāmā’ti pa-kāro ca
anya-e0201n0:2439_3: upasaggo nāma, parādayo ca upasaggā nāmāti attho. Evaṃ yojanārahatā aññapadatthena
anya-e0201n0:2440: Atagguṇasaṃviññāṇo yathā? Dinnasuṅko rājā dānaṃ deti, pabbatādīni khettāni kassati iccādi. Imesu pana samāsapadattho avidheyyo, aññapadattho eva vidheyyo.
anya-e0201n0:2442: Paṭhamābahubbīhi, dutiyābahubbīhi, tatiyābahubbīhi, catutthībahubbīhi, pañcamībahubbīhi, chaṭṭhībahubbīhi, sattamībahubbīhi cāti sattavidho.
anya-e0201n0:2443: Tattha paṭhamābahubbīhi sahapubbapada, upamānapubbapada, saṅkhyobhayapada, disantarāḷattha, byatihāralakkhaṇavasena pañcavidho.
anya-e0201n0:2446: Anekaṃ syādyantapadaṃ aññapadassa atthe vikappena ekatthaṃ hoti.
anya-e0201n0:2447: Saha vitakkenāti savitakko, vitakkena saha yo vattatīti vā savitakko, samādhi.
anya-e0201n0:2448_0: Ettha ca ‘saha vitakkenā’ti ettha paṭhamāvibhattiyā atthabhūto aññapadattho vākyasāmatthiyena
anya-e0201n0:2448_1: sijjhati. Na hi kriyākārakarahitaṃ vākyaṃ nāma sambhavati, iminā suttena sahapada,
anya-e0201n0:2448_2: vitakkapadānaṃ samādhisaṅkhātena aññapadatthena ekatthībhāvo hoti, ekatthībhāve ca
anya-e0201n0:2448_3: honte vākye ṭhitānaṃ aññapadānaṃ vibhattīnañca sabbe atthā ekatthabhūtena samāsena
anya-e0201n0:2448_4: vuttā nāma honti, aññapadāni ca vibhattiyo ca vuttatthā nāma, vuttatthānañca attharahitattā
anya-e0201n0:2448_5: payogakiccaṃ natthi, tasmā ‘ekatthatāya’nti suttena vibhattīnaṃ lopo, evaṃ sabbasamāsesu
anya-e0201n0:2448_6: vākyedissamānānaṃ ya, ta, eta, ima, iti, eva, iva, viya, ca, vāiccādīnaṃ aññapadānaṃ
anya-e0201n0:2448_7: mahāvuttisuttena lopo, vibhattīnañca lope sati sarantānaṃ byañjanantānañca samāsapadānaṃ
anya-e0201n0:2448_8: sayameva pakatibhāvo, idha pana ‘sahassa soññatthe’ti suttena sahasaddassa sattaṃ,
anya-e0201n0:2448_9: tato syādyuppatti, savitakko samādhi, savitakkā samādhayo, savitakkā paññā, savitakkā
anya-e0201n0:2448_10: paññāyo, savitakkaṃ jhānaṃ, savitakkāni jhānāni iccādinā sabbaliṅga, vibhatti, vacanehi
anya-e0201n0:2449_0: Upamānapubbapado yathā? Kāyabyāmānaṃ samapamāṇattā nigrodho iva parimaṇḍalo nigrodhaparimaṇḍalo,
anya-e0201n0:2449_1: nigrodho iva vā parimaṇḍalo yo hotīti so nigrodhaparimaṇḍalo, rājakumāro, saṅkho
anya-e0201n0:2449_2: iva paṇḍaro saṅkhapaṇḍaro, kāko iva sūro kākasūro, sattānaṃ paññācakkhupaṭilābhakaraṇena
anya-e0201n0:2449_3: tesaṃ cakkhu viya bhūtoti cakkhubhūto, lokuttaradhammapaṭilābhakaraṇena tesaṃ dhammo
anya-e0201n0:2449_4: viya bhūtoti dhammabhūto, niccasommahadayatāya brahmā viya bhūtoti brahmabhūto, andho
anya-e0201n0:2450_0: Saṅkhyobhayapado yathā? Dve vā tayo vā pattā dvittippattā, idha vāsaddāyeva aññapadāni
anya-e0201n0:2450_1: nāma, aniyamabhūto tesaṃ attho aññapadattho nāma. Dvīhaṃ vā tīhaṃ vā dvīhatīhaṃ,
anya-e0201n0:2450_2: cha vā pañca vā vācā chappañcavācā. Evaṃ sattaṭṭhamāsā, ekayojanadviyojanāni iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:2451_0: Disantarāḷattho yathā? Dakkhiṇassā ca pubbassā ca yadantarāḷaṃ hoti sā dakkhiṇapubbā.
anya-e0201n0:2451_1: Evaṃ pubbuttarā, pacchimuttarā, aparadakkhiṇā, mahāvuttinā pubbapade rassattaṃ. Dakkhiṇā
anya-e0201n0:2451_2: ca sā pubbā cāti dakkhiṇapubbā iccādinā kammadhārayopi yujjati.
anya-e0201n0:2453: 354. Tattha gahetvā tena paharitvā yuddhe sarūpaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:2454: Sattamyantaṃ tatiyantañca samānarūpaṃ syādyantapadaṃ tattha gahetvā tena paharitvā yuddhe aññapadatthe ekatthaṃ hoti vā.
anya-e0201n0:2456: Aññapadatthavisaye kriyābyatihāre gamyamāne padante ṅānubandho ipaccayo hoti, ettha ikāro rasso eva.
anya-e0201n0:2458: Vipaccayante uttarapade pare pubbapadantassa āttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0201n0:2459: Kesesu ca kesesu ca gahetvā idaṃ yuddhaṃ pavattatīti kesākesi, daṇḍehi ca daṇḍehi ca paharitvā idaṃ yuddhaṃ pavattatīti daṇḍādaṇḍi. Evaṃ muṭṭhāmuṭṭhi, musalāmusali.
anya-e0201n0:2462: Āgatā samaṇā imaṃ saṅghārāmaṃ soyaṃ āgatasamaṇo, saṅghārāmo. Ettha ca samāsapadassa attho duvidho vāccattho, abhidheyyattho cāti.
anya-e0201n0:2463: Tattha saṅghārāmassa samaṇehi pattabbabhāvasaṅkhātā kammasatti vāccattho nāma, sattimantabhūto saṅghārāmo abhidheyyattho nāma.
anya-e0201n0:2464_0: Tattha āgatasamaṇasaddo vāccatthameva ujuṃ vadati, na abhidheyyatthaṃ, āgatasamaṇoti
anya-e0201n0:2464_1: sutvā samaṇehi pattabbabhāvamattaṃ jānāti, saṅghārāmadabbaṃ na jānātīti vuttaṃ hoti,
anya-e0201n0:2464_2: tasmā tassaṃ abhidheyyattho aññena saṅghārāmasaddena ācikkhiyati, vāccatthassa pana
anya-e0201n0:2464_3: tena ujuṃ vuttattā puna vattabbābhāvato dutiyāvibhattiyā ācikkhanakiccaṃ natthi,
anya-e0201n0:2464_4: tasmā saṅghārāmapade dutiyāvibhattisambhavo natthi, liṅgatthamattavisayā paṭhamāvibhatti
anya-e0201n0:2464_5: eva pavattati, puna padantarasambandhe sati “saṅghārāmaṃ passati āgatasamaṇaṃ, saṅghārāmena
anya-e0201n0:2464_6: gāmo sobhati āgatasamaṇena, saṅghārāmassa pūjeti āgatasamaṇassā”tiādinā tato sabbā
anya-e0201n0:2464_7: vibhattiyo pavattanti. Esa nayo sabbesu vācakapadesu netabboti.
anya-e0201n0:2465_0: Āgatasamaṇā sāvatthi, āgatasamaṇaṃ jetavanaṃ, āgacchanti samaṇā imanti vā āgatasamaṇo,
anya-e0201n0:2465_1: vihāro. Ārūḷhā vānarā imaṃ rukkhanti ārūḷhavānaro, rukkho. Sampattā gāmikā yaṃ gāmanti
anya-e0201n0:2468_0: Jitāni indriyāni yenāti jitindriyo, samaṇo. Diṭṭho catusaccadhammo yenāti diṭṭhadhammo.
anya-e0201n0:2468_1: Evaṃ pattadhammo, viditadhammo, pariyogāḷhadhammo, katāni catumaggakiccāni yenāti
anya-e0201n0:2468_2: katakicco, bahuvacane sati katāni kiccāni yehi te katakiccā, arahanto. Dhammena adhigatā
anya-e0201n0:2468_3: bhogā yenāti dhammādhigatabhogo, puriso. Evaṃ adhammādhigatabhogo. Evaṃ kattari.
anya-e0201n0:2468_4: Karaṇe pana chinno rukkho yenāti chinnarukkho, pharasu iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:2471_0: Dinno suṅko yassa rañño soyaṃ dinnasuṅko, upanītaṃ bhojanaṃ yassāti upanītabhojano,
anya-e0201n0:2471_1: natthi tulo etassāti atulo, ‘ṭa nañssā’ti na-kārassa ṭattaṃ, natthi paṭipuggalo yassāti
anya-e0201n0:2471_2: appaṭipuggalo, natthi sīlaṃ assāti dussīlo, natthi paṭisandhipaññā assāti duppañño,
anya-e0201n0:2471_3: ‘ghapassantassāppadhānassā’ti suttena ghasaññassa āssa rassattaṃ. Natthi sīlaṃ assāti
anya-e0201n0:2471_4: nissīlo, nippañño, apañño, virūpaṃ mukhaṃ assāti dummukho. Evaṃ dummano, dubbaṇṇo,
anya-e0201n0:2471_5: natthi attano uttaro adhiko yassāti anuttaro, ‘ana sare’ti suttena nassa ana.
anya-e0201n0:2472_0: Idha bāhiratthabahubbīhi nāma vuccati, sattāhaṃ parinibbutassa assāti sattāhaparinibbuto,
anya-e0201n0:2472_1: aciraṃ parinibbutassa assāti aciraparinibbuto, māso jātassa assāti māsajāto, dvemāsajāto,
anya-e0201n0:2472_2: eko māso abhisittassa assa raññoti ekamāsābhisitto, ekāhaṃ matassa assāti ekāhamataṃ.
anya-e0201n0:2472_3: Evaṃ dvīhamataṃ, tīhamataṃ, ekāhaṃ paṭicchannāya assāti ekāhappaṭicchannā. Evaṃ dvīhappaṭicchannā,
anya-e0201n0:2472_4: āpatti. Yojanaṃ gatassa assāti yojanagato, dviyojanagato iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:2475: Niggatā janā asmā gāmāti niggatajano, apagataṃ kāḷakaṃ itoti apagatakāḷako, paṭo. Apagatakāḷakaṃ, vatthaṃ. Apetaṃ viññāṇaṃ yamhāti apetaviññāṇaṃ, matasarīraṃ iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:2478_0: Chinno hattho yassa soti chinnahattho, hatthacchinno, jāto chando yassāti jātachando,
anya-e0201n0:2478_1: chandajāto, sañjātaṃ pītisomanassaṃ yassāti sañjātapītisomanasso, pītisomanassasañjāto,
anya-e0201n0:2478_2: visuddhaṃ sīlaṃ yassāti visuddhasīlo, sīlavisuddho, mahanto kāyo yassāti mahākāyo.
anya-e0201n0:2479_0: Idha upamānapubbapado nāma vuccati, suvaṇṇassa viya vaṇṇo yassāti suvaṇṇavaṇṇo, brahmuno
anya-e0201n0:2479_1: viya saro yassāti brahmassaro, nāgassa viya gati assāti nāgagati. Evaṃ sīhagati,
anya-e0201n0:2479_2: nāgavikkamo, sīhavikkamo, sīhassa viya hanu assāti sīhahanu, eṇissa viya jaṅghā yassāti
anya-e0201n0:2479_3: eṇijaṅgho, usabhassa viya assa khandhoti usabhakkhandho iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:2480_0: Rūpaṃ vuccati sabhāvo, yādisaṃ rūpaṃ assāti yathārūpaṃ. Evaṃ tathārūpaṃ, evaṃ rūpaṃ
anya-e0201n0:2480_1: assāti evarūpaṃ, bindulopo. Evaṃ ādi assāti evamādi. Tathā iccādi, iccevamādi, īdisaṃ
anya-e0201n0:2480_2: nāmaṃ yassāti itthannāmo, evaṃnāmo, kīdisaṃ nāmaṃ yassāti kinnāmo, ‘konāmo’ti ettha
anya-e0201n0:2481_0: Ko samudayo yassa dhammassāti kiṃsamudayo, kā jāti yassāti kiṃjātiko, kiṃnidānaṃ
anya-e0201n0:2481_1: yassāti kiṃnidāno, kati vassāni yassāti kativasso, ko attho assāti kimatthaṃ, vacanaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:2481_2: ‘Kvattho’ti mahāvuttinā kiṃsaddassa kottaṃ, yādiso attho assāti yadattho, tādiso
anya-e0201n0:2481_3: attho assāti tadattho, ediso attho yassa vinayassāti etadattho, vinayo. Etadatthā,
anya-e0201n0:2484_0: Sampannāni sassāni yasmiṃ janapade soyaṃ sampannasasso, sulabhā bhikkhā yasmiṃ janapade
anya-e0201n0:2484_1: soyaṃ subhikkho, dullabhā bhikkhā yasminti dubbhikkho, bahavo gāmā asmiṃ janapadeti
anya-e0201n0:2484_2: bahugāmo. Evaṃ bahujano, gāmo. Natthi gāmakhettaṃ yasmiṃ araññe tayidaṃ agāmakaṃ,
anya-e0201n0:2484_3: samāsante ko. Saṃvijjanti manussā yasmiṃ gāme samanusso, na vijjanti manussā yasmiṃ
anya-e0201n0:2487_0: Bhinnādhikaraṇabahubbīhi nāma vuccati, ekarattiṃ vāso assāti ekarattivāso, samānena
anya-e0201n0:2487_1: janena saddhiṃ vāso assāti samānavāso, ubhato kammato uppannaṃ byañjanadvayaṃ assāti
anya-e0201n0:2487_2: ubhatobyañjano, aluttasamāso. Evaṃ kaṇṭhasmiṃ kāḷo assāti kaṇṭhekāḷo, urasmiṃ lomāni
anya-e0201n0:2487_3: assāti urasilomo, yassa hatthe patto atthīti pattahattho. Evaṃ asihattho, daṇḍahattho,
anya-e0201n0:2487_4: chattaṃ pāṇimhi assāti chattapāṇi. Evaṃ satthapāṇi, daṇḍapāṇi, vajirapāṇi, dāne ajjhāsayo
anya-e0201n0:2487_5: assāti dānajjhāsayo, dānādhimuttiko, buddhesu bhatti assāti buddhabhattiko, buddhe
anya-e0201n0:2489_0: Tipadabahubbīhi nāma vuccati, parakkamena adhigatā sampadā yehi te parakkamādhigatasampadā,
anya-e0201n0:2489_1: dhammena adhigatā bhogā yehi te dhammādhigatabhogā, oṇīto pattamhā pāṇi yena so oṇītapattapāṇi,
anya-e0201n0:2489_2: sīhassa pubbaddhaṃ viya kāyo assāti sīhapubbaddhakāyo, mattā bahavo mātaṅgā yasmiṃ
anya-e0201n0:2493: Dve ca dve ca padāni dvandā, dve ca dve ca atthā vā dvandā, mahāvuttinā dvinnaṃ dvisaddānaṃ dvandādeso. Dvandasaddasadisattā sabbo cāyaṃ samāso dvandoti vuccati.
anya-e0201n0:2494_0: Atha vā dve avayavā andiyanti bandhiyanti etthāti dvando, yugaḷassetaṃ nāmaṃ “pādadvandaṃ
anya-e0201n0:2494_1: munindassa, vandāmi sirasāmaha”nti ettha viya, idha pana padayugaḷaṃ atthayugaḷañca
anya-e0201n0:2495_0: Ettha siyā – yadi ubhayapadatthappadhāno dvando, evañca sati dvande kathaṃ ekatthībhāvalakkhaṇaṃ
anya-e0201n0:2495_1: siyāti? Vuccate – abhinnavidheyyatthattā. Vacanapathañhi patvā kattubhāvakammabhāvādiko
anya-e0201n0:2495_2: vidheyyattho eva padānaṃ accantappadhānattho hoti vacanavākyasampattiyā padhānaṅgattā,
anya-e0201n0:2495_3: so ca vidheyyattho dvandepi abhinno eva hoti. Tathā hi “sāriputtamoggallānā gacchanti,
anya-e0201n0:2495_4: sāriputtamoggallāne passati” iccādīsu dve atthā ekavibhattiyā visayā hutvā ekakattu,
anya-e0201n0:2495_5: ekakammādibhāvena ekattaṃ gacchanti, evaṃ dvandepi dvinnaṃ tiṇṇaṃ bahunnaṃ vā padānaṃ
anya-e0201n0:2497: Anekaṃ syādyantapadaṃ casaddassa atthe ekatthaṃ hoti vā.
anya-e0201n0:2498: Ettha ca samuccayo, anvācayo, itarītarayogo, samāhāroti cattāro casaddatthā honti.
anya-e0201n0:2499_0: Tattha samuccayo yathā? Cīvarañca piṇḍapātañca senāsanañca detīti. Anvācayo yathā?
anya-e0201n0:2499_1: Dānañca deti, sīlañca rakkhatīti. Ime dve casaddatthā vākyadvande eva labbhanti,
anya-e0201n0:2499_2: na samāsadvande padānaṃ aññamaññaṃ nirapekkhattāti vadanti. Taṃ anvācaye yujjati
anya-e0201n0:2499_3: nānākriyāpekkhattā, samuccaye pana “cīvarañca piṇḍapātañca senāsanañca detī”ti vā
anya-e0201n0:2499_4: “cīvarapiṇḍapātasenāsanāni detī”ti vā evaṃ dvidhāpi yojetuṃ yujjatiyeva “lābhī hoti
anya-e0201n0:2499_6: Anvācayopi vā samāsadvande no na labbhati “mālāgandhavilepanadhāraṇamaṇḍanavibhūsanaṭṭhānā”ti
anya-e0201n0:2499_7: dī. ni. 1.10 pāḷidassanato. Evaṃ pana yujjeyya – casaddattho ekakriya, nānākriyāpekkhanabhedena
anya-e0201n0:2499_8: duvidho hoti samuccayo, anvācayo cāti, tesu ca ekeko avayavappadhāna, samudāyappadhānabhedena
anya-e0201n0:2499_9: duvidho hoti itarītarayogo, samāhāro cāti. Tattha itarītarayoge avayavappadhānattā
anya-e0201n0:2500_0: Dvande paṇītataraṃ pubbe nipatati. Sāriputto ca moggallāno ca sāriputtamoggallānā,
anya-e0201n0:2500_1: sāriputtamoggallāne, sāriputtamoggallānehi iccādi. Evaṃ samaṇabrāhmaṇā, brāhmaṇagahapatikā,
anya-e0201n0:2501: Appakkhara, bahvakkharesu appakkharaṃ kvaci pubbaṃ hoti, gāmanigamā, gāmajanapadā iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:2502: Kvaci ivaṇṇu’vaṇṇantā pubbe honti, aggi ca dhūmo ca aggidhūmā, rattidivā, dhātuliṅgāni.
anya-e0201n0:2503: Avaṇṇantesu sarādipadaṃ pubbaṃ hoti, attho ca dhammo ca atthadhammā, dhammatthā vā iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:2504: Ayañca niyamo dvipadadvandesu yebhuyyena labbhati, bahupadadvandesu na labbhati.
anya-e0201n0:2507_0: Catthe samāhāre ekatthapadaṃ napuṃsakaṃ hoti, ekavacanantattaṃ pana samāhāravacaneneva
anya-e0201n0:2507_1: siddhaṃ, ayañca samāhāro pāṇyaṅgādīnaṃ dvandesu niccaṃ labbhati, rukkhatiṇādīnaṃ
anya-e0201n0:2509_0: Cakkhu ca sotañca cakkhusotaṃ, mukhañca nāsikā ca mukhanāsikaṃ, ‘syādīsu rasso’ti
anya-e0201n0:2509_1: rassattaṃ. Hanu ca gīvā ca hanugīvaṃ. Evaṃ kaṇṇanāsaṃ, chavi ca maṃsañca lohitañca
anya-e0201n0:2509_2: chavimaṃsalohitaṃ, nāmañca rūpañca nāmarūpaṃ, jarā ca maraṇañca jarāmaraṇaṃ. Bahulādhikārā
anya-e0201n0:2509_3: kvaci vikapparūpampi dissati, hatthā ca pādā ca hatthapādaṃ, hatthapādā vā iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:2511: Naccañca gītañca vāditañca naccagītavāditaṃ. Evaṃ sammatāḷaṃ, ‘samma’nti kaṃsatāḷaṃ, ‘tāḷa’nti hatthatāḷaṃ, saṅkho ca paṇavo ca ḍiṇḍimo ca saṅkhapaṇavaḍiṇḍimaṃ iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:2513: Phālo ca pācanañca phālapācanaṃ, yugañca naṅgalañca yuganaṅgalaṃ iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:2515: Hatthino ca assā ca hatthiassaṃ. Evaṃ rathapattikaṃ, asi ca cammañca asicammaṃ. ‘Camma’nti saraparittāṇaphalakaṃ, dhanu ca kalāpo ca dhanukalāpaṃ iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:2517: Ḍaṃsā ca makasā ca ḍaṃsamakasaṃ. Evaṃ kunthakipillikaṃ su. ni. 607, kīṭapaṭaṅgaṃ iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:2519: Ahi ca nakulo ca ahinakulaṃ, biḷāro ca mūsikā ca biḷāramūsikaṃ, rassattaṃ. Kākolūkaṃ, sappamaṇḍūkaṃ, nāgasupaṇṇaṃ iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:2521_0: Sīlañca paññāṇañca sīlapaññāṇaṃ, samatho ca vipassanā ca samathavipassanaṃ, vijjā
anya-e0201n0:2521_1: ca caraṇañca vijjācaraṇaṃ. Evaṃ satisampajaññaṃ, hiriottappaṃ, uddhaccakukkuccaṃ,
anya-e0201n0:2523: Kusalākusalaṃ, sāvajjānavajjaṃ, kaṇhasukkaṃ, hīnapaṇītaṃ, chekabālaṃ iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:2525: Dīgho ca majjhimo ca dīghamajjhimaṃ, aṅguttarasaṃyuttakaṃ, khandhakavibhaṅgaṃ iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:2529: Orabbhikā ca sūkarikā ca orabbhikasūkarikaṃ. Evaṃ sākuṇikamāgavikaṃ, sapākacaṇḍālaṃ, venarathakāraṃ, pukkusachavaḍāhakaṃ iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:2533: Pubbā ca aparā ca pubbāparaṃ. Evaṃ dakkhiṇuttaraṃ, pubbadakkhiṇaṃ, pubbuttaraṃ, aparadakkhiṇaṃ, aparuttaraṃ.
anya-e0201n0:2535: Gaṅgāyamunaṃ, mahisarabhu, sabbattha napuṃsakattā ante dīghānaṃ rassattaṃ sattasu vibhattīsu ekavacanantañca.
anya-e0201n0:2538: Usīrāni ca bīraṇāni ca usīrabīraṇaṃ, usīrabīraṇā. Evaṃ muñjapabbajaṃ, muñjapabbajā, kāsakusaṃ, kāsakusā.
anya-e0201n0:2540_0: Khadiro ca palāso ca khadirapalāsaṃ, khadirapalāsā, dhavo ca assakaṇṇo ca dhavassakaṇṇaṃ,
anya-e0201n0:2542_0: Gajā ca gavajā ca gajagavajaṃ, gajagavajā, gomahisaṃ, gomahisā, eṇeyyavarāhaṃ, eṇeyyavarāhā,
anya-e0201n0:2542_1: ajeḷakaṃ, ajeḷakā, kukkuṭasūkaraṃ, kukkuṭasūkarā, hatthigavassavaḷavaṃ, hatthigavassavaḷavā.
anya-e0201n0:2544: Haṃsabilavaṃ, haṃsabilavā, kāraṇḍavacakkavākaṃ, kāraṇḍavacakkavākā, bakabalākaṃ, bakabalākā.
anya-e0201n0:2546: Hiraññasuvaṇṇaṃ, hiraññasuvaṇṇā, maṇi ca saṅkho ca muttā ca veḷuriyañca maṇisaṅkhamuttaveḷuriyaṃ, maṇisaṅkhamuttaveḷuriyā, jātarūparajataṃ, jātarūparajatā.
anya-e0201n0:2548: Sāliyavaṃ, sāliyavā, tilamuggamāsaṃ, tilamuggamāsā, nipphāvakulatthaṃ, nipphāvakulatthā.
anya-e0201n0:2550: Macchamaṃsaṃ, macchamaṃsā, sākasūpaṃ, sākasūpā, gabyamāhisaṃ, gabyamāhisā, eṇeyyavārāhaṃ, eṇeyyavārāhā, migamāyūraṃ, migamāyūrā.
anya-e0201n0:2552: Kāsikosalaṃ, kāsikosalā, vajjimallaṃ, vajjimallā, cetavaṃsaṃ, cetavaṃsā, majjhañca sūrasenañca majjhasūrasenaṃ, majjhasūrasenā, kurupañcālaṃ, kurupañcālā.
anya-e0201n0:2556: Idāni pubbe vuttāni avuttāni ca chasu samāsesu visesavidhānāni vuccante.
anya-e0201n0:2557: Napuṃsakekattaṃ, samāsantarasso, pumbhāvātideso, samāsante ka, samāsante a, nānādeso, abyayo, saṅkhyā.
anya-e0201n0:2559: Tattha sabbo abyayībhāvo napuṃsakaliṅgo eva, samāhārabhūtā digu, dvandā napuṃsakā ca ekattasaṅkhyā ca.
anya-e0201n0:2560: 359. Kvacekattañca chaṭṭhiyā ka. 327; rū. 351; nī. 704; caṃ. 2.2.69-73; pā. 2.4.22-25.
anya-e0201n0:2562_0: Chāyā, sabhāsvevāyaṃ vidhi, salabhānaṃ chāyā salabhacchāyaṃ …sabhacchāyaṃ (mūlapāṭhe).
anya-e0201n0:2562_1: Evaṃ sakaṭacchāyaṃ, gharacchāyaṃ. Idha na hoti, rukkhacchāyā, pabbatacchāyā. Sabhāsadde
anya-e0201n0:2562_2: amanussasabhāsvevāyaṃ vidhi, brahmūnaṃ sabhā brahmasabhaṃ. Evaṃ devasabhaṃ, indasabhaṃ,
anya-e0201n0:2562_3: yakkhasabhaṃ, rakkhasasataṃ. Manussasabhāsu natthi, khattiyasabhā, rājasabhā iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:2566: ‘Syādīsu rasso’ti suttena abyayībhāva, samāhāradigu, dvandānaṃ kassaci tappurisassa ca syādīsu rasso.
anya-e0201n0:2575: 360. Ghapassantassāppadhānassa ka. 403; rū. 354; nī. 858; caṃ. 2.2.86; pā. 1.2.48.
anya-e0201n0:2576: Syādīsu antabhūtassa appadhānabhūtassa ca ghapassa rasso hoti.
anya-e0201n0:2578: Bahukañño, poso, bahuitthi, kulaṃ, bahuvadhu, kulaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:2584: Syādīsu antabhūtassa appadhānabhūtassa ca gossa u hoti.
anya-e0201n0:2590: 362. Itthiyaṃ bhāsitapumitthī pumāvekatthe ka. 331; rū. 353; nī. 714; caṃ. 5.2.29; pā. 6.3.34.
anya-e0201n0:2591_0: ‘Ekatthe’ti tulyādhikaraṇe, itthiyaṃ vattamāne ekatthe uttarapade pare kadāci bhāsitapumo
anya-e0201n0:2591_1: itthiliṅgasaddo pumā iva hoti. Caturaṅgamidaṃ vidhānaṃ, pubbapadaṃ itthiliṅgañca
anya-e0201n0:2591_2: bhāsitapumañca siyā, parapadaṃ niyatitthiliṅgañca pubbapadena ekatthañca siyāti.
anya-e0201n0:2592: Dīghā jaṅghā yassa so dīghajaṅgho, puriso, dīghajaṅghā, itthī, dīghajaṅghaṃ, kulaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:2593_0: Ettha ca ye saddā katthaci pulliṅgarūpā honti, katthaci itthipaccayayuttā itthiliṅgarūpā,
anya-e0201n0:2593_1: te bhāsitapumā nāma. Dīgho maggo, dīghā ratti, gato puriso, gatā itthī, kumāro, kumārī,
anya-e0201n0:2594_0: Ye pana itthipaccayayuttā niccaṃ itthiliṅgarūpā honti, te bhāsitapumā nāma na honti,
anya-e0201n0:2594_1: kaññā, paññā, saddhā, nadī, itthī, pathavī iccādi. Tathā sabhāvaitthiliṅgāpi niyatapunnapuṃsakaliṅgāpi
anya-e0201n0:2594_2: bhāsitapumā na honti, devatā, ratti, dhenu, vadhū, sakko, devo, brahmā, ratanaṃ, saraṇaṃ iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:2595_0: Idha pana dīghasaddo “dīgho bālāna saṃsāro”ti dha. pa. 60 ādīsu bhāsitapumo, so visesyaliṅgānugatavasena
anya-e0201n0:2595_1: idha itthipaccayayutto itthiliṅgasaddo nāma. Iminā suttena pumbhāvātidese kate tattha
anya-e0201n0:2595_3: rassattaṃ, kumārī bhariyā yassa so kumārabhariyo, īpaccayanivatti. Yuvati jāyā yassa
anya-e0201n0:2595_4: so yuvajāyo, tipaccayanivatti. Brahmabandhū bhariyā yassa so brahmabandhubhariyo, ūpaccayanivatti.
anya-e0201n0:2596_0: Itthiyanti kiṃ? Kumārī ratanaṃ yassa so kumārīratano, puriso, idha parapadaṃ itthiliṅgaṃ
anya-e0201n0:2596_1: na hoti, tasmā pumbhāvātideso na kātabbo, yadi kareyya, kumāro ratanaṃ yassa kumāraratanoti
anya-e0201n0:2597_0: Ekattheti kiṃ? Kumārīsu bhatti yassa so kumārībhattiko. Evaṃ samaṇībhattiko, brāhmaṇībhattiko,
anya-e0201n0:2597_1: samāsante ko, idha parapadaṃ pubbapadena ekatthaṃ na hoti, tasmā pumbhāvātideso na
anya-e0201n0:2597_2: kātabbo, yadi kareyya, kumāresu bhatti yassa so kumārabhattikoti evaṃ aniṭṭhattho bhaveyya.
anya-e0201n0:2598_0: Itthīti kiṃ? Daṭṭhabbaṭṭhena diṭṭhi, gāmaṇikulaṃ diṭṭhi yena so gāmaṇidiṭṭhi, idha
anya-e0201n0:2598_1: gāmaṇisaddo bhāsitapumo hoti, idha pana kulavācakattā napuṃsakaliṅge tiṭṭhati, itthipaccayo
anya-e0201n0:2599_0: Bhāsitapumoti kiṃ? Saddhā pakati yassa so saddhāpakatiko. Evaṃ paññāpakatiko, idha
anya-e0201n0:2599_1: pubbapadaṃ niyatitthiliṅgattā bhāsitapumaṃ na hotīti. Saddhādhano, paññādhano, saddhādhuro
anya-e0201n0:2600_0: Kammadhārayamhi ka. 332; rū. 343; nī. 716 pana ‘ekatthe’ti padaṃ visuṃ ekaṃ aṅgaṃ
anya-e0201n0:2600_1: na hoti anekatthassa idha asambhavato. Dīghā ca sā jaṅghā cāti dīghajaṅghā, kumārī
anya-e0201n0:2600_2: ca sā bhariyā cāti kumārabhariyā. Evaṃ khattiyakaññā, brāhmaṇakaññā, yuvati ca sā
anya-e0201n0:2600_3: bhariyā cāti yuvabhariyā, brahmabandhū ca sā bhariyā cāti brahmabandhubhariyā.
anya-e0201n0:2601: Itthiyanti kiṃ? Kumārī ca sā ratanañcāti kumārīratanaṃ. Evaṃ samaṇīpadumaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:2602: Itthīti kiṃ? Gāmaṇikulañca taṃ diṭṭhi cāti gāmaṇidiṭṭhi.
anya-e0201n0:2603: Bhāsitapumoti kiṃ? Saddhāpakati, gaṅgānadī, taṇhānadī, pathavīdhātu.
anya-e0201n0:2604: Saññāsaddesu pana caturaṅgayuttepi vidhānaṃ na hoti, nandādevī, nandāpokkharaṇī, kāyagatāsati, paṭhamāvibhatti, dutiyāvibhatti, pañcamīvibhatti, chaṭṭhīvibhatti iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:2606: Paccaye pare kadāci bhāsitapumo itthiliṅgasaddo kvaci pumāva hoti.
anya-e0201n0:2607: Byattatarā, byattatamā, ettha ca byattānaṃ itthīnaṃ atisayena byattāti byattatarā, byattatamāti attho. Evaṃ paṇḍitatarā, paṇḍitatamā iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:2608: 364. Sabbādayo vuttimatte ka. 331; rū. 353; nī. 714; caṃ. 5.2.41; pā. 6.3.35.
anya-e0201n0:2609: Vuttimatte ṭhāne sabbādināmakā sabbanāmasaddā pumāva honti.
anya-e0201n0:2610_0: Sā pamukhā yassa so tappamukho. Evaṃ tappadhāno, tāya tāhi vā sampayutto taṃsampayutto.
anya-e0201n0:2610_1: Sā eva pamukhā tappamukhā. Evaṃ tappadhānā, tassā mukhaṃ tammukhaṃ, tassaṃ gāthāyaṃ
anya-e0201n0:2610_2: tāsu gāthāsu vā tatra, tāya gāthato tāhi vā gāthāhi tato, tassaṃ velāyaṃ tadā iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:2611: Ettha ca vutti nāma samāsa, taddhitā’ yādidhātupaccayanta, vibhattipaccayantānaṃ nāmaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:2615: Aññapadatthavisaye kattuiccādīhi ltupaccayantehi itthiyaṃ ī, ūkārantehi ca bahulaṃ kapaccayo hoti.
anya-e0201n0:2616_0: Bahavo kattāro yasmiṃ dese so bahukattuko. Evaṃ bahuvattuko, bahukā nadiyo yasmiṃ
anya-e0201n0:2616_1: dese so bahunadiko. Evaṃ bahuitthiko, gāmo, bahuitthikā, sabhā, bahuitthikaṃ, kulaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:2617: Ettha ca ‘brahmabandhū’ti rassapadaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ vadati, dīghapadaṃ brāhmaṇiṃ vadati, kapaccaye pare dīghānaṃ mahāvuttinā rassattaṃ icchanti.
anya-e0201n0:2620: Aññapadatthavisaye ltitthiyūhi aññato avaṇṇivaṇṇuvaṇṇantehi bahulaṃ kapaccayo hoti vā.
anya-e0201n0:2622: Agāmakaṃ, araññaṃ, bahugāmako, janapado, sasotako, asotako, salomako, sapakkhako, bahumālako, bahumālo, bahumāyako, bahumāyo.
anya-e0201n0:2624: Sundarā diṭṭhi yassa so sammādiṭṭhiko, sammādiṭṭhi, micchādiṭṭhiko, micchādiṭṭhi, matapatikā, itthī, saddhāpakatiko, paññāpakatiko, bahuhatthiko, bahudaṇḍiko.
anya-e0201n0:2626: Sahetuko, ahetuko, sacakkhuko, acakkhuko, sabhikkhuko, abhikkhuko, dīghāyuko, appāyuko, bahudhenuko, vajo, bahurattaññuko, bhikkhusaṅgho.
anya-e0201n0:2627: Itthiliṅge kamhi pare akārassa mahāvuttinā vā ‘adhātussa ke…’ti suttena vā bahulaṃ ikārattaṃ hoti, bahuputtikā, itthī, bahuputtakā vā, ekaputtikā, ekaputtakā iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:2630: 367. Samāsanta ka. 337; rū. 350; nī. 722; caṃ. 4.4.52; pā. 5.4.68; ‘tva’ (bahūsu).
anya-e0201n0:2631: ‘Samāsanto+a’ iti dvipadamidaṃ, samāsanto hutvā apaccayo hotīti attho. Adhikārasuttamidaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:2632: 368. Pāpādīhi bhūmiyā ka. 337; rū. 350; nī. 722; caṃ. 4.4.72; …pe… 5.4.75; ‘godāvarīnaṃ’ (bahūsu).
anya-e0201n0:2633: Pāpādīhi parāya bhūmiyā samāsanto ahoti, ‘bhūmisaddassā’ti vattabbe niyatitthiliṅgadassanatthaṃ ‘bhūmiyā’ti vuttaṃ. Evaṃ aññatthapi.
anya-e0201n0:2634: Pāpānaṃ bhūmi pāpabhūmaṃ, pāpānaṃ uppattibhūmityattho, jātiyā bhūmi jātibhūmaṃ, satthujātaraṭṭhaṃ. Evaṃ pacchābhūmaṃ, majjhimadese pacchābhāgaraṭṭhaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:2636: Saṅkhyāhi parāya bhūmiyā samāsanto a hoti.
anya-e0201n0:2637_0: Dve bhūmiyo etthāti dvibhūmo, dvibhūmako, pāsādo, dvibhūmiko vā, tisso bhūmiyo etesanti
anya-e0201n0:2637_1: vā tīsu bhūmisu pariyāpannāti vā tebhūmakā, dhammā, catubhūmakā, dhammā, tebhūmikā,
anya-e0201n0:2637_2: catubhūmikā vā. Digumhi-dve bhūmiyo dvibhūmaṃ, tisso bhūmiyo tibhūmaṃ, catasso bhūmiyo catubhūmaṃ iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:2638: 370. Nadīgodhāvarīnaṃ ka. 337; rū. 350; nī. 722; caṃ. 4.4.73; pā. 5.4.75.
anya-e0201n0:2639: Saṅkhyāhi parāsaṃ nadī, godhāvarīnaṃ samāsanto a hoti.
anya-e0201n0:2640: Pañca nadiyo pañcanadaṃ, pañca vā nadiyo yasmiṃ padese so pañcanado, satta godhāvariyo sattagodhāvaraṃ.
anya-e0201n0:2641: 371. Asaṅkhyehi caṅgulyānaññāsaṅkhyatthesu ka. 337; rū. 350; nī. 722; caṃ. 4.4.74; pā. 5.4.86.
anya-e0201n0:2642_0: Aññattho ca asaṅkhyattho ca aññāsaṅkhyatthā. Tattha ‘aññattho’ti aññapadattho bahubbīhisamāso,
anya-e0201n0:2642_1: ‘asaṅkhyattho’ti asaṅkhyatthasamāso abyayībhāvasamāsoti vuttaṃ hoti, na aññāsaṅkhyatthā
anya-e0201n0:2642_2: anaññāsaṅkhyatthā, aññāsaṅkhyatthavajjitesu samāsesu asaṅkhyehi upasaggehi ca saṅkhyāhi
anya-e0201n0:2642_3: ca parāya aṅguliyā samāsanto a hoti. Casaddena “sugataṅgulena, pamāṇaṅgulena” iccādīni sijjhanti.
anya-e0201n0:2643: Aṅgulīhi niggataṃ niraṅgulaṃ, aṅguliyo atikkantaṃ accaṅgulaṃ, ime dve amādisamāsā, dve aṅguliyo samāhaṭāti dvaṅgulaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:2644_0: Anaññāsaṅkhyatthesūti kiṃ? Pañca aṅguliyo asminti pañcaṅguli, hattho. Aṅguliyā samīpaṃ
anya-e0201n0:2644_1: upaṅguli. “Caturaṅgulaṃ kaṇṇaṃ osāretvā mahāva. 66, aṭṭhaṅgulaṃ dantakaṭṭhaṃ, dvaṅgulaparamaṃ,
anya-e0201n0:2645: 372. Dārumhaṅgulyā ka. 337; rū. 350; nī. 722; caṃ. 4.4.97; pā. 5.4.114; ‘dārumyaṅgulyā’ (bahūsu).
anya-e0201n0:2646: Dārusaṅkhāte aññapadatthe pavattāya aṅguliyā samāsanto ahoti.
anya-e0201n0:2647: Pañca aṅguliyo assāti pañcaṅgulaṃ, dāru. Ettha ca aṅgulipamāṇāvayavo dhaññādīnaṃ mānaviseso ‘dārū’ti vuccati.
anya-e0201n0:2648: 373. Dīghāhovassekadesehi ca ratyā ka. 337; rū. 350; nī. 722; caṃ. 4.4.75; pā. 5.4.87.
anya-e0201n0:2649_0: Dīgho ca aho ca vasso ca ekadeso cāti dvando, ekadeso nāma pubba, parādi, anaññāsaṅkhyatthesu
anya-e0201n0:2649_1: dīghādīhi ca asaṅkhyehi ca saṅkhyāhi ca parāya rattiyā samāsanto a hoti. Casaddena
anya-e0201n0:2650_0: Dīghā rattiyo dīgharattaṃ, dīghā rattidivaparaṃparātyattho. Aho ca ratti ca ahorattaṃ,
anya-e0201n0:2650_1: vassena temitā ratti vassarattaṃ, rattiyā pubbaṃ pubbarattaṃ, rattiyā paraṃ pararattaṃ,
anya-e0201n0:2650_2: rattiyā aḍḍhaṃ aḍḍharattaṃ, rattiṃ atikkanto atiratto, dve rattiyo dvirattaṃ. Evaṃ
anya-e0201n0:2650_3: tirattaṃ, caturattaṃ, pañcarattaṃ, chārattaṃ, vādhikārattā “ekarattaṃ, ekarattī”ti sijjhati.
anya-e0201n0:2651: Anaññāsaṅkhyatthesūti kiṃ? Dīghā ratti etthāti dīgharatti, hemanto. Rattiyā samīpaṃ uparatti.
anya-e0201n0:2652: 374. Go tvacatthe cālope ka. 337; rū. 350; nī. 722; caṃ. 4.4.77; pā. 5.4.92.
anya-e0201n0:2653: Acatthe ca anaññā’saṅkhyatthesu ca pavattā gosaddamhā alopaṭṭhāne samāsanto a hoti.
anya-e0201n0:2654: Rañño go rājagavo, attano go sagavo, paresaṃ go paragavo, pañcagavo, pañcagavaṃ. Evaṃ dasagavaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:2655: Alopeti kiṃ? Pañcahi gohi kīto pañcagu. Ettha ca tena kītoti etasmiṃ atthe taddhitapaccayassa lopo, tena ayaṃ apaccayo na hoti, ‘gossū’ti ossuttaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:2656: Acattheti kiṃ? Gavajā ca gāvo ca gavajagavo, yomhi gossa gavattaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:2658: 375. Rattidiva dāragava caturassā ka. 337; rū. 350; nī. 722; caṃ. 4.4.62; pā. 5.4.77.
anya-e0201n0:2660: Ratti ca divā ca rattidivaṃ, dārā ca gāvo ca dāragavaṃ, catasso assiyo yassa so caturasso, apaccayo, assissa issa attaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:2665: 377. Akkhismāññatthe ka. 337; rū. 350; nī. 722; caṃ. 4.4.96; pā. 5.4.113.
anya-e0201n0:2666: Aññapadatthe pavattā akkhimhā samāsanto a hoti.
anya-e0201n0:2667_0: Visālāni akkhīni yassa so visālakkho, virūpāni akkhīni yassa so virūpakkho, anekasahassāni
anya-e0201n0:2667_1: akkhīni yassa so sahassakkho, lohitāni akkhīni yassa so lohitakkho. Evaṃ nīlakkho,
anya-e0201n0:2667_2: nīlakkhi vā. Bahulādhikārā anaññatthepi, akkhīnaṃ paṭimukhaṃ paccakkhaṃ, akkhīnaṃ
anya-e0201n0:2667_3: parabhāgo parokkhaṃ, akkhīnaṃ tirobhāgo tirokkhaṃ. Akkhisaddena cettha pañcindriyāni gayhanti.
anya-e0201n0:2668: Mahāvuttinā kvaci samāsanto a, ā, ipaccayā honti.
anya-e0201n0:2670_0: Vāyuno sakhā vāyusakho, vāyusaṅkhāto sakhā assāti vā vāyusakho, aggi, sabbesaṃ piyā’piyamajjhattānaṃ
anya-e0201n0:2670_1: sakhāti sabbasakho, sabbe vā sakhāyo assāti sabbasakho, mettāvihārī. “Sabbamitto
anya-e0201n0:2670_2: sabbasakho”ti theragā. 648 pāḷi. Pāpānaṃ sakhāti pāpasakho, pāpā sakhāro yassāti
anya-e0201n0:2670_3: vā pāpasakho. “Pāpamitto pāpasakho”ti dī. ni. 3.253 pāḷi. Pahito pesito attā yenāti
anya-e0201n0:2670_4: pahitatto, majjhimo attā sabhāvo yassāti majjhatto, chātaṃ ajjhattasantānaṃ saṇṭhānaṃ
anya-e0201n0:2670_5: (mūlapāṭhe) yassāti chātajjhatto, suhito attā yassāti suhitatto, yato saṃyato attā
anya-e0201n0:2670_6: yassāti yatatto, ṭhito attā assāti ṭhitattoiccādi.
anya-e0201n0:2672: Paccakkho dhammo yassāti paccakkhadhammā, chādetīti chado, moho, vivaṭo chado yasminti vivaṭacchadā, sammāsambuddho.
anya-e0201n0:2674_0: Sundaro gandho yassāti sugandhi, kucchito gandho yassāti duggandhi, pūtino gandho
anya-e0201n0:2674_1: yassāti pūtigandhi, surabhino gandho surabhigandhi. “Sarīrassa sugandhino, guṇagandhiyutto aha”nti pāḷi.
anya-e0201n0:2678: Uttarapade pare pubbapade vidhi hotīti attho. Adhikārasuttamidaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:2679: “Abrāhmaṇo, anariyo, abhikkhuko, ananto”iccādīsu samāse uttarapade pare na-kārassa a, ana honti.
anya-e0201n0:2682_0: Nā’ssa khamatthīti nakho, ‘kha’nti sukhaṃ, dukkhañca, nā’ssa kulamatthīti nakulo,
anya-e0201n0:2682_1: evaṃnāmako brāhmaṇo, pumassa sakaṃ puṃsakaṃ natthi puṃsakaṃ etasminti napuṃsako,
anya-e0201n0:2682_2: khañjanaṃ vekallagamanaṃ khattaṃ, natthi khattaṃ etassāti nakkhattaṃ, kaṃ vuccati
anya-e0201n0:2682_3: sukhaṃ, tabbiruddhattā akaṃ vuccati dukkhaṃ, natthi akaṃ etasminti nāko, saggo, na
anya-e0201n0:2682_4: muñcatīti namuci, māro. Na galati na cavatīti nagaraṃ, gehe vattabbe ‘agāra’nti sijjhati.
anya-e0201n0:2683: 380. Nago vā pāṇini ka. 333-334; rū. 344-345; nī. 717-718; caṃ. 5.2.96; pā. 6.3.77; ‘nago vāppāṇini’ (bahūsu).
anya-e0201n0:2685: Na gacchantīti nagā, rukkhā. Nagā, pabbatā. Agā, rukkhā, agā, pabbatā.
anya-e0201n0:2686: Apāṇinīti kiṃ? Ago vasalo kiṃ tena. Ettha ‘ago’ti duggatajano, ‘vasalo’ti lāmako, ‘kiṃ tenā’ti nindāvacanaṃ, “sītenā”tipi pāṭho. Evaṃ neke, aneke, nekāni, anekāni iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:2688: 381. Sahassa soññatthe ka. 404; rū. 370; nī. 859; caṃ. 5.2.97; pā. 6.3.82.
anya-e0201n0:2689: Aññapadatthe samāse uttarapade pare sahassa so hoti vā.
anya-e0201n0:2690: Puttena saha yo vattatīti saputto, sahaputto.
anya-e0201n0:2691: Aññattheti kiṃ? Saha katvā, saha yujjhitvā.
anya-e0201n0:2693: Saññāyaṃ uttarapade pare sahassa so hoti.
anya-e0201n0:2694: Saha āyattaṃ sāyattaṃ, saha palāsaṃ sapalāsaṃ, agarukārassetaṃ nāmaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:2696: Apaccakkhe gamyamāne uttarapade pare sahassa so hoti.
anya-e0201n0:2697_0: Oḍḍiyati etāyāti oḍḍi, pāso. Oḍḍiyā saha yo vattatīti soḍḍi, kapoto. Idha ‘oḍḍi’
anya-e0201n0:2697_1: apaccakkhā. “Sāggi kapoto”tipi pāṭho, picunā saha vattatīti sapicukā, vātamaṇḍalikā,
anya-e0201n0:2697_2: sā ca apaccakkhā, uggantvā ākāse paribbhamantaṃ picusaṅghāṭaṃ disvā ñātabbā. “Sapisācā
anya-e0201n0:2697_3: vātamaṇḍalikā”tipi pāṭho. Evaṃ sarajā, vātā, sarakkhasī, ratti.
anya-e0201n0:2698: 384. Akāle sakatthassa ka. 404; rū. 370; nī. 859; caṃ. 5.2.110; pā. 6.3.81.
anya-e0201n0:2699: Sakatthappadhānassa sahasaddassa so hoti akāle uttarapade pare.
anya-e0201n0:2701: Akāleti kiṃ? Saha pubbaṇhaṃ, saha paraṇhaṃ, sunakkhattena saha pavattaṃ pubbaṇhaṃ, paraṇhanti attho.
anya-e0201n0:2702: 385. Ganthantādhikye ka. 404; rū. 370; nī. 859; caṃ. 5.2.101; pā. 6.3.79.
anya-e0201n0:2703: Ganthassa anto ganthanto. Yathā taṃ kaccāyanaganthassa anto uṇādikappo, adhikabhāvo ādhikyaṃ, ganthante ca ādhikye ca vattamānassa sahasaddassa so hoti uttarapade pare.
anya-e0201n0:2704: Saha uṇādinā’ yaṃ adhiyateti taṃ soṇādi, sakalaṃ kaccāyanaṃ adhītetyattho. Saha muhuttena sakalaṃ jotiṃ adhīte samuhuttaṃ, jotīti nakkhattasatthaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:2705: Ādhikye – sadoṇā, khārī, sakahāpaṇaṃ, nikkhaṃ, samāsakaṃ, kahāpaṇaṃ. Niccatthamidaṃ suttaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:2706: 386. Samānassa pakkhādīsu vā ka. 404; rū. 370; nī. 859; caṃ. 5.2.103-4; pā. 6.3.84-86.
anya-e0201n0:2707: Pakkhādīsu uttarapadesu samānassa so hoti vā.
anya-e0201n0:2708: Samāno pakkho sahāyo sapakkho, samāno pakkho yassāti vā sapakkho, samānapakkho vā. Evaṃ sajāti, samānajāti, sajanapado, saratti.
anya-e0201n0:2709_0: Samāno pati yassā sā sapati. Evaṃ sanābhi, sabandhu, sabrahmacārī, sanāmo. Avhayaṃ
anya-e0201n0:2709_1: vuccati nāmaṃ, candena samānaṃ avhayaṃ yassa so candasavhayo, sagotto, indena samānaṃ
anya-e0201n0:2709_2: gottaṃ yassa so indasagotto, sarūpaṃ, saṭṭhānaṃ. Hari vuccati suvaṇṇaṃ, harinā samāno
anya-e0201n0:2709_3: vaṇṇo yassa so harissavaṇṇo, sassa dvittaṃ. Evaṃ siṅgīnikkhasavaṇṇo, savayo, sadhano, sadhammo, sajātiyo.
anya-e0201n0:2712: Iyayutte udare pare samānassa so hoti vā.
anya-e0201n0:2715: Aññesupi samānassa so hoti, candena samānā sirī yassa taṃ candassasirīkaṃ, mukhaṃ. Evaṃ padumassasirīkaṃ, vadanaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:2716_0: Mahāvuttinā santādīnañca so hoti, saṃvijjati lomaṃ assāti salomako. Evaṃ sapakkhako,
anya-e0201n0:2716_1: saṃvijjanti āsavā etesanti sāsavā, saṃvijjanti paccayā etesanti sappaccayā, saṃvijjanti
anya-e0201n0:2716_2: attano uttaritarā dhammā etesanti sauttarā, santo puriso sappuriso. Tathā sajjano,
anya-e0201n0:2720_0: Ayaṃ attho etassāti idamatthī, samāsante ī, idamatthino bhāvo idamatthitā. Ayaṃ paccayo
anya-e0201n0:2720_1: etesanti idappaccayā, idappaccayānaṃ bhāvo idappaccayatā. “Imesaṃ paccayā idappaccayā,
anya-e0201n0:2720_2: idappaccayā eva idappaccayatā”tipi yojenti. ‘Ida’nti nipātapadampi atthi, “rūpañca
anya-e0201n0:2720_3: hidaṃ bhikkhave attā abhavissā, vedanā ca hidaṃ. Saññā ca hidaṃ. Saṅkhārā ca hidaṃ
anya-e0201n0:2722: Uttarapade pare pumassa puṃ hoti vā.
anya-e0201n0:2723: Pumassa liṅgaṃ pulliṅgaṃ, pumassa bhāvo pumbhāvo, pumā ca so kokilo cāti puṅkokilo, pumā ca so go cāti puṅgavo, ‘go tvacatthe…’ti apaccayo, napuṃsako.
anya-e0201n0:2726: Uttarapade pare nta, ntūnaṃ ṭa hoti vā kvaci.
anya-e0201n0:2727: Bhavaṃ patiṭṭho yesaṃ te bhavaṃpatiṭṭhā, bindāgamo. Bhagavā mūlaṃ yesaṃ te bhagavaṃmūlakā, dhammā. Evaṃ bhagavaṃpaṭisaraṇā, dhammā.
anya-e0201n0:2728_0: Bahulādhikārā tarādīsu ca paresu, mahantīnaṃ atisayena mahāti mahattarī, rattaññūnaṃ
anya-e0201n0:2728_1: mahantassa bhāvo rattaññumahattaṃ. Evaṃ jātimahattaṃ, guṇamahattaṃ, puññamahattaṃ,
anya-e0201n0:2730: Uttarapade pare nta, ntūnaṃ a hoti.
anya-e0201n0:2733: Rī, rikkha, kapaccayantesu paresu samānassa so hoti.
anya-e0201n0:2734: Niccasamāsattā aññapadena viggaho, saṃvijjatīti samāno, paccakkhe viya citte upalabbhatīti attho. Samāno viya so dissatīti sadī, sadikkho, sadiso, samānā viya te dissantīti sadisā.
anya-e0201n0:2736: Tesu paresu ntapaccayantassa ca kiṃ, imasaddānañca kamena ṭā, kī, ṭī honti.
anya-e0201n0:2737: Bhavaṃ viya so dissatīti bhavādī, bhavādikkho, bhavādiso, ko viya so dissatīti kīdī, kīdikkho, kīdiso, ayaṃ viya so dissatīti īdī, īdikkho, īdiso.
anya-e0201n0:2739: Tesu paresu sabbādināmakānaṃ ya, ta, eta, añña, amha, tumhasaddānaṃ anto ā hoti.
anya-e0201n0:2740: Yādī, yādikkho, yādiso, tādī, tādikkho, tādiso, etādī, etādikkho, etādiso.
anya-e0201n0:2742: Tesu paresu etassa eṭa hoti vā.
anya-e0201n0:2743: Edī, edikkho, ediso, aññādī, aññādikkho, aññādiso, amhādī, amhādikkho, amhādiso, tumhādī, tumhādikkho, tumhādiso.
anya-e0201n0:2745: Tesu paresu ekavacane pavattānaṃ tumha’ mhasaddānaṃ tā, mā honti vā.
anya-e0201n0:2746: Ahaṃ viya so dissatīti mādī, mādikkho, mādiso, tvaṃ viya so dissatīti tādī, tādikkho, tādiso.
anya-e0201n0:2747_0: Ekasminti kiṃ? Amhe viya te dissantīti amhādino, amhādikkhā, amhādisā, tumhe viya
anya-e0201n0:2747_1: te dissantīti tumhādino, tumhādikkhā, tumhādisā. Ettha ca upamānatthasseva ekattaṃ
anya-e0201n0:2747_2: icchīyati, tasmā ahaṃ viya te dissantīti mādisā tvaṃ viya te dissantīti tādino, tādisātipi
anya-e0201n0:2747_3: yujjanti. “Mādisā ve jinā honti, ye pattā āsavakkhaya”nti mahāva. 11 pāḷi, imāni
anya-e0201n0:2749: Rī, rikkha, kapaccayehi aññasmiṃ uttarapade pare tumha’mhānaṃ taṃ, maṃādesā honti kvaci.
anya-e0201n0:2750: Tvaṃ leṇaṃ yesaṃ te taṃleṇā, ahaṃ leṇaṃ yesaṃ te maṃleṇā saṃ. ni. 4.359. Evaṃ taṃdīpā, maṃdīpā saṃ. ni. 4.359, taṃpaṭisaraṇā, maṃpaṭisaraṇā.
anya-e0201n0:2751: 398. Manādyāpādīnamo maye ca ka. 183; rū. 386; nī. 375.
anya-e0201n0:2752: Uttarapade mayapaccaye ca pare manādīnaṃ āpādīnañca o hoti.
anya-e0201n0:2753: Manoseṭṭhā, manomayā, rajojallaṃ, rajomayaṃ, sabbo manogaṇo idha vattabbo, āpodhātu, āpomayaṃ. Anuyanti disodisaṃ dī. ni. 3.281, jīva tvaṃ saradosataṃ jā. 1.2.9.
anya-e0201n0:2756: Parosataṃ, parosahassaṃ, paropaṇṇāsa dhammā, idha parasaddo “indriyaparopariyatta”nti ettha viya adhikatthavācisaddantaraṃ, na sabbanāmaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:2759_0: Ariyehi puthagevāyaṃ janoti puthujjano. Api ca pāḷinaye puthusaddoyeva bahulaṃ dissati,
anya-e0201n0:2759_1: puthu kilese janentīti puthujjanā, puthu nānāsatthārānaṃ mukhaṃ ullokentīti puthujjanā,
anya-e0201n0:2759_2: puthu nānāoghehi vuyhantīti puthujjanā mahāni. 51, 94, saññānānāttaputhuttapabhedaṃ
anya-e0201n0:2759_3: paṭicca taṇhānānāttaputhuttapabhedo hoti dha. sa. aṭṭha. 1, iṅgha aññepi pucchassu,
anya-e0201n0:2759_4: puthū samaṇabrāhmaṇe saṃ. ni. 1.246. Gāmā gāmaṃ vicarissaṃ, sāvake vinayaṃ puthū,
anya-e0201n0:2759_5: āyatāni puthūni ca, puthunā vijjuvaṇṇinā jā. 2.22.968, puthukāyā puthubhūtā iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:2759_6: Tasmā “puthageva, puthakkaraṇe” iccādīsu thussa ukārassa akāro akāroti? yujjati.
anya-e0201n0:2760: 401. So chassāhāyatanesu vā ka. 374; rū. 408; nī. 804.
anya-e0201n0:2761: Ahe ca āyatane ca pare chassa so hoti vā.
anya-e0201n0:2762: Cha ahāni sāhaṃ. Atthi sāhassa jīvitaṃ jā. 2.22.314, ‘sāhassā’ti sāhaṃ+assāti chedo. Saḷāyatanaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:2763: Vāti kiṃ? Chāhappaṭicchannā āpatti cūḷava. 134, cha āyatanāni.
anya-e0201n0:2764: 402. Ltupitādīnamāraṅraṅa ka. 200; rū. 159; nī. 415; caṃ. 5.2.20; pā. 6.3.32.
anya-e0201n0:2765: Samāsuttarapade pare ltupaccayantānaṃ pitādīnañca kamena āraṅa, raṅa honti vā.
anya-e0201n0:2766: Satthuno dassanaṃ satthāradassanaṃ. Evaṃ kattāraniddeso. Mātā ca pitā ca mātarapitaro, mātāpitūsu saṃvaḍḍho mātāpitarasaṃvaḍḍho.
anya-e0201n0:2767: Vāti kiṃ? Satthudassanaṃ, kattu niddeso, mātāpitaro.
anya-e0201n0:2768: 403. Vijjāyonisambandhīnamā tatra catthe ka. 199; rū. 158; nī. 736; caṃ. 5.2.21; pā. 6.3.25.
anya-e0201n0:2769: Catthasamāse vijjāsambandhīnaṃ yonisambandhīnañca ltupitādīnaṃ ā hoti tesveva paresu.
anya-e0201n0:2772: Ettha ca vijjāsippāni sikkhāpentā ācariyā sissānaṃ vijjāsambandhī mātāpitaro nāma.
anya-e0201n0:2774: Catte putte pare vijjāyonisambandhīnaṃ ltupitādīnaṃ ā hoti.
anya-e0201n0:2775_0: Mātāputtā gacchanti, pitāputtā gacchanti. Mahāvuttinā tesañca i hoti, mātipakkho,
anya-e0201n0:2775_1: pitipakkho. Mātigho labhate dukhaṃ jā. 2.19.118, pitigho labhate dukhaṃ, māttikaṃ
anya-e0201n0:2775_2: dhanaṃ, pettikaṃ dhanaṃ pārā. 34. Ettha ca mātuyā santakaṃ māttikaṃ, pituno santakaṃ
anya-e0201n0:2775_3: pettikaṃ, dvittaṃ vuddhi ca. Mātito, pitito, bhātā eva bhātiko, bhātikarājā.
anya-e0201n0:2776: 405. Jāyāya jāyaṃ patimhi ka. 339; rū. 358; nī. 731; ‘…jayaṃ patimhi’ (bahūsu).
anya-e0201n0:2778_0: Puttaṃ janetīti jāyā, jāyā ca pati ca jāyampatī jayampatī (bahūsu). Atha vā “jāyampatī”ti
anya-e0201n0:2778_1: idaṃ sandhividhināva siddhaṃ, tasmā “jampatī”tipāṭho siyā yathā “devarājā sujampatī’
anya-e0201n0:2778_2: saṃ. ni. 1.264’ti, yathā ca sakkataganthesu “dāro ca pati ca dampatī”ti. Idha pana
anya-e0201n0:2778_3: mahāvuttinā patimhi sujātāya sujaṃ hoti, dārassa ca daṃ hoti, tathā jāyā ca pati
anya-e0201n0:2779_0: Yañca vuttiyaṃ “jānipatīti pakatyantarena siddhaṃ, tathā dampatī”ti vuttaṃ. Tattha
anya-e0201n0:2779_1: puttaṃ janetīti jānī. Jānī ca pati ca jānīpatīti yujjati. “Tudampatī”ti pāṭho. Kaccāyane
anya-e0201n0:2779_2: ca ‘jāyāya tu daṃjāni patimhī’ti. Tattha tusaddo padapūraṇamatte yujjati.
anya-e0201n0:2780: 406. Saññāyamudodakassa ka. 404; rū. 370; nī. 257; caṃ. 5.2.65; pā. 6.3.57.
anya-e0201n0:2781: Saññāyaṃ gamyamānāyaṃ uttarapade pare udakassa udo hoti.
anya-e0201n0:2782: Udakaṃ dhāretīti udadhi, mahantaṃ udakaṃ dhāretīti mahodadhi, udakaṃ pivanti etthāti udapānaṃ, udakaṃ pivanti etāyāti udapāti.
anya-e0201n0:2784: Kumbhādīsu paresu udakassa udo hoti vā.
anya-e0201n0:2785: Udakassa kumbho udakumbho, udakakumbho. Evaṃ udapatto, udakapatto, udabindu, udakabindu. Mahāvuttinā syādīsupi, “nīlodā pokkharaṇī”ti pāḷi.
anya-e0201n0:2787: Sotādīsu paresu udakassa ussa lopo hoti.
anya-e0201n0:2788: Udakassa sotaṃ dakasotaṃ, udake rakkhaso dakarakkhaso, udakaṃ āsayo yesaṃ te dakāsayā, pāṇā. Mahāvuttinā syādīsupi, “dake dakāsayā sentī”ti saṃ. ni. 3.78 (thokaṃ visadisaṃ) pāḷi.
anya-e0201n0:2791: Pubbaṇho, aparaṇho, ajjaṇho, sāyaṇho sāyanho, majjhaṇho.
anya-e0201n0:2794: 410. Kupādayo niccamasyādividhimhi ka. 324; rū. 339; caṃ. 2.2.24; pā. 2.2.18.
anya-e0201n0:2795: Syādividhito aññattha kuādayo pādayo ca saddā syādyantena saha niccaṃ ekatthā honti.
anya-e0201n0:2796_0: Kucchito brāhmaṇo kubrāhmaṇo, īsakaṃ uṇhaṃ kaduṇhaṃ, pākaṭo hutvā bhavatīti pātubhūto,
anya-e0201n0:2796_1: āvī ‘āvi’pi dissati hutvā bhavatīti āvībhūto, tuṇhī bhavatīti tuṇhībhūto, pamukho
anya-e0201n0:2796_2: nāyako panāyako, pakārena karitvā pakaritvā pakārena kataṃ pakataṃ, paṭhamaṃ vā kataṃ
anya-e0201n0:2796_3: pakataṃ, virūpo puriso duppuriso. Evaṃ dukkaṭaṃ, sobhaṇo puriso supuriso. Evaṃ sukataṃ,
anya-e0201n0:2796_4: abhidhammo, abhitthuto, bhusaṃ kaḷāro ākaḷāro, bhusaṃ bandho ābandho iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:2797: Pādayo pakatādyatthe paṭhamāya ekatthā honti, pakato ācariyo pācariyo. Evaṃ payyako, paro antevāsī pantevāsī, paro putto paputto, paro nattā panattā.
anya-e0201n0:2798: Atyādayo atikkantādyatthe dutiyāya, mañcaṃ atikkanto atimañco. Evaṃ atibālo, ativelā.
anya-e0201n0:2799: Avādayo kuṭṭhādyatthe tatiyāya, kokilāya avakuṭṭhaṃ vanaṃ avakokilaṃ, ‘avakuṭṭha’nti chaḍḍitanti vadanti. Evaṃ avamayūraṃ.
anya-e0201n0:2800: Pariyādayo gilānādyatthe catutthiyā, ajjhāyituṃ gilāno pariyajjheno.
anya-e0201n0:2801: Nyādayo nikkhantādyatthe pañcamiyā, kosambiyā nikkhanto nikkosambi, vānato nikkhantaṃ nibbānaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:2804: Cīpaccayanto saddo kriyatthehi saddehi saha ekattho hoti.
anya-e0201n0:2805: Balasā kiriya balīkiriya, pākaṭīkiriya, pākaṭībhuyya, pākaṭībhaviya.
anya-e0201n0:2807: Alamādayo saddā bhūsanādīsu atthesu etehi kriyatthehi saha ekatthā honti.
anya-e0201n0:2808: Bhūsanaṃ akāsīti alaṃkiriya, samaṃ ādaraṃ akāsīti sakkacca, asamaṃ anādaraṃ akāsīti asakkacca, binduno pararūpattaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:2809_0: Bhūsanādīsūti kiṃ? Alaṃ bhutvā gato, ‘ala’nti pariyattaṃ, sakkatvā gato, sobhaṇaṃ
anya-e0201n0:2809_1: katvātyattho. “Kacca, kiriya” iccādinā saṃkhittarūpehi upapadena saha siddhehi eva
anya-e0201n0:2809_2: ekatthasaññā, na “katvā” iccādinā asaṃkhittarūpehi visuṃ siddhehīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0201n0:2811: Aññe ca saddā kriyatthehi syādyantehi saha bahulaṃ ekatthā honti.
anya-e0201n0:2812: Atirekaṃ abhavīti parobhuyya. Evaṃ tirobhuyya, parokiriya, tirokiriya, urasikiriya, manasikiriya, majjhekiriya, tuṇhībhuyya.
anya-e0201n0:2813: Tyādisaddāpi saññābhāvaṃ pattā nipātarūpā honti, syādirūpā ca. Tasmā tepi imasmiṃ sutte saṅgayhanti.
anya-e0201n0:2814_0: Atthikhīrā gāvī, nasantiputtā itthī, atthi hutvā paccayo atthipaccayo. Evaṃ natthipaccayo,
anya-e0201n0:2814_1: ahosi eva kammaṃ ahosikammaṃ, ehi ca passa ca ehipassa, ehipassa iti vidhānaṃ arahatīti
anya-e0201n0:2814_2: ehipassiko, ayaṃ taddhitantasamāso nāma. Evaṃ parattha.
anya-e0201n0:2815_0: Ehi bhaddanteti vuttopi na etīti naehibhaddantiko dī. ni. 1.394, tiṭṭha bhaddanteti
anya-e0201n0:2815_1: vuttopi na tiṭṭhatīti natiṭṭhabhaddantiko, ehi svāgataṃ tuyhanti vadanasīlo ehisvāgatiko,
anya-e0201n0:2815_2: ehisvāgatavādī pārā. 432 vā, ehi bhikkhūti vacanena siddhā upasampadā ehibhikkhūpasampadā,
anya-e0201n0:2815_3: evaṃ porāṇā āhaṃsu vā, evaṃ pure āsiṃsu vāti evaṃ pavattaṃ vidhānaṃ ettha atthīti
anya-e0201n0:2815_4: itihāso dī. ni. 1.256, purāṇagantho, yaṃ pubbe anaññātaṃ, taṃ idāni ñassāmi iti pavattassa
anya-e0201n0:2815_5: indriyaṃ anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ, asuko iti āha asuko iti āha, asukasmiṃvā ganthe
anya-e0201n0:2815_6: iti āha asukasmiṃ ganthe iti āhāti evaṃ pavattavacanaṃ itihitihaṃ, aññāsi iti byākato
anya-e0201n0:2816_0: Keci pana “sacchikaroti, manasikaroti, pākaṭīkaroti, āvīkaroti, pātukaroti, alaṅkaroti,
anya-e0201n0:2816_1: sakkaroti, pabhavati, parābhavati” iccādīnampi ekatthībhāvaṃ vadanti. Tumantatvantādikāpi
anya-e0201n0:2816_2: ettha saṅgayhanti, gantuṃ kāmetīti gantukāmo, kattukāmo, daṭṭhukāmo, gantuṃ mano
anya-e0201n0:2816_3: etassāti gantumano, saṃvidhāya avahāro saṃvidhāvahāro, yalopo. Evaṃ upādāya uppannaṃ
anya-e0201n0:2816_4: rūpaṃ upādārūpaṃ, anupādāya vimutto anupādāvimutto, paṭiccasamuppādo, āhaccabhāsito,
anya-e0201n0:2816_5: upahaccaparinibbāyī pu. pa. 37, aveccappasādo, chakkhattuparamaṃ, sattakkhattuparamo pu. pa. 31 iccādi.
