anya-e0201n0:2820: 414. Vidhādīsu dvissa du ka. 386; rū. 410; nī. 811.
anya-e0201n0:2822: Dve vidhā pakārā yassāti duvidho, dve paṭṭāni yassāti dupaṭṭaṃ, cīvaraṃ, duvaṅgikaṃ, jhānaṃ iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:2825: Dve guṇā paṭalā yassāti diguṇā, saṅghāṭi, dve gāvo digu, dve rattiyo dirattaṃ, dvirattaṃ vā.
anya-e0201n0:2828: Dve vā tayo vā vārā dvattikkhattuṃ, dve vā tayo vā pattā dvattipattā.
anya-e0201n0:2829: 417. Ā saṅkhyāyāsatādonaññatthe ka. 383; rū. 253; nī. 815; caṃ. 5.2.52; pā. 6.3.47.
anya-e0201n0:2830: Aññapadatthavajjite samāse satādito aññasmiṃ saṅkhyāpade pare dvissa ā hoti.
anya-e0201n0:2831: Dve ca dasa ca dvādasa, dvīhi vā adhikā dasa dvādasa, dvāvīsati, dvattiṃsa, rassattaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:2833: Anaññattheti kiṃ? Dve dasa yasminti dvidasa.
anya-e0201n0:2835: Anaññatthe asatādo saṅkhyāpade pare tissa e hoti.
anya-e0201n0:2836: Tayo ca dasa ca terasa, tīhi vā adhikā dasa terasa. Evaṃ tevīsati, tettiṃsa.
anya-e0201n0:2837: 419. Cattālīsādo vā ka. 404; rū. 370; caṃ. 5.2.54; pā. 6.3.49.
anya-e0201n0:2838: Cattālīsādīsu paresu tissa e hoti vā.
anya-e0201n0:2839: Tecattālīsaṃ, ticattālīsaṃ, tepaññāsaṃ, tipaññāsaṃ, tesaṭṭhi, tisaṭṭhi, tesattati, tisattati, teasīti, tiasīti, tenavuti, tinavuti.
anya-e0201n0:2841: Cattālīsādo dvissa e hoti vā ā ca.
anya-e0201n0:2842_0: Dvecattālīsaṃ, dvācattālīsaṃ, dvicattālīsaṃ, dvepaññāsaṃ, dvipaññāsaṃ, dvāsaṭṭhi,
anya-e0201n0:2842_1: dvesaṭṭhi, dvāsattati, dvesattati, dvāsīti, dvānavuti, dvenavuti. Vāsaddena paññāsamhi
anya-e0201n0:2844: Acattālīsādo pare dvissa bā hoti vā.
anya-e0201n0:2845: Bārasa, dvādasa, bāvīsati, dvāvīsati, bāttiṃsa, dvattiṃsa.
anya-e0201n0:2847: 422. Catussa cuco dase ka. 390; rū. 256; nī. 826.
anya-e0201n0:2848: Dase pare catussa cu, co honti vā.
anya-e0201n0:2850: 423. Vīsatidasesu pañcassa paṇṇapannā ka. 404; rū. 370; nī. 814.
anya-e0201n0:2851: Esu pañcassa paṇṇa, pannā honti vā yathākkamaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:2857: Dase pare eka, aṭṭhānaṃ ā hoti.
anya-e0201n0:2859: 426. Ra saṅkhyāto vā ka. 381; rū. 254; nī. 812.
anya-e0201n0:2860: Ekādisaṅkhyamhā parassa dasassa ra hoti vā.
anya-e0201n0:2861: Ekārasa, ekādasa, bārasa, dvādasa, pannarasa, pañcadasa, sattarasa, sattadasa, aṭṭhārasa, aṭṭhādasa, bādese pannādese ca niccaṃ. Idha na hoti, catuddasa.
anya-e0201n0:2862: 427. Chatīhi ḷo ca ka. 379; rū. 258; nī. 809.
anya-e0201n0:2863: Cha, tīhi parassa dassa ḷo hoti ro ca.
anya-e0201n0:2866: ‘Aḍḍhuḍḍhatiyā’ti aḍḍhā+uḍḍhatiyāti chedo, aḍḍhamhā paresaṃ catuttha, tatiyānaṃ uḍḍha, tiyā honti yathākkamaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:2867: Aḍḍhena catuttho aḍḍhuḍḍho, aḍḍhena tatiyo aḍḍhatiyo.
anya-e0201n0:2869: 429. Dutiyassa saha diyaḍḍhadivaḍḍhā ka. 387; rū. 411; nī. 819.
anya-e0201n0:2870: Aḍḍhamhā parassa dutiyassa saha aḍḍhena diyaḍḍha, divaḍḍhā honti.
anya-e0201n0:2872_0: Yathā ca eka, dvi,ti, catu, pañca, cha, satta, aṭṭha, nava, dasasaddā paccekaṃ attano
anya-e0201n0:2872_1: atthesu nipatanti, tathā vīsati, tiṃsati, cattālīsa, paññāsa, saṭṭhi, sattati, asīti,
anya-e0201n0:2872_2: navutisaddā paccekaṃ attano atthesu nipatanti, dasasaddassa kāriyā na honti, evaṃ
anya-e0201n0:2873_0: Tato paraṃ pana dasa sahassāni dasasahassaṃ, idaṃ ‘nahuta’nti ca vuccati, sataṃ sahassāni
anya-e0201n0:2873_1: satasahassaṃ, idaṃ ‘lakkha’nti ca vuccati, dasa satasahassāni dasasatasahassanti
anya-e0201n0:2874: Dve satāni dvisataṃ, tīṇi satāni tisataṃ, dve sahassāni dvisahassaṃ, tīṇi sahassāni tisahassaṃ iccādīni digumhi vuttāneva.
anya-e0201n0:2875_0: Gaṇanapathe pana ekaṭṭhānaṃ, dasaṭṭhānaṃ, sataṭṭhānaṃ, sahassaṭṭhānaṃ, dasasahassaṭṭhānaṃ,
anya-e0201n0:2875_1: satasahassaṭṭhānaṃ, dasasatasahassaṭṭhānanti imāni satta ṭhānāni kamena dasaguṇitāni
anya-e0201n0:2875_2: honti. Tattha ekaṭṭhānaṃ nāma ekaṃ, dve, tīṇi iccādi. Dasaṭṭhānaṃ nāma dasa, vīsaṃ,
anya-e0201n0:2875_3: tiṃsaṃ iccādi. Sataṭṭhānaṃ nāma sataṃ, dvisataṃ, tisataṃ iccādi. Sahassaṭṭhānaṃ nāma
anya-e0201n0:2875_4: sahassaṃ, dvisahassaṃ, tisahassaṃ iccādi. Evaṃ uparipi. Ekamekasmiñca ṭhāne nava
anya-e0201n0:2875_5: padāni ca nava antaranavantāni ca honti. Ayaṃ mūlabhūmi nāma.
anya-e0201n0:2876_0: Taduttari koṭibhūmi nāma. Tatthapi ekaṭṭhānaṃ, dasaṭṭhānaṃ, sataṭṭhānaṃiccādīni satta
anya-e0201n0:2876_1: ṭhānāni honti. Tattha mūlabhūmiyā antimaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā dasaguṇite kate koṭibhūmiyaṃ
anya-e0201n0:2876_2: ekaṭṭhānaṃ hoti, idhapi satta ṭhānāni kamena dasaguṇitāniyeva, idha dasakoṭisatasahassaṃ
anya-e0201n0:2877_0: Taduttari pakoṭibhūmi nāma. Etthapi satta ṭhānāni honti. Tattha koṭibhūmiyā antimaṭṭhānaṃ
anya-e0201n0:2877_1: gahetvā dasaguṇite kate pakoṭibhūmiyaṃ ekaṭṭhānaṃ hoti, idhapi satta ṭhānāni dasaguṇitāniyeva,
anya-e0201n0:2877_2: dasapakoṭisatasahassaṃ antimaṭṭhānaṃ, iminā nayena sabbabhūmīsu uparūpari bhūmisaṅkanti
anya-e0201n0:2878_0: Ayaṃ panettha bhūmikkamo-mūlabhūmi, koṭibhūmi, pakoṭibhūmi, koṭipakoṭibhūmi, nahutabhūmi,
anya-e0201n0:2878_1: ninnahutabhūmi, akkhobhiṇībhūmi bhinī, bhanītipi dissanti, bindubhūmi, abbudabhūmi,
anya-e0201n0:2878_2: nirabbudabhūmi, ahahabhūmi, abababhūmi, aṭaṭabhūmi, sogandhikabhūmi, uppalabhūmi,
anya-e0201n0:2878_3: kumudabhūmi, puṇḍarīkabhūmi, padumabhūmi, kathānabhūmi, mahākathānabhūmi, asaṅkhyeyyabhūmīti
anya-e0201n0:2878_4: ekavīsati bhūmiyo sattacattālīsasataṃ ṭhānāni ca honti.
anya-e0201n0:2879_0: Nirayabhūmīnaṃ kamena pana abbudabhūmi, nirabbudabhūmi, abababhūmi, aṭaṭabhūmi, ahahabhūmi,
anya-e0201n0:2879_1: kumudabhūmi, sogandhikabhūmi, uppalabhūmi, puṇḍarīkabhūmi, padumabhūmīti vattabbo.
anya-e0201n0:2879_2: Ettha ca yasmā pāḷibhāsāyaṃ dasasatasahassaṃ nāma sattamaṭṭhānaṃ natthi, cha ṭhānāni
anya-e0201n0:2879_3: eva atthi, tasmā garū aṭṭhakathāsu saṃ. ni. 1.181 āgatanayena sattamaṭṭhānaṃ ullaṅghetvā
anya-e0201n0:2879_4: chaṭṭhaṭṭhānato upari bhūmisaṅkantiṃ kathentā sataguṇitaṃ katvā kathenti, satasahassānaṃ
anya-e0201n0:2879_5: sataṃ koṭi, koṭisatasahassānaṃ sataṃ pakoṭi iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:2880_0: Tattha satasahassānaṃ sataṃ nāma dasasatasahassānaṃ dasakameva hoti, tasmā tathā
anya-e0201n0:2880_1: kathentāpi bhūmīnaṃ sabbaṭṭhānānañca dasaguṇasiddhimeva kathentīti veditabbaṃ. Yasmā
anya-e0201n0:2880_2: ca gaṇanabhūmisaṅkhāto gaṇanapatho nāma nānādesavāsīnaṃ vasena nānāvidho hoti, tasmā
anya-e0201n0:2880_3: dīpavaṃse akkhobhiṇī, bindu, kathāna, mahākathānāni vajjetvā pāḷinayena sattarasa
anya-e0201n0:2880_4: bhūmiyova vuttā. Kaccāyane ka. 394, 395; rū. 416, 417 pubbe dassitā ekavīsati bhūmiyo,
anya-e0201n0:2880_5: sakkataganthesu tato sādhikabhūmiyo, katthaci pana mahābalakkhandhapariyantā saṭṭhi bhūmiyoti āgatā.
anya-e0201n0:2881: Tattha sakasakabhūmito atirekavatthūni gaṇanapathavītivattāni nāma honti, yesaṃ pana mūlabhūmimattaṃ atthi, tesaṃ koṭimattānipi vatthūni gaṇanapathātikkantāni eva.
anya-e0201n0:2882_1: ca atthato ekaṃ. Tasmā idhapi vīsati bhūmiyo eva anukkamena dasaguṇitā gaṇanapathā
anya-e0201n0:2882_2: nāma honti. Asaṅkhyeyyanti pana dasaguṇavinimuttā gaṇanapathātikkantabhūmi eva vuccati.
anya-e0201n0:2882_3: Mahākathānabhūmātikkantato paṭṭhāya hi anantamahāpathaviyā sabbapaṃsucuṇṇānipi idha
anya-e0201n0:2882_4: asaṅkhyeyyabhūmiyaṃ saṅgayhanti. Itarathā asaṅkhyeyyanti ca gaṇanapathabhūmīti ca viruddhametanti.
anya-e0201n0:2883_0: Dīpavaṃse ca “tato upari abhūmi, asaṅkhyeyyanti vuccatī”ti vuttaṃ. Tattha ‘abhūmī’ti
anya-e0201n0:2883_1: vacanena gaṇanapathabhūmi eva paṭisiddhā, na tu gaṇanapathātikkantā visuṃ asaṅkhyeyyabhūmi
anya-e0201n0:2883_2: nāma. Cariyāpiṭakasaṃvaṇṇanāyampi cariyā. aṭṭha. nidānakathā ayamattho vutto. Asaṅkhyeyyabhūmiyampi
anya-e0201n0:2883_3: asaṅkhyeyyānaṃ cūḷa, mahādivasena anekappabhedo dakkhiṇavibhaṅgasuttena ma. ni. 3.370 dīpetabbo.
anya-e0201n0:2884_0: Saddanītiyaṃ nī. 833 pana pāḷinayaṃ gahetvā “vīsati abbudāni ekaṃ nirabbudaṃ nāma.
anya-e0201n0:2884_1: Vīsati nirabbudāni ekaṃ ababaṃ nāma” iccādinā nirabbudādīnaṃ saṅkhyānampi vīsatimattaguṇaṃ
anya-e0201n0:2884_2: nāma vuttaṃ. Taṃ na yujjati. Nirayesu hi vīsatimattaguṇena abbuda, nirabbudādīnaṃ
anya-e0201n0:2884_3: dasannaṃ nirayānaṃ tāni nāmāni siddhāni bhavanti. Garū pana tāni nāmāni gahetvā dasaguṇasiddhesu
anya-e0201n0:2884_4: gaṇanapathesu pakkhipiṃsu, tasmā nāmamattena sadisāni bhavanti, guṇavidhi pana visadisoeva.
anya-e0201n0:2885_0: Evañcakatvā pāḷiyampi bakabrahmāsutte saṃ. ni. 1.175 “sataṃ sahassānaṃ nirabbudānaṃ,
anya-e0201n0:2885_1: āyuṃ pajānāmi tavāhaṃ brahme”ti vuttaṃ. Ettha ca yadi gaṇanabhūmipathepi nirabbudānaṃ
anya-e0201n0:2885_2: vīsatimattena abababhūmi bhaveyya, evaṃ sati nirabbudānaṃ satasahassaṃ nāma na vucceyya.
anya-e0201n0:2885_3: Jātakaṭṭhakathāyañca jā. aṭṭha. 3.7.69 “nirabbudasatasahassānaṃ ekaṃ ahahaṃ nāma,
anya-e0201n0:2885_4: ettakaṃ bakassa brahmuno tasmiṃbhave avasiṭṭhaṃ āyū”ti vuttaṃ. Tasmā imaṃ gaṇanabhūmipathaṃ
anya-e0201n0:2885_5: patvā vīsatiguṇaṃ nāma natthīti siddhaṃ hoti. Akkhobhiṇī, bindu, kathāna, mahākathānānipi
anya-e0201n0:2885_6: aññato gahetvā pakkhittāni siyuṃ. Evaṃ pakkhittānañca cuddasannaṃ saṅkhyānaṃ kaccāyane
anya-e0201n0:2890_0: Taddhitavutti nāma vicitrā hoti, sātisayena vicitrañāṇahitaṃ vahati, tasmā tesaṃ
anya-e0201n0:2890_1: tesaṃ kulaputtānaṃ hitanti taddhitaṃ, imasmiṃ kaṇḍe sabbavidhānassa nāmaṃ. Taṃ pana
anya-e0201n0:2890_2: aṭṭhavidhaṃ hoti apaccaṃ, anekatthaṃ, assatthi, bhāvakammaṃ, parimāṇaṃ, saṅkhyā,
anya-e0201n0:2892: 430. Ṇo vāpacce ka. 344; rū. 361; nī. 752; caṃ. 2.4.16; pā. 4.1.92; ‘sarānamādissā…’ (bahūsu).
anya-e0201n0:2893_0: Chaṭṭhyantā nāmamhā tassa apaccanti atthe vikappena ṇapaccayo hoti. Vāsaddo vākya,
anya-e0201n0:2893_1: samāsānaṃ vikappanattho, ito paraṃ anuvattate, tena sabbattha vikappavidhi sijjhati.
anya-e0201n0:2893_2: Ṇānubandho vuddhyattho, so payogaappayogī. Vasiṭṭhassa apaccanti atthe iminā suttena
anya-e0201n0:2893_3: vasiṭṭhamhā ṇapaccayo, so sāmyatthañca apaccatthañca ubhayaṃ vadati, chaṭṭhī ca apaccapadañca
anya-e0201n0:2893_4: tena vuttatthā nāma honti, vasiṭṭhapadaṃ paccayena saha ekatthaṃ hoti, ubhayaṃ ekato
anya-e0201n0:2893_5: hutvā puttassa nāmaṃ hotīti attho. Tato ‘ekatthatāya’nti chaṭṭhiyā lopo, apaccapadaṃ
anya-e0201n0:2893_6: pana vuttatthamattena luppati. Tañhi sutte padhānabhāvena niddiṭṭhaṃ hoti, na chaṭṭhīti,
anya-e0201n0:2893_7: mahāvuttinā vā padānaṃ lopo. Evaṃ sabbattha.
anya-e0201n0:2895: Padānaṃ ādibhūtassa akārassa ca ivaṇṇu’vaṇṇassa ca ā, e, o vuddhiyo honti ṇānubandhe paccaye pareti padādia-kārassa āvuddhi, syādyuppatti.
anya-e0201n0:2896: Vāsiṭṭho, puriso, vāsiṭṭhī, itthī, vāsiṭṭhaṃ, kulaṃ, vasiṭṭhassa putto vāsiṭṭho, vasiṭṭhassa dhītā vāsiṭṭhī, vasiṭṭhassa kulaṃ vāsiṭṭhanti evampi yojetuṃ yujjati.
anya-e0201n0:2897: Tattha ‘vasiṭṭhassā’ti etena gottasseva pitubhūtaṃ ādipurisaṃ vadati. Kasmā? Gottasaddattā. Evañhi sati tasmiṃ gotte paccājātā sabbepi janā tassa apaccā nāma honti.
anya-e0201n0:2899: Majjhe pavattānaṃ a, yuvaṇṇānaṃ ā, e, ovuddhiyo honti vā kvaci.
anya-e0201n0:2900: Vāseṭṭho, vāseṭṭhī, vāseṭṭhaṃ. Vāsaddena “vasiṭṭhassa putto dhītā kula”nti vākyaṃ vā “vasiṭṭhaputto vasiṭṭhadhītā vasiṭṭhakula”nti samāsaṃ vā vikappeti. Evaṃ sabbattha.
anya-e0201n0:2901_0: Bharadvājassa apaccaṃ bhāradvājo, visāmittassa bhāradvājassa… vesāmittassa… (rū.)
anya-e0201n0:2901_1: apaccaṃ vesāmitto, gotamassa apaccaṃ gotamo, kassapassa apaccaṃ kassapo, vasudevassa
anya-e0201n0:2902_0: Upagussa apaccanti ettha ‘uvaṇṇassāvaṅa…’ti ṇānubandhe paccaye pare uvaṇṇassa avaṅa
anya-e0201n0:2902_1: hoti. Opagavo, opagavī, opagavaṃ, manuno apaccaṃ mānavo, bhagguno apaccaṃ bhaggavo,
anya-e0201n0:2902_2: paṇḍuno apaccaṃ paṇḍavo, upavindussa apaccaṃ opavindavo iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:2903: 433. Vacchādito ṇānaṇāyanā ka. 345; rū. 366; nī. 754; pā. 4.1.93, 94, 162, 163.
anya-e0201n0:2904: Chaṭṭhuntehi vacchādīhi gottasaddagaṇehi tassa apaccanti atthe ṇānubandhā āna, āyanapaccayā honti vā.
anya-e0201n0:2905_0: Vacchassa apaccaṃ vacchāno, vacchāyano, vacchānī, vacchāyanī, vacchānaṃ, vacchāyanaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:2905_1: Evaṃ kaccāno, kaccāyano, kātiyāno, kātiyāyano, sākaṭāno, sākaṭāyano, kaṇhāno, kaṇhāyano,
anya-e0201n0:2905_2: moggallāno, moggallāyano, aggivessāno aggivessanotipi dissati dī. ni. 1.176; ma.
anya-e0201n0:2905_3: ni. 1.353 ādayo, aggivessāyano, muñcāno, muñcāyano, kuñcāno, kuñcāyano iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:2906: 434. Kattikāvidhavādīhi ṇeyyaṇerā ka. 346; rū. 367; nī. 755; pā. 4.1.120, 123, 126, 127, 128, 129, 131.
anya-e0201n0:2907: Chaṭṭhyantehi kattikādīhi vidhavādīhi ca tassa apaccanti atthe kamena ṇānubandhā eyya, erapaccayā honti vā.
anya-e0201n0:2908_0: Ṇeyye – kattikāya nāma devadhītāya apaccaṃ kattikeyyo, vinatāya nāma deviyā apaccaṃ
anya-e0201n0:2908_1: venateyyo, rohiṇiyā nāma deviyā apaccaṃ rohiṇeyyo, bhaginiyā apaccaṃ bhāgineyyo,
anya-e0201n0:2908_2: nadiyā nāma itthiyā apaccaṃ nādeyyo. Evaṃ anteyyo, āheyyo, kāmeyyo, suciyā apaccaṃ
anya-e0201n0:2909_0: Ṇere – vidhavāya apaccaṃ vedhavero, vidhavā nāma matapatikā itthī. Bandhukiyā apaccaṃ
anya-e0201n0:2909_1: bandhukero, nāḷikiyā nāma itthiyā putto nāḷikero, samaṇassa upajjhāyassa putto sāmaṇero,
anya-e0201n0:2910: 435. Ṇya diccādīhi ka. 347; rū. 368; nī. 756; caṃ. 2.4.2; pā. 4.1.85.
anya-e0201n0:2911: Chaṭṭhuntehi ditiiccādīhi tassa apaccanti atthe ṇānubandho yapaccayo hoti vā.
anya-e0201n0:2913: Ye pare avaṇṇassa ivaṇṇassa ca lopo hotīti ṇyamhi pare avaṇṇi’vaṇṇānaṃ lopo.
anya-e0201n0:2914: Ditiyā nāma devadhītāya apaccaṃ decco, aditiyā apaccaṃ ādicco.
anya-e0201n0:2915: Tattha ivaṇṇalope ‘tavaggavaraṇānaṃ ye cavaggabayañā’ti yamhi pare tavaggassa cavaggattaṃ, puna ‘vaggalasehi te’ti yassa pubbarūpattaṃ, kuṇḍaniyā apaccaṃ koṇḍañño.
anya-e0201n0:2917: Sare pare uvaṇṇassa avaṅa hotīti uvaṇṇassa avattaṃ. ‘Tavaggavaraṇāna…’nti suttena vassa battaṃ, puna ‘vaggalasehi te’ti suttena yassa pubbarūpattaṃ, bhātuno apaccaṃ bhātabyo.
anya-e0201n0:2919: Rassā’kārantato apaccatthe ṇānubandho rassi’paccayo hoti vā.
anya-e0201n0:2920_0: Dakkhassa apaccaṃ dakkhi. Evaṃ doṇi, vāsavi, sakyaputti, nāṭaputti, dāsaputti, dāruno
anya-e0201n0:2920_1: apaccaṃ dāravi vicāretabbamidaṃ, varuṇassa apaccaṃ vāruṇi. Evaṃ kaṇḍi, bāladevi,
anya-e0201n0:2920_2: pāvaki, jinadattassa apaccaṃ jenadatti, suddhodani, anuruddhi iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:2921: 439. Rājato ño jātiyaṃ ka. 347; rū. 368; nī. 756; caṃ. 2.4.70; pā. 4.1.137.
anya-e0201n0:2922: Jātiyaṃ gamyamānāyaṃ rājasaddamhā apaccatthe ñapaccayo hoti vā.
anya-e0201n0:2923: Rañño apaccaṃ rājañño, rājakulassa puttoti attho.
anya-e0201n0:2926: Jātiyaṃ gamyamānāyaṃ khattasaddamhā apaccatthe ya, iyapaccayā honti.
anya-e0201n0:2930: Jātiyaṃ gamyamānāyaṃ manusaddamhā apaccatthe ssa, saṇapaccayā honti.
anya-e0201n0:2931: Manuno apaccaṃ manusso, mānuso, manu nāma kappe ādikhattiyo mahāsammatarājā, itthiyaṃ manussī, mānusī,
anya-e0201n0:2933: 442. Janapadanāmasmā janakhattiyā raññe ca ṇo ka. 352; rū. 376; nī. 765; caṃ. 2.4.96; pā. 4.1.168; “janapadanāmasmā khattiyā…” (bahūsu).
anya-e0201n0:2934: Janavācinā ca khattiyavācinā ca janapadanāmamhā raññe ca apacce ca ṇo hoti.
anya-e0201n0:2935: Pañcālānaṃ janānaṃ rājā pañcālo, pañcālassa khattiyassa apaccaṃ pañcālo. Evaṃ kosalo, māgadho, okkāko dī. ni. 1.267.
anya-e0201n0:2936: Janapadanāmasmāti kiṃ? Dasaratharañño putto dāsarathi dāsaraṭṭhi.
anya-e0201n0:2937: Janakhattiyāti kiṃ? Pañcālassa brāhmaṇassa apaccaṃ pañcāli.
anya-e0201n0:2939: Kuru, sivisaddehi apacce raññe ca ṇyo hoti.
anya-e0201n0:2940: Kururañño apaccaṃ korabyo jā. 1.14.228, 232, 236, kururaṭṭhavāsīnaṃ rājā korabyo, korabbo, pubbarūpattaṃ, sivirañño apaccaṃ sebyo, siviraṭṭhavāsīnaṃ rājā sebyo.
anya-e0201n0:2943: 444. Ṇa rāgā tena rattaṃ ka. 347; rū. 368; nī. 756; caṃ. 3.1.1 …pe… 4.2.1.
anya-e0201n0:2944: Rajjanti vatthaṃ etenāti rāgo, rajanavatthu, rāgavācimhā tena rattanti atthe ṇo hoti.
anya-e0201n0:2945: Kasāvena rattaṃ vatthaṃ kāsāvaṃ dha. pa. 9, kāsāyaṃ vā. Evaṃ kosumbhaṃ, haliddiyā rattaṃ hāliddaṃ, pāṭaṅgena rattaṃ pāṭaṅgaṃ, mañjiṭṭhaṃ, kuṅkumaṃ iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:2946: “Nīlaṃ vatthaṃ, pītaṃ vattha”ntiādīsu pana nīla, pītādisaddā guṇasaddattā paccayena vinā guṇanissayaṃ dabbaṃ vadanti. Evaṃ sabbesu guṇasadda, jātisadda, nāmasaddesu.
anya-e0201n0:2947: 445. Nakkhatteninduyuttena kāle ka. 352; rū. 376; nī. 765; caṃ. 3.1.5; pā. 4.2.3.
anya-e0201n0:2948: Induyuttena nakkhattena lakkhite kāle tannakkhattavācīhi ṇo hoti.
anya-e0201n0:2949: Puṇṇacandayuttena phussanakkhattena lakkhitā phussā, ratti, phusso, aho. Evaṃ māgho iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:2953: 446. Sāssa devatā puṇṇamāsī ka. 352; rū. 376; nī. 765; caṃ. 3.1.18, 19 …pe… 4.2.21-24.
anya-e0201n0:2954: Sā assa devatā, sā assa puṇṇamāsīti atthe paṭhamantā ṇo hoti.
anya-e0201n0:2955_0: Buddho assa devatāti buddho, yo buddhaṃ attano ārakkhadevataṃ viya garuṃ katvā vicarati,
anya-e0201n0:2955_1: nirantaraṃ vā “buddho buddho”ti vācaṃ nicchāreti, tassetaṃ nāmaṃ. Sugato assa devatāti
anya-e0201n0:2955_2: sogato, mahindadevo assa devatāti māhindo. Evaṃ yāmo, somo, vāruṇo.
anya-e0201n0:2956: Phussī assa puṇṇamāsīti phusso, māso. Evaṃ māgho, phagguno, citto, vesākho, jeṭṭhamūlo, āsaḷho, sāvaṇo, poṭṭhapādo, assayujo, kattiko, māgasiro.
anya-e0201n0:2957: Puṇṇamāsīti kiṃ? Phussī assa pañcamī tithī.
anya-e0201n0:2958: 447. Tamadhīte taṃ jānāti kaṇikā ca ka. 351; rū. 374; nī. 764; caṃ. 3.1.37 …pe… 4.2.59.
anya-e0201n0:2959: Etesu atthesu dutiyantā ṇo ca ko ca ṇiko cāti ete paccayā honti.
anya-e0201n0:2960: Ṇamhi – byākaraṇaṃ adhīte jānāti vā veyyākaraṇo dī. ni. 1.256. Pakkhe “veyyākaraṇiko, byañjanaṃ adhīte jānāti vā veyyañjaniko”ti imāni ṇikena sijjhanti.
anya-e0201n0:2961: Kamhi-chandaṃ adhīte jānāti vā chando. Evaṃ padako dī. ni. 1.256, nāmako.
anya-e0201n0:2962: Ṇikamhi-vinayaṃ adhīte jānāti vā venayiko, suttantiko, ābhidhammiko.
anya-e0201n0:2963_0: Ettha ca ‘veyyākaraṇo’ti pade viyyākaraṇaṃ adhīteti vākyaṃ, ‘veyañjaniko’ti pade
anya-e0201n0:2963_1: viyañjanaṃ adhīteti. Upari ‘dovāriko, sovaggika’nti padesupi ‘duvāre niyutto, suvaggāya
anya-e0201n0:2963_2: saṃvattatī’ti vākyaṃ, atthaṃ kathentena pana duvāra, suvaggasaddānaṃ taddhitabhāve
anya-e0201n0:2963_3: eva siddhattā dvāreti ca saggāyāti ca kathetabbo.
anya-e0201n0:2964: 448. Tassa visaye dese ka. 352; rū. 376; nī. 365; caṃ. 3.1.61; pā. 4.2.52, 53.
anya-e0201n0:2965: Tassa desarūpe visaye chaṭṭhuntā ṇo hoti.
anya-e0201n0:2966: Thūyamigā vasātino nāma, vasātīnaṃ visayo deso vāsāto. Idha adesarūpattā ṇo na hoti, cakkhussa visayo rūpaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:2967: 449. Nivāse tannāme ka. 352; rū. 376; nī. 365; caṃ. 3.1.64; pā. 4.2.69.
anya-e0201n0:2969: Sivīnaṃ nivāso deso sebyo. Vasaṃ adenti bhakkhantīti vasādā, byagghā sīhā vā, vasādānaṃ nivāso deso vāsādo.
anya-e0201n0:2971: Samīpe bhavaṃ anubhavaṃ, “adūrabhave”tipi pāṭho, tannāme anubhave dese chaṭṭhyantā ṇo hoti.
anya-e0201n0:2972: Vidisāya anubhavaṃ vedisaṃ, nagaraṃ, udumbarassa anubhavaṃ odumbaraṃ, vimānaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:2974: Tannāme tena nibbatte dese tatiyantā ṇo hoti.
anya-e0201n0:2975_0: Kusambena nāma isinā nibbattā kosambī, itthiyaṃ ī, nagarī. Evaṃ kākandī, mākandī,
anya-e0201n0:2975_1: sahassena dhanena nibbattā sāhassī, parikhā, ayañca tatiyā hetumhi kattari karaṇe
anya-e0201n0:2977: Taṃ idha atthīti atthe tannāme dese paṭhamantā ṇo hoti.
anya-e0201n0:2978: Udumbarā asmiṃ dese santīti odumbaro, badarā asmiṃ dese santīti bādaro. Evaṃ pabbajo.
anya-e0201n0:2981_0: Udake bhavo odako, maccho, urasi bhavo oraso, putto, sāgamo. Nagare bhavo nāgaro.
anya-e0201n0:2981_1: Evaṃ jānapado, māgadho, kapilavatthumhi bhavo kāpilavatthavo, ‘uvaṇṇassāvaṅa…’ti
anya-e0201n0:2981_2: ussa avattaṃ. Kosambiyaṃ bhavo kosambo, mitte bhavā mettā, pure bhavā porī dī. ni.
anya-e0201n0:2981_3: 1.9, vācā, manasmiṃ bhavo mānaso. Ettha pana –
anya-e0201n0:2983: Ṇānubandhe paccaye pare manādīnaṃ ante sāgamo hotīti sabbattha manogaṇādīnaṃ ante sāgamo.
anya-e0201n0:2984: Mānaso, rāgo, mānasā, taṇhā, mānasaṃ, sukhaṃ. Evaṃ cetaso, cetasā, cetasaṃ. Kvaci mano eva mānasaṃ, ceto eva cetasotipi yujjati.
anya-e0201n0:2985: 455. Ajjādīhi tano ka. 352; rū. 376; nī. 765; caṃ. 3.15; pā. 4.2.105.
anya-e0201n0:2986: Tatra bhavoti atthe ajjādīhi tano hoti.
anya-e0201n0:2987_0: Ajja bhavo ajjatano, attho, ajjattanī, vibhatti, dvittaṃ, ajjatanaṃ, hitaṃ, sve bhavo
anya-e0201n0:2987_1: svātano, mahāvuttinā essa āttaṃ. Hiyyo bhavo hiyyattano, hiyyattano, hiyyattanaṃ,
anya-e0201n0:2988: 456. Purāto ṇo ca ka. 352; rū. 376; nī. 765.
anya-e0201n0:2989: Tatra bhavoti atthe purāsaddamhā ṇo ca tano ca honti.
anya-e0201n0:2990: Pure bhavo purāṇo, idha ṇo anubandho na hoti, porāṇo vā, purātano.
anya-e0201n0:2993: Rājakiccesu raññā saha bhavatīti amacco dī. ni. ṭī. 1.339.
anya-e0201n0:2994: 458. Majjhādīhimo ka. 353; rū. 378; nī. 767; caṃ. 3.2.82; pā. 4.3.8, 22; ‘majjhāditvimo’ (bahūsu).
anya-e0201n0:2996: Majjhe bhavo majjhimo. Evaṃ antimo, heṭṭhimo, uparimo, orimo, pacchimo, abbhantarimo, paccantimo, puratthimo.
anya-e0201n0:2998: Bhavatthe sattamyantā ete pañca paccayā honti.
anya-e0201n0:2999: Kaṇa-kusinārāyaṃ bhavo kosinārako, magadhesu bhavo māgadhako, āraññako, vihāro.
anya-e0201n0:3000: Ṇeyya-gaṅgāyaṃ bhavo gaṅgeyyo, pabbateyyo, vane bhavo vāneyyo.
anya-e0201n0:3001: Ṇeyyaka-kosaleyyako, bārāṇaseyyako, campeyyako, mithileyyako, idha na vuddhi.
anya-e0201n0:3002: Ya-gāme bhavo gammo, dive bhavo dibbo,
anya-e0201n0:3003: Iya-gāmiyo, gāmiko, yassa kattaṃ, udare bhavo odariyo, odariko, dive bhavo diviyo, pañcāliyo, bodhipakkhiyo, lokiyo.
anya-e0201n0:3006_0: Sāradiko, divaso, sāradikā, ratti, sāradikaṃ, pupphaṃ. Bhavasaddena cettha aññepi
anya-e0201n0:3006_1: atthe upalakkheti, pabbatato pakkhandā nadī pabbateyyā, kimīnaṃ kose jātaṃ koseyyaṃ,
anya-e0201n0:3007: 461. Tamassa sippaṃ sīlaṃ paṇyaṃ paharaṇaṃ payojanaṃ ka. 351; rū. 374; nī. 764; caṃ. 3.4.49-66 …pe… 4.4.47-65.
anya-e0201n0:3008: Tamassa sippaṃ, tamassa sīlaṃ, tamassa paṇyaṃ, tamassa paharaṇaṃ, tamassa payojananti atthesu paṭhamantā ṇiko hoti.
anya-e0201n0:3009: Sippe – vīṇāvādanamassa sippaṃ veṇiko. Ettha ca vīṇāsaddena vīṇāvādanaṃ vuccati. Ekatthībhāvasāmatthiyañhetaṃ. Evaṃ sabbattha. Evaṃ modiṅgiko, pāṇaviko, vaṃsiko.
anya-e0201n0:3010_0: Sīle-paṃsukūladhāraṇaṃ assa sīlaṃ paṃsukūliko, paṃsukūlaṃ dhāretuṃ sīlamassāti vā
anya-e0201n0:3010_1: paṃsukūliko. Sīlasaddena cettha vata, dhamma, sādhukārāpi gayhanti, paṃsukūlaṃ dhāreti
anya-e0201n0:3010_2: sīlenāti paṃsukūlikotipi yujjati. Evaṃ tecīvariko, piṇḍaṃ piṇḍaṃ patatīti piṇḍapāto,
anya-e0201n0:3010_3: piṇḍācārena laddhabhojanaṃ, piṇḍapātayāpanaṃ assa sīlanti piṇḍapātiko, piṇḍapātena
anya-e0201n0:3010_4: yāpetuṃ sīlañca vatañca dhammo ca garukāro ca assāti piṇḍapātiko.
anya-e0201n0:3011: ‘Paṇya’nti vikkeyyavatthu vuccati, gandho paṇyaṃ assāti gandhiko. Evaṃ teliko, goḷiko.
anya-e0201n0:3012: Paharanti etenāti paharaṇaṃ, āvudhabhaṇḍaṃ, cāpo paharaṇamassāti cāpiko. Evaṃ tomariko, muggariko.
anya-e0201n0:3013: Payojanaṃ vuccati phalaṃ, upadhi payojanamassāti opadhikaṃ a. ni. 8.59, puññaṃ, sataṃ payojanamassāti sātikaṃ. Evaṃ sāhassikaṃ jā. 2.21.415.
anya-e0201n0:3014: 462. Taṃ hantārahati gacchatuñchati carati ka. 351; rū. 374; nī. 764; caṃ. 3.4.27-43; pā. 4.4.28-46.
anya-e0201n0:3015: Taṃ hanti, taṃ arahati, taṃ gacchati, taṃ uñchati, taṃ caratīti atthesu dutiyantā ṇiko hoti.
anya-e0201n0:3016_0: Pakkhīhi pakkhino hantīti pakkhiko. Evaṃ sākuṇiko a. ni. 2.263 (sākunikotipi dissati),
anya-e0201n0:3016_1: māyūriko, macchehi macche hanatīti macchiko. Evaṃ dhenuko, magehi mage hanatīti māgaviko,
anya-e0201n0:3016_2: majjhe vāgamo. Evaṃ hāriṇiko, ‘hariṇo’ti mago eva. Sūkariko, idha na vuddhi.
anya-e0201n0:3018: Paradāraṃ gacchatīti pāradāriko, paradāriko vā. Evaṃ pathiko, maggiko.
anya-e0201n0:3019: Badare uñchati gavesatīti bādariko. Evaṃ āmalakiko.
anya-e0201n0:3021: 463. Tena kataṃ kītaṃ bandhaṃ abhisaṅkhataṃ saṃsaṭṭhaṃ hataṃ hanti jitaṃ jayati dibbati khaṇati tarati carati vahati jīvati ka. 350; rū. 373; nī. 364; caṃ. 3.4.1-26; pā. 4.4.1-27.
anya-e0201n0:3022: Tena kataṃ, tena kītaṃ…pe… tena jīvati iccatthesu tatiyantā ṇiko hoti.
anya-e0201n0:3023: Kāyena kataṃ kāyikaṃ. Evaṃ vācasikaṃ, mānasikaṃ, vātena kato vātiko, ābādho.
anya-e0201n0:3024: Satena mūlena kītaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ sātikaṃ. Evaṃ sāhassikaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:3025: Varattāya yottāya bandhito vārattiko, ayasā bandhito āyasiko, sāgamo. Evaṃ pāsiko.
anya-e0201n0:3026: Ghatena abhisaṅkhataṃ saṃsaṭṭhaṃ vā ghātikaṃ. Evaṃ goḷikaṃ, dādhikaṃ, māricikaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:3028: Jālena hantīti jāliko, jālakevaṭṭo. Evaṃ bāḷisiko saṃ. ni. 2.158.
anya-e0201n0:3029: Akkhehi jitaṃ dhanaṃ akkhikaṃ. Evaṃ sālākikaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:3031: Khaṇittiyā khaṇatīti khāṇittiko. Evaṃ kuddāliko, idha na vuddhi.
anya-e0201n0:3032: Uḷumpena taratīti oḷumpiko, uḷumpiko vā. Evaṃ nāviko jā. 2.20.149, gopucchiko.
anya-e0201n0:3033: Sakaṭena caratīti sākaṭiko. Evaṃ rathiko, yāniko, daṇḍiko,
anya-e0201n0:3034: Khandhena vahatīti khandhiko. Evaṃ aṃsiko, sīsiko, idha na vuddhi.
anya-e0201n0:3035: Vetanena jīvatīti vetaniko. Evaṃ bhatiko, kasiko, kayiko, vikkayiko, bhatikādīsu na vuddhi.
anya-e0201n0:3037: Tassa saṃvattatīti atthe catutthyantā ṇiko hoti.
anya-e0201n0:3038_0: Puna bhavāya saṃvattatīti ponobbhaviko, punassa ottaṃ, bhassa dvittaṃ, ponobbhavikā
anya-e0201n0:3038_1: mahāva. 14, taṇhā, lokāya saṃvattatīti lokiko, suṭṭhu aggoti saggo, saggāya saṃvattatīti
anya-e0201n0:3038_2: sovaggikaṃ dī. ni. 1.163, puññaṃ. Evaṃ diṭṭhadhammikaṃ, samparāyikaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:3039: 465. Tato sambhūtamāgataṃ ka. 351; rū. 374; nī. 765; caṃ. 3.3.49-51; …pe… 4.3.77-79.
anya-e0201n0:3040: Tato sambhūtaṃ, tato āgataṃ iccatthesu pañcamyantā ṇiko hoti.
anya-e0201n0:3041_0: Mātito sambhūtaṃ āgataṃ vā mattikaṃ pārā. 34, dvittaṃ rasso ca. Evaṃ pettikaṃ. Ṇya,
anya-e0201n0:3041_1: ṇiyāpi dissanti, surabhito sambhūtaṃ sorabhyaṃ, thanato sambhūtaṃ thaññaṃ, pitito
anya-e0201n0:3042: 466. Tattha vasati vidito bhatto niyutto ka. 351; rū. 374; nī. 765; caṃ. 3.4.70-75 …pe… 4.4.69-74.
anya-e0201n0:3044: Rukkhamūle vasatīti rukkhamūliko. Evaṃ āraññiko, sosāniko.
anya-e0201n0:3045_0: Ettha ca vasatīti sāmaññavacanepi tassīla, tabbata, taddhamma, tassādhukāritānaṃ
anya-e0201n0:3045_1: vasena attho veditabbo taddhitapaccayānaṃ pasiddhatthadīpakattā. Na hi rukkhamūle
anya-e0201n0:3048: Dvāre niyutto dovāriko. Evaṃ bhaṇḍāgāriko, navakammiko, idha na vuddhi. “Jātikiyo, andhakiyo” iccādīsu mahāvuttinā kiyo.
anya-e0201n0:3050: Tassa idanti atthe chaṭṭhuntā ṇiko hoti.
anya-e0201n0:3051_0: Saṅghassa ayaṃ saṅghiko, vihāro, saṅghikā, bhūmi, saṅghassa idaṃ saṅghikaṃ, bhaṇḍaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:3051_1: Evaṃ puggalikaṃ, gaṇikaṃ, mahājanikaṃ, sakyaputtassa esoti sakyaputtiko. Evaṃ nāṭaputtiko, dāsaputtiko.
anya-e0201n0:3057: Kaccāyanassa idaṃ kaccāyanaṃ, byākaraṇaṃ. Evaṃ sogataṃ, sāsanaṃ, māhiṃsaṃ, maṃsādi.
anya-e0201n0:3060: 471. Yamhi gossa ca ka. 78; rū. 31; nī. 229.
anya-e0201n0:3061_0: Yavante paccaye pare gossa ca uvaṇṇānañca avaṅa hotīti avādeso. ‘Tavaggavaraṇāna…’nti
anya-e0201n0:3061_1: suttena vassa battaṃ, gunnaṃ idaṃ gabyaṃ, maṃsādi, du vuccati rukkho, tassa idaṃ
anya-e0201n0:3064: 472. Tametthassatthīti mantu ka. 369; rū. 403; nī. 793; caṃ. 4.2.98; pā. 5.2.94.
anya-e0201n0:3065_0: Taṃ ettha atthi, taṃ assa atthīti atthesu paṭhamantā mantupaccayo hoti, ivaṇṇu’vaṇṇo’kārehi
anya-e0201n0:3065_1: mantu. Tattha ivaṇṇantehi niccaṃ, upaṭṭhitā sati etasmiṃ atthi, etassa vā atthīti
anya-e0201n0:3065_2: satimā. Evaṃ gatimā, matimā, dhitimā saṃ. ni. 1.1952; jā. 2.22.1451, atthadassimā
anya-e0201n0:3069: Dīghaṃ āyu asmiṃ atthi, assa vā atthīti āyasmā mahāni. 49. Evaṃ cakkhumā, bandhumā, bhāṇumā iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:3070_0: Bahū gāvo asmiṃ santi, assa vā santīti gomā. Candimā, pāpimāpadesu ca mahāvuttinā
anya-e0201n0:3070_1: imantupaccayaṃ icchanti. Tattha candasaṅkhātaṃ vimānaṃ assa atthīti candimā dha.
anya-e0201n0:3070_2: pa. 387, devaputto, upacārena pana vimānampi candimāti vuccati, devaputtopi candoti
anya-e0201n0:3070_3: vuccati. Ati viya pāpo ajjhāsayo assa atthīti pāpimā saṃ. ni. 1.137, māro. Na hi
anya-e0201n0:3070_4: appakena pāpena pāpimāti vuccati pahūtādivasena pasiddhe eva mantādīnaṃ pavattanato. Vuttañhi vuttiyaṃ –
anya-e0201n0:3072: Niccayoge ca saṃsagge, hontime mantuādayo”ti moga. 78.
anya-e0201n0:3079_0: Tathā vijjamānehi eva satiādīhi satimā iccādayo vuccanti, na atītehi anāgatehi ca
anya-e0201n0:3079_1: avijjamānehi, kasmā? Atthisaddena paccuppannena niddiṭṭhattā. Evaṃ pana sati kathaṃ
anya-e0201n0:3079_2: pubbepi tvaṃ satimā āsi, anāgatepi satimā bhavissasīti idaṃ siddhanti? Tadapi tadā
anya-e0201n0:3080_0: Go, asso, manusso iccādīsu jātisaddesu tesaṃ dabbābhidhānasamatthattā mantādayo na
anya-e0201n0:3080_1: honti, tathā nīlo paṭo, sukko paṭoiccādīsu guṇasaddesu tisso, phussoiccādīsu nāmasaddesu
anya-e0201n0:3080_2: ca. Yesaṃ pana dabbābhidhānasāmatthiyaṃ natthi, tesveva honti, buddhimā, paññavā,
anya-e0201n0:3083_0: Bahavo puttā assa asmiṃ vā santīti puttimo, patthaṭā kitti assa asmiṃ vā atthīti
anya-e0201n0:3083_1: kittimo. Evaṃ phalimo, khandhimo, rukkho, puttiyo, kappimo, kappiyo, jaṭimo, jaṭiyo,
anya-e0201n0:3083_2: thiraṃ guṇajātaṃ assa asmiṃ vā atthīti theriyo, hānabhāgo assa atthi, asmiṃ vā vijjatīti
anya-e0201n0:3083_3: hānabhāgiyo. Evaṃ ṭhitibhāgiyo, visesabhāgiyo, nibbedhabhāgiyo iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:3084_0: Ettha ca pāḷiyaṃ candimā, puttimāsaddānaṃ simhi rājādigaṇarūpaṃ dissati, rattimābhāti
anya-e0201n0:3084_1: candimā dha. pa. 387, puttehi nandati puttimāti saṃ. ni. 1.12. Kittimāsaddassa pana
anya-e0201n0:3087: Niccasīlavasena visuddhaṃ sīlaṃ assa atthi, asmiṃ vā vijjatīti sīlavā, pasattho guṇo assa atthi, asmiṃ vā vijjatīti guṇavā.
anya-e0201n0:3088_0: Evaṃ sabbattha padatthānurūpaṃ mantvatthaviseso vattabbo, paṭisandhisahagatā paññā
anya-e0201n0:3088_1: assa atthīti paññavā, paccaye pare dīghānaṃ kvaci rassattaṃ. Vidati etenāti vido,
anya-e0201n0:3088_2: ñāṇaṃ, vido etassa atthi, etasmiṃ vā vijjatīti vidvā, byañjane pubbassaralopo.
anya-e0201n0:3090_0: Bahulādhikārā rasmivā, lakkhivā, yasassivā, bhayadassivā, massuvā, gāṇḍīvadhanvātipi
anya-e0201n0:3090_1: sijjhanti. Tattha gāṇḍīvadhanu assa atthi, asmiṃ vā vijjatīti gāṇḍīvadhanvā, byañjane pubbassaralopo.
anya-e0201n0:3092: Tehi mantvatthe ika, ī honti vā.
anya-e0201n0:3093_0: Niccaṃ gahito daṇḍo assa atthi, asmiṃ vā vijjatīti daṇḍiko, daṇḍī, daṇḍavā. Evaṃ
anya-e0201n0:3093_1: gandhiko, gandhī, gandhavā, rūpiko, rūpī, rūpavā. Iṇasāmike vattabbe dhanā iko, dhaniko,
anya-e0201n0:3093_2: aññatra dhanī, dhanavā, atthiko, atthī, atthavā.
anya-e0201n0:3094_0: Ettha ca asannihitena atthena attho assa atthīti atthiko, mahagghena atthiko mahagghatthiko.
anya-e0201n0:3094_1: Evaṃ dhanatthiko, puññatthiko, seyyatthiko, ayaṃ attho etassāti idamatthī, pāṭavena
anya-e0201n0:3094_2: attho assāti pāṭavatthī. Evaṃ chekatthī, kusalatthīiccādīni sijjhanti.
anya-e0201n0:3095_0: Vaṇṇasaddantā pana īyeva hoti, brahmuno vaṇṇo saṇṭhānaṃ assa atthīti brahmavaṇṇī.
anya-e0201n0:3095_1: Atha vā brahmuno vaṇṇo brahmavaṇṇo, brahmavaṇṇo viya vaṇṇo yassa so brahmavaṇṇī.
anya-e0201n0:3095_2: Evaṃ brahmavacchasī, ‘vacchasa’nti sīsaṃ, taddhitantasamāsapadaṃ nāmetaṃ. Evaṃ devavaṇṇī.
anya-e0201n0:3096_0: Hattha, dantādīhi jātiyaṃ ī, hatthī, dantī, gajo, dāṭhī, kesarī, sīho, aññatra hatthavā,
anya-e0201n0:3096_1: dantavā. Brahmacārimhi vattabbe vaṇṇato īyeva, vaṇṇī, aññatra vaṇṇavā. Pokkharādīhi
anya-e0201n0:3096_2: dese īyeva, pokkharaṃ vuccati kamalaṃ, pokkharaṇī, puna itthiyaṃ nī, pubbaī-kārassa
anya-e0201n0:3096_3: attaṃ, uppalinī, kumudinī, bhisinī, muḷālinī, sālukinī, padumaṃ ettha dese atthīti
anya-e0201n0:3096_4: padumī, tato itthiyaṃ nī, paduminī, pubbaī-kārassa rassattaṃ, sabbaṃ kamalākarassa
anya-e0201n0:3096_5: vā kamalagacchassa vā nāmaṃ, aññatra pokkharavā hatthī, idha soṇḍā pokkharaṃ nāma.
anya-e0201n0:3097: Sikhī, sikhāvā, mālī, mālāvā, sīlī, sīlavā, balī, balavā. Samāsantepi ī, niddāsīlī, sabhāsīlī, bāhubalī, ūrubalī. Sukha, dukkhehi īyeva, sukhī, dukkhī iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:3098: 477. Tapādīhi sī ka. 365; rū. 399; nī. 789; caṃ. 4.2.106; pā. 5.2.102; ‘… ssī’ (bahūsu).
anya-e0201n0:3100: Tapo assa asmiṃ vā vijjatīti tapassī, dvittaṃ. Evaṃ yasassī, tejassī, mano assa atthīti manassī.
anya-e0201n0:3104: Tapo assa atthīti tāpaso, itthiyaṃ tāpasī.
anya-e0201n0:3107_0: Asaṃyataṃ mukhaṃ assa atthīti mukharo, susi assa atthīti susiro, rukkho, ūso khāro
anya-e0201n0:3107_1: yasmiṃ atthīti ūsaro, khārabhūmippadeso, madhu raso assa atthīti madhuro, guḷo, nagā
anya-e0201n0:3107_2: ettha santīti nagaro, bahupabbatappadeso, “nagara”ntipi pāṭho, kuñjo vuccati hanu,
anya-e0201n0:3107_3: kuñjaro, hatthī, uṇṇatā dantā assa santīti danturo, hatthīyeva, mahāvuttinā assa uttaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:3110: Tundi vuccati vuddhā nābhi, tundibho, valiyo etasmiṃ atthīti valibho.
anya-e0201n0:3112: 481. Saddhāditva ka. 370; rū. 405; nī. 795; caṃ. 4.2.105; pā. 5.2.101 (saddādivha?).
anya-e0201n0:3114: Saddhā assa atthi, asmiṃ vā vijjatīti saddho. Evaṃ pañño, sato.
anya-e0201n0:3116: 482. Ālvābhijjhādīhi ka. 359; rū. 384; nī. 779; caṃ. 4.2.157; pā. 3.2.158.
anya-e0201n0:3118_0: Abhijjhā adhikā assa atthīti abhijjhālu, sītaladukkhaṃ adhikaṃ assa atthīti sītālu,
anya-e0201n0:3118_1: dhajā bahulā asmiṃ rathe santīti dhajālu, dayā bahulā assāti dayālu, purisacittaṃ
anya-e0201n0:3122_0: Picchaṃ tūlaṃ assa atthi, tasmiṃ vā vijjatīti picchilo, picchavā, tūlarukkho, picchilā
anya-e0201n0:3122_1: sippali sippalī, sīmbalī, semmalītipi dissati, phenilo pheṇilotipi dissati, phenavā,
anya-e0201n0:3122_2: addāriṭṭhako, jaṭilo, jaṭāvā, tāpaso, tuṇḍilo, tuṇḍavā, adhikā vācā assa atthīti
anya-e0201n0:3125_0: Niccarakkhitasīlaṃ assa atthi, asmiṃ vā vijjatīti sīlavo, puriso, sīlavā, itthī,
anya-e0201n0:3125_1: kesā atidīghā asmiṃ santīti kesavo, kesavā, aparimāṇā aṇṇā udakā asmiṃ santīti aṇṇavo,
anya-e0201n0:3125_2: mahantaṃ balaṃ assa atthīti balavo, balavā, balavaṃ. Gāṇḍī vuccati sandhi, bahavo
anya-e0201n0:3125_3: gāṇḍī asmiṃ atthīti gāṇḍīvaṃ, dhanu gaṇḍassa gaṇḍamigasiṅgassa ayaṃ gāṇḍī, so assa
anya-e0201n0:3125_4: atthīti gāṇḍīti gāṇḍīvo. (pañcakāṭīkā). gāṇḍīmeṇḍasiṅgamassa atthīti gāṇḍīvaṃ, dhanu.
anya-e0201n0:3125_5: (payogasiddhi). gāṇḍī ganthi, so atthi assa asmiṃ vā gāṇḍīvo ajjunadhanu, (mugdhabodhaṭīkā),
anya-e0201n0:3125_6: bahukā rājī assa atthīti rājīvaṃ, paṅkajaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:3129: 486. Issare āmyuvāmī ka. 364; rū. 398; nī. 787; caṃ. 4.2.143; pā. 5.2.126; “sissare…” (bahūsu).
anya-e0201n0:3131: Issariyaṭṭhānabhūtaṃ saṃ assa atthīti sāmī, suvāmī su. ni. 671, itthiyaṃ sāminī, suvāminī, bindulopo, kāgame sāmiko.
anya-e0201n0:3132: 487. Lakkhyā ṇo a ca ka. 364; rū. 398; nī. 787; pā. 5.2.100.
anya-e0201n0:3133: Lakkhīmhā mantvatthe ṇo hoti, īkārassa attañca hoti.
anya-e0201n0:3135: 488. Aṅgā no kalyāṇe ka. 364; rū. 398; nī. 787; pā. 5.2.100.
anya-e0201n0:3136: Kalyāṇe vattabbe aṅgamhā mantvatthe no hoti.
anya-e0201n0:3137: Kalyāṇaṃ aṅgaṃ etissā itthiyā atthīti aṅganā.
anya-e0201n0:3140: Bahūni lomāni assa santīti lomaso. Ettha ‘so’ti suttavibhāgena “sumedhaso, bhūrimedhaso” iccādīnipi sijjhanti.
anya-e0201n0:3143: 490. Tassa bhāvakammesu tta tā ttana ṇya ṇeyyaṇiya ṇa iyā ka. 360; rū. 387; nī. 780; caṃ. 4.1.136-153; pā. 5.1.119-136.
anya-e0201n0:3144: Tassa bhāvo, tassa kammanti atthe chaṭṭhuntā ete aṭṭha paccayā bahulaṃ bhavanti.
anya-e0201n0:3145_0: Tattha bhavanti buddhi, saddā etasmāti bhāvo, saddānaṃ attano atthesu ādimhi uppattikāraṇaṃ,
anya-e0201n0:3145_1: cirakālaṃ pavattikāraṇañca. Tattha ādimhi pavattikāraṇaṃ byappattinimittaṃ nāma.
anya-e0201n0:3145_2: Cirakālaṃ pavattikāraṇaṃ pavattinimittaṃ nāma. Tadubhayampi jāti, dabba, guṇa, kriyā,
anya-e0201n0:3146: Tattha “gossa bhāvo gotta”nti ettha gojāti bhāvo nāma.
anya-e0201n0:3147: “Daṇḍino bhāvo daṇḍitta”nti ettha daṇḍadabbaṃ bhāvo nāma.
anya-e0201n0:3148: “Nīlassa paṭassa bhāvo nīlatta”nti ettha nīlaguṇo bhāvo nāma.
anya-e0201n0:3149: “Pācakassa bhāvo pācakatta”nti ettha pacanakriyā bhāvo nāma.
anya-e0201n0:3150: “Tissanāmassa janassa bhāvo tissatta”nti ettha tissanāmaṃ bhāvo nāma.
anya-e0201n0:3151: Tattha gossa bhāvoti gosaddaṃ sutvā godabbe gobuddhiyā vā godabbaṃ disvā tasmiṃ dabbe govohārassa vā pavattikāraṇanti attho. Evaṃ sesesupi yathānurūpaṃ attho veditabbo.
anya-e0201n0:3155_0: Ṇyamhi-alasassa bhāvo ālasyaṃ, samaṇassa bhāvo sāmaññaṃ, brāhmaṇassa bhāvo brāhmaññaṃ,
anya-e0201n0:3155_1: sīlasamādhipaññāguṇo sāmaññañca brāhmaññañca nāma. Tāpasassa bhāvo tāpasyaṃ, nipuṇassa
anya-e0201n0:3155_2: bhāvo nepuññaṃ, vipulassa bhāvo vepullaṃ, rañño bhāvo rajjaṃ, āpabbatassa khettassa
anya-e0201n0:3155_3: bhāvo āpabbatyaṃ, dāyādassa bhāvo dāyajjaṃ, visamassa bhāvo vesammaṃ, sakhino bhāvo
anya-e0201n0:3156: Ṇeyyamhi – sucissa bhāvo soceyyaṃ. Evaṃ ādhipateyyaṃ iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:3157_0: Ṇiyamhi-ālasiyaṃ, madabhāvo madiyaṃ. Evaṃ dakkhiyaṃ, purohitabhāvo porohitiyaṃ, byattassa
anya-e0201n0:3157_1: bhāvo veyyattiyaṃ, byāvaṭassa bhāvo veyyāvaṭiyaṃ, imāni dve pubbe veyyākaraṇapadaṃ viya siddhāni.
anya-e0201n0:3158: Ṇamhi-garuno bhāvo gāravo, paṭubhāvo pāṭavaṃ iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:3159: Iyamhi-adhipatibhāvo adhipatiyaṃ, paṇḍitabhāvo paṇḍitiyaṃ, bahussutabhāvo bahussutiyaṃ, naggassa bhāvo naggiyaṃ, sūrabhāvo sūriyaṃ, vīrabhāvo vīriyaṃ iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:3160: Kammatthe kammaṃ nāma kriyā, alasassa kammaṃ alasattaṃ, alasatā, alasattanaṃ, ālasyaṃ, ālaseyyaṃ, ālasiyaṃ, ālasaṃ, alasiyaṃ iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:3161: 491. Bya vaddhadāsā vā ka. 360; rū. 387; nī. 780.
anya-e0201n0:3162: Bhāva, kammesu vaddha, dāsehi byo hoti vā.
anya-e0201n0:3163: Vaddhassa bhāvo kammaṃ vā vaddhabyaṃ, vaddhatā, dāsabyaṃ, dāsatā, ‘vaddhava’nti idha ṇe pare vāgamo.
anya-e0201n0:3164: 492. Naṇa yuvā bo ca vaye ka. 361; rū. 388; nī. 781; caṃ. 4.1.146; pā. 5.1.130; ‘…vassa’ (bahūsu).
anya-e0201n0:3165: Vaye gamyamāne bhāva, kammesu yuvato naṇa hoti vā bāgamo ca.
anya-e0201n0:3168: 493. Aṇvādīhimo ka. 360; rū. 387; nī. 780; caṃ. 4.1.139; pā. 5.1.122; ‘aṇvāditvimo’ (bahūsu).
anya-e0201n0:3170: Aṇuno bhāvo aṇimā, laghuno bhāvo laghimā.
anya-e0201n0:3172: Imapaccaye pare kassa, mahantasaddānaṃ kamena kasa, mahā honti.
anya-e0201n0:3173_0: Kassakassa kammaṃ kasimā (kisamahatamime kasamahā. imapaccaye pare kisa, mahanthasaddānaṃ
anya-e0201n0:3173_1: kamena kasa, mahā honthi. kisassa bhāvo kasimā, moga. 4-133), mahantassa bhāvo mahimā.
anya-e0201n0:3173_2: Sumanassa bhāvo somanassaṃ, ṇyamhi sāgamo, ‘vaggalasehi te’ti yassa pararūpattaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:3173_3: Evaṃ domanassaṃ, sundaraṃ vaco etasminti suvaco, suvacassa bhāvo sovacassaṃ. Evaṃ dovacassaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:3174_1: ramaṇaṃ, ramaṇaṃ ettha atthīti rāmaṇo, ārāmo, ārāmarāmaṇassa bhāvo ārāmarāmaṇeyyakaṃ,
anya-e0201n0:3174_2: ṇeyyo, sakatthe ca ko kathaṃ rāmaṇiyakatthi? sakatthe kanthā ṇena siddhaṃ,, ārāmasampatti,
anya-e0201n0:3177: 495. Tamassa parimāṇaṃ ṇiko ca ka. 351; rū. 374; nī. 764; caṃ. 4.1.62; pā. 5.1.57, 58.
anya-e0201n0:3178: Taṃ assa parimāṇanti atthe paṭhamantā ṇiko hoti ko ca. Parimīyate anenāti parimāṇaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:3179_0: Doṇo parimāṇamassāti doṇiko. Evaṃ khāriko, kumbhiko, asītivassāni parimāṇamassāti
anya-e0201n0:3179_1: āsītiko, vayo. Evaṃ nāvutiko, upaḍḍhakāyo parimāṇamassāti upaḍḍhakāyikaṃ, bimbohanaṃ,
anya-e0201n0:3179_2: dve parimāṇamassāti dukaṃ. Evaṃ tikaṃ, catukkaṃ, pañcakaṃ, chakkaṃ, dvittaṃ. Dasakaṃ, satakaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:3180: 496. Yatetehi ttako ka. 391; rū. 423; nī. 830; pā. 5.1.22, 23
anya-e0201n0:3181: Tamassa parimāṇanti atthe ya, ta, etasaddehi sadisadvibhūto ttako hoti.
anya-e0201n0:3185: Etaṃ parimāṇamassāti ettakaṃ, yāva parimāṇamassāti yāvattakaṃ. Evaṃ tāvattakaṃ, etāvattakaṃ. ‘Yatetehī’ti vacanena yāva, tāva, etāvāpi gayhanti.
anya-e0201n0:3186: 498. Sabbā ca ṭāvantu ka. 391; rū. 423; nī. 830; caṃ. 4.2.43; pā. 5.2.39; ‘sabbā cacavantu’ (bahūsu).
anya-e0201n0:3187: Tamassa parimāṇanti atthe ya, te’tehi ca sabbato ca ṭāvantu hoti, etassa dvittaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:3188_0: Sabbaṃ parimāṇaṃ assāti sabbāvantaṃ, sabbāvā, attho, sabbāvanto, sabbāvantā, atthā,
anya-e0201n0:3188_1: sabbāvati, atthe, sabbāvantesu, atthesu, itthiyaṃ sabbāvatī, sabbāvantī, parisā.
anya-e0201n0:3188_2: Evaṃ yāvā, yāvantā, yāvanto, tāvā, tāvantā, tāvanto, ettāvā, ettāvantā, ettāvanto iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:3189: Kvaci mahāvuttinā ekassa ta-kārassa lopo, yāvatako kāyo, tāvatako byāmo dī. ni. 3.200, yāvatikā yānassa bhūmi.
anya-e0201n0:3190: 499. Kiṃmhā rati rīva rīvataka rittakā ka. 391; rū. 423; nī. 830; caṃ. 4.2.45; pā. 5.2.41.
anya-e0201n0:3191: Taṃ assa parimāṇanti atthe kiṃsaddato ete cattāro paccayā bhavanti.
anya-e0201n0:3193: Rānubandhe paccaye pare padantasarādissa lopo hoti. Ādisaddena padantabyañjanaṃ gayhati, suttavibhattena rīvantu, rittāvantupaccayā ca honti.
anya-e0201n0:3194_0: Kiṃ parimāṇamassāti kati. Pañcakkhandhā kati kusalā, kati akusalā vibha. 151, kativassosi
anya-e0201n0:3194_1: tvaṃ bhikkhu, ekavasso ahaṃ bhagavā mahāva. 78, kiṃ parimāṇaṃ assāti kīvaṃ, kiṃva
anya-e0201n0:3194_2: dūro ito gāmo. Evaṃ kīvatakaṃ, kittakaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:3195: Rīvantumhi – kīvanto hontu yācakā jā. 2.20.103 ti.
anya-e0201n0:3196: Rittāvantumhi – kittāvatā khandhānaṃ khandhapaññatti saṃ. ni. 3.82, kittāvatā nu kho bhante rūpanti vuccati, kittāvatā nu kho bhante māroti vuccati saṃ. ni. 3.161.
anya-e0201n0:3197: Pubbasuttena ṭāvantumhi – ettāvatā khandhānaṃ khandhapaññatti, ettāvatā rūpanti vuccati, ettāvatā māroti vuccati.
anya-e0201n0:3199_0: Mīyate etenāti mānaṃ, taṃ ummānaṃ, parimāṇanti duvidhaṃ, uddhaṃ mānaṃ ummānaṃ, tadaññaṃ
anya-e0201n0:3199_1: mānaṃ parimāṇaṃ, imasmiṃ sutte pana sāmaññavacanattā duvidhampi labbhati, duvidhe
anya-e0201n0:3199_2: māne pavattā hatthādisaddamhā tamassa parimāṇanti atthe mattapaccayo hoti.
anya-e0201n0:3200_0: Hattho parimāṇaṃ assāti hatthamattaṃ, dve hatthā parimāṇaṃ assāti dvihatthamattaṃ,
anya-e0201n0:3200_1: dve aṅguliyo parimāṇaṃ assāti dvaṅgulamattaṃ. Evaṃ caturaṅgulamattaṃ, vidatthimattaṃ,
anya-e0201n0:3200_2: yojanamattaṃ, tīṇi yojanāni parimāṇaṃ assāti tiyojanamattaṃ, nāḷimattaṃ, patthamattaṃ,
anya-e0201n0:3200_3: doṇamattaṃ, palaṃ vuccati ummānasaṅkhāto pātiviseso, palaṃ parimāṇaṃ assāti palamattaṃ,
anya-e0201n0:3200_4: pañcamattaṃ, pañcamattehi bhikkhusatehi saddhiṃ pārā. 1, tiṃsamattaṃ, saṭṭhimattaṃ,
anya-e0201n0:3200_5: satamattaṃ, sahassamattaṃ, koṭimattaṃ, kumbhamattaṃ, cāṭimattaṃ, hatthimattaṃ, pabbatamattaṃ iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:3201_0: ‘Mattā’ti vā parimāṇavācisaddantaraṃ, hattho mattā etassāti hatthamattaṃ. Evaṃ dvihatthamattaṃ,
anya-e0201n0:3201_1: iccādinā samāsopi yujjati. Abhedūpacārena pana hatthaparimāṇaṃ hatthoti katvā “dvihatthaṃ
anya-e0201n0:3201_2: vatthaṃ, doṇo vīhi, doṇo māso”ti sijjhati.
anya-e0201n0:3202: 502. Taggho cuddhaṃ ka. 328; rū. 352; nī. 708; caṃ. 4.2.39; pā. 5.2.37.
anya-e0201n0:3203: Uddhaṃmāne pavattā saddā tamassa parimāṇanti atthe tagghapaccayo hoti matto ca.
anya-e0201n0:3206: Uddhaṃmāne pavattā purisamhā ṇo ca hoti taggho ca matto ca.
anya-e0201n0:3207_0: Catuhattho puriso parimāṇamassāti porisaṃ, tiporisaṃ, sataporisaṃ, gambhīraṃ. Evaṃ
anya-e0201n0:3207_1: purisatagghaṃ, purisamattaṃ, uddhaṃ pasāritahatthena saddhiṃ pañcahatthaṃ purisapamāṇaṃ
anya-e0201n0:3207_2: porisanti vadanti, “ekūnatīso vayasā”ti dī. ni. 2.214 (ekūnatiṃso) ettha ekūnatīsa
anya-e0201n0:3207_3: vassāni āyuparimāṇaṃ assāti ekūnatīso. Evaṃ vīso, tīso, cattālīso, paññāso, sahasso
anya-e0201n0:3207_4: brahmā, dvisahasso brahmā, dasasahasso brahmā. Ettha ca “sahassaparimāṇaṃ cakkavāḷaṃ
anya-e0201n0:3210: 504. Ekā kākyasahāye ka. 391; rū. 423; nī. 835; caṃ. 4.2.67; pā. 5.3.52.
anya-e0201n0:3211: Asahāyatthe ekamhā ka, ākī honti vā.
anya-e0201n0:3212: Asahāyo eko, ekako, ekākī, eko vā.
anya-e0201n0:3213: Itthiyaṃ ekikā, ekākinī, ekā vā, ‘adhātussa ke’ti suttena itthiyaṃ kamhi pare assa ittaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:3214: 505. Dviti catūhi tīyatthā ka. 385; rū. 409; nī. 817; tisatthā?.
anya-e0201n0:3215: Tehi tassa pūraṇanti atthe tīyo ca ttho ca honti.
anya-e0201n0:3216: 506. Dvitīnaṃ dutā tīye ka. 386, 410; nī. 818; tiye?.
anya-e0201n0:3217: Tīye pare dvi, tisaddānaṃ du, tādesā honti.
anya-e0201n0:3218_0: Dvinnaṃ pūraṇo dutīyo chaṭṭhasaṃgīti pāṭhesu dutiyotyādinā dissanti, dvinnaṃ pūraṇī
anya-e0201n0:3218_1: dutīyā, dvinnaṃ pūraṇaṃ dutīyaṃ. Evaṃ tatīyo, tatīyā, tatīyaṃ. Catunnaṃ pūraṇo catuttho,
anya-e0201n0:3219: 507. Ma pañcādikatihi ka. 373; rū. 406; nī. 802; caṃ. 4.2.55; pā. 5.2.49.
anya-e0201n0:3220: Pañcādīhi ca katimhā ca tassa pūraṇanti atthe mo hoti.
anya-e0201n0:3221: Pañcamo, pañcamī, pañcamaṃ. Evaṃ sattama, aṭṭhama, navama, dasama, ekādasamādi. Katinnaṃ pūraṇo katimo, katimī, tithī.
anya-e0201n0:3222: 508. Tassa pūraṇekādasādito vā ka. 374; rū. 412; nī. 805; caṃ. 4.2.51; pā. 5.2.48.
anya-e0201n0:3223: Pūrate anenāti pūraṇaṃ, ekādasādito tassa pūraṇanti atthe ṭānubandho apaccayo hoti vā.
anya-e0201n0:3224_0: Ekādasannaṃ pūraṇo ekādaso, ekādasī, ekādasaṃ, ekādasamo vā. Evaṃ dvādaso, dvādasamo,
anya-e0201n0:3224_1: teraso, terasamo, cuddaso, cuddasamo, pañcadaso, pañcadasamo, pannaraso, pannarasamo,
anya-e0201n0:3224_2: soḷaso, soḷasamo, sattaraso, sattarasamo, aṭṭhāraso, aṭṭhārasamo.
anya-e0201n0:3225: 509. Ṭe satissa tissa ka. 389; rū. 413; nī. 824.
anya-e0201n0:3226: Ṭe pare satissa ti-kārassa lopo hotīti vīsati, tīsatīnaṃ tissa lopo.
anya-e0201n0:3227: Ekūnavīso, ekūnavīsatimo, vīso, vīsatimo, tīso, tīsatimo, cattālīso, cattālīsamo, paññāso, paññāsamo. Saṭṭhyādito purimasuttena mo, saṭṭhimo, sattatimo, asītimo, navutimo.
anya-e0201n0:3229: Satādito tassa pūraṇatthe mo hoti, satādīnaṃ antassa ittañca hoti.
anya-e0201n0:3230: Satassa pūraṇo satimo, dvisatimo, tisatimo, sahassimo.
anya-e0201n0:3232: Chamhā tassa pūraṇanti atthe ṭṭha, ṭṭhamā honti.
anya-e0201n0:3233: Chaṭṭho, chaṭṭhī, chaṭṭhaṃ, chaṭṭhamo, chaṭṭhamī, chaṭṭhamaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:3234: 512. Saṅkhyāya saccutīsāsadasantāyādhikāsmiṃ satasahasse ṭa ka. 328; rū. 352; nī. 701; caṃ. 4.2.50 …pe… 5.2.45, 46; ‘…ḍo’ (bahūsu).
anya-e0201n0:3235: Sati, uti, īsa, āsa, dasantāhi saṅkhyāhi te adhikā asmiṃ satasahasseti atthe ṭānubandho apaccayo hoti.
anya-e0201n0:3236: Ettha ca ‘satasahasse’ti sate vā sahasse vāti attho.
anya-e0201n0:3237: Tattha sahassasaddena sahassaṃ dasasahassaṃ satasahassaṃ dasasatasahassañca gayhati.
anya-e0201n0:3238: Dasanta, satyanta, īsanta, āsanta, utyantāti evaṃ anukkamo veditabbo.
anya-e0201n0:3239: Tattha dasa, ekādasato paṭṭhāya yāva aṭṭhārasā navasaṅkhyā dasantā nāma.
anya-e0201n0:3240: Vīsati, ekavīsatito paṭṭhāya yāva aṭṭhavīsatiyā navasaṅkhyā ca tīsati, ekatīsatito paṭṭhāya yāva aṭṭhatīsatiyā navasaṅkhyā ca satyantā nāma.
anya-e0201n0:3241: Cattālīsa, ekacattālīsato paṭṭhāya yāva aṭṭhacattālīsāya navasaṅkhyā īsantā nāma.
anya-e0201n0:3242: Paññāsa, ekapaññāsato paṭṭhāya yāva aṭṭhapaññāsāya navasaṅkhyā āsantā nāma.
anya-e0201n0:3243: Navuti, ekanavutito paṭṭhāya yāva aṭṭhanavutiyā nava saṅkhyā utyantā nāma.
anya-e0201n0:3244: Sesā ṭṭhunta, tyantāpi idha saṅgayhanti. Ṭṭhuntā nāma saṭṭhi,-ekasaṭṭhyādikā navasaṅkhyā. Tyantā nāma sattati, ekasattatyādikā navasaṅkhyā ca asīti, ekāsītyādikā navasaṅkhyā ca.
anya-e0201n0:3245_0: Dasantāsu tāva – dasa adhikā yasmiṃ sate tayidaṃ dasasataṃ. Evaṃ dasasahassaṃ, dasasatasahassaṃ,
anya-e0201n0:3245_1: ekādasa adhikā yasmiṃ sate tayidaṃ ekādasasataṃ. Evaṃ ekādasasahassaṃ, ekādasasatasahassaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:3246_0: Satyantāsu – ṭamhi ti-kāralopo, vīsati adhikā yasmiṃ sate tayidaṃ vīsasataṃ. Evaṃ
anya-e0201n0:3246_1: ekavīsasataṃ, dvāvīsasataṃ iccādi, tīsati adhikā yasmiṃ sate tayidaṃ tīsasataṃ. Evaṃ
anya-e0201n0:3246_2: ekatīsasataṃ, dvattīsasataṃ iccādi. Esa nayo sahassepi.
anya-e0201n0:3247: Īsantāsu – cattālīsaṃ adhikā yasmiṃ sate tayidaṃ cattālīsasataṃ. Evaṃ ekacattālīsasataṃ, dvecattālīsasataṃ iccādi. Esa nayo sahassepi.
anya-e0201n0:3248: Āsantāsu – paññāsaṃ adhikā yasmiṃ sate tayidaṃ paññāsasataṃ. Evaṃ ekapaññāsasataṃ, dvepaññāsasataṃ iccādi. Esa nayo sahassepi.
anya-e0201n0:3249: Ṭṭhuntāsu – saṭṭhi adhikā yasmiṃ sate tayidaṃ saṭṭhisataṃ. Evaṃ ekasaṭṭhisataṃ, dvāsaṭṭhisataṃ iccādi. Esa nayo sahassepi.
anya-e0201n0:3250: Tyantāsu – sattati adhikā, ekasattati adhikā, asīti adhikā, ekāsīti adhikā iccādinā vattabbā.
anya-e0201n0:3251: Utyantāsu – navuti adhikā yasmiṃ sate tayidaṃ navutisataṃ. Evaṃ ekanavutisataṃ, dvenavutisataṃ iccādi. Esa nayo sahassepi.
anya-e0201n0:3252: Atha vā dasantā nāma ekato paṭṭhāya dasasaṅkhyā.
anya-e0201n0:3257_0: Eko adhiko yasmiṃ sate tayidaṃ ekasataṃ, “athetthekasataṃ khatyā, anuyantā yasassino”ti
anya-e0201n0:3257_1: jā. 2.22.594 pāḷi. “Dve adhikā yasmiṃ sate tayidaṃ dvisataṃ” iccādinā sabbaṃ vattabbaṃ,
anya-e0201n0:3258_0: Yathā pana “eko ca dasa ca ekādasa, ekādhikā vā dasa ekādasā”ti sijjhati, tathā idhapi
anya-e0201n0:3258_1: “dasa ca satañca dasasataṃ, dasādhikaṃ vā sataṃ dasasata”ntiādinā vutte sabbaṃ taṃ
anya-e0201n0:3259_0: Tattha pana “dve satāni dvisataṃ, tīṇi satāni tisata”miccādīni ca “dve sahassāni
anya-e0201n0:3259_1: dvisahassaṃ, tīṇi sahassāni tisahassa”miccādīni ca “dve satasahassāni dvisatasahassaṃ,
anya-e0201n0:3259_2: tīṇi satasahassāni tisatasahassa”miccādīni ca digusamāse sijjhanti.
anya-e0201n0:3260: 513. Vārasaṅkhyāyakkhattuṃ ka. 646; rū. 419; nī. 1282; caṃ. 4.4.5; pā. 5.4.17.
anya-e0201n0:3262: Dve vārā dvikkhattuṃ. Evaṃ tikkhattuṃ, catukkhattuṃ, pañcakkhattuṃ, dasakkhattuṃ, satakkhattuṃ, sahassakkhattuṃ.
anya-e0201n0:3264: Vārasambandhibhūtā katisaddā kkhattuṃ hoti. Kati vārā katikkhattuṃ.
anya-e0201n0:3265: 515. Bahumhā dhā ca paccāsattiyā ka. 646; rū. 419; nī. 1282; ‘paccāsattiyaṃ’ (bahūsu).
anya-e0201n0:3266: Vārasambandhibhūtā bahusaddā paccāsattiyā sati dhā ca hoti kkhattuñca.
anya-e0201n0:3267_0: Bahuvārā bahukkhattuṃ, bahusaddena anekavāraṃ upalakkheti, anekavārā anekakkhattuṃ.
anya-e0201n0:3267_1: Evaṃ bahuvārā bahudhā, anekavārā anekadhā. Paccāsatti nāma vārānaṃ accāsannatā vuccati,
anya-e0201n0:3267_2: divasassa bahukkhattuṃ bhuñjati, bahudhā bhuñjati, vārānaṃ dūrabhāve sati te paccayā
anya-e0201n0:3276: Dvīhi pakārehi dvidhā. Evaṃ tidhā, catudhā, pañcadhā, dasadhā, satadhā, sahassadhā, bahudhā, ekadhā, anekadhā.
anya-e0201n0:3283: 520. Sabbādīhi pakāre thā ka. 398; rū. 421; nī. 844; caṃ. 4.3.26; pā. 5.3.69.
anya-e0201n0:3284: Bahubhedo vā sāmaññassa bhedako viseso vā pakāro, sabbādīhi pakāre thā hoti.
anya-e0201n0:3285: Sabbena pakārena sabbathā, sabbehi pakārehi sabbathā, yādisena pakārena yathā, yādisehi pakārehi yathā. Evaṃ tathā, aññathā, ubhayathā, itarathā.
anya-e0201n0:3288: Kena pakārena kathaṃ, iminā pakārena itthaṃ. Iminā suttena kiṃ, imasaddehi thaṃ, tthaṃpaccaye katvā kiṃssa kattaṃ, imassa ittañca kariyati.
anya-e0201n0:3289: 522. Tabbati jātiyo ka. 398; rū. 421; nī. 844; caṃ. 4.3.26; pā. 5.3.69.
anya-e0201n0:3290: So pakāro assa atthīti tabbā, tasmiṃ tabbati, pakāravante dabbeti attho. Taṃsāmaññavācimhā tabbati jātiyapaccayo hoti.
anya-e0201n0:3291: Visesena paṭurūpo paṇḍito paṭujātiyo. Visesena mudurūpaṃ vatthu mudujātiyaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:3292: 523. So vīcchāppakāresu ka. 397; rū. 420; nī. 836; caṃ. 4.4.2 …pe… 5.4.43.
anya-e0201n0:3295: Padaṃ padaṃ vāceti padaso vāceti. Khaṇḍaṃ khaṇḍaṃ karoti khaṇḍaso karoti, bilaṃ bilaṃ vibhajjati bilaso vibhajjati iccādi. Ettha ca ‘padaṃ padaṃ’ iccādīsu kriyāvisesane dutiyā.
anya-e0201n0:3297: Bahūhi pakārehi puthuso, sabbehi pakārehi sabbaso iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:3298: “Yoniso upāyaso, ṭhānaso, hetuso, atthaso, dhammaso, suttaso, anubyañjanaso” iccādīsu pana mahāvuttinā tatiyekavacanassa sottaṃ. Tathā dīghaso, oraso iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:3301: 524. Pitito bhātari reyyaṇa ka. 352; rū. 376; nī. 765.
anya-e0201n0:3302: Pitusaddamhā tassa bhātāti atthe reyyaṇa hoti.
anya-e0201n0:3303: Pitu bhātā petteyyo a. ni. 6.44. ‘Rānubandhentasarādissā’ti ussa lopo, tassa dvittaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:3304: 525. Mātito ca bhaginiyaṃ cho ka. 352; rū. 376; nī. 765.
anya-e0201n0:3305: Mātito pitito ca bhaginiyaṃ cho hoti.
anya-e0201n0:3306: Mātu bhaginī mātucchā udā. 22, pitu bhaginī pitucchā saṃ. ni. 2.243.
anya-e0201n0:3307: 526. Mātāpitūsvāmaho ka. 352; rū. 376; nī. 765; caṃ. 3.1.60; pā. 4.2.36.
anya-e0201n0:3309: Mātu mātā mātāmahī, mātu pitā mātāmaho ma. ni. 2.411, pitu mātā pitāmahī, pitu pitā pitāmaho.
anya-e0201n0:3314: Mātu hito metteyyo, pitu hito petteyyo. Mātāpitūsu suppaṭipanno.
anya-e0201n0:3317: Upādānānaṃ hitaṃ upādāniyaṃ. Evaṃ oghaniyaṃ, yoganiyaṃ, ganthaniyaṃ, nīvaraṇiyaṃ, suttavibhattiyā aññatthesupi iyo, samānodare sayito sodariyo.
anya-e0201n0:3319: Tassa hitanti atthe cakkhvādīhi sso hoti.
anya-e0201n0:3320: Cakkhussa hitaṃ cakkhussaṃ a. ni. 5.208, subharūpaṃ cakkhubhesajjañca. Āyuno hitaṃ āyussaṃ a. ni. 5.231, āyuvaḍḍhanavidhi.
anya-e0201n0:3323: Sabhāyaṃ sādhu sabbho, ‘sādhū’ti kusalo yogyo hito vā. Mittānaṃ hitaṃ mettaṃ. Suttavibhāgā aññatrapi ṇyo, rathaṃ vahatīti racchā, rathavīthi.
anya-e0201n0:3325: Tasmiṃ sādhūti atthe kammamhā niya, ññā honti.
anya-e0201n0:3328: Tattha sādhūti atthe kathādīhi iko hoti.
anya-e0201n0:3329: Kathāyaṃ sādhu kathiko, dhammakathāyaṃ sādhu dhammakathiko, saṅgāme sādhu saṅgāmiko, gāmavāse sādhu gāmavāsiko, upavāse sādhu upavāsiko.
anya-e0201n0:3330: 533. Pathādīhi ṇeyyo ka. 352; rū. 376; nī. 765; caṃ. 3.4.105; pā. 4.4.104.
anya-e0201n0:3331: Tattha sādhūti atthe pathādīhi ṇeyyo hoti.
anya-e0201n0:3332: Pathe sādhu pātheyyaṃ, saṃ vuccati dhanaṃ, tassa pati sapati, sapatimhi sādhu sāpateyyaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:3333: 534. Dakkhiṇāyārahe ka. 352; rū. 376; nī. 765; caṃ. 4.1.80; pā. 5.1.69.
anya-e0201n0:3336: 535. Āyo tumantā ka. 352; rū. 376; nī. 765; ‘rāyo tumantā’ (bahūsu).
anya-e0201n0:3338: Ghātetuṃ arahatīti ghātetāyo, jāpetuṃ arahatīti jāpetāyo, ‘jāpetu’nti hāpetuṃ, pabbājetuṃ arahatīti pabbājetāyo, mahāvuttinā āyamhi sabinduno ussa lopo.
anya-e0201n0:3341: 536. Tassa vikārāvayavesu ṇa ṇika ṇeyyamayā ka. 352, 351, 372; rū. 376, 374, 385; nī. 765, 764, 798; caṃ. 3.3.103; pā. 4.3.134.
anya-e0201n0:3342: Tassa vikāro, tassa avayavoti atthesu ṇādayo honti, pakatiyā uttari avatthantarāpatti vikāro.
anya-e0201n0:3343: Udumbarassa vikati odumbaraṃ, bhasmā, udumbarassa avayavo odumbaraṃ, paṇṇādi. Kapotāvayavo kāpotaṃ, maṃsalohitapattādi.
anya-e0201n0:3345: Ṇeyyamhi-eṇissa avayavo eṇeyyaṃ, maṃsaṃ. Kosakimīnaṃ vikati koseyyaṃ, suttaṃ vatthañca.
anya-e0201n0:3346: Mayamhi-tiṇānaṃ vikati tiṇamayaṃ. Evaṃ dārumayaṃ, naḷamayaṃ, mattikāmayaṃ, gunnaṃ vikati gomayaṃ, karīsaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:3347: 537. Jatuto mayaṇa vā ka. 372; rū. 385; nī. 798; caṃ. 3.3.108; pā. 4.3.138; jatuto saṇa vā (bahūsu).
anya-e0201n0:3348: Tassa vikārāvayavesu jatuto mayaṇa hoti vā.
anya-e0201n0:3352: 538. Taratamissikiyiṭṭhātisaye ka. 363; rū. 390; nī. 786; caṃ. 4.3.45; pā. 5.3.55, 57.
anya-e0201n0:3354: Pāpānaṃ atisayena pāpoti pāpataro, pāpatamo, pāpissiko, pāpiyo, pāpiṭṭho, itthiyaṃ pāpatarā, atisayatopi atisayapaccayo hoti, atisayena pāpiṭṭho pāpiṭṭhataro.
anya-e0201n0:3355: 539. Vacchādīhi tanutte taro ka. 363; rū. 390; nī. 786; caṃ. 4.3.74; pā. 5.3.91.
anya-e0201n0:3357_0: Atitaruṇo vaccho vacchataro, itthiyaṃ vacchatarī. Yobbanassa tanutte yobbanapattānaṃ
anya-e0201n0:3357_1: susuttassa tanutte atitaruṇo usabho ukkhataro, assabhāvassa tanutte taruṇaasso assataro,
anya-e0201n0:3357_2: itthiyaṃ assatarī. Sāmatthiyassa tanutte taruṇausabho usabhataro.
anya-e0201n0:3358: 540. Kiṃmhā niddhāraṇe taratamā ka. 363; rū. 390; nī. 786; caṃ. 4.3.77; pā. 5.3.92, 93; ‘…ratara ratamā’ (bahūsu).
anya-e0201n0:3359: Kiṃsaddā niddhāraṇe gamyamāne tara, tamā honti.
anya-e0201n0:3360: Kataro bhavataṃ devadatto, kataro bhavataṃ yaññadatto, katamo bhavataṃ devadatto, katamo bhavataṃ yaññadatto, ‘kissa ko’ti suttena tara, tamesu kissa kattaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:3364: Tassa samūhoti atthe kaṇa, ṇa, ṇikā honti.
anya-e0201n0:3365: Gottapaccayantehi tāva – rājaññānaṃ samūho rājaññakaṃ, mānussakaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:3366_0: Ukkhādīhi-ukkhānaṃ usabhānaṃ samūho okkhakaṃ, oṭṭhānaṃ samūho oṭṭhakaṃ, urabbhānaṃ
anya-e0201n0:3366_1: samūho orabbhakaṃ. Evaṃ rājakaṃ, rājaputtakaṃ, hatthikaṃ, dhenukaṃ, sasaṃ adenti
anya-e0201n0:3366_2: bhakkhantīti sasādakā, tesaṃ samūho sasādakakaṃ. Ikkhaṇikaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:3368: Ṇikamhi-apūpānaṃ samūho āpūpikaṃ, sakuṇānaṃ samūho sākuṇiko saṃkulānaṃ samūho saṃkulikaṃ?.
anya-e0201n0:3371: Janatā, rājatā, bandhutā, gāmatā, sahāyatā, nagaravāsīnaṃ samūho nāgaratā iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:3373: Ubha, dvi, tīhi tassa aṃsatthe ayo hoti.
anya-e0201n0:3374: Ubho aṃsā bhāgā assāti ubhayaṃ, dve aṃsā assāti dvayaṃ, tayo aṃsā assāti tayaṃ, vatthuttayaṃ, ratanattayaṃ, dve vā tayo vā aṃsā assāti dvattayaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:3378: Tena dattoti atthe la, iyā honti. Mahāvuttinā dinnasaddassa dattattaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:3379: Devena dattoti devalo jā. 1.8.65. ‘Devilo’tipi devīlo? pāḷi. Deviyo, devadatto vā.
anya-e0201n0:3380: Evaṃ brahmalo, brahmiyo, brahmadatto, sivena bissanudevarājena datto sīvalo, sīviyo, itthiyaṃ sīvali, sīviyi, sissa dīgho.
anya-e0201n0:3381: 545. Tena nibbatte ka. 353; rū. 378; nī. 767; ‘tena nibbatte imo’?.
anya-e0201n0:3383_0: Pākena nibbattaṃ pākimaṃ, pheṇena nibbattaṃ pheṇimaṃ, veṭhanena nibbattaṃ veṭhimaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:3383_1: Evaṃ vedhimaṃ, gopphanena nibbattaṃ gopphimaṃ pārā. aṭṭha. 2.431, pupphadāmaṃ, karaṇena
anya-e0201n0:3383_2: nibbattaṃ kittimaṃ, kuttimaṃ vā, mahāvuttinā karaṇassa kittaṃ kuttañca. Suttavibhattena
anya-e0201n0:3388_0: Vedaṃ ñāṇaṃ nissitaṃ vedallaṃ, lassa dvittaṃ, duṭṭhu nissitaṃ duṭṭhullaṃ. “Madanīyaṃ,
anya-e0201n0:3388_1: bandhanīyaṃ, mucchanīyaṃ, rajanīyaṃ, gamanīyaṃ, dassanīyaṃ” iccādīni karaṇe vā adhikaraṇe
anya-e0201n0:3389_0: ‘Dhūmāyitatta’ntiādīsu dhūmo viya attānaṃ ācaratīti dhūmāyitaṃ, gaganaṃ, dhūmāyitaṃ
anya-e0201n0:3389_1: eva dhūmāyitattaṃ, sakatthe tta. Evaṃ timirāyitattaṃ, nāmadhātuto saṃ. ni. 3.87 āyapaccayena siddhaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:3390: 547. Sañjātā tārakādvitvito ka. 555; rū. 612; nī. 1142; caṃ. 4.2.37 …pe… 5.2.36; ‘sañjātaṃ…’ (bahūsu).
anya-e0201n0:3391: Tārakādīhi te assa sañjātāti atthe ito hoti.
anya-e0201n0:3392_0: Tārakā sañjātā assāti tārakitaṃ, gaganaṃ. Pupphāni sañjātāni assāti pupphito. Evaṃ
anya-e0201n0:3392_1: phalito, rukkho. Pallavāni sañjātāni assāti pallavitā, latā. Dukkhaṃ sañjātaṃ assāti
anya-e0201n0:3393_0: Paṇḍā vuccati paññā, paṇḍā sañjātā assāti paṇḍito, daṇḍo sañjāto assāti daṇḍito.
anya-e0201n0:3393_1: Mahāvuttinā tassa natte malaṃ sañjātaṃ assāti malinaṃ. Tathā pipāsā sañjātā assāti
anya-e0201n0:3393_2: pipāsito, jighacchā sañjātā assāti jighacchito, bubhukkhā sañjātā assāti bubhukkhito,
anya-e0201n0:3393_3: mucchā sañjātā assāti mucchito, visaññā sañjātā assāti visaññito, nindā sañjātā assāti nindito.
anya-e0201n0:3394: Evaṃ gabba-thambhe gabbito. Dabba-pāṭave dabbito. Antaraṃ sañjātaṃ assāti antarito, vaccaṃ sañjātaṃ assāti vaccito.
anya-e0201n0:3395: 548. Nindāññātappapaṭibhāgarassadayāsaññāsu ko ka. 391; rū. 423; nī. 835; caṃ. 4.3.62, 63, 64; pā. 5.3.73-79, 96, 97.
anya-e0201n0:3397: Nindāyaṃ – kucchito samaṇo samaṇako. Evaṃ muṇḍako, assako, uddhumātakaṃ, vinīlakaṃ, vipubbakaṃ, aṭṭhikaṃ iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:3398: Aññāte – aññāto asso assako, kassa ayaṃ assoti vā assako iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:3399: Appatthe – appakaṃ telaṃ telakaṃ. Evaṃ ghatakaṃ, khuddakaṃ dhanu dhanukaṃ, rathakaṃ, gāmakaṃ iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:3400: Paṭibhāgatthe – hatthirūpakaṃ hatthikaṃ. Evaṃ assakaṃ, balībaddako iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:3401: Rasse-rasso manusso manussako. Evaṃ rukkhako, pilakkhako iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:3402: Dayāyaṃ-anukampito putto puttako. Evaṃ vacchako, itthikā, ambakā, kumārikā iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:3406: 549. Abhūtatabbhāve karāsabhūyoge vikārācī ka. 391; rū. 423; nī. 835; caṃ. 4.4.35; pā. 5.4.50.
anya-e0201n0:3407: Pubbe tassa abhūtassa vatthuno kadāci tathā bhavanaṃ abhūtatabbhāvo, tasmiṃ abhūtatabbhāve jotaniye sati karā’sa, bhūdhātūnaṃ yoge vikāravācimhā nāmasmā cānubandho īpaccayo hoti.
anya-e0201n0:3408: Adhavalaṃ dhavalaṃ karoti dhavalīkaroti, adhavalo dhavalo siyā dhavalīsiyā, adhavalo dhavalo bhavati dhavalībhavati. Evaṃ dhavalīkāro, dhavalībhūto.
anya-e0201n0:3409: Abhūtatabbhāveti kiṃ? Ghaṭaṃ karoti, ghaṭo atthi, ghaṭo bhavati.
anya-e0201n0:3411: Vikārāti kiṃ? Pakatiyā mā hotu, suvaṇṇaṃ kuṇḍalaṃ karoti, suvaṇṇassa kuṇḍalakaraṇaṃ nāma loke pakatirūpanti vuttaṃ hoti. Evaṃ suvaṇṇaṃ kuṇḍalaṃ siyā, suvaṇṇaṃ kuṇḍalaṃ bhavatīti.
anya-e0201n0:3415: Sakatthepi paccayā dissanti. ‘Sakattho’ti sakapadattho, pakatiliṅgapadatthoti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0201n0:3416_0: Hīno eva hīnako, poto eva potako, devo eva devatā, yathābhūtameva yathābhuccaṃ, karuṇā
anya-e0201n0:3416_1: eva kāruññaṃ, pattakālameva pattakallaṃ, ākāsānantameva ākāsānañcaṃ, pāguññameva
anya-e0201n0:3416_2: pāguññatā, kammaññameva kammaññatā, dānaṃ eva dānamayaṃ, sīlaṃ eva sīlamayaṃ. Evaṃ
anya-e0201n0:3417: Yathā ca amaccaputtā eva ‘amaccaputtiyā’ti vuccanti, evaṃ “sakyaputto eva sakyaputtiyo, asamaṇo hoti asakyaputtiyo pārā. 55, evaṃ nāṭaputtiyo, dāsaputtiyo”tipi yujjati.
anya-e0201n0:3418_1: devavaṇṇī’ti ettha brahmuno vaṇṇo brahmavaṇṇo, brahmavaṇṇo viya vaṇṇo assa atthīti
anya-e0201n0:3418_2: atthe sati īpaccayo paccayattho eva hoti, na sakattho. Brahmavaṇṇo viya vaṇṇo yassa
anya-e0201n0:3418_3: soyaṃ brahmavaṇṇīti atthe sati sakatthoyeva. Api ca ekasmiṃ aññapadatthe dve samāsa,
anya-e0201n0:3418_4: taddhitā vattantītipi yujjati, tathā ‘paguṇassa bhāvo pāguññatā’tiādīsu dve taddhitapaccayā bhāvattheti.
anya-e0201n0:3422: Pubbe niddiṭṭhā ṇādayo paccayā niddiṭṭhatthato aññesupi atthesu dissanti.
anya-e0201n0:3423: Magadhesu jāto māgadho, magadhesu saṃvaḍḍhito māgadho, magadhesu nivuttho māgadho, magadhānaṃ magadhesu vā issaro māgadho iccādi, ṇo.
anya-e0201n0:3424: Kāsiṃ agghatīti kāsiyo cūḷava. 376, ‘kāsī’ti sataṃ vā sahassaṃ vā vuccati, iyo.
anya-e0201n0:3427: Pubbe niddiṭṭhapaccayehi aññepi paccayā niddiṭṭhesu aniddiṭṭhesu ca atthesu dissanti.
anya-e0201n0:3428: Visadisā vividhā (moga.) mātaro vimātaro, tāsaṃ puttā vemātikā netti 95, ikaṇa.
anya-e0201n0:3429: Pathe gacchantīti pathāvino ma. ni. 2.347, aghaṃ dukkhaṃ pāpaṃ vā gacchatīti aghāvī, āvī.
anya-e0201n0:3430: Issā assa atthīti issukī jā. 1.6.43, ukī.
anya-e0201n0:3431: Dhuraṃ vahantīti dhorayhā a. ni. 3.58, yhaṇa.
anya-e0201n0:3432: Lobhassa hitā lobhaneyyā. Evaṃ dosaneyyā, mohaneyyā, aneyyo.
anya-e0201n0:3433: Dassanaṃ arahatīti dassaneyyo. Evaṃ vandaneyyo, pūjaneyyo, namassaneyyo, eyyo.
anya-e0201n0:3434: Oghānaṃ hitā oghaniyā, yoganiyā, ganthaniyā, kammaniyaṃ, attaniyaṃ, dassaniyaṃ, pūjaniyo, namassaniyo iccādi, aniyo.
anya-e0201n0:3435: Yaṃ parimāṇaṃ assāti yāvaṃ, yāvantassa bhāvo yāvatvaṃ. Evaṃ tāvatvaṃ, tva.
anya-e0201n0:3436: Paramānaṃ uttamapurisānaṃ bhāvo kammaṃ vā pāramī, samaggānaṃ bhāvo kammaṃ vā sāmaggī, ṇī.
anya-e0201n0:3437: “Nāgavatā, sīhavatā, ājaññavatā” iccādīsu bhāve vantupaccayaṃ icchanti.
anya-e0201n0:3441: ‘Padānamādissāyuvaṇṇassāeo ṇānubandhe’ti padādibhūtānaṃ akāra, ivaṇṇu’vaṇṇānaṃ ā, e, ovuddhi.
anya-e0201n0:3442: Ādicco, vāsiṭṭho, venateyyo, meniko, pettikaṃ, odumbaraṃ, oḷumpiko, odagyaṃ, dobhaggaṃ, sobhaggaṃ iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:3444: ‘Majjhe’ti suttena padamajjhepi vuddhi, vāseṭṭho, aḍḍhateyyo iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:3445: 553. Saṃyogepi kvaci ka. 405; rū. 365; nī. 864; ‘pi’ (bahūsu natthi).
anya-e0201n0:3446: Ṇānubandhe paccaye pare saṃyogepi kvaci vuddhi hoti.
anya-e0201n0:3447: Petteyyo, pettikaṃ, decco, pamukhe sādhu pāmokkhaṃ, pamuditassa bhāvo pāmojjaṃ, vattabbanti vākyaṃ, bhajitabbanti bhāgyaṃ, bhoggaṃ, yoggaṃ iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:3451: Tattha avaṇṇe-paṇḍiccaṃ, tacchaṃ, dāyajjaṃ, dvidhā bhāvo dvejjhaṃ, karuṇāyeva kāruññaṃ iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:3452: Ivaṇṇe-adhipatissa bhāvo ādhipaccaṃ. Evaṃ ādicco, koṇḍañño iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:3453: ‘Uvaṇṇassāvaṅa sare’ti sare pare uvaṇṇassa avaṅa hoti.
anya-e0201n0:3454: Ṇamhi-lahuno bhāvo lāghavaṃ, rāghavaṃ, jamburukkhe bhavaṃ jambavaṃ. Tathā kapilavatthumhi bhavaṃ kāpilavatthavaṃ, vanaṃ. Bhātuno apaccaṃ bhātabyo, gabyaṃ, dabyaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:3455: ‘Ṭe satissā…’ti ṭamhi paccaye vīsati, tīsatīnaṃ tilopo.
anya-e0201n0:3456: Vīsatiyā pūraṇo vīso, ekūnavīso. Evaṃ tīso, ekūnatīso.
anya-e0201n0:3458: Metteyyo, petteyyo, kivaṃ, kittakaṃ, īdī, īdikkho, īdiso, āhacca, upahacca, sakkacca, adhikicca, kiriyā, vedagū, pāragū iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:3459: 554. Paccayānaṃ lopo ka. 391; rū. 423; nī. 830; moggallāne ‘lopo’ tveva dissati.
anya-e0201n0:3461_0: Buddhe ratanaṃ paṇītaṃ, cakkhu suññaṃ attena vā attaniyena vā saṃ. ni. 4.85. Ettha
anya-e0201n0:3461_1: ca ratanassa bhāvo ratanaṃ, attano bhāvo attā, attano sakassa bhāvo attaniyanti evaṃ bhāvapaccayalopo.
anya-e0201n0:3462: “Buddhānussati dhammānussati”ādīsu “buddhassa bhāvo buddho, buddhassa ayaṃ guṇo buddho”tiādinā nayena paccayalopo veditabbo.
anya-e0201n0:3464: Iyi’ṭṭhesu paresu vī, mantu, vantūnaṃ lopo hoti.
anya-e0201n0:3465: Medhāvīnaṃ atisayena medhāvīti medhiyo, medhiṭṭho, satimantānaṃ atisayena satimāti satiyo, satiṭṭho, guṇavantānaṃ atisayena guṇavāti guṇiyo, guṇiṭṭho.
anya-e0201n0:3469: 556. Jo vuddhassiyiṭṭhesu ka. 262; rū. 391; nī. 513; caṃ. 4.3.50; pā. 5.3.61, 62.
anya-e0201n0:3472: 557. Bāḷhantikapasatthānaṃ sādhanedasajā ka. 263, 264, 265; rū. 392, 393, 394; nī. 512, 514, 515; caṃ. 4.3.49, 51; pā. 5.3.60, 63; ‘… dasā’ (bahūsu).
anya-e0201n0:3473: Iya, iṭṭhapaccayesu paresu bāḷha, antika, pasatthasaddānaṃ sādha, neda, sa, jādesā honti.
anya-e0201n0:3474: Bāḷhānaṃ atisayena bāḷhoti sādhiyo, sādhiṭṭho, antikānaṃ atisayena antikoti nediyo, nediṭṭho, pasatthānaṃ atisayena pasatthoti seyyo, seṭṭho, jeyyo, jeṭṭho.
anya-e0201n0:3476: Iya, iṭṭhapaccayesu paresu appa, yuvasaddānaṃ kaṇa, kanaādesā honti.
anya-e0201n0:3477: Appānaṃ navānaṃ atisayena appo navoti kaṇiyo, kaṇiṭṭho, yuvānaṃ taruṇānaṃ atisayena yuvā taruṇoti kaniyo, kaniṭṭho, kaniye vaye bhavā kaññā.
anya-e0201n0:3478: 559. Kosajjājjava pārisajja suhajja maddavārisyāsa bhājaññatheyyabāhusaccā ka. 360, 361; rū. 387, 388; nī. 780, 781; ‘…rissā…” (bahūsu).
anya-e0201n0:3479: Bhāva, kammesu ṇānubandhe paccaye pare ete saddā nipaccante. Tattha ajjava, maddavā’sabhasaddā ṇamhi sijjhanti, sesā ṇyamhi.
anya-e0201n0:3480_0: Tattha ujuno bhāvo ajjavaṃ, iminā suttena ṇamhi ussa attaṃ, ‘uvaṇṇassāvaṅa…’ iti
anya-e0201n0:3480_1: ussa avattaṃ. Evaṃ muduno bhāvo maddavaṃ, usabhassa bhāvo āsabhaṃ, ussa āttaṃ. Kusitassa
anya-e0201n0:3480_2: kusītassa? bhāvo kosajjaṃ, iminā ilopo, tyassa jjattaṃ, parisāsu uppanno pārisajjo
anya-e0201n0:3480_3: dī. ni. 2.215, dāgamo, suhadayova suhado, yalopo, suhadassa bhāvo sohajjaṃ jā. 1.5.23,
anya-e0201n0:3480_4: isino idaṃ ārisyaṃ, issa ārittaṃ, ājāniyassa ājānīyassātipi dissati bhāvo ājaññaṃ,
anya-e0201n0:3480_5: yalopo, puna ‘lopovaṇṇivaṇṇāna’nti ilopo, tato paraṃ sandhirūpaṃ, ājāniyo eva vā
anya-e0201n0:3480_6: ājañño jā. 1.1.24, sakatthe ṇyo, thenassa bhāvo, kammaṃ vā theyyaṃ, nassa yattaṃ,
anya-e0201n0:3480_7: bahusutassa bhāvo bāhusaccaṃ, ussa attaṃ, puna sandhirūpaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:3481: 560. Adhātussa ke pāṇiniye, cande ca ‘kāka’iti pañcamyantaṃ dissate syādito ghessi ka. 404; rū. 370; nī. 859.
anya-e0201n0:3483: Adhātussa avayavabhūte kakāre pare pubbassa akārassa bahulaṃ i hoti kanissite ghe asyādito pare sati.
anya-e0201n0:3484: Bālikā, ekikā, hatthipotikā, mahallikā, kumbhakārikā, kammakārikā, annadāyikā, upāsikā, sāvikā, dhammavācikā.
anya-e0201n0:3485: Adhātussāti kiṃ? Kulupakā- bhikkhunī, dhenupakā, khīrupakā-vacchī, idha dhātvādesopi kakāro dhātusaññaṃ labhatiyeva.
anya-e0201n0:3489_0: Ettha ca bahavo paribbājakā yassā sā bahuparibbājakāti viggaho. Paribbājakasaddo
anya-e0201n0:3489_1: pakatisyādisaddo hoti, tasmā kanissitassa ghasaññassa ākārassa syādito parattā pubbassa
anya-e0201n0:3489_2: assa ittaṃ na bhavati. Yadi bhaveyya, bahukā paribbājikāyo yassanti atthappasaṅgo siyāti.
anya-e0201n0:3495: Atha dhātupaccayasaṃsiddhaṃ kāla, kāraka, purisa, saṅkhyābhedadīpakaṃ liṅgabhedarahitaṃ kriyāpadhānavācakaṃ tyādyantanāmakaṃ ākhyātapadaṃ dīpiyate.
anya-e0201n0:3496: Tattha kriyaṃ dhāretīti dhātu. Sā pakatidhātu, vikatidhātu, nāmadhātuvasena tividhā.
anya-e0201n0:3497: Tattha bhū, hū, gamu, paca iccādi pakatidhātu nāma sabhāvena siddhattā.
anya-e0201n0:3498: Titikkha, tikiccha, bubhukkha, jighacchaiccādi vikatidhātu nāma saṅkhatavasena siddhattā.
anya-e0201n0:3499: Puttīya, pabbatāya iccādi nāmadhātu nāma nāmabhūtassa sato kriyavācīpaccayayogena dhātuṭṭhāne ṭhitattā.
anya-e0201n0:3501: Tatthayā dhātu kammāpekkhaṃ kriyaṃ vadati, sā sakammikā nāma. Gāmaṃ gacchati, odanaṃ pacati iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:3502: Yā kammanirapekkhaṃ kriyaṃ vadati, sā akammikā nāma. Bhavati, hoti, tiṭṭhati, seti iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:3504: Tattha yā ekakammāpekkhaṃ kriyaṃ vadati, sā ekakammikā nāma. Gāmaṃ gacchati, odanaṃ pacati iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:3505: Yā padhānā’padhānavasena kammadvayāpekkhaṃ kriyaṃ vadati, sā dvikammikā nāma.
anya-e0201n0:3507: Tattha yā dhātu pāpanatthā hoti, sā nyādi nāma. Ajaṃ gāmaṃ neti, bhāraṃ gāmaṃ vahati, sākhaṃ gāmaṃ ākaḍḍhati.
anya-e0201n0:3508_0: Sesā dvikammikā duhādi nāma. Gāviṃ khīraṃ duhati, brāhmaṇaṃ kambalaṃ yācati, dāyakaṃ
anya-e0201n0:3508_1: bhikkhaṃ bhikkhati, goṇaṃ vajaṃ rundhati, bhagavantaṃ pañhaṃ pucchati, sissaṃ dhammaṃ
anya-e0201n0:3508_2: anusāsati, bhagavā bhikkhū etaṃ [vacanaṃ] avoca, rājā amaccaṃ vacanaṃ bravīti iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:3509_0: Tattha yadā kammasmiṃ rūpaṃ sijjhati, tadā vibhatti, paccayā nyādimhi padhānakammaṃ
anya-e0201n0:3509_1: vadanti, duhādimhi apadhānakammaṃ, sabbadhātūsu kāritayoge kāritakammanti, sabbañcetaṃ
anya-e0201n0:3509_2: dhātūnaṃ pakatiatthavasena vuttaṃ, anekatthattā pana dhātūnaṃ atthantaravacane vā
anya-e0201n0:3509_3: nānupasaggayoge vā akammikāpi sakammikā honti, sakammikāpi akammikā honti.
anya-e0201n0:3514: Vida – anubhavane, sukhaṃ vedeti, vipākaṃ paṭisaṃvedeti ma. ni. 3.303.
anya-e0201n0:3515: Vida – ārocane, vedayāmahaṃ bhante vedayatīti maṃ dhāretu cūḷava. aṭṭha. 102, kāraṇaṃ nivedeti, dhammaṃ paṭivedeti iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:3517_0: Pada-gatiyaṃ, maggaṃ pajjati, paṭipajjati, maggo uppajjati, nipajjati, sampajjati,
anya-e0201n0:3517_1: bhogo bhavati, sambhavati, bhogaṃ anubhavati, taṇhaṃ abhibhavati, paribhavati, adhibhavati,
anya-e0201n0:3517_2: araññaṃ abhisambhavati, ajjhogāhatīti attho. Gacchantaṃ magge abhisambhavati, sampāpuṇātīti attho iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:3518: Padānaṃ byañjanasampattiyā vā atthasampattiyā vā upakārakā vibhatti, paccayā paccayā nāma.
anya-e0201n0:3519: Tattha vibhattiyo tyādi, tvādiiccādinā aṭṭhavidhā bhavanti, sarūpato channavutividhā.
anya-e0201n0:3520: Tattha pubbachakkabhūtāni aṭṭhacattālīsarūpāni parassapadāni nāma. Parachakkabhūtāni aṭṭhacattālīsarūpāni attanopadāni nāma.
anya-e0201n0:3521: Tattha parahitapaṭisaṃyuttesu ṭhānesu pavattibahulāni padāni parassapadāni nāma. Attahitapaṭisaṃyuttesu pavattibahulāni attanopadāni nāmāti eke.
anya-e0201n0:3522_0: Paro vuccati kattā sabbakriyāsādhāraṇattā, attā vuccati kammaṃ sakasakakriyāsādhāraṇattā,
anya-e0201n0:3522_1: parassa abhidhāyakāni padāni parassapadāni, attano abhidhāyakāni padāni attanopadānīti aññe.
anya-e0201n0:3523: Attā vuccati padatthānaṃ sarīrabhūtā kriyā, kattunā pana sādhyaṭṭhena kriyarūpāni bhāva, kammānipi attāti vuccanti. Sādhakaṭṭhena tehi parabhūto kattā paro nāmāti apare.
anya-e0201n0:3524_0: Attā vuccati amhattho, paro vuccati tumha, nāmattho, pubbachakkāni parabahulattā
anya-e0201n0:3524_1: parassapadāni nāma, parachakkāni pana rūḷhīvasena attanopadāni nāmātipi vadanti.
anya-e0201n0:3524_2: Idaṃ na yujjati parachakkesu tabbahulamattassāpi asiddhattā. Pāḷibhāsaṃ pana patvā
anya-e0201n0:3524_3: dvinnaṃ chakkānaṃ attahita, parahitesu vā tīsu kārakesu vā pavattinānāttaṃ na dissatiyeva,
anya-e0201n0:3524_4: tasmā imasmiṃ ganthe taṃ nāmadvayaṃ na gahitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:3525: Paccayā pana catubbidhā vikaraṇa, kicca, kārita, dhātupaccayavasena.
anya-e0201n0:3526: Tattha ye dhātusiddhāni tyādipadāni tabbādipadāni ca gaṇavibhāgavasena aññamaññaṃ visadisarūpāni karonti, te vikaraṇapaccayā nāma, la, ya, ṇoiccādayo.
anya-e0201n0:3528: Paresaṃ āṇāpanasaṅkhāte payojakabyāpāre pavattā ṇi, ṇāpipaccayā kāritapaccayā nāma.
anya-e0201n0:3529: Visuṃ taṃtaṃkriyavācībhāvena dhāturūpā kha, cha, saiccādikā paccayā dhātupaccayā nāma.
anya-e0201n0:3530: “Kāla, kāraka, purisa, saṅkhyābhedadīpaka”nti ettha atīta, paccuppannā’nāgata, kālavimuttavasena kālabhedo catubbidho.
anya-e0201n0:3531: Tattha hiyyattanī, ajjattanī ajjatanī (bahūsu), parokkhāti imā tisso vibhattiyo atīte kāle vattanti.
anya-e0201n0:3534: Sattamī, kālātipattīti dve kālavimutte vattanti, ayaṃ kira porāṇiko vibhattīnaṃ kamo, so ca pāḷiyā sametiyeva.
anya-e0201n0:3536: Athopi viharissanti, esā buddhāna dhammatā”ti a. ni. 4.21 ca –
anya-e0201n0:3537_0: “Abbhatītā ca ye buddhā, vattamānā anāgatā”ti ca apa. thera 1.1.588 pāḷī. Imasmiṃ
anya-e0201n0:3537_1: kame pañcamī, sattamīti nāmadvayampi anvatthavasena siddhaṃ bhavati. Pacchā pana
anya-e0201n0:3538_0: Kattu, kamma, bhāvā pana kārakabhedo nāma. Tattha bhāvo duvidho sādhya, sādhanavasena
anya-e0201n0:3538_1: visesana, visesyavasena ca. Tattha dhātvatthakriyā sādhyabhāvo nāma. Paccayatthakriyā sādhanabhāvo nāma.
anya-e0201n0:3539_0: Tesu sādhyabhāvo nānādhātūnaṃ vasena nānāvidho hoti. Sādhanabhāvo nānādhātvatthānaṃ
anya-e0201n0:3539_1: pavattākārasaṅkhātena ekaṭṭhena ekova hoti. So pana yathā jāti nāma anuppannapakkhe
anya-e0201n0:3539_2: ṭhite saṅkhatadhamme uppādentī viya khāyati, tathā vohāravisayamatte ṭhite sabbadhātvatthe
anya-e0201n0:3539_3: pātubhonte karonto viya khāyati, tasmā so sādhananti ca kārakanti ca vuccati. Yathā
anya-e0201n0:3539_4: ca jātivasena uppannā saṅkhatadhammā “cintanaṃ jātaṃ, phusanaṃ jāta” miccādinā ekantameva
anya-e0201n0:3539_5: jātiṃ visesenti, tathā paccayatthavasena pātubhontā nānādhātvatthāpi “bhuyyate, gamyate,
anya-e0201n0:3539_6: paccate, bhavanaṃ, gamanaṃ, pacana” miccādinā ekantameva paccayatthaṃ visesenti.
anya-e0201n0:3539_7: Vatticchāvasena pana bhāvasādhanapadesu dhātvattha, paccayatthānaṃ abhedopi vattuṃ
anya-e0201n0:3539_8: yujjatiyeva. Idha pana dvīsu bhāvesu sādhanabhāvo adhippetoti.
anya-e0201n0:3540_1: paṭisaṃvedeti sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā”ti ma. ni. 3.1 ettha attā eva
anya-e0201n0:3540_2: vuccati, so ca attā “so karoti, so paṭisaṃvedetī”ti a. ni. 6.43; visuddhi. 2.580
anya-e0201n0:3540_3: ettha kārakoti vuccati. Iti ‘puriso’ti kārako eva.
anya-e0201n0:3541_0: So ca tividho nāmattho, tumhattho, amhattho cāti. Tattha attano ajjhattasantānabhūtattā
anya-e0201n0:3541_1: amhattho uttamapuriso nāma, sesā pana kamena paṭhamapuriso, majjhimapurisoti vuccanti.
anya-e0201n0:3541_2: Vibhattiyo pana taddīpakattā paṭhamapurisādināmaṃ labhanti. Idañca nāmaṃ kārakabhede
anya-e0201n0:3541_3: antogadhamevāti katvā imasmiṃ ganthe na gahitanti.
anya-e0201n0:3543: ‘Liṅgabhedarahita’nti “puriso gacchati, itthī gacchati, kulaṃ gacchati” iccādīsu ‘puriso’iccādīnaṃ abhidheyyapadānaṃ liṅgānugato rūpabhedo ākhyātapade natthi.
anya-e0201n0:3544: ‘Kriyāpadhānavācaka’nti ettha kriyaṃ eva padhānato abhidhāti, na nāmapadaṃ viya dabbaṃ padhānato abhidhātīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0201n0:3545: Tattha kriyā nāma dhātvatthabhāvo vuccati, sā ca kālavasena atītakriyā, paccuppannakriyā, anāgatakriyā, kālavimuttakriyāti catubbidhā hoti.
anya-e0201n0:3546: Āṇattikriyā, āsiṭṭhakriyā, anumatikriyā, parikappakriyā, araha, sakka, vidhi, nimantanā’mantanādikriyāti bahuvidho kriyābhedoti.
anya-e0201n0:3547: Bhū-sattāyaṃ, santassa bhāvo sattā, tassaṃ sattāyaṃ, bhūdhātu sattāyamatthe vattate, sabbapadatthānaṃ sadda, buddhivisayabhāvena vijjamānabhāve vattatetyattho.
anya-e0201n0:3549_0: Adhikārasuttamidaṃ, kriyatthā paraṃ vibhatti, paccayā bhavantīti attho. Kriyā attho
anya-e0201n0:3549_1: yassāti kriyattho. Pakatidhātu, vikatidhātu, nāmadhātuvasena tividho dhātu, kāritapaccayantarūpampi
anya-e0201n0:3550: 562. Vattamāneti anti si tha mi ma te ante se vhe e mhe ka. 414; rū. 428; nī. 872; caṃ. 1.2.82; pā. 3.2.123.
anya-e0201n0:3551_0: Ārabhitvā niṭṭhaṃ anupagato bhāvo vattamāno nāma, taṃsambandhīkālopi tadūpacārena
anya-e0201n0:3551_1: vattamānoti vuccati. Vattamāne kāle kriyatthā paraṃ tyādivibhattiyo bhavanti. Ayañca
anya-e0201n0:3551_2: vibhatti tyādīti ca vattamānakālavisayattā vattamānāti ca sijjhati.
anya-e0201n0:3552: 563. Pubbāparachakkānamekānekesu tumhamhasesesu dve dve majjhimuttamapaṭhamā ka. 408; rū. 431; nī. 867.
anya-e0201n0:3553_0: Tumhanāmaṃ, amhanāmaṃ, tadubhayato sesanāmanti tīsu nāmesu payujjamānesu vā gamyamānesu
anya-e0201n0:3553_1: vā ekasmiṃ vā anekesu vā atthesu pubbachakka, parachakkānaṃ dve dve majjhima, uttama,
anya-e0201n0:3553_2: paṭhamā vibhattiyo bhavanti. “Uttamanti uttaraṃ antima”nti cūḷamoggallāne vuttaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:3554: Ettha ca vibhattividhānamukhena taṃtaṃsaññāvidhānampi siddhaṃ hoti.
anya-e0201n0:3555: Kathaṃ?Ti, anti, si, tha, mi, ma iti pubbachakkaṃ nāma.
anya-e0201n0:3556: Te, ante, se, vhe, e, mhe iti parachakkaṃ nāma.
anya-e0201n0:3557: Pubbachakke ca-ti, antidvayaṃ paṭhamadukaṃ nāma, si, thadvayaṃ majjhimadukaṃ nāma, mi, madvayaṃ uttamadukaṃ nāma. Evaṃ parachakke.
anya-e0201n0:3558_0: Tattha tulyādhikaraṇabhūte sesanāme payujjamāne vā gamyamāne vā paṭhamadukaṃ bhavati.
anya-e0201n0:3558_1: Tathā tumhanāme majjhimadukaṃ, amhanāme uttamadukaṃ. Dukesu ca ekasmiṃ atthe vattabbe
anya-e0201n0:3559_0: Ettha ca nāmānaṃ atthanissitā katvattha, kammatthā idha nāmatthāti vuccanti. Kattu,
anya-e0201n0:3559_1: kammasaṅkhāte yasmiṃ nāmatthe tyādivibhattiyo bhavanti, so nāmattho tyādivācakānaṃ
anya-e0201n0:3559_2: eva vāccabhūto vuttattho nāma hoti, na syādivibhattīnaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:3560: Vuttakattu, kammādhiṭṭhānassa ca liṅgatthassa vācakaṃ nāmapadaṃ abhidheyyapadaṃ nāma, etadeva tulyādhikaraṇapadanti ca vuccati.
anya-e0201n0:3561_0: Amādayo ca atthavācakavibhattiyo etasmiṃ okāsaṃ na labhanti, liṅgatthamattajotikā
anya-e0201n0:3561_1: paṭhamāvibhatti eva okāsaṃ labhati. Evarūpāni tulyādhikaraṇabhūtāni abhidheyyapadāni
anya-e0201n0:3562: Idañca suttaṃ suddhehi tumha’mha, sesanāmehi yuttavākye ca missakehi yuttavākye cāti dvīsu dvīsu vākyesu veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:3563: Tattha suddhehi yutte paccekaṃ dukāni vattanti. Yathā? So gacchati, te gacchanti, tvaṃ gacchasi, tumhe gacchatha, ahaṃ gacchāmi, mayaṃ gacchāmāti.
anya-e0201n0:3564_0: Tathā suddhadvandepi. Yathā? So ca so ca gacchati, gacchanti vā. Te ca te ca gacchanti,
anya-e0201n0:3564_1: so ca te ca gacchanti, tvañca tvañca gacchasi, gacchatha vā. Tumhe ca tumhe ca gacchatha,
anya-e0201n0:3565_0: Missakehi yutte dvandavākye pana ‘vippaṭisedhe’ti saṅketattā paradukāni eva okāsaṃ
anya-e0201n0:3565_1: labhanti, tesu ca bahuvacanāni eva. Yathā? So ca tvañca gacchatha, so ca ahañca gacchāma,
anya-e0201n0:3565_2: tvañca ahañca gacchāma, so ca tvañca ahañca gacchāma. Ekavacanacatukkaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:3566: Te ca tumhe ca gacchatha, te ca mayañca gacchāma, tumhe ca mayañca gacchāma, te ca tumhe ca mayañca gacchāma. Bahuvacanacatukkaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:3567: So ca tumhe ca gacchatha, so ca mayañca gacchāma, tvañca mayañca gacchāma, so ca tvañca mayañca gacchāma. Ekavacanamūlacatukkaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:3568: Te ca tvañca gacchatha, te ca ahañca gacchāma, tumhe ca ahañca gacchāma, te ca tumhe ca ahañca gacchāma. Bahuvacanamūlacatukkaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:3569_0: Api ca tvañca so ca gacchatha, ahañca so ca gacchāma, tvañca ahañca so ca gacchāma,
anya-e0201n0:3569_1: tumhe ca so ca gacchatha, mayañca so ca gacchāma, tvañca te ca gacchatha, ahañca
anya-e0201n0:3570: Atrimā pāḷī – tuvañca putto suṇisā ca nattā, sammodamānā gharamāvasetha jā. 1.8.7. Ahañca putto suṇisā ca nattā, sammodamānā gharamāvasema jā. 1.8.7.
anya-e0201n0:3571: Ahañca dāni āyasmā ca sāriputto bhikkhusaṅghaṃ pariharissāma ma. ni. 2.160.
anya-e0201n0:3572: Ahañca ime ca bhikkhū samādhinā nisīdimhā.
anya-e0201n0:3573: Ahañca bhariyā ca dānapatī ahumhā jā. 2.22.1593.
anya-e0201n0:3574: Ahañca sāmiko ca dānapatī ahumhā jā. 2.22.1617 iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:3575_0: Yaṃ pana “so ca gacchati, tvañca gacchasī”ti vattabbe “tumhe gacchathā”ti vā “so
anya-e0201n0:3575_1: ca gacchati, ahañca gacchāmī”ti vattabbe “mayaṃ gacchāmā”ti vā vacanaṃ, taṃ pakatibahuvacanameva,
anya-e0201n0:3576_0: Yañca kaccāyane – “sabbesamekābhidhāne paro puriso”ti nī. 216 piṭṭhe suttaṃ, tatthapi
anya-e0201n0:3576_1: sabbesaṃ dvinnaṃ vā tiṇṇaṃ vā missakabhūtānaṃ nāma, tumha’mhānaṃ ekato abhidhāne
anya-e0201n0:3576_2: missakadvandavākye paro puriso yojetabboti attho na na sambhavatīti.
anya-e0201n0:3578: Aparokkhesu māna, nta, tyādīsu paresu kriyatthā paraṃ kattari lānubandho apaccayo hoti. Lānubandho ‘ūlasse’ti sutte visesanattho.
anya-e0201n0:3579: Etena yattha māna, nta, tyādayo kattari vattanti, tattha ayaṃ lapaccayoti lapaccayena tesaṃ kattuvācakabhāvaṃ ñāpeti, esa nayo “kyo bhāvakammesu…” iccādīsupi.
anya-e0201n0:3580_0: Ettha ca vikaraṇapaccayā nāma byañjanapūraṇā eva honti, na atthapūraṇā, tasmā yasmiṃ
anya-e0201n0:3580_1: payoge tehi vinā padarūpaṃ na sijjhati, tattheva te vattanti. Yattha sijjhati, tattha
anya-e0201n0:3580_2: na vattanti, ayampi lapaccayo dhātuto paraṃ vibhattisare vā āgamasare vā asante vattati,
anya-e0201n0:3580_3: sante pana “pacāmi, pacāma, pacāhi, gameti, gamenti, vajjeti, vajjenti”-iccādīsu
anya-e0201n0:3580_4: kāriyantaratthāya vattati. Yattha ca paccayānaṃ lopo vihito, tattha gaṇantara, rūpantarappasaṅgapaṭisiddhāya
anya-e0201n0:3581: 565. Yuvaṇṇānameo paccaye ka. 485; rū. 434; nī. 975; caṃ. 1.1.82; pā. 3.1.60.
