anya-e0201n0:3582_0: Vibhatti, paccayā paccayo nāma. I, kī, khi, ci, ji iccādayo ivaṇṇā nāma. Cu, ju,
anya-e0201n0:3582_1: bhū, hū iccādayo uvaṇṇā nāma. Paccaye pare ekakkharadhātvantānaṃ ivaṇṇu’vaṇṇānaṃ
anya-e0201n0:3582_2: kamena e, ovuddhiyo honti. ‘Paro kvacī’ti parasaralopo.
anya-e0201n0:3583: Saṃpubbo-sambhoti, sambhonti, sambhosi, sambhotha, sambhomi, sambhoma.
anya-e0201n0:3584: Anupubbo-anubhavane, so bhogaṃ anubhoti, te bhogaṃ anubhonti, tvaṃ bhogaṃ anubhosi, tumhe bhogaṃ anubhotha, ahaṃ bhogaṃ anubhomi, mayaṃ bhogaṃ anubhoma.
anya-e0201n0:3585: Tattha yathā “nīlo paṭo”ti ettha nīlasaddassa attho duvidho vāccattho, abhidheyyatthoti.
anya-e0201n0:3588: Nīlasaddo pana vaccātthameva ujuṃ vadati, nīlasaddamattaṃ suṇanto nīlaguṇameva ujuṃ jānāti, tasmā “paṭo” iti padantarena nīlasaddassa abhidheyyattho ācikkhīyati.
anya-e0201n0:3589: Tathā “anubhotī”ti ettha tisaddassa attho duvidho vāccattho, abhidheyyatthoti.
anya-e0201n0:3592_0: Tisaddo pana vāccatthameva ujuṃ vadati, na abhidheyyatthaṃ. “Anubhotī”ti suṇantosādhyakriyāsahitaṃ
anya-e0201n0:3592_1: kattārameva ujuṃ jānāti, na kiñci dabbanti attho. Tasmā “so” iti padantarena tisaddassa
anya-e0201n0:3592_2: abhidheyyattho ācikkhīyati, vāccatthassa pana tisaddeneva ujuṃ vuttattā tatiyāvibhattiyā
anya-e0201n0:3592_3: puna ācikkhitabbakiccaṃ natthi, liṅgatthajotanatthaṃ abhidheyyapade paṭhamāvibhatti
anya-e0201n0:3594: Sare pare e, onaṃ kamena aya, avā honti. Ya, vesu a-kāro uccāraṇattho.
anya-e0201n0:3597: Hi, mi, mesu paresu a-kārassa dīgho hoti.
anya-e0201n0:3599: Parachakke – bhavate, bhavante, bhavase, bhavavhe, bhave, bhavamhe.
anya-e0201n0:3601: Adhyā’bhi, paripubbo hiṃsāyaṃ, adhibhavati, abhibhavati, paribhavati.
anya-e0201n0:3602: Vipubbo vināse, pākaṭe, sobhaṇe ca, vibhavati.
anya-e0201n0:3604: Abhi, saṃpubbo pattiyaṃ, ajjhogāhe ca, abhisambhavati, tathā pātubbhavati, āvibhavati iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:3607: 568. Kyo bhāvakammesvaparokkhesu māna nta tyādīsu ka. 440; rū. 445; nī. 920; caṃ. 1.1.80; pā. 3.1.67.
anya-e0201n0:3608: Parokkhāvajjitesu māna, ntapaccayesu tyādīsu ca paresu kriyatthā bhāvasmiṃ kammani ca kānubandho yapaccayo hoti, bahulādhikārā kvaci kattari ca.
anya-e0201n0:3609: Rūpaṃ vibhuyyati, so pahīyissati saṃ. ni. 1.249, bhattaṃ paccati, gimhe udakaṃ chijjati, kusūlo bhijjati.
anya-e0201n0:3611: Kānubandhe nāgame ca ivaṇṇu’vaṇṇānaṃ assa ca te e, o,-ā na hontīti kyamhi vuddhi natthi.
anya-e0201n0:3612_0: Kamme-tena purisena bhogo anubhūyati, tena bhogā anubhūyanti, tena tvaṃ anubhūyasi,
anya-e0201n0:3612_1: tena tumhe anubhūyatha, tena ahaṃ anubhūyāmi, tena mayaṃ anubhūyāma. Yassa dvittaṃ
anya-e0201n0:3613: Tattha “anubhūyatī”ti ettha kyapaccayasahitassa tisaddassa attho duvidho vāccattho, abhidheyyatthoti.
anya-e0201n0:3616_0: Tisaddo pana kyapaccayasahito vāccatthameva ujuṃ vadati, na abhidheyyatthaṃ. “Anubhūyatī”ti
anya-e0201n0:3616_1: suṇanto sādhyakriyāsahitaṃ kammasattiṃ eva ujuṃ jānāti, na kiñci dabbanti vuttaṃ
anya-e0201n0:3617: Anubhūyate, anubhuyyate, anubhūyante, anubhuyyante, anubhūyase, anubhūyavhe, anubhūye, anubhuyye, anubhūyamhe, anubhuyyamhe.
anya-e0201n0:3618: 570. Garupubbā rassā re ntentīnaṃ ka. 517; rū. 488; nī. 1105; ‘guru…’ (bahūsu).
anya-e0201n0:3619: Garupubbamhā rassato nte, ntīnaṃ reādeso hoti.
anya-e0201n0:3620: Jāyare, jāyanti, jāyare, jāyante, gacchare, gacchanti, gacchare, gacchante, gamissare, gamissanti, gamissare, gamissante.
anya-e0201n0:3623: Ettha ca suttavibhāgena “sabbaṃ hidaṃ bhañjare kālapariyāyaṃ jā. 1.15.370, muñcare bandhanasmā jā. 2.22.1648, jīvare’ vāpi sussatī”ti jā. 2.22.840 etāni pāḷipadāni sijjhanti.
anya-e0201n0:3624: Tattha ‘bhañjare’ti bhijjati, ‘muñcare’ti muñcantu, ‘jīvare’ vāpī’ti jīvanto’vāpi. Anubhūyare, anubhūyanti, anubhūyare, anubhūyante.
anya-e0201n0:3625_0: Bhāvo nāma bhavana, gamanādiko kriyākāro, so dhātunā eva tulyādhikaraṇabhāvena visesīyati,
anya-e0201n0:3625_1: na nāmapadena, tasmā tattha tumha’mha, sesanāmavasena tyādidukavisesayogo nāma natthi,
anya-e0201n0:3625_2: paṭhamadukameva tattha bhavati, dabbasseva ca tassa abyattasarūpattā saṅkhyābhedopi
anya-e0201n0:3626: Tena bhogaṃ anubhūyati, anubhuyyati, anubhūyate, anubhuyyate, anubhavanaṃ hotīti attho.
anya-e0201n0:3629: 571. Payojakabyāpāre ṇāpi ca ka. 438; rū. 540; nī. 914.
anya-e0201n0:3630: Yo suddhakattāraṃ payojeti, tassa payojakassa kattuno byāpāre kriyatthā ṇi ca ṇāpi ca honti. Ṇānubandhā vuddhutthā.
anya-e0201n0:3631: Tesu ca ākārantato ‘ato’ (moga.) ṇāpiyeva hoti, dāpeti, dāpayati.
anya-e0201n0:3633: Sesato dvepi, pāceti, pācayati, pācāpeti, pācāpayati.
anya-e0201n0:3634: Payojakabyāpāropi kriyā evāti tadatthavācīhi ṇi,-ṇāpīhi paraṃ vibhatti, paccayā bhavanti, dhātvantassa ca ṇi, ṇāpīnañca vuddhi.
anya-e0201n0:3635: So maggaṃ bhāveti, te maggaṃ bhāventi, tvaṃ maggaṃ bhāvesi, tumhe maggaṃ bhāvetha, ahaṃ maggaṃ bhāvemi, mayaṃ maggaṃ bhāvema.
anya-e0201n0:3637: E, onaṃ kamena āya, āvā honti sarādo ṇānubandhe paccaye pare, suttavibhattiyā aṇānubandhepi āyā’vā honti.
anya-e0201n0:3640: Jhe-cintāyaṃ, jhāyati, jhāyanti, ujjhāyati, nijjhāyati iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:3642: Ṇi, ṇāpi, āpīhi ca kattari lo hoti vā.
anya-e0201n0:3644: Iminā asare ṭhāne ayādesato paraṃ akāro hoti, so maggaṃ bhāvayati, bhāvayanti, bhāvayasi, bhāvayatha, bhāvayāmi, bhāvayāma.
anya-e0201n0:3649: Kriyatthā parassa kyassa ādimhi īña hoti.
anya-e0201n0:3650: Tena maggo bhāvīyati, tena maggā bhāvīyanti, tena tvaṃ bhāvīyasi, tena tumhe bhāvīyatha, tena ahaṃ bhāvīyāmi, tena mayaṃ bhāvīyāma.
anya-e0201n0:3656: Ekakammā dvikammā ca, dvikammā ca tikammakā.
anya-e0201n0:3657: Iti suddhakatturūpaṃ, suddhakammarūpaṃ, hetukatturūpaṃ, hetukammarūpanti ekadhātumhi cattāri nipphannarūpāni labbhanti.
anya-e0201n0:3658: Katturūpena cettha kammakatturūpampi saṅgayhati. Kusūlo bhijjati, bhijjanadhammo bhijjati.
anya-e0201n0:3659: Kammarūpena ca kattukammarūpampi saṅgayhati. Tattha yaṃ padaṃ kattuvācakaṃ samānaṃ saddarūpena kammarūpaṃ bhavati, taṃ kattukammarūpaṃ nāma, taṃ pāḷiyaṃ bahulaṃ dissati.
anya-e0201n0:3660_0: Rūpaṃ vibhāviyyati mahāni. 108, atikkamiyyati, samatikkamiyyati, vītivattiyyati,
anya-e0201n0:3660_1: nimittaṃ abhibhuyyatīti gotrabhu paṭi. ma. 1.59, pavattaṃ abhibhuyyati paṭi. ma.
anya-e0201n0:3660_2: 1.59, cutiṃ abhibhuyyati, upapattiṃ abhibhuyyatīti paṭi. ma. 1.59 gotrabhu iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:3661_0: Tathā so pahīyethāpi nopi pahīyetha saṃ. ni. 1.249, so pahīyissati saṃ. ni. 1.249,
anya-e0201n0:3661_1: nihiyyati yaso tassa dī. ni. 3.246, hiyyoti hiyyati poso, pareti parihāyati jā. 1.15.348,
anya-e0201n0:3661_2: ājānīyā hasīyanti jā. 2.22.2369, vidhurassa hadayaṃ dhaniyati jā. 2.22.1350 iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:3662_0: Yañca ‘yamhi dā dhā mā thā hā pā maha mathādīnamī’ti kaccāyane suttaṃ, taṃ kammani
anya-e0201n0:3662_1: icchanti, kattari eva yujjati kammani ivaṇṇāgamassa sabbhāvā. Saddanītiyaṃ pana “so
anya-e0201n0:3662_2: pahīyissatī”ti padānaṃ bhāvarūpattaṃ daḷhaṃ vadati, tāni pana kattukammarūpāni evāti.
anya-e0201n0:3663: Ettha ca vattamānaṃ catubbidhaṃ niccapavattaṃ, pavattāvirataṃ, pavattuparataṃ, samīpavattamānanti.
anya-e0201n0:3664: Tattha niccapavatte – idhāyaṃ pabbato tiṭṭhati, candimasūriyā pariyāyanti, disā bhanti virocamānā a. ni. 4.69.
anya-e0201n0:3665: Pavattāvirate – api nu te gahapati kule dānaṃ dīyatīti, dīyati me bhante kule dānaṃ a. ni. 9.20.
anya-e0201n0:3666: Ettha ca yāva dāne saussāho, tāva yathāpavattā dānakriyā vattamānā eva nāma hoti ussāhassa aviratattā.
anya-e0201n0:3667_0: Pavattuparate – na khādati ayaṃ maṃsaṃ, neva pāṇaṃ hanati a. ni. 3.67, na adinnaṃ
anya-e0201n0:3667_1: ādiyati a. ni. 3.67. Ettha yāva tabbipakkhakriyaṃ na karoti, tāva viramaṇakriyā vattamānā eva nāma hoti.
anya-e0201n0:3668: Samīpe – atīte – kuto nu tvaṃ āgacchasi saṃ. ni. 1.130, rājagahato āgacchāmīti. Anāgate – dhammaṃ te desemi, sādhukaṃ suṇohi.
anya-e0201n0:3669: Suttavibhattena tadāyoge atītepi ayaṃ vibhatti hoti, vākacīrāni dhunanto, gacchāmi ambare tadā bu. vaṃ. 2.37.
anya-e0201n0:3670_0: Yāva, pure, purāyoge anāgatepi-idheva tāva tiṭṭhāhi, yāvāhaṃ āgacchāmi, yaṃnūnāhaṃ
anya-e0201n0:3670_1: dhammañca vinayañca saṅgāyeyyaṃ pārā. aṭṭha. 1.paṭhamamahāsaṅgītikathā, pure adhammo
anya-e0201n0:3670_2: dibbati, dhammo paṭibāhiyyati cūḷava. 437, dante ime chinda purā marāmi jā. 1.16.127.
anya-e0201n0:3671: Ekaṃsatthepi-nirayaṃ nūnagacchāmi, ettha me natthi saṃsayo jā. 2.22.331. Avassambhāviyatthepi-dhuvaṃ buddho bhavāmahaṃ bu. vaṃ. 2.109, dhuvaṃ buddho bhavissati bu. vaṃ. 2.81 vā.
anya-e0201n0:3672: Aniyamatthepi-manasā ce pasannena, bhāsati vā karoti vā dha. pa. 2 cintetīti cittaṃ dha. sa. aṭṭha. 1, phusatīti phasso dha. sa. aṭṭha. 1, bujjhatīti buddho.
anya-e0201n0:3673: Kadā karahiyogepi-kadā gacchati, karahi gacchati, gamissati vā.
anya-e0201n0:3677: 575. Tu antu hi tha mi ma taṃ antaṃ su vho e āmase ka. 424; rū. 450; nī. 897; caṃ. 1.3.122; pā. 3.3.162.
anya-e0201n0:3678: Vattamāne kāle pañha, patthanā, vidhīsu kriyatthā tvādayo honti.
anya-e0201n0:3679: Pañhe-dhammaṃ vā tvaṃ adhiyassu vinayaṃ vā pāci. 471 (atthato sadisaṃ).
anya-e0201n0:3681: Tattha patthanāyaṃ-bhavābhave saṃsaranto, saddho homi amaccharī.
anya-e0201n0:3682: Āsīsāyaṃ-etena saccavajjena, pajjunno abhivassatu cariyā. 3.89, sabbe bhadrāni passantu jā. 1.2.105, sabbe sattā averā hontu paṭi. ma. 2.22.
anya-e0201n0:3684_0: Āyācane-desetu bhante bhagavā dhammaṃ dī. ni. 2.68, ovadatu maṃ bhagavā saṃ. ni.
anya-e0201n0:3684_1: 3.1, anusāsatu maṃ sugata saṃ. ni. 3.1, ullumpatu maṃ bhante saṅgho mahāva. 71, asmākaṃ
anya-e0201n0:3684_2: adhipannānaṃ, khamassu rājakuñjara jā. 2.21.181, etha byagghā nivattavho jā. 1.3.66.
anya-e0201n0:3686: Tattha vidhimhi-akusalaṃ pajahatha, kusalaṃ upasampajja viharatha paṭi. ma. 3.30; pārā. 19, evaṃ vitakketha, mā evaṃ vitakketha paṭi. ma. 3.30.
anya-e0201n0:3687: Niyojane-etha bhikkhave sīlavā hotha a. ni. 5.114, appamādena sampādetha dī. ni. 2.185, etha gaṇhatha bandhatha dī. ni. 2.342, mā vo muñcittha kiñcanaṃ dī. ni. 2.342.
anya-e0201n0:3691: Pavāraṇāyaṃ-vadatu maṃ bhante saṅgho mahāva. aṭṭha. 213, vadetha bhante yenattho pārā. 290.
anya-e0201n0:3692: Anumatiyaṃ-paribhuñja vā vissajjehi vā yathāpaccayaṃ vā karohi pāci. 374.
anya-e0201n0:3693: Varadāne-phussatī varavaṇṇābhe, varassu dasadhā vare jā. 2.22.1655, icchitaṃ patthitaṃ tuyhaṃ, khippameva samijjhatu a. ni. aṭṭha. 1.1.192.
anya-e0201n0:3694: Anuññāyaṃ-puccha vāsava maṃ pañhaṃ, yaṃ kiñci manasicchasi dī. ni. 2.356.
anya-e0201n0:3697: Akkose-muddhā te phalatu sattadhā jā. 1.16.295, corā taṃ khaṇḍākhaṇḍikaṃ chindantu ma. ni. aṭṭha. 1.
anya-e0201n0:3698: Sapathe-etena saccavajjena, putto uppajjataṃ ise jā. 1.14.104, musā me bhaṇamānāya, muddhā phalatu sattadhā jā. 1.14.104.
anya-e0201n0:3699: Āmantane-etu vessantaro rājā jā. 2.22.2341, “ehi bhikkhu cara brahmacariyaṃ mahāva. 28, etha bhikkhave sīlavā hotha” iccādīsupi ehi, ethasaddā āmantane tiṭṭhanti.
anya-e0201n0:3700: Nimantane-adhivāsetu me bhante bhagavā svātanāya bhattaṃ pārā. 77.
anya-e0201n0:3701: Pavedane-vedayatīti maṃ saṅgho dhāretu cūḷava. aṭṭha. 102, upāsakaṃ maṃ bhavaṃ gotamo dhāretu dī. ni. 1.299, punārāyu ca me laddho, evaṃ jānāhi mārisa dī. ni. 2.369.
anya-e0201n0:3702_0: Pattakāle-parinibbātu bhante bhagavā, parinibbātu sugato, parinibbānakālo bhante
anya-e0201n0:3702_1: bhagavato dī. ni. 2.168, kālo kho te mahāvīra, uppajja mātukucchiyaṃ bu. vaṃ. 1.67,
anya-e0201n0:3702_2: byākarohi aggivessana na dāni te tuṇhībhāvassa kālo ma. ni. 1.357.
anya-e0201n0:3703: Anubhotu, anubhontu, anubhohi, anubhotha, anubhomi, anubhoma, bhavatu, bhavantu, ‘himimesvassā’ti hi, mi, mesu assa dīgho, tvaṃ paṇḍito bhavāhi.
anya-e0201n0:3707: Iminā ato hissa lopo, tvaṃ paṇḍito bhava.
anya-e0201n0:3709: Parachakke-so bhavataṃ, te bhavantaṃ, tvaṃ bhavassu, tumhe bhavavho, ahaṃ bhave, mayaṃ bhavāmase, imāni suddhakatturūpāni.
anya-e0201n0:3710: Anubhūyatu, anubhūyantu, anubhuyyatu, anubhuyyantu iccādi suddhakammarūpaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:3711: Bhāvetu, bhāventu, bhāvayatu, bhāvayantu iccādi hetukatturūpaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:3712: Bhāvīyatu, bhāvīyantu. Rassatte-bhāviyatu, bhāviyantu. Dvitte-bhāviyyatu, bhāviyyantu. Tathā bhāvayīyatu, bhāvayīyantuiccādi hetukammarūpaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:3713: ‘Eyyāthasse’iccādisuttena thassa vho, tumhe bhavavho, bhavatha vā.
anya-e0201n0:3717: 577. Hetuphalesveyya eyyuṃ eyyāsi eyyātha eyyāmi eyyāma etha eraṃ etho eyyāvho eyyavho (moggallānādīsu) eyyaṃ eyyāmhe vā ka. 416; rū. 454; nī. 880; caṃ. 1.3.120; pā. 3.3.156.
anya-e0201n0:3718_0: Aññamaññasambandhiniyā hetukriyāyañca phalakriyāyañca kriyatthā eyyādayo honti vā.
anya-e0201n0:3718_1: Hetuphalesupi kadāci aññavibhattuppattidīpanattho vāsaddo, sace so yānaṃ labhissati,
anya-e0201n0:3718_2: gamissati, sace na labhissati, na gamissati iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:3719: Sace saṅkhāro nicco bhaveyya, sukho nāma bhaveyya, sace so paṇḍito bhaveyya, sukhito bhaveyya.
anya-e0201n0:3722: Pañhe-kinnu kho tvaṃ vinayaṃ vā adhiyyeyyāsi dhammaṃ vā.
anya-e0201n0:3724: Vidhimhi-pāṇaṃ na haneyya, adinnaṃ na ādiyeyya, dānaṃ dadeyya, sīlaṃ rakkheyya.
anya-e0201n0:3725: 579. Sattārahesveyyādī ka. 416; rū. 454; nī. 881-4; caṃ. 1.3.128; pā. 3.3.169-172; satyarahesveyyādī (bahūsu).
anya-e0201n0:3727: Bhavaṃ rajjaṃ kareyya, bhavaṃ rajjaṃ kātuṃ sakko, kātuṃ arahoti attho.
anya-e0201n0:3728: So imaṃ vijaṭaye jaṭaṃ saṃ. ni. 1.23.
anya-e0201n0:3731: Pabbatamapi sirasā bhindeyya, bhaveyya, bhaveyyuṃ, bhaveyyāsi, bhaveyyātha, bhaveyyāmi, bhaveyyāma.
anya-e0201n0:3732: Parachakke-so bhavetha, te bhaveraṃ, tvaṃ bhavetho, tumhe bhaveyyāvho, ahaṃ bhaveyyaṃ, mayaṃ bhaveyyāmhe, iti suddhakatturūpāni.
anya-e0201n0:3733: Anubhūyeyya, anubhūyeyyuṃ. Dvitte rassattaṃ, anubhuyyeyya, anubhuyyeyyuṃ iccādi suddhakammarūpaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:3734: Bhāveyya, bhāveyyuṃ, bhāvayeyya, bhāvayeyyuṃ iccādi hetukatturūpaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:3735: Bhāvīyeyya, bhāvīyeyyuṃ. Rassatte-bhāvayiyeyya, bhāvayiyeyyuṃ. Dvitte-bhāviyyeyya, bhāviyyeyyuṃ. Tathā bhāvayīyeyya, bhāvayīyeyyuṃ iccādi hetukammarūpaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:3737: Eyya, eyyāsi, eyyamiccetesaṃ ṭe hoti vā.
anya-e0201n0:3738_0: Atrimā pāḷī-caje mattā sukhaṃ dhīro, passe ce vipulaṃ sukhaṃ dha. pa. 290. Kiṃ tvaṃ
anya-e0201n0:3738_1: sutasomā’nutappe jā. 2.21.399, dhīraṃ passe suṇe dhīraṃ, dhīrena saha saṃvase jā. 1.13.94 iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:3739: So bhave, bhaveyya, tvaṃ bhave, bhaveyyāsi, ahaṃ bhave, bhaveyyaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:3742: Atrimā pāḷī-vajjuṃ vā te na vā vajjuṃ, natthi nāsāya rūhanā jā. 1.3.33, upayānāni me dajjuṃ, rājaputta tayī gateti jā. 2.22.26.
anya-e0201n0:3744: Eyyāmassa emu ca hoti, antassa u ca.
anya-e0201n0:3745_0: Atrimā pāḷī-kathaṃ jānemu taṃ mayaṃ dī. ni. 2.318, muñcemu naṃ uragaṃ bandhanasmā
anya-e0201n0:3745_1: jā. 1.15.252, dakkhemu te nāga nivesanāni jā. 1.15.254, gantvāna taṃ paṭikaremu accayaṃ,
anya-e0201n0:3745_2: appeva naṃ putta labhemu jīvitaṃ jā. 1.15.13, dajjemu kho pañcasatāni bhoto jā. 2.22.1302,
anya-e0201n0:3745_3: pañhaṃ pucchemu mārisa dī. ni. 2.354, viharemu averino dī. ni. 2.357, tayājja guttā
anya-e0201n0:3746_0: Mahāvuttinā kvaci majjhe yyā-kārassa lopo, atthaṃ dhammañca pucchesi jā. 1.16.150,
anya-e0201n0:3746_1: uregaṇḍāyo bujjhesi, tāyo bujjhesi māṇava jā. 2.17.132-133, yathā gatiṃ me abhisambhavetha
anya-e0201n0:3746_2: jā. 2.17.87-89, yathā gatiṃ te abhisambhavema jā. 2.17.87-89, okāsaṃ sampajānātha,
anya-e0201n0:3747: ‘Eyyāthasse’iccādisuttena eyyāthassa o ca, tumhe bhaveyyātho, bhaveyyātha vā.
anya-e0201n0:3748: Ettha ca pubbe vuttā pañha, patthanā, vidhippabhedā idhapi yathāpayogaṃ veditabbā. Pañhasaddena paripañha, paripucchā, parivitakka, parivīmaṃsādayo saṅgayhanti.
anya-e0201n0:3749: Paripañhe-dhammaṃ vā paṭhamaṃ saṅgāyeyyāma vinayaṃ vā.
anya-e0201n0:3750: Paripucchāyaṃ-vadetha bhante kimahaṃ kareyyaṃ, ko imassa attho, kathañcassa atthaṃ ahaṃ jāneyyaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:3751: Parivitakke-kassāhaṃ paṭhamaṃ dhammaṃ deseyyaṃ dī. ni. 2.72, yaṃnūnāhaṃ dhammañca vinayañca saṅgāyeyyaṃ pārā. aṭṭha. 1.paṭhamamahāsaṅgītikathā.
anya-e0201n0:3752: Parivīmaṃsāyaṃ-gaccheyyaṃ vā ahaṃ uposathaṃ, na vāgaccheyyaṃ mahāva. 137.
anya-e0201n0:3753: Patthanāyaṃ-evaṃrūpo siyaṃ ahaṃ anāgatamaddhānaṃ ma. ni. 3.274, ummādantyā ramitvāna, sivirājā tato siyaṃ jā. 2.18.70, passeyya taṃ vassasataṃ arogaṃ jā. 2.21.453.
anya-e0201n0:3754: Āyācane-labheyyāhaṃ bhante bhagavato santike pabbajjaṃ, labheyyaṃ upasampadaṃ mahāva. 28; saṃ. ni. 2.17.
anya-e0201n0:3756: Niyojane-careyyādittasīsova, natthi maccussa nā gamo saṃ. ni. 1.145.
anya-e0201n0:3757: Ajjhesane-yassa siyā āpatti, so āvikareyya mahāva. 132, yassa nakkhamati, so bhāseyya mahāva. 70.
anya-e0201n0:3759: Anumatiyaṃ-taṃ jano hareyya vā daheyya vā yathāpaccayaṃ vā kareyya ma. ni. 1.247.
anya-e0201n0:3761: Āmantane-yadā te pahiṇeyyāmi, tadā eyyāsi khattiya jā. 2.22.635.
anya-e0201n0:3763: Pattakāle-saṅgho uposathaṃ kareyya, pātimokkhaṃ uddiseyya mahāva. 167.
anya-e0201n0:3764: ‘Sambhāvane vā’ti vāsaddo avuttavikappanattho, tena parikappa, kriyātipannādayo saṅgayhanti.
anya-e0201n0:3766: Tattha bhūtaparikappe-yo bālaṃ seveyya, sopi bālo bhaveyya.
anya-e0201n0:3767: Abhūtaparikappe-yadā kacchapalomānaṃ, pāvāro tividho siyā jā. 1.8.78. Yadā sasavisāṇānaṃ, nisseṇī sukatā siyā jā. 1.8.79.
anya-e0201n0:3768: Kriyātipanne-sace so agāraṃ ajjhāvaseyya, rājā assa cakkavattī dī. ni. 3.136.
anya-e0201n0:3772: 584. Anajjattane ā ū o ttha a mhā ttha tthuṃ se vhaṃ iṃ mhase ka. 418; rū. 456; nī. 886; caṃ. 1.2.77; pā. 3.2.111.
anya-e0201n0:3773: Ajjato aññasmiṃ bhūte kāle kriyatthā paraṃ āiccādayo honti.
anya-e0201n0:3774: 585. Ā ī ssādīsvaña vā ka. 519; rū. 457; nī. 1032.
anya-e0201n0:3775: Āiccādīsu īiccādīsu ssādīsu ca tesaṃ ādimhi aña hoti vā.
anya-e0201n0:3776: So abhavā, bhavā, te abhavū, bhavū, tvaṃ abhavo, bhavo, tumhe abhavattha, bhavattha, ahaṃ abhava, bhava, mayaṃ abhavamhā, bhavamhā.
anya-e0201n0:3777: Parachakke-abhavattha, bhavattha, abhavatthuṃ, bhavatthuṃ, abhavase, bhavase, abhavavhaṃ, bhavavhaṃ, abhaviṃ, bhaviṃ, abhavamhase, bhavamhase.
anya-e0201n0:3778: 586. Ā ī ū mhā ssā ssāmhānaṃ vā ka. 517; rū. 488; nī. 1105.
anya-e0201n0:3780: So abhava, te abhavu, mayaṃ abhavamha.
anya-e0201n0:3781: ‘Eyyāthasse’iccādinā āssa tthattaṃ, assa ca aṃ, so abhavattha, bhavattha, abhavā, bhavā vā, ahaṃ abhavaṃ, bhavaṃ, abhava, bhava vā, imāni suddhakatturūpāni.
anya-e0201n0:3782_0: Ettha ca mahāvuttinā ā-vibhattiyā thādeso bahulaṃ dissati, medanī sampakampatha jā.
anya-e0201n0:3782_1: 2.22.1672, visaññī samapajjatha jā. 2.22.328, imā gāthā abhāsatha jā. 2.22.328, tuccho
anya-e0201n0:3782_2: kāyo adissatha theragā. 172, nibbidā samatiṭṭhatha theragā. 273, eko rahasi jhāyatha
anya-e0201n0:3782_3: jā. 1.15.286 iccādi. Tathā o-vibhattiyā ca, dubbheyyaṃ maṃ amaññatha iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:3786: 587. Bhūte ī uṃ o ttha iṃ mhā ā ū se vhaṃ aṃ mhe ka. 419; rū. 469; nī. 887.
anya-e0201n0:3787: Abhavīti bhūto, atītoti attho, bhūte kāle kriyatthā paraṃ īiccādayo honti.
anya-e0201n0:3788: 588. A ī ssā ssatyādīnaṃ byañjanassiu ka. 516; rū. 466; nī. 1030; caṃ. 1.2.76; pā. 3.2.110 aīssaādīnaṃ byañjanassiu (bahūsu).
anya-e0201n0:3789: Aādissa īādissa ssāādissa ssatiādissa ca byañjanassa ādimhi iu hoti. ‘Byañjanassā’ti etena aādimhi pañca, īādimhi sattāti dvādasa suddhasaravibhattiyo paṭikkhipati.
anya-e0201n0:3791_0: So abhavī, bhavī, te abhavuṃ, bhavuṃ, tvaṃ abhavo, bhavo, tumhe abhavittha, bhavittha,
anya-e0201n0:3791_1: ahaṃ abhaviṃ, bhaviṃ, mayaṃ abhavimhā, bhavimhā, so abhavā, bhavā, te abhavū, bhavū,
anya-e0201n0:3791_2: tvaṃ abhavise, bhavise, tumhe abhavivhaṃ, bhavivhaṃ, ahaṃ abhavaṃ, bhavaṃ, mayaṃ
anya-e0201n0:3792: ‘Āīū’iccādinā ī, mhā, ā, ūnaṃ rassatte-so abhavi, bhavi, mayaṃ abhavimha, bhavimha, so abhava, bhava, te abhavu, bhavu.
anya-e0201n0:3793: 589. Eyyāthasseaāīthānaṃ o a aṃ ttha ttho vho vā ka. 517; rū. 488; nī. 1105; ‘…vhoka’ (bahūsu).
anya-e0201n0:3795_0: Tumhe gaccheyyātho, gaccheyyātha vā, tvaṃ agacchissa, agacchisse vā, ahaṃ agamaṃ,
anya-e0201n0:3795_1: gamaṃ, agama, gama vā, so agamittha, gamittha, agamā, gamā vā, so agamittho, gamittho,
anya-e0201n0:3795_2: agamī, gamī vā, tumhe gacchavho, gacchatha vāti.
anya-e0201n0:3796: Iminā ī, ā, avacanānaṃ ttho, ttha, aṃādesā honti, so abhavittho, bhavittho, so abhavittha, bhavittha, ahaṃ abhavaṃ, bhavaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:3797_0: Atrimā pāḷī – īmhi-paṅko ca mā visiyittho jā. 1.13.44, sañjagghittho mayā saha jā.
anya-e0201n0:3797_1: 1.16.241. Āmhi-anumodittha vāsavo jā. 2.22.1667, nimantayittha vāsavo jā. 2.22.1667,
anya-e0201n0:3797_2: khubbhittha nagaraṃ tadā jā. 2.22.1673, subhūtitthero gāthaṃ abhāsittha theragā.
anya-e0201n0:3797_3: 1. Amhi-idhāhaṃ mallikaṃ deviṃ etadavocaṃ saṃ. ni. 1.119, ajānamevaṃ āvuso avacaṃ
anya-e0201n0:3797_4: jānāmīti pārā. 195, ahaṃ kāmānaṃ vasamanvagaṃ jā. 2.19.45, ajjhagaṃ amataṃ santiṃ iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:3800: Agamiṃsu, agamaṃsu, agamuṃ. Iminā uṃssa iṃsu, abhaviṃsu, bhaviṃsu.
anya-e0201n0:3801: 591. Ossa a i ttha ttho ka. 517; rū. 488; nī. 1105.
anya-e0201n0:3803: Tvaṃ abhava, tvaṃ abhavi, tvaṃ abhavittha, tvaṃ abhavittho.
anya-e0201n0:3804_0: Atrimā pāḷī-ossa atte-mā hevaṃ ānanda avaca dī. ni. 2.95, tvameva dāni’makara, yaṃ
anya-e0201n0:3804_1: kāmo byagamā tayi jā. 1.2.167. Itte-mā tvaṃ bhāyi mahārāja, mā tvaṃ bhāyi rathesabha
anya-e0201n0:3804_2: jā. 2.22.684, mā cintesi mā tvaṃ soci, yācāmi luddakaṃ ahaṃ gavesitabbaṃ. Tthattemāssu
anya-e0201n0:3804_3: tiṇṇo amaññittha jā. 2.22.255, mā kilittha mayā vinā jā. 2.22.1713, māssu kujjhittha
anya-e0201n0:3804_4: nāvika jā. 1.6.5. Tthotte-mā purāṇe amaññittho theragā. 280, mā dayhittho punappunaṃ
anya-e0201n0:3804_5: saṃ. ni. 1.212, tiṇamatte asajjittho jā. 1.1.89, mā tvaṃ brahmuno vacanaṃ upātivattittho
anya-e0201n0:3804_6: ma. ni. 1.502, mā tvaṃ maññittho na maṃ jānātī ma. ni. 1.502 ti.
anya-e0201n0:3806: Suttavibhattena tthassa ttho hoti, taṃ vo vadāmi bhaddante, yāvantettha samāgatā apa. thera 1.1.367, massu mittānaṃ dubbhittho. Mittadubbho hi pāpakoti jā. 1.16.222.
anya-e0201n0:3807_0: Mahāvuttinā ossa kvaci lopo, puna dānaṃ adā tuvaṃ jā. 2.22.1786, mā no tvaṃ tāta
anya-e0201n0:3807_1: adadā jā. 2.22.2126, mā bhoti kupitā ahu jā. 2.22.1931, māhu pacchānutāpinī saṃ.
anya-e0201n0:3813: Assosumhā, ahesumhā, avocumhā, avocuttha iccādīni dissanti.
anya-e0201n0:3814: Tumhe abhavuttha, bhavuttha, abhavittha, bhavittha vā, mayaṃ abhavumhā, bhavumhā, abhavimhā, bhavimhā vā.
anya-e0201n0:3815: 594. Iṃssa ca suu ka. 517; rū. 488; nī. 1105; “…siu” (bahūsu).
anya-e0201n0:3816_0: Imiccassa mhā, tthānañca ādimhi suu hoti, sāgamo hotīti attho. Casaddena īādīnampi
anya-e0201n0:3816_1: ādimhi sāgamo hoti, sāgame ca sati byañjanaṃ hoti, tassa ādimhi iāgamo labbhati.
anya-e0201n0:3816_2: Tena “imā gāthā abhāsisuṃ gavesitabbaṃ, te me asse ayācisuṃ, yathābhūtaṃ vipassisuṃ”
anya-e0201n0:3817: So bhogaṃ anubhosi, anubhavi vā, tumhe anubhosittha, anubhavittha vā, ahaṃ anubhosi, anubhaviṃ vā. Mayaṃ anubhosimhā anubhavimhā vā.
anya-e0201n0:3818: 595. Eontā suṃ ka. 517; rū. 488; nī. 1105; ‘eottā suṃ” (bahūsu).
anya-e0201n0:3819: Edantato odantato ca parassa uṃvacanassa suṃ hoti vā.
anya-e0201n0:3820: Ānesuṃ, sāyesuṃ, cintesuṃ, paccanubhosuṃ, paribhosuṃ, adhibhosuṃ, abhibhosuṃ.
anya-e0201n0:3821: Suttavibhattena ādantatopi ca, vihāsuṃ viharanti ca saṃ. ni. 1.173, te anubhosuṃ, imāni suddhakatturūpāni.
anya-e0201n0:3825: Tena bhogā anvabhūyuṃ, anubhūyuṃ, anvabhūyiṃsu, anubhūyiṃsu iccādi suddhakammarūpaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:3826: So maggaṃ abhāvi, bhāvi, abhāvesi, bhāvesi, abhāvayi, bhāvayi, te maggaṃ abhāviṃsu, bhāviṃsu.
anya-e0201n0:3827_0: ‘Eontāsu’nti edantamhā suṃ. Te maggaṃ abhāvesuṃ, bhāvesuṃ, abhāvayiṃsu, bhāvayiṃsu,
anya-e0201n0:3827_1: tvaṃ maggaṃ abhāvaya, bhāvaya, abhāvayi, bhāvayi, tvaṃ maggaṃ abhāvittha, bhāvittha,
anya-e0201n0:3827_2: abhāvayittha, bhāvayittha, tvaṃ maggaṃ abhāvayittho, bhāvayittho, tvaṃ maggaṃ abhāvesi,
anya-e0201n0:3827_3: bhāvesi, tumhe maggaṃ abhāvittha, bhāvittha, abhāvayittha, bhāvayittha, ahaṃ maggaṃ
anya-e0201n0:3827_4: abhāviṃ, bhāviṃ, abhāvesiṃ, bhāvesiṃ, abhāvayiṃ, bhāvayiṃ, mayaṃ maggaṃ abhāvimhā,
anya-e0201n0:3827_5: bhāvimhā, abhāvimha, bhāvimha, abhāvayimhā, bhāvayimhā, abhāvayimha, bhāvayimha.
anya-e0201n0:3828: So maggaṃ abhāvā, bhāvā, abhāvittha, bhāvittha, abhāvayittha, bhāvayittha iccādi hetukatturūpaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:3829: Tena maggo abhāviyi, bhāviyi, tena maggā abhāviyiṃsu, bhāviyiṃsu iccādi hetukammarūpaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:3833: 596. Parokkhe a u e tha aṃ mha ttha re ttho vho iṃ mhe ka. 417; rū. 460; nī. 887; caṃ. 1.2.81; pā. 3.2.115.
anya-e0201n0:3834: Akkhānaṃ indriyānaṃ paraṃ parokkhaṃ, apaccakkhanti attho. Bhūte kāle attano parokkhakriyāya vattabbāya kriyatthā aādayo honti.
anya-e0201n0:3835: Mahāvuttinā gassa dīgho vā, so kira jagāma, te kira jagāmu, tvaṃ kira jagāme, tumhe kira jagāmittha, ahaṃ kira jagāmaṃ, mayaṃ kira jagāmimha iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:3836: Ettha ca ‘so kira jagāma’ iccādīni anussavaparokkhāni nāma.
anya-e0201n0:3837: ‘Ahaṃ kira jagāmaṃ, mayaṃ kira jagāmimhā’ti idaṃ attanā gantvāpi gamanaṃ pamuṭṭhassa vā asampaṭicchitukāmassa vā paṭivacanaparokkhaṃ nāma.
anya-e0201n0:3838: 597. Parokkhāyañca ka. 458; rū. 461; nī. 939; caṃ. 5.1.3; pā. 6.1.2.
anya-e0201n0:3839: Parokkhamhi pubbakkharaṃ ekassaraṃ dverūpaṃ hoti, casaddena aññasmimpi dvedverūpaṃ sijjhati.
anya-e0201n0:3840: Caṅkamati, daddallati, dadāti, jahāti, juhoti, lolupo, momūho.
anya-e0201n0:3842: Dvitte pubbesaṃ dutiya, catutthānaṃ kamena paṭhama, tatiyā honti.
anya-e0201n0:3844: Dvitte pubbassa bhūssa anto a hoti.
anya-e0201n0:3846: Dvitte bhūdhātussa ante vuka hoti, vāgamo hotīti attho.
anya-e0201n0:3848: So kira rājā babhūva, te kira rājāno babhūvu, tvaṃ babhūve.
anya-e0201n0:3849_0: ‘A ī ssā ssatyādīnaṃ byañjanassiu’ iti suttena byañjanādimhi iāgamo, tumhe babhūvittha,
anya-e0201n0:3849_1: ahaṃ babhūvaṃ, mayaṃ babhūvimha, so babhūvittha, te babhūvire, tvaṃ babhūvittho,
anya-e0201n0:3849_2: tumhe babhūvivho, ahaṃ babhūviṃ, mayaṃ babhūvimhe, imāni suddhakatturūpāni.

anya-e0201n0:3854: 601. Bhavissati ssati ssanti ssasi ssatha ssāmi ssāma ssate ssante ssase ssavhe ssaṃ ssāmhe ka. 421; rū. 473; nī. 892; caṃ. 1.3.2; pā. 3.3.13.

anya-e0201n0:3857: Nipātanāmayoge garahāyañca vimhaye ca ssatyādayo honti, atītakālepi ssatyādīnaṃ uppattidīpanatthamidaṃ suttaṃ, anutthunana, paccānutāpa, paccānumodanādīnipi ettha saṅgayhanti.
anya-e0201n0:3858: Tattha garahāyaṃ-atthi nāma tāta sudinna ābhidosikaṃ kummāsaṃ paribhuñjissasi pārā. 32.

anya-e0201n0:3860_0: Anutthunanādīsu-na attanā paṭicodessaṃ, na gaṇassa ārocessaṃ pāci. 665, na pubbe

anya-e0201n0:3860_3: jā. 1.12.58, iti pacchānutappati jā. 1.12.50, anekajātisaṃsāraṃ, sandhāvissaṃ anibbisaṃ dha. pa. 153.

anya-e0201n0:3862_1: bhavissasi, bhavissatha, bhavissāmi, bhavissāma, bhavissate, bhavissante, bhavissare,
anya-e0201n0:3866: Kyassa lopo hoti vā ssakāravati vibhattimhi.
anya-e0201n0:3867: Tena maggo gamissati, gamīyissati vā, tena maggo agamissā, agamīyissā vāti vikappena kyassa lopo.
anya-e0201n0:3868: Tena bhogo anubhavissati, anubhūyissati vā, tena bhogā anubhavissanti, anubhūyissanti vā iccādi suddhakammarūpaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:3869: Bhāvissati, ‘ūlasse’ti issa e, bhāvessati, bhāvayissatiiccādi hetukatturūpaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:3870: Tena maggo bhāvīyissati, maggā bhāvīyissanti iccādi hetukammarūpaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:3874: 604. Eyyādotipattiyaṃ ssā ssaṃsu sse ssatha ssaṃ ssāmhā ssatha ssiṃsu ssase ssavhe ssiṃ ssāmhase ka. 422; rū. 475; nī. 895; caṃ. 1.3.107; pā. 3.3.139; eyyādo vātipattiyaṃ (bahūsu).
anya-e0201n0:3875: Eyyādivisaye kriyātipattiyaṃ ssādayo bhavanti. Eyyādivisayo nāma hetuphalakriyāsambhavo, tadubhayakriyāya abhāvo kriyātipatti.
anya-e0201n0:3876: Sā duvidhā atītā ca anāgatā ca.
anya-e0201n0:3877: Tattha atītāyaṃ-sace so paṭhamavaye pabbajjaṃ alabhissā, arahā abhavissā ‘sace pana nikkhamitvā pabbajissa, arahattaṃ pāpuṇissa’ (dhammapada aṭṭha. 1) iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:3878: Anāgatāyaṃ-sacāhaṃ na gamissaṃ, mahājāniyo so abhavissā iccādi.

anya-e0201n0:3879_1: iti ssādīsu iāgamo, abhavissā, bhavissā, abhavissaṃsu, bhavissaṃsu, abhavisse, bhavisse,

anya-e0201n0:3879_3: bhavissatha, abhavissiṃsu, bhavissiṃsu, abhavissase, bhavissase, abhavissavhe, bhavissavhe,

anya-e0201n0:3887: Ito paṭṭhāya sarantadhātuyo sarānukkamena, byañjanantadhātuyo akkharānukkamena vuccante.

anya-e0201n0:3909: Ajjhattanimhi vikappena sāgamo, aṭṭhāsi, patiṭṭhāsi, adhiṭṭhahi, adhiṭṭhāsi, adhiṭṭhesi, saṇṭhahi, saṇṭhāsi, upaṭṭhahi, upaṭṭhāsi.
anya-e0201n0:3910: ‘Uṃssiṃsvaṃsū’ti uṃssa iṃsu, aṃsu, adhiṭṭhahiṃsu, saṇṭhahiṃsu, upaṭṭhahiṃsu. Atthamentamhi sūriye, vāḷā panthe upaṭṭhahuṃ jā. 2.22.2186. Aṭṭhaṃsu, upaṭṭhahaṃsu.
anya-e0201n0:3914: ‘Eontāsu’nti uṃssasuṃ, saralopo, aṭṭhāsuṃ, upaṭṭhāsuṃ, patiṭṭhāpesuṃ, saṇṭhāpesuṃ, patiṭṭhāpayuṃ, saṇṭhāpayuṃ, patiṭṭhāpayiṃsu, saṇṭhāpayiṃsu.
anya-e0201n0:3915: Ssatyādimhi-ṭhassati, ṭhassanti, rassattaṃ, upaṭṭhissati, upaṭṭhissanti, ahaṃ bhotiṃ upaṭṭhissaṃ jā. 2.22.1934, saṇṭhahissati, saṇṭhahissanti.

anya-e0201n0:3927_0: ‘Iyaṅa’ iti suttavibhattena aññadhātūnampi. Jā-hāniyaṃ, appena bahuṃ jiyyāma jā.

anya-e0201n0:3930: Etesaṃ ghamma, vajja, dajjā honti vā nta, māna, tyādīsu.

anya-e0201n0:3940_0: Atrimā pāḷī-dajjā sappuriso dānaṃ jā. 2.22.2261, upāyanāni me dajjuṃ jā. 2.22.24,

anya-e0201n0:3941: Ajjhattanimhi-adadi, adāsi, adaduṃ, adaṃsu, adajji, adajjuṃ, tvaṃ adado. Varañce me ado sakka jā. 2.17.142.
anya-e0201n0:3942: Parachakke-so dānaṃ adā, brāhmaṇassa adā dānaṃ, sivīnaṃ raṭṭhavaḍḍhano jā. 2.22.2117.
anya-e0201n0:3943: Ssatyādimhi-dāssati, dāssanti, dadissati, dadissanti, dajjissati, dajjissanti.

anya-e0201n0:3944_1: therīgā. 272. Appasmeke pavecchanti, bahuneke na dicchare saṃ. ni. 1.33. Devo sammā

anya-e0201n0:3945: Dhā-dhāraṇe, sandhāti, vidhāti, nidheti, nidhenti. Vidheti, vidhenti.
anya-e0201n0:3946: ‘Parokkhāyañcā’ti casaddena dvittaṃ. ‘Dutiyacatutthāna…’nti dhassa dattaṃ. ‘Rasso pubbassā’ti pubbassa rasso.
anya-e0201n0:3949: Saddahāti, saddahati vā. Saddahāti tathāgatassa bodhiṃ. Vidahāti, nidahāti, saddahanti, vidahanti, nidahanti.
anya-e0201n0:3950: ‘Mayadā sare’ti sutte ‘mayadā’ti suttavibhattiyā byañjanepi niggahītassa dattaṃ, kammaṃ saddahāti, kammaphalaṃ saddahāti, saddahanti, vatthaṃ paridahāti, paridahanti.
anya-e0201n0:3951: Kamme-sandhīyati, sandhīyanti, sandhiyyati, sandhiyyanti, vidhiyyati. Navena sukhadukkhena, porāṇaṃ apidhiyyati jā. 1.2.114.
anya-e0201n0:3955: Īādimhi-saddahi, saddahiṃsu. Tatra bhikkhavo samādahiṃsu dī. ni. 2.332, samādahaṃsu vā.

anya-e0201n0:3962_1: yūthassa purato vajaṃ jā. 1.8.14. Naḷena vāriṃ pissāma, na ca maṃ tvaṃ vadhissasi jā. 1.1.20.

anya-e0201n0:3964: Mā-māne, dvittaṃ rasso ca, mamāyati, mamāyanti. Yemaṃ kāyaṃ mamāyanti, andhā bālā puthujjanā theragā. 575.

anya-e0201n0:3994: Etu, sametu, entu, samentu, ehi, samehi, etha, sametha, etha byagghā nivattavho, paccupetha mahāvanaṃ jā. 1.3.66.

anya-e0201n0:3996: Īādimhi ‘paro kvacī’ti vibhattisaralopo, dhammaṃ abhisami, abhisamiṃsu.
anya-e0201n0:3997: ‘Eontā su’nti uṃssa suṃ, abhisamesuṃ, abhisamayuṃ, abhisamayiṃsu.
anya-e0201n0:4000: ‘Etī’ti dhātuniddeso tisaddo, idhātumhā parassa ssakārassa hi hoti vā.
anya-e0201n0:4001_0: Ehiti, essati. Bodhirukkhamupehiti bu. vaṃ. 2.63, nerañjaramupehiti bu. vaṃ. 2.63,
anya-e0201n0:4001_1: upessati, tadā ehinti me vasaṃ jā. 1.1.33, tato nibbānamehisi cūḷava. 382 tassuddānaṃ,
anya-e0201n0:4001_2: na punaṃ jātijaraṃ upehisi dha. pa. 238. Suttavibhattena aññadhātūhipi, kathaṃ jīvihisi
anya-e0201n0:4001_3: tvaṃ apa. thera 1.3.13, jāyihitippasādo jā. 2.17.145, paññāyihinti etā daharā jā. 2.17.197.
anya-e0201n0:4002: Ssādimhi “sace puttaṃ siṅgālānaṃ, kukkurānaṃ adāhisī”ti gavesitabbaṃ pāḷi, ‘adāhisī’ti ca adadissasetyattho.
anya-e0201n0:4004_0: Khito yāgamo, vikappena yassa dvittaṃ, kappo khīyetha, vaṇṇo na khīyetha tathāgatassa
anya-e0201n0:4004_1: dī. ni. aṭṭha. 1.304, ujjhāyanti khīyanti pārā. 88, avaṇṇaṃ pakāsentīti attho. Khiyyati,
anya-e0201n0:4004_2: khiyyanti, āyu khiyyati maccānaṃ, kunnadīnaṃva odakaṃ saṃ. ni. 1.146.
anya-e0201n0:4006: 616. Nito cissa cho ka. 20; rū. 27; nī. 50.
anya-e0201n0:4007: Nito parassa cissa ca-kārassa cho hoti.
anya-e0201n0:4011: Sarantassa dhātussa dīgho hoti kyamhīti ikāru’kārānaṃ kyamhi vikappena dīgho.
anya-e0201n0:4013: Ji-jaye, jeti, jenti, vijeti, vijenti, parājeti, parājenti, jayati, jayanti, vijayati, vijayanti, parājayati, parājayanti.
anya-e0201n0:4014: Kamme kyamhi dīgho, na taṃ jitaṃ sādhu jitaṃ, yaṃ jitaṃ avajīyati. Taṃ kho jitaṃ sādhu jitaṃ, yaṃ jitaṃ nāvajīyati jā. 1.1.70.
anya-e0201n0:4015: Ṇāpimhi pubbassaralopo vā, jāpeti, jāpayati. Yo na hanti na ghāteti, na jināti na jāpaye jā. 1.10.144. Jayāpeti, jayāpayati, jayāpīyati, jayāpīyanti, jayatu, jayantu.
anya-e0201n0:4016: Īādimhi-ajesi, ajesuṃ, vijesi, vijesuṃ, ajayi, ajayuṃ, ajayiṃsu, vijayi, vijayuṃ, vijayiṃsu, jessati, vijessati, parājessati, jayissati, vijayissati, parājayissati.
anya-e0201n0:4017: Ḍī-vehāsagatiyaṃ, sakuṇo ḍeti, ḍenti dī. ni. 1.215; a. ni. 4.198. Pāsaṃ oḍḍeti, oḍḍenti.
anya-e0201n0:4018: Nī-naye, neti, nenti, vineti, vinenti, nayati, nayanti, vinayati, vinayanti.
anya-e0201n0:4021: Ṇāpimhi āyādesassa rasso, nayāpeti, nayāpenti, nayāpayati, nayāpayanti.
anya-e0201n0:4023: Īādimhi-nesi, nesuṃ, vinesi, vinesuṃ, ānesi, ānesuṃ, anayi, nayi, anayiṃsu, nayiṃsu, ānayi, ānayiṃsu, vinayi, vinayiṃsu.
anya-e0201n0:4025: Bhī-bhaye, bheti. Mā bhetha kiṃ socatha modathavho jā. 1.12.27, vibhemi etaṃ asādhuṃ, uggatejo hi brāhmaṇo jā. 2.17.103. Bhāyati, bhāyanti.
anya-e0201n0:4026: Kārite mahāvuttinā sāgamo vā, bhīseti, bhīsayati, bhīsāpeti, bhīsāpayati. Bhikkhuṃ bhīseyya vā bhīsāpeyya vā pāci. 346-347.
anya-e0201n0:4027: Sī-saye, seti, senti, atiseti, atisenti, sayati, sayanti.
anya-e0201n0:4030: Ṇimhi-sāyeti, sāyayati, sāyesuṃ dīnamānasā apa. thera 2.54.48.
anya-e0201n0:4031: Mhi-hāse, umheti, umhayati, vimheti, vimhayati, na naṃ umhayate disvā, na ca naṃ paṭinandati jā. 1.2.93.
anya-e0201n0:4033: Kārite pubbassaralopo, sace maṃ nāganāsūrū, umhāyeyya pabhāvatī. Sace maṃ nāganāsūrū, pamhāyeyya pabhāvatī jā. 2.20.17.
anya-e0201n0:4036_0: Cu-cavane, ju-sīghagamane, thu-abhitthavane, du-gatiyaṃ upatāpe ca, bhū-sattāyaṃ,
anya-e0201n0:4036_1: yu-missane gatiyañca, ru-sadde, brū-viyattiyaṃ vācāyaṃ, su-sandane janane ca, sū-pasavane,
anya-e0201n0:4037: Tyādyuppatti, ‘kattari lo’ti lapaccayo, uvaṇṇassa avādeso, ‘dīgho sarassā’ti sakammikadhātūnaṃ kyamhi dīgho.
anya-e0201n0:4042: ‘Bahula’nti adhikatattā kyamhi kvaci vuddhi, avādeso, abhitthavīyati, abhitthavīyanti, abhitthaviyyati, abhitthaviyyanti.
anya-e0201n0:4049: Byañjane pare brūssa o na hoti.
anya-e0201n0:4052: Brūto tissa ādimhi īña hoti. Īmhi pubbalopo.
anya-e0201n0:4055: Ivaṇṇu’vaṇṇantānaṃ dhātūnaṃ kvaci iyaṅa, uvaṅa honti sare.
anya-e0201n0:4056: Bruvanti, brunti vā. “Ajānantā no pabruntī”ti pāḷi. Brūsi, brūtha, brūmi, brūma.
anya-e0201n0:4057: 621. Tyantīnaṃ ṭaṭū ka. 517; rū. 488; nī. 1105; caṃ. 1.4.13; pā. 3.4.84.
anya-e0201n0:4058: Ti, antīsu brūssa āha hoti, tesañca ṭa, ṭū honti.
anya-e0201n0:4060_0: Atrimā pāḷī-nibbānaṃ bhagavā āha, sabbaganthapamocanaṃ, āha tesañca yo nirodho mahāva.
anya-e0201n0:4060_1: 60, yaṃ pare sukhato āhu, tadariyā āhu dukkhato. Yaṃ pare dukkhato āhu, tadariyā
anya-e0201n0:4060_2: sukhato vidū su. ni. 767. Tattha ‘āhā’ti katheti. ‘Āhū’ti kathenti.
anya-e0201n0:4061: Brūtu, brūvantu, brūhi maṅgalamuttamaṃ khu. pā. 5.2, brūtha, brūmi, brūma.
anya-e0201n0:4063: Īādimhi sare pare brūssa ottaṃ, ossa ca avādeso, abravi, abravuṃ, abraviṃsu.
anya-e0201n0:4070: Āhādesamhā parassa uvacanassa aṃsu hoti vā.
anya-e0201n0:4071: Te āhaṃsu, saccaṃ kirevamāhaṃsu, narā ekacciyā idha jā. 1.13.123.
anya-e0201n0:4072: Su-sandane, nadī savati, savanti, ābhavaggā savanti.
anya-e0201n0:4074: Hu-pūjāyaṃ, ‘parokkhāyañcā’ti dvittaṃ, ‘kavaggahānaṃ cavaggajā’ti hassa jo, juhoti, juhonti.
anya-e0201n0:4080: Eyyādimhi- ‘yuvaṇṇānamiyaṅauvaṅa sare’ti dhātvantassa uvādeso, huveyya, huveyyuṃ.
anya-e0201n0:4081_0: Āādimhi-so ahuvā. Vaṇṇagandhaphalūpeto, amboyaṃ ahuvā pure jā. 1.2.71. Ahuvā te pure
anya-e0201n0:4081_1: sakhā saṃ. ni. 1.50, te ahuvū, tvaṃ ahuvo, tumhe ahuvattha ma. ni. 1.215, jhāyatha
anya-e0201n0:4081_2: bhikkhave mā pamādāttha, mā pacchā vippaṭisārino ahuvattha, ahuva, ahuvaṃ vā, ahuvamhā.
anya-e0201n0:4081_3: “Akaramhasa te kiccaṃ, yaṃ balaṃ ahuvamhase jā. 1.4.29. Ahuvamheva mayaṃ pubbe, na
anya-e0201n0:4083: Mahāvuttinā īlopo rasso ca. Ahudeva bhayaṃ ahu chambhitattaṃ. Ahudeva kukkuccaṃ, ahu vippaṭisāro pārā. 38. Ādīnavo pāturahu theragā. 269, dibbo ratho pāturahu.
anya-e0201n0:4085: Hūto ñuṃvacanassa resuṃ hoti. Suttavibhattena mhāssa resumhā ca. ‘Rānubandhentasarādissā’ti dhātvantalopo.
anya-e0201n0:4086: Te pubbe ahesuṃ. Uvādese ahuvuṃ, pubbassaralope ahuṃ.
anya-e0201n0:4087: Atrimā pāḷī- sabbamhi taṃ araññamhi, yāvantettha dijā ahuṃ jā. 2.22.2425. Kūṭāgārasahassāni, sabbasoṇṇamayā ahuṃ apa. thera 1.1.407.
anya-e0201n0:4088: Ossa si, ittha, ttho. Tvaṃ ahosi, ahuvi, ahuvittha, ahuvittho.
anya-e0201n0:4089_0: Mahāvuttinā olopo rasso, mā bhoti kupitā ahu jā. 2.22.1931, māhu pacchānutāpinī saṃ.
anya-e0201n0:4089_1: ni. 1.162, ahosiṃ nu kho ahaṃ atītamaddhānaṃ, na nu kho ahosiṃ, kinnu kho ahosiṃ,
anya-e0201n0:4089_2: kathaṃ nu kho ahosiṃ saṃ. ni. 2.20; ma. ni. 1.18, ahaṃ ahuviṃ, mayaṃ ahosimhā, ahosimha
anya-e0201n0:4089_3: vā. Ahesumhā nu kho mayaṃ atītamaddhānaṃ, na nu kho ahesumhā, kinnu kho ahesumhā,
anya-e0201n0:4089_4: kathaṃ nu kho ahesumhā ma. ni. 1.407. Mayaṃ pubbe ahuvimhā, ahumhā vā. “Mayaṃ pubbe
anya-e0201n0:4091: Mahāvuttinā mhāssa uñca. “Pañcasatā mayaṃ sabbā, tāvatiṃsupagā ahu”nti pāḷi.
anya-e0201n0:4092: Parachakke assa aṃ, ahaṃ pubbe ahuvaṃ, ahuva vā.
anya-e0201n0:4094_0: Atrimā pāḷī- “ahaṃ kevaṭṭagāmasmiṃ, ahuṃ kevaṭṭadārako apa. thera 1.39.86, cakkavattī
anya-e0201n0:4094_1: ahuṃ rājā, jambumaṇḍassa issaro. Sattakkhattuṃ mahābrahmā, vasavattī tadā ahuṃ. Muddhābhisitto
anya-e0201n0:4096: 625. Hūssa hehehihohi ssaccādo ka. 480; rū. 490; nī. 961; ‘…ssatyādo’ (bahūsu).
anya-e0201n0:4097: Ssatyādimhi hūdhātussa he ca hohi ca hohi ca honti.
anya-e0201n0:4098: Hessati, hessanti, hehissati, hehissanti, hohissati, hohissanti. Buddho hessaṃ sadevake bu. vaṃ. 2.55, anāgatamhi addhāne, hessāma sammukhā imaṃ bu. vaṃ. 2.74.
anya-e0201n0:4099: 626. Dakkha sakkha hehi hohīhi lopo ka. 480; rū. 490; nī. 961; ‘dakkhā hehihohilopo’ (bahūsu).
anya-e0201n0:4100: Etehi ādesehi ssassa lopo hoti vā. Suttavibhattena aññehipi ssalopo.
anya-e0201n0:4101: Sakkhisi tvaṃ kuṇḍalini, maññisi khattabandhuni jā. 2.17.14. Na hi sakkhinti chettuṃ su. ni. 28, adhammo haññiti dhammamajja jā. 1.11.31, brahmadatto palāyiti iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:4103_0: Atrimā pāḷī-piyo ca me hehiti mālabhārī, ahañca naṃ mālinī ajjhupessaṃ jā. 1.15.197,
anya-e0201n0:4103_1: tilodano hehiti sādhupakko jā. 1.8.2. Doso pemañca hehiti theragā. 719. Mama tvaṃ
anya-e0201n0:4103_2: hehisi bhariyā jā. 1.14.27. Tato sukhī hohisi vītarāgo. Khippaṃ hohisi anāsavo dī. ni. 2.207 iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:4106_0: E-āgatiyaṃ gatiyañca, ke-sadde, khe-khādanu’paṭṭhānesu, ge-sadde, apapubba ce-pūjāyaṃ,
anya-e0201n0:4106_1: jhe-cintāyaṃ dāha’jjhānesu ca, te-pālane, the-sadda, saṅghātesu, de-suddhi, niddāsu,
anya-e0201n0:4106_2: pe-vuddhiyaṃ, bhe-bhaye, le-chedane, ve-gatiyaṃ tantasantāne ca, se-antakriyāyaṃ,
anya-e0201n0:4107_0: Ṇānubandhapaccayena vinā yesaṃ dhātūnaṃ āyādeso labbhati, te edantā nāma. Mahāvuttinā
anya-e0201n0:4107_1: yalope sati ādantehi samānarūpaṃ, ādantānañca yāgame sati edantehi samānarūpaṃ, tasmā
anya-e0201n0:4108_0: Mahāvuttinā edantānaṃ tyādīsu tabbādīsu ca āyādeso, kvaci yalopo, e-āgatiyaṃ. Ayaṃ
anya-e0201n0:4108_1: so sārathī eti jā. 2.22.51, sace enti manussattaṃ saṃ. ni. 1.49, lakkhaṇaṃ passa
anya-e0201n0:4108_2: āyantaṃ, migasaṅghapurakkhataṃ jā. 1.1.11, yoga’māyanti maccuno saṃ. ni. 1.20, āyāmāvuso
anya-e0201n0:4108_3: pārā. 228, āyāmānanda dī. ni. 2.186; pārā. 22; ma. ni. 1.273.
anya-e0201n0:4109: Ettha edhātu āgaccha, gacchāmāti atthadvayaṃ vadati, yādhātuvasena āgaccha, yāmātipi atthaṃ vadanti.
anya-e0201n0:4111_0: Kucchitā dhammā āyanti vaḍḍhanti etthāti kāyo, ‘āyo’ti vuccati vaḍḍhi, tato apeto
anya-e0201n0:4111_1: apāyo, tena upeto upāyo, avayavadhammā samudenti etthāti samudāyo, paribyattaṃ āyanti etenāti pariyāyo.
anya-e0201n0:4114: Khe-khādane, tiṇaṃ khāyati, vikkhāyati, undurā khāyanti, vikkhāyanti.
anya-e0201n0:4115: Khe-upaṭṭhāne, khāyati, pakkhāyati, alakkhī viya khāyati.
anya-e0201n0:4117: Apapubba ce-pūjāyaṃ, apacāyati, ye vuddha’mapacāyanti jā. 1.1.37.
anya-e0201n0:4118: Jhe-cintāyaṃ, jhāyati, jhāyanti, pajjhāyati, pajjhāyanti, abhijjhāyati, abhijjhāyanti.
anya-e0201n0:4119: Jhe-olokane, nijjhāyati, nijjhāyanti, upanijjhāyati, upanijjhāyanti, ujjhāyati, ujjhāyanti.
anya-e0201n0:4122: Ṇāpimhi yalopo, kaṭṭhaṃ jhāpeti, jhāpenti, jhāpayati, jhāpayanti.
anya-e0201n0:4123: Jhe-ajjhayane saṃpubbo, mahāvuttinā niggahītassa jādeso, sajjhāyati, sajjhāyanti, mantaṃ sajjhāyati.
anya-e0201n0:4129_0: Bhe-bhaye, bhāyati, bhāyanti, sabbe bhāyanti maccuno dha. pa. 129, bhāyasi, sace
anya-e0201n0:4129_1: bhāyatha dukkhassa udā. 44, kinnu kho ahaṃ tassa sukhassa bhāyāmi ma. ni. 1.381,
anya-e0201n0:4129_2: nataṃ bhāyāmi āvuso, bhāyāma apa. therī. 2.2.458.
anya-e0201n0:4131: Īādimhi-mā bhāyi, mā soci dī. ni. 2.207, mā cintayi.
anya-e0201n0:4133: Le-chedane, tiṇaṃ lāyati, sāliṃ lāyati, lāyanti.
anya-e0201n0:4142: Ṇi, ṇāpīnaṃ lopo hoti tesuṇi, ṇāpīsu paresu.
anya-e0201n0:4143: Bhikkhu attanā vippakataṃ kuṭiṃ parehi pariyosāpeti pārā. 363. Ettha akammakattā dhātussa ‘kuṭi’nti ca ‘parehī’ti ca dve kammāni dvikkhattuṃ pavattehi kāritehi sijjhanti.
anya-e0201n0:4145: Hare-lajjāyaṃ, harāyati, harāyanti, aṭṭiyāmi harāyāmi saṃ. ni. 1.165, harāyāma, harāyatīti hirī, mahāvuttinā upantassa ittaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:4146: Gile-rujjane, gilāyati, piṭṭhi me āgilāyati cūḷava. 345; dī. ni. 3.300, gilāyanti.
anya-e0201n0:4149: “Jhānaṃ, ujjhānaṃ, nijjhānaṃ, tāṇaṃ, parittāṇaṃ, vodānaṃ, niddānaṃ, gilāno, palāto, milātanti”ādīsu yalopo.
anya-e0201n0:4155: Atha byañjanantadhāturūpāni vuccante. Tāni ca avuddhika, savuddhikavasena duvidhāni honti. Tattha avuddhikāni tāva vuccante.
anya-e0201n0:4156: Khipa, guha, tuda, disa, pisa, phusa, likha, vadhādi.
anya-e0201n0:4157: Idha dhātūnaṃ antassaro uccāraṇattho, so rūpavidhāne nappayujjate.
anya-e0201n0:4159: Tudādīhi kānubandho apaccayo hoti. Kānubandho avuddhidīpanattho.
anya-e0201n0:4160: Khipa-khipane, khipati, pakkhipati, ukkhipati, okkhipati, nikkhipati, vikkhipati, paṭikkhipati, saṃkhipati.
anya-e0201n0:4162: Kārite-khipeti, khipayati, khipāpeti, khipāpayati, khepeti, khepayati vā, udakaṃ khepeti, taṇhaṃ khepeti, khayāpetīti attho.
anya-e0201n0:4165: Kārite gussa dīgho, gūheti, gūhayati, gūhāpeti, gūhāpayati.
anya-e0201n0:4173: ‘Tavaggavaraṇānaṃ ye cavaggabayañā’ti dassa jattaṃ. ‘Vaggalasehi te’ti yassa pubbarūpattaṃ, tujjati.
anya-e0201n0:4175: Disī-uddisane, uddisanaṃ sarūpato kathanaṃ. Uddisati, pātimokkhaṃ uddisanti mahāva. 152, niddisati, niddisanti, apadisati, apadisanti.
anya-e0201n0:4177: Kārite-ācariyo sissaṃ pāḷidhammaṃ uddisāpeti, uddisāpayati, vācetīti attho. Pāṭhesu pana sadvayampi dissati.
anya-e0201n0:4178: Nuda-khipane, nudati, panudati, vinodeti, paṭivinodeti vā.
anya-e0201n0:4184: Phusa-samphasse pattiyañca, phusati, phusanti dhīrā nibbānaṃ dha. pa. 23, vajjaṃ naṃ phuseyya pārā. 409; cūḷava. 344.
anya-e0201n0:4191: Yamhi dhassa jhattaṃ, yassa pubbarūpaṃ. ‘Catutthadutiyesvesaṃ tatiyapaṭhamā’ti jhassa tatiyajattaṃ, vajjhati, vajjhanti, vajjhare. Ime sattā haññantu vā vajjhantu vā ma. ni. 1.60.
anya-e0201n0:4192: Kārite-vadheti, vadhayati, vadhāpeti, vadhāpayati, sāmiko purisaṃ maggaṃ gameti, gamayati, gamāpeti, gamāpayati iccādīnipi idha vattabbāni.
anya-e0201n0:4196_0: Asa-bhuvi, āsa-nivāse upavesane ca, isu-icchā, kantīsu, kamu-padagamane, kusa-akkose,
anya-e0201n0:4196_1: gamu-gatimhi, jaravayohānimhi, jana-janane, mara-pāṇacāge, yamu-uparame, ruda-assuvimocane
anya-e0201n0:4196_2: kandane ca, ruha-janane, labha-lābhe, vaca, vada-viyattiyaṃ vācāyaṃ, vida-ñāṇe, vasa-nivāse,
anya-e0201n0:4197: Tyādyuppatti, kattari lo, asa-bhuvi, sattāyanti attho.
anya-e0201n0:4199: Atthito parassati, tūnaṃ tassa tho hoti.
anya-e0201n0:4200: ‘Pararūpamayakāre byañjane’ti suttena byañjane pare dhātvantassa pararūpattaṃ, ‘catutthadutiyesvesaṃ tatiyapaṭhamā’ti suttena pararūpassa dutiyassa paṭhamattaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:4202_0: Ettha ca “atthi tvaṃ etarahi, na tvaṃ natthi, atthi ahaṃ etarahi, nāhaṃ natthi, puttā
anya-e0201n0:4202_1: matthi dhanā matthi dha. pa. 62, atthi imasmiṃ kāye kesā”ti khu. pā. 3.dvitiṃsākāra
anya-e0201n0:4203_0: “Atthīti kho kaccāyana ayameko anto, natthīti dutiyo anto”ti saṃ. ni. 2.15 ca “atthipaccayo,
anya-e0201n0:4203_1: natthipaccayo”ti paṭṭhā. 1.1.paccayuddesa ca evamādīsu nāmapaṭirūpako. Tathā natthisaddo.
anya-e0201n0:4204: Tumhi-vipassissa ca namatthu dī. ni. 3.287, namo te buddha vīratthu saṃ. ni. 1.90, ettha ca “dhiratthumaṃ pūtikāya”nti ādīsu atthusaddo nipāto.
anya-e0201n0:4206: Nta, māna, anti, antu, iyā, iyuṃsu atthissa ādilopo hoti.
anya-e0201n0:4210_0: Manussosi mahāva. 126, purisosi mahāva. 126. Himhi dīgho, tvaṃ paṇḍito āhi, bhavāhīti
anya-e0201n0:4210_1: attho. Tavibhattīsu dhātvantassa pararūpaṃ, tumhe attha, kaccittha parisuddhā pārā.
anya-e0201n0:4210_2: 233. Tvādimhi-mā pamādattha ma. ni. 1.88, 215, tumhe samaggā attha.
anya-e0201n0:4211: 632. Mimānaṃ vā mhimhā ca ka. 492; rū. 499; nī. 987; ‘sīhisvaṭa’ (bahūsu).
anya-e0201n0:4212: Atthito paresaṃ mi, mānaṃ mhi, mhā honti vā, atthissa ca aṭa hoti.
anya-e0201n0:4214: Tvādimhi-ahaṃ iminā puññena anāgate paññavā amhi, mayaṃ paññavanto amha.
anya-e0201n0:4216: Etesu mi, mesu atthissa sassa so hoti. Pararūpanisedhanatthamidaṃ suttaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:4217: Ahaṃ paṇḍito asmi, mayaṃ paṇḍitā asma.
anya-e0201n0:4218: Tvādimhi-ahaṃ anāgate paññavā asmi, mayaṃ paññavanto asma.
anya-e0201n0:4220: 634. Atthiteyyādichannaṃ sa su sasi satha saṃsāma ka. 571, 517; rū. 624, 488; nī. 830, 1105; ‘atthiteyyādicchannaṃ sasusasatha saṃ sāma’ (bahūsu).
anya-e0201n0:4221: ‘Atthī’ti dhātuniddeso ti-kāro, atthito paresaṃ eyyādīnaṃ channaṃ sādayo honti.
anya-e0201n0:4222: Evamassa vacanīyo pārā. 411, evamassu vacanīyā pārā 418, tvaṃ assasi, tumhe assatha, ahaṃ assaṃ, mayaṃ assāma.
anya-e0201n0:4223_0: Assunipātopi bahuṃ dissati, tayassu dhammā jahitā bhavanti khu. pā. 6.10, kenassu
anya-e0201n0:4223_1: taratī oghaṃ, kenassu tarati aṇṇavaṃ saṃ. ni. 1.246. “Kiṃsu chetvā sukhaṃ seti, kiṃsu
anya-e0201n0:4223_2: chetvā na socatī”ti saṃ. ni. 1.71 ettha niggahītamhā saṃyogādilopo.
anya-e0201n0:4225: Atthito eyyādīsu ādimhi dvinnaṃ iyā, iyuṃ honti. ‘Ntamānantantiyiyuṃsū…’tiādilopo.
anya-e0201n0:4226: So siyā, te siyuṃ, ete dve nipātāpi honti. “Vedanākkhandho siyā kusalo, siyā akusalo, siyā abyākato”ti vibha. 152 ādīsu ekaccoti attho.
anya-e0201n0:4227: “Siyā kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo dhammo uppajjeyya hetupaccayā”ti paṭṭhā. 1.1.35-38 ādīsu kinnūti attho.
anya-e0201n0:4229_0: Mahāvuttinā eyyuṃ, eyyamiccetesaṃ iyaṃsu, iyaṃ honti, ādilopo, siyaṃsu dve bhikkhū
anya-e0201n0:4229_1: abhidhamme nānāvādā ma. ni. 3.35, evaṃrūpo siyaṃ ahaṃ anāgatamaddhānaṃ, evaṃvedano
anya-e0201n0:4233: So āsi, te āsuṃ, āsiṃsu, tvaṃ āsi, tumhe āsittha, ahaṃ āsiṃ. Tatrāpāsiṃ evaṃvaṇṇo dī. ni. 1.245; ma. ni. 1.68. Mayaṃ āsimha, āsimhā.
anya-e0201n0:4235_0: Aādiparokkhāyañca āādihiyyattaniyañca ssādīsu bhavissanti, kālātipattīsu ca atthissa
anya-e0201n0:4235_1: bhū hoti. Idañca suttaṃ atthissa etāsaṃ vibhattīnampi sādhāraṇakaraṇatthaṃ. Rūpampi bhūrūpameva.
anya-e0201n0:4236: So babhūva, te babhūvu, so abhavā, te abhavū, so bhavissati, te bhavissanti, so abhavissā, te abhavissaṃsu iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:4237: 638. Atyādintesvatthissa bhū ka. 517; rū. 500; nī. 1020; caṃ. 5.4.79; pā. 2.4.52.
anya-e0201n0:4238_0: Tyādivajjitesu ntavajjitesu ca paccayesu atthissa bhū hoti. Etena tyādi, tvādi, eyyādi,
anya-e0201n0:4238_1: īādisaṅkhātāsu catūsu vibhattīsu ntapaccaye ca atthissa bhūādeso natthi, sesāsu catūsu
anya-e0201n0:4238_2: vibhattīsu ca ntavajjitesu tabbādīsu ca atthissa bhūādeso labbhatīti veditabbo.
anya-e0201n0:4239: Āsa-upavesane. Guruṃ upāsati, payirupāsati, upāsanti, payirupāsanti.
anya-e0201n0:4241: Kārite-mātā puttaṃ guruṃ upāseti, payirupāseti, upāsayati, payirupāsayati.
anya-e0201n0:4242: Īādimhi-upāsi, payirupāsi, upāsiṃsu, payirupāsiṃsu, upāsuṃ, payirupāsuṃ.
anya-e0201n0:4244: 639. Gamayamisāsadisānaṃ vā cchaṅa ka. 476, 522; rū. 442, 476; nī. 957, 1035.
anya-e0201n0:4245: Gamu, yamu, isu, āsa, disānaṃ anto byañjano ṅānubandho ccho hoti vā nta, māna, tyādīsu.
anya-e0201n0:4246: Gacchanto, niyacchanto, icchanto, acchanto, dicchantoti iminā tyādīsu āsassa ccho, acchati, acchanti, so acchi, te acchiṃsu.
anya-e0201n0:4249: Antassa samīpe pavattatīti upanto, byañjanantadhātūnaṃ pubbassaro ‘upanto’ti vuccati, lahubhūtassa upantabhūtassa ca ivaṇṇu’vaṇṇassa e, ovuddhī honti.
anya-e0201n0:4251: Lahussāti kiṃ? Jīvati, dhūpati, ikkhati, sukkhati.
anya-e0201n0:4252: Upantassāti kiṃ? Siñcati, bhuñjati, niggahītāgamena byavahitattā upanto na hoti.
anya-e0201n0:4254: Iminā issa evuddhi hoti, esati, anvesati, pariyesati.
anya-e0201n0:4258: Isu-icchāyaṃ, cchādeso, icchati, icchanti, sampaṭicchati, sampaṭicchanti.
anya-e0201n0:4261: Kamme-icchāpīyati, icchāpayīyati, so icchi, te icchiṃsu, icchissati, icchissanti.
anya-e0201n0:4262: Kamu-vijjhane, gambhīresu ṭhānesu ñāṇaṃ kamati, na satthaṃ kamati, na visaṃ kamati, na aggi kamati a. ni. 8.1, na vijjhatīti attho.
anya-e0201n0:4263: Kamu-padagamane, pakkamati, apakkamati, upakkamati, vikkamati, abhikkamati, paṭikkamati, atikkamati, saṅkamati, okkamati.
anya-e0201n0:4265: Nimhā parassa kamassa kassa kho hoti. ‘Ādissā’ti saṅketattā kassāti ñāyati.
anya-e0201n0:4269: Byañjanantassa dhātussa ādimhi a-kārassa āvuddhi hoti ṇānubandhe paccaye. ‘Bahula’nti adhikatattā ṇāpimhi āvuddhi natthi.
anya-e0201n0:4270: Pakkāmeti, pakkāmayati, nikkhāmeti, nikkhāmayati, nikkhamāpeti, nikkhamāpayati.
anya-e0201n0:4271_0: Īādimhi mahāvuttinā ādidīgho vā hoti, so pakkami, pakkāmi, idaṃ vatvāna pakkāmi,
anya-e0201n0:4271_1: maddī sabbaṅgasobhaṇā jā. 2.22.1857, pakkamuṃ, pakkāmuṃ, sammodamānā pakkāmuṃ, aññamaññaṃ
anya-e0201n0:4271_2: piyaṃ vadā jā. 2.22.1868, pakkamiṃsu, pakkāmiṃsu, pakkamaṃsu, pakkāmaṃsu, pakkamissati,
anya-e0201n0:4272_0: Āpubbo kusa-akkose, lahupantattā vuddhi, akkosati, akkosanti. Papubbo āmantane, pakkosati,
anya-e0201n0:4272_1: pakkosanti. Vipubbo uccasadde, vikkosati, vikkosanti. Paṭipubbo nīvāraṇe, paṭikkosati, paṭikkosanti.
anya-e0201n0:4275: Kusato ruhato ca parassa īssa cchi hoti.
anya-e0201n0:4276: Akkocchi maṃ avadhi maṃ dha. pa. 3-4, idañca rūpaṃ kudha, kupadhātūhipi sādhenti, evaṃ sati “akkocchi me”ti pāṭho siyā. Akkosi, akkosiṃsu.
anya-e0201n0:4277_0: Gamu gatimhi, kattari lo, ‘ūlasse’ti lassa ettaṃ, gameti, gamenti. Avapubbo ñāṇe,
anya-e0201n0:4277_1: avagameti, avagamenti, adhipubbo ñāṇe lābhe ca, adhigameti, adhigamenti. Vipubbo
anya-e0201n0:4279: Pubbarūpatte-gammati, gammanti, adhigammati, adhigammanti, adhigammare, adhigammate, adhigammante, adhigammare.
anya-e0201n0:4280: Kārite vuddhi natthi, gameti, gamayati, gamāpeti, gamāpayati.
anya-e0201n0:4282_0: Hiyyattanimhi-so agamā, gamā, te agamū, gamū, tvaṃ agamo, agama, agami, tumhe agamuttha,
anya-e0201n0:4282_1: ahaṃ agamiṃ, gamiṃ, mayaṃ agamamhā, gamamhā, agamumhā, gamumhā, so agamattha, te
anya-e0201n0:4282_2: agamatthuṃ, tvaṃ agamase, tumhe agamavhaṃ, ahaṃ agamaṃ, mayaṃ agamamhase.
anya-e0201n0:4283: Ajjhattanimhi īādīsu ikārāgamo, so agamī, gamī.
anya-e0201n0:4285: Mahāvuttinā ākārena saha sāgamo, so agamāsi, gāmaṃ agamāsi, nagaraṃ agamāsi.
anya-e0201n0:4286: ‘Eyyāthasse’iccādinā īssa ttho, so gāmaṃ agamittho, gamittho, te agamuṃ, gamuṃ.
anya-e0201n0:4287: ‘Uṃssiṃsvaṃsū’ti iṃsu, aṃsu, te agamiṃsu, gamiṃsu, agamaṃsu, gamaṃsu, tvaṃ agamo, gamo.
anya-e0201n0:4288: ‘Ossa a i ttha ttho’ ‘sī’ti suttāni, tvaṃ agama, gama, agami, gami, agamittha, gamittha, agamittho, gamittho, agamāsi, gamāsi, tumhe agamittha.
anya-e0201n0:4289: ‘Mhātthānamuu’iti uttaṃ, tumhe agamuttha, gamuttha, ahaṃ agamiṃ, gamiṃ, agamāsiṃ, gamāsiṃ, mayaṃ agamimhā, gamimhā.
anya-e0201n0:4290: Rassatte-agamimha, gamimha, agamumhā, gamumhā, agamumha, gamumha, agamāsimhā, gamāsimhā, agamāsimha, gamāsimha.
anya-e0201n0:4293: ‘Eyyāthasse’iccādinā tthatte-so agamittha, gamittha, te agamū, gamū.
anya-e0201n0:4294: Rassatte-agamu, gamu, tvaṃ agamise, gamise, tumhe agamivhaṃ, gamivhaṃ, ahaṃ agama, gama, agamaṃ, gamaṃ vā, agamimhe, gamimhe.
anya-e0201n0:4295: Kamme-agamīyi, agammi, agamīyittho, agammittho, agamīyuṃ, gamīyuṃ, agamīyiṃsu, gamīyiṃsu, agammuṃ, gammuṃ, agammiṃsu, gammiṃsu.
anya-e0201n0:4297: Kārite-agamāpayi, gamāpayi, agamāpesi, gamāpesi, agamāpayuṃ, gamāpayuṃ, agamāpayiṃsu, gamāpayiṃsu.
anya-e0201n0:4299: Āādimhi īādimhi ca gamissa massa ā hoti. Saralopo.
anya-e0201n0:4300: So agā, te agū, tvaṃ ago, tumhe aguttha, ahaṃ agaṃ, mayaṃ agumhā.
anya-e0201n0:4301: Īādimhi īsaralopo, agā devāna santike jā. 1.14.205, vāyaso anupariyagā su. ni. 449.
anya-e0201n0:4302: Āpubbo āgamane, anavhito tato āgā jā. 1.5.21, sopā’gā samitiṃ vanaṃ dī. ni. 2.335.
anya-e0201n0:4303: Adhipubbo paṭilābhe, ajjhagā amataṃ santiṃ vi. va. 846, taṇhānaṃ khayamajjhagā dha. pa. 154.
anya-e0201n0:4304: Atipubbo upādhipubbo ca titikkame, nakkhattaṃ paṭimānentaṃ, attho bālaṃ upajjhagā jā. 1.1.49. Khaṇo ve mā upajjhagā.
anya-e0201n0:4305_0: Etāni o, avacanānaṃ lope sati tumha’mhayogepi labhanti, aguṃ, agiṃsu, agaṃsu. Samantā
anya-e0201n0:4305_1: vijjutā āguṃ jā. 2.22.2264, tepā’guṃsamitiṃ vanaṃ (gavesitabbaṃ), visesaṃ ajjhagaṃsute
anya-e0201n0:4305_2: dī. ni. 2.354, asesaṃ parinibbanti, asesaṃ dukkhamajjhaguṃ itivu. 93, sabbaṃ dukkhaṃ
anya-e0201n0:4305_3: upajjhaguṃ paṭi. ma. 1.236; ma. ni. 3.271. Ajjhago, ajjhaga, ajjhagi, ajjhaguttha,
anya-e0201n0:4305_4: ajjhagiṃ, ajjhagimhā, ajjhagumhā, agā, āgā, anvagā, ajjhagā, upajjhagā, agū, āgū.
anya-e0201n0:4305_5: Āgū devā yasassino dī. ni. 2.340, cittassa ekadhammassa, sabbeva vasamanvagū saṃ.
anya-e0201n0:4305_6: ni. 1.61. Cetā haniṃsu vedabbaṃ, sabbe te byasanamajjhagū jā. 1.1.48.
anya-e0201n0:4306_0: Parokkhāyaṃ ādissa dvittaṃ, ‘kavaggahānaṃ cavaggajā’ti pubbassa cavaggo. So jagama,
anya-e0201n0:4306_1: mahāvuttinā upantassa dīgho, kvaci assa ittaṃ, “rājā dudīpo jagāmi magga”nti jā.
anya-e0201n0:4306_2: 2.22.911; ‘rājā dudīpopi jagāma saggaṃ’ pāḷi. So jagāma, te jagāmu, tvaṃ jagame.
anya-e0201n0:4307: Byañjanādimhi ikārāgamo, tumhe jagamittha, ahaṃ jagamaṃ, mayaṃ jagamimha, so jagamittha, te jagamire, tvaṃ jagamittho, tumhe jagamivho, ahaṃ jagamiṃ, mayaṃ jagamimhe.
anya-e0201n0:4309: Parachakke-so gamissate, te gamissante, gamissare, tvaṃ gamissase, tumhe gamissavhe, ahaṃ gamissaṃ, mayaṃ gamissāmhe.
anya-e0201n0:4311: ‘Āīūmhāssāssāmhānaṃ vā’ti ssā, ssāmhānaṃ rasso, agamissa, gamissa, te agamissaṃsu, gamissaṃsu, tvaṃ agamisse, gamisse.
anya-e0201n0:4312: ‘Eyyāthasse’ iccādinā ssessa attaṃ, tvaṃ agamissa, gamissa, tumhe agamissatha, gamissatha, ahaṃ agamissaṃ, gamissaṃ, mayaṃ agamissāmhā, gamissāmhā, agamissāmha, gamissāmha.
anya-e0201n0:4313: ‘Gama vada dānaṃ ghammavajjadajjā’ti sabbavibhattīsu gamissa ghammo, ghammati, ghammanti.
anya-e0201n0:4315: Mahāvuttinā gagghādeso vā, tvaṃ yena yeneva gagghasi, phāsuṃyeva gagghasi a. ni. 8.63.
anya-e0201n0:4316: ‘Gamayamisāsadisānaṃ vācchaṅa’ iti suttena sabbavibhattīsu gamissa massa ccho, gacchati, gacchanti, gacchare.
anya-e0201n0:4318: Kārite-gacchāpeti, gacchāpayati. Gacchatu, gacchantu, gaccheyya, gaccheyyuṃ.
anya-e0201n0:4320: ‘Eyyeyyāseyyaṃnaṃ ṭe’iti suttena eyya, eyyāsi, eyyaṃvibhattīnaṃ ettaṃ, so gacche, tvaṃ gacche, ahaṃ gacche.
anya-e0201n0:4323: Īādimhi-agacchi, gacchi, agacchuṃ, gacchuṃ, agacchiṃsu, gacchiṃsu.
anya-e0201n0:4324: 645. Ḍaṃsassa ca ñchaṅa ka. 517; rū. 488; nī. 1105; ‘chaṅa’ (bahūsu).
anya-e0201n0:4325: Āādīsu īādīsu ca ḍaṃsassa ca anto byañjano ñchaṅa hoti.
anya-e0201n0:4326: So agañchā, gañchā. Tathā agañchū, gacchū.
anya-e0201n0:4328: Tasmiṃ paṭipaviṭṭhamhi, añño āgañchi brāhmaṇo su. ni. 985. Khippameva upāgañchi, yattha sammati temiyo jā. 2.22.73. Te agañchuṃ, gañchuṃ.
anya-e0201n0:4330: 646. Labha vasa chida gama bhida rudānaṃ cchaṅa ka. 481; rū. 524; nī. 966, 968.
anya-e0201n0:4331: Ssena saha etesaṃ cchaṅa hoti vā ssayuttāsu vibhattīsu, suttavibhattena susassa ca, “nadīva avasucchatī”ti jā. 2.22.2140 pāḷi.
anya-e0201n0:4332_0: Lacchati, labhissati, alacchā, alabhissā, vacchati, vasissati, avacchā, avasissā,
anya-e0201n0:4332_1: checchati, chindissati, acchecchā, acchindissā, bhecchati, bhindissati, abhecchā,
anya-e0201n0:4333: Iminā ssayuttāsu dvīsu vibhattīsu ssena saha gamissa massa ccho, gacchati, gacchissati, gacchanti, gacchissanti, ahaṃ gacchaṃ, gacchissaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:4334_0: Atrimā pāḷī-gacchaṃ pāraṃ samuddassa, kassaṃ purisakāriyaṃ jā. 2.22.131, tassāhaṃ
anya-e0201n0:4334_1: santikaṃ gacchaṃ, so me satthā bhavissati, sabbāni abhisambhossaṃ, gacchaññeva rathesabha
anya-e0201n0:4334_2: jā. 2.22.1832, vedhabyaṃ kaṭukaṃ loke, gacchaññeva rathesabha jā. 2.22.1835.
anya-e0201n0:4338: Jara, sadānaṃ saramhā īmaāgamo hoti vāti īmaāgamo.
anya-e0201n0:4342: Etesaṃ iyaṅa hoti vā nta, māna, tyādīsu.
anya-e0201n0:4347: Janī-pātubhāve, mahāvuttinā sabbavibhattīsu nassa yādeso ādidīgho ca, jāyati, upajāyati, vijāyati, jāyanti, jāyare, pajāyanti, pajāyare, upajāyanti, upajāyare.
anya-e0201n0:4348: Kārite vuddhi natthi, janeti, janenti, janayati, janayanti.
anya-e0201n0:4349: Kamme-janīyati, janīyanti, jāyatu, jāyantu, jāyeyya, jāyeyyuṃ.
anya-e0201n0:4351: Īādimhi-ajāyi, ajāyiṃsu, vijāyi, vijāyiṃsu, ajani, jani vā.
anya-e0201n0:4352: Kārite-ajanesi, janesi, ajanayi, janayi, ajanesuṃ, janesuṃ, ajanayuṃ, janayuṃ, ajanayiṃsu, janayiṃsu.
anya-e0201n0:4357: Ā, īādīsu ‘ḍaṃsassa ca ñchaṅa’ iti suttaṃ, niggahītalopo, aḍañchā, ḍañchā, aḍañchi, ḍañchi.
anya-e0201n0:4359: Kamme yamhi ‘hassa vipallāso’ti pubbāparavipallāso, agginā gāmo dayhati, dayhanti.
anya-e0201n0:4361: 649. Dahassa dassa ḍo ka. 20; rū. 27; nī. 50; ‘…dasadadakkhā’ (bahūsu).
anya-e0201n0:4366: Disadhātussa passa ca dassa ca dasa ca da ca dakkha cāti ete ādesā honti vā.
anya-e0201n0:4367: Vipassanā, vipassī bhagavā, sudassī, piyadassī, atthadassī, dhammadassī, sudassaṃ vajjamaññesaṃ dha. pa. 252, sudassananagaraṃ, mahāsudassano nāma rājā dī. ni. 2.242.
anya-e0201n0:4368_0: Dasādese-catusaccaddaso nātho vibha. aṭṭha. suttantabhājanīyavaṇṇanā, duddaso dhammo
anya-e0201n0:4368_1: mahāva. 7; dī. ni. 2.64, attano pana duddasaṃ dha. pa. 252, so ve bhikkhu dhammadasoti
anya-e0201n0:4368_2: vuccati gavesitabbaṃ. Passa dhammaṃ durājānaṃ, sammuḷhettha aviddasū. Daṭṭhabbaṃ, daṭṭhā, daṭṭhunti.
anya-e0201n0:4369_0: Iminā suttena disassa sabbavibhattīsu yathārahaṃ passa, dassa, dakkhādesā honti,
anya-e0201n0:4369_1: ā, īādīsu dasa, dādesā honti, “dissati, dissantī”ti rūpāni pana yassa pubbarūpattena
anya-e0201n0:4369_2: idha kamme sijjhanti, divādigaṇe kattari sijjhanti. Mahāvuttinā addassa, dissādesāpi
anya-e0201n0:4369_3: honti. Atrimā pāḷī-yaṃ vāsavaṃ addassāmaṃ jā. 1.6.112; ‘addasāma’, ye mayaṃ bhagavantaṃ
anya-e0201n0:4369_4: addassāma gavesitabbaṃ, api me mātaraṃ adassatha ma. ni. 2.356, dissanti bālā abyattā
anya-e0201n0:4369_5: mahāva. 82, mayi ime dhammā sandissanti, ahañca imesu dhammesu sandissāmi ma. ni.
anya-e0201n0:4369_6: 3.253, nimittāni padissanti, tāni ajja padissareti bu. vaṃ. 2.82, tasmā tyādīsupi
anya-e0201n0:4369_7: “adassati, adassanti, adassasi, adassatha, adassāmi, addassāmā”ti yujjanti.
anya-e0201n0:4370: Kārite ṇimhi dassādeso, dasseti, dassayati, nidasseti, nidassayati, sandasseti, sandassayati.
anya-e0201n0:4371: Kamme-dassīyati, dassīyanti, nidassīyati, nidassīyanti, sandassīyati, sandassīyanti, dakkhati, dakkhanti.
anya-e0201n0:4373: ‘Gamayamisāsadisānaṃ cchaṅa’ iti cchādese- dicchati, dicchanti iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:4374: Passati, passanti, dakkhati, dakkhanti, passīyati, passīyanti, dakkhīyati, dakkhīyanti.
anya-e0201n0:4375: Yassa pubbarūpatte-dissati, dissanti, dissate, dissante, uddissate, uddissante, niddissate, niddissante, apadissate, apadissante.
anya-e0201n0:4378: Passatu, passantu, dakkhatu, dakkhantu, passeyya, passeyyuṃ, dakkheyya, dakkheyyuṃ.
anya-e0201n0:4379_0: Eyyāmassa emu ca antassa u ca honti. “Kattha passemu khattiyaṃ jā. 2.2.1947, dakkhemu
anya-e0201n0:4379_1: te nivesana”nti jā. 1.15.254 (…nivesanāni) pāḷi. Passeyyāma, passeyyāmu, dakkheyyāma, dakkheyyāmu.
anya-e0201n0:4381: Dasa, dādesesu dakārassa dvittaṃ, addasā kho bhagavā mahāva. 9; dī. ni. 2.69; saṃ. ni. 1.159, addasā kho āyasmā ānando ma. ni. 1.364.
anya-e0201n0:4382_0: Rassatte-tamaddasa mahābrahmā, nisinnaṃ samhi vesmani jā. 1.16.148. Te addasū. Rassatte-addasu,
anya-e0201n0:4382_1: āmantayassu vo putte, mā te mātaramaddasu jātake “āmantayassu te putte, mā te mātara maddasuṃ”.
anya-e0201n0:4384: Rassatte-adda. Yāyamāno mahārājā, addā sīdantare nage jā. 2.22.2105. Yo dukkhaṃ sukhato adda, dukkhamaddakkhi sallato dī. ni. 2.368.
anya-e0201n0:4385: Īādimhi-apassi, passi, apassī, passī, apassiṃsu, passiṃsu, apassi, passi, apassittha, passittha, apassiṃ, passiṃ, apassimhā, passimhā.
anya-e0201n0:4386: Dassādese-addassi, addassuṃ, addassiṃsu, addassaṃsu, addassi, addassittha, addassiṃ, addassimhā.
anya-e0201n0:4389: Parachakke-addasā, addasū, ahaṃ addasaṃ, mayaṃ addassimhe. Addasaṃ kāma te mūlaṃ, saṅkappā kāma jāyasi jā. 1.8.39.
anya-e0201n0:4390_0: Kvaci sāgame ākārāgamo, so addasāsi, te addasāsuṃ, ahaṃ addasāsiṃ, mayaṃ adasāsimha.
anya-e0201n0:4390_1: Yaṃ addasāsiṃ sambuddhaṃ, desentaṃ dhammamuttamaṃ theragā. 287. Athaddasāsiṃ sambuddhaṃ,
anya-e0201n0:4391: Mahāvuttinā iṃssa imhi hoti, pathe addasāsimhi bhojaputte jā. 2.17.146.
anya-e0201n0:4393: Dakkhādese‘dakkha sakkha hehi’iccādinā ssassalopo, dakkhati, dakkhanti, dakkhiti, dakkhinti, dakkhissati, dakkhissanti.
anya-e0201n0:4396: ‘Jaramarānamiyaṅa’iti iyādeso, miyati, miyanti, amhaṃ daharā na miyyare jā. 1.10.97.
anya-e0201n0:4397: Kārite ‘assā ṇānubandhe’ti āvuddhi, māreti, mārenti, mārayati, mārayanti, mārāpeti, mārāpenti, mārāpayati, mārāpayanti.
anya-e0201n0:4398: Yamu-uparame, yamati, yamanti. Pare ca na vijānanti, mayamettha yamāmase. Ettha ca ‘yamāmase’ti viramāmase, maraṇaṃ gacchāmaseti attho.
anya-e0201n0:4402: ‘Gamayamisāsadisānaṃ vā cchaṅa’iti massa cchādeso, niyacchati, niyacchanti.
anya-e0201n0:4406: Ṇāpimhi na vuddhi, niyamāpeti, niyamāpayati, vavatthapetīti attho.

anya-e0201n0:4408_1: nūna kapaṇā ammā, cirarattāya rucchati jā. 2.22.2136. Koñjī samuddatīreva, kapaṇā
anya-e0201n0:4408_2: nūna rucchati jā. 2.21.113. Sā nūna kapaṇā ammā, ciraṃ rucchati assame jā. 2.22.2138,
anya-e0201n0:4408_3: kaṃ nva’jja chātā tasitā, uparucchanti dārakā jā. 2.22.2153. Rodissati, rodissanti,
anya-e0201n0:4410: Ruha-pāpuṇane, ruhati, ruhanti, āruhati, āruhanti, ārohati, ārohanti, abhiruhati, abhiruhanti, oruhati, oruhanti, orohati, orohanti.
anya-e0201n0:4412: ‘Hassa vipallāso’ti ha, yānaṃ vipariyāyo, āruyhati, oruyhati.
anya-e0201n0:4416: Yassa pubbarūpatte ‘catutthadutiyesvesaṃ tatiyapaṭhamā’ti saṃyogādissa catutthassa tatiyattaṃ, labbhati, labbhanti, labbhare.

anya-e0201n0:4419: Labhamhā paresaṃ iṃ, īnaṃ kamena thaṃ, thā honti vā, dhātvantassa pararūpattaṃ, saṃyogādissa dutiyassa paṭhamattaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:4420: Ahaṃ alatthaṃ, alabhiṃ vā, so alattha, alabhi vā.
anya-e0201n0:4421_0: Mahāvuttinā uṃssa thuṃ, thaṃsu honti, mhāssa ca thamhā, thuṃmhā honti, te bhagavato
anya-e0201n0:4421_1: santike pabbajjañca upasampadañca alatthuṃ dī. ni. 2.77, satiṃ paccalatthuṃ, viparītasaññaṃ
anya-e0201n0:4421_2: paccalatthuṃ, te satiṃ paccalatthaṃsu, agamamhā kho tava gehaṃ, tattha neva dānaṃ
anya-e0201n0:4421_3: alatthamhā ma. ni. 2.300 (thokaṃ visadisaṃ), akkosameva alatthamhā, mayañca alatthamhā
anya-e0201n0:4421_4: savanāya, alatthumhā vā. Dhātvantassa ccho ca. Tadāhaṃ pāpikaṃ diṭṭhiṃ, paṭilacchiṃ

anya-e0201n0:4422_1: cchādeso, lacchati, labhissati, lacchanti, labhissanti, lacchasi, labhissasi, lacchatha,
anya-e0201n0:4422_2: labhissatha, lacchāmi, labhissāmi, lacchāma, labhissāma. Lacchāma putte jīvantā,
anya-e0201n0:4426: Yassa pubbarūpatte ‘assū’ti suttena ādimhi akārassa uttaṃ, vuccati, vuccanti, vuccare, vuccate, vuccante, vuccare.
anya-e0201n0:4427: Kārite-vāceti, vācenti, vācayati, vācayanti, vācāpeti, vācāpenti, vācāpayati, vācāpayanti.
anya-e0201n0:4429: Mahāvuttinā ākārena saha sāgamo, avacāsi, vacāsi, avacuṃ, vacuṃ, avaciṃsu, vaciṃsu, tvaṃ avaco, avaca, avaci, avacāsi, avacittha, avacittho, tumhe avacittha.
anya-e0201n0:4430: ‘Mhāthānamuña’iti suttaṃ, tumhe avacuttha, vacuttha, ahaṃ avaciṃ, vaciṃ, avacāsiṃ, vacāsiṃ, mayaṃ avacimhā, vacimhā, avacimha, vacimha vā, mayaṃ avacumhā, vacumhā, so avacā, vacā.
anya-e0201n0:4431: Rassatte-avaca, avacittha, vacittha vā, ahaṃ avacaṃ, avaca, vaca vā, mayaṃ avacimhe, vacimhe.

anya-e0201n0:4441: Vada-viyattiyaṃ vācāyaṃ, vadati, vadanti, ovadati, ovadanti, vadasi, vadatha, vadāmi, vadāma.

anya-e0201n0:4445: Kārite-bheriṃ vādeti, vādenti, vādayati, vādayanti, guruṃ abhivādeti, abhivādenti, abhivādesi, abhivādetha, abhivādemi, abhivādema.

anya-e0201n0:4448: ‘Gamavadadānaṃ ghammavajjadajjā vā’ti vajjādeso, ‘ūlasse’ti lassa ettaṃ, vajjeti, vajjenti.
anya-e0201n0:4451: Eyyādimhi-‘eyyeyyāseyyaṃnaṃṭe’iti eyyādīnaṃ ekavacanānaṃ ettaṃ, vade, vadeyya, vajje, vajjeyya, vadeyyuṃ, vajjeyyuṃ.
anya-e0201n0:4452: Vajjādese mahāvuttinā eyyassa āttaṃ, eyyumādīnaṃ eyyasaddassa lopo, so vajjā, te vajjuṃ.
anya-e0201n0:4453: Eyyādīnaṃ yyāsaddassa lopo vā, tvaṃ vajjāsi, vajjesi, tumhe vajjātha, vajjetha, ahaṃ vajjāmi, vajjemi, mayaṃ vajjāma, vajjema, ahaṃ vajjaṃ, mayaṃ vajjāmhe, vajjeyyāmhe.
anya-e0201n0:4454_0: Atrimā pāḷī-vajjuṃ vā te na vā vajjuṃ, natthi nāsāya rūhanā jā. 1.3.33, ammaṃ ārogyaṃ
anya-e0201n0:4454_1: vajjāsi, tvañca tāta sukhī bhava jā. 2.22.2148, ammaṃ ārogyaṃ vajjātha, ayaṃ no neti
anya-e0201n0:4455: Hiyyattaniyaṃ-so avadā, vadā, avajjā, vajjā, te avadū, vadū, avajjū, vajjū.
anya-e0201n0:4456: Ajjattaniyaṃ-so avadi, vadi, avajji, vajji, te avaduṃ, vaduṃ, avajjuṃ, vajjuṃ, avadiṃsu, vadiṃsu, avajjiṃsu, vajjiṃsu.
anya-e0201n0:4461_0: Kārite-nivedeti, paṭivedeti, nivedayati, paṭivedayati, paṭivedayāmi vo bhikkhave
anya-e0201n0:4461_1: ma. ni. 1.416, jānāpemīti attho. Vedayāmahaṃ bhante, vedayatīti maṃ saṅgho dhāretūti
anya-e0201n0:4461_2: cūḷava. aṭṭha. 102 jānāpemi, pākaṭaṃ karomīti vā attho.

anya-e0201n0:4464: Īādimhi-paccayānaṃ khayaṃ avedi, te viduṃ, vidiṃsu.
anya-e0201n0:4465: Kārite-nivedesi, nivedayi, paṭivedesi, paṭivedayi, nivedayuṃ, nivedayiṃsu, paṭivedayuṃ, paṭivedayiṃsu.
anya-e0201n0:4466: Ssatyādimhi-vidissati, vedissati, parisuddhāti vedissāmi mahāva. 134 iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:4468: Kamme-adhi, āpubbo, tena gāmo adhivasīyati, āvasīyati, ajjhāvasīyati.
anya-e0201n0:4469: ‘Assū’ti suttena akārassa uttaṃ, vussati, vussanti, vussare, “bhagavati brahmacariyaṃ vussatī”ti ma. ni. 1.257 pāḷi.
anya-e0201n0:4472: Īādimhi-avasi, vasi, avasuṃ, vasuṃ, avasiṃsu, vasiṃsu.
anya-e0201n0:4473_0: Ssatyādīsu-‘labha vasa chida gama bhida rudānaṃ cchaṅa’iti ssena saha dhātvantassa
anya-e0201n0:4473_1: cchādeso, vacchati, vasissati, vacchanti, vasissanti, āyasmato nissāya vacchāmi mahāva.
anya-e0201n0:4473_2: 77, na te vacchāmi santike jā. 2.22.1933, avacchā, avasissā, avacchaṃsu, avasissaṃsu.
anya-e0201n0:4476: Yassa pubbarūpatte-pavissati, pavissanti, pavissare, pavissate, pavissante, pavissare.
anya-e0201n0:4480: Mahāvuttinā dhātvantassa kkho hoti, pāvekkhi pathaviṃ cecco jā. 1.19.98, so pāvekkhi kāsirājā jā. 1.15.266, so tassa gehaṃ pāvekkhi jā. 1.15.303, pāvisuṃ, pāvisiṃsu, pāvekkhiṃsu.
anya-e0201n0:4481_0: Ssatyādīsu ‘vaca bhuja muca visānaṃ kkhaṅa’iti ssena saha dhātvantassa kkho, pavekkhati,
anya-e0201n0:4481_1: pavisissati, pavekkhanti, pavisissanti, esa bhiyyo pavekkhāmi, vammikaṃ sataporisaṃ
anya-e0201n0:4482: Sada-saṃsīdane, ‘jarasadānamīma vā’tiādisaramhā īmaāgamo hoti vā, sīdati, sīdanti, lābūni sīdanti, silā plavanti jā. 1.1.77, saṃsīdati, visīdati, osīdati, avasīdati.
anya-e0201n0:4485: Kāritepi na vuddhi ādesantarattā, sīdeti, sīdayati, saṃsīdeti, saṃsīdayati, osīdeti, osīdayati, osīdāpeti, osīdāpayati, nisīdāpeti, nisīdāpayati.
anya-e0201n0:4486: Papubbamhi īma na hoti, pitā puttaṃ buddhe pasādeti, pasādayati, pasādenti, pasādayanti.
anya-e0201n0:4489: ‘Kvaci vikaraṇāna’nti suttena lavikaraṇassa lope hanti, phalaṃ ve kadaliṃ hanti, sakkāro kāpurisaṃ hanti cūḷava. 335, hanti kuddho puthujjano a. ni. 7.64.
anya-e0201n0:4490: Mahāvuttinā kvaci dhātvantalopo, vikkosamānā tibbāhi, hanti nesaṃ varaṃ varaṃ jā. 2.22.2370, luddakā migaṃ hanti, kevaṭṭā macchaṃ hanti.
anya-e0201n0:4492: Dhātvantassa cavaggatte yassa pubbarūpattaṃ, haññati, haññanti.

anya-e0201n0:4502: Hanamhā parassa ssakārassa je, khādesā honti vā, mahāvuttinā dhātvantassa pararūpattaṃ.

anya-e0201n0:4514: Parachakke assa tthattaṃ, so ahāsittha, aharittha.
anya-e0201n0:4517: Ssakāravatīsu vibhattīsu ssena saha harassa ca karassa ca rakārassa āhaṅa hoti vā.
anya-e0201n0:4518_0: Iu āgame-hāhiti, khārikājañca hāhiti jā. 2.22.1759. Hāhati vā, harissati, hāhinti,
anya-e0201n0:4518_1: hāhanti, harissanti, hāhasi, sukhaṃ bhikkhu vihāhisi dha. pa. 379. Hāhatha, hāhāmi, hāhāma, harissāma.
anya-e0201n0:4519: Mahāvuttinā harassa dhātvantassa lopo ca, “yo imasmiṃ dhammavinaye appamatto vihassati saṃ. ni. 1.185, purakkhatvā vihassāma therīgā. 121, ahaṃ udakamāhissa”nti jā. 2.22.1931 pāḷī.
anya-e0201n0:4521: Āpubba sīsa-patthanāyaṃ, āsīsati, āsīsanti, paccāsīsati, paccāsīsanti.
anya-e0201n0:4523: Ādibhūtā saramhā paraṃ paṭhamasaddarūpaṃ ekassaraṃ dverūpaṃ hoti, iminā sarapubbānaṃ dhātupadānaṃ padadvitte āsīsa, sīsa iti rūpadvayaṃ bhavati.
anya-e0201n0:4525: Dvitte anādibhūtassa ekassa byañjanassa lopo hotīti purime sīsarūpe sakāralopo.
anya-e0201n0:4527_0: Tathā ‘parokkhāyañcā’ti sutte casaddena kamādīnaṃ dhātupadānaṃ padadvitte kate ‘loponādibyañjanassā’ti
anya-e0201n0:4527_1: purime padarūpe anādibyañjanalopo, ‘kavaggahānaṃ cavaggajā’ti sesassa kavaggassa
anya-e0201n0:4527_2: cavaggattaṃ, ‘niggahītañcā’ti niggahītāgamo, caṅkamati, caṅkamanti, caṅkamatu, caṅkamantu,
anya-e0201n0:4530: Mahāvuttinā niggahītassa pararūpatte jara-bhijjane, jajjarati jajjaranti.
anya-e0201n0:4532: Muha-vecitte, momuhati, momuhanti, mahāvuttinā ussa ottaṃ.

anya-e0201n0:4535_1: ca dvitte anādibyañjanalopo natthi, gāmo gāmo ramaṇīyo. Tathā kvaci atisayadīpanepi,
anya-e0201n0:4535_2: rūparūpaṃ, dukkhadukkhaṃ, ajjhattajjhattaṃ, devadevo, munimuni, rājarājā, brahmabrahmā,
anya-e0201n0:4535_3: varavaro, aggaaggo, jeṭṭhajeṭṭho, seṭṭhaseṭṭho, pasatthapasattho, uggatauggato, ukkaṭṭhukkaṭṭho,
anya-e0201n0:4539_0: ‘Kattarī’ti padaṃ vattate, tañca bahulādhikārā vikaraṇānaṃ kattari nibandhaṃ bhāva,
anya-e0201n0:4539_1: kammesu anibandhaṃ vikappena pavattiṃ dīpeti, tasmā bhāva, kammesu ca kāritarūpesu
anya-e0201n0:4540: Chida, bhida, bhuja, muca, yuja, rica, rudha, lipa, vida, sica, subha.
anya-e0201n0:4541: 660. Mañca rudhādīnaṃ ka. 446; rū. 509; nī. 926; caṃ. 1.1.93; pā. 3.1.78.

anya-e0201n0:4542_1: āgacchati, mānubandho pubbantadīpanattho, akāro uccāraṇattho, casaddena rudha, subhādīhi

anya-e0201n0:4545: Kamme kyo, ‘tavaggavaraṇānaṃ ye cavaggabayañā’ti yamhi dhātvantassa cavaggattaṃ, ‘vaggalasehi te’ti yassa pubbarūpattaṃ. Chijjati, chijjanti.
anya-e0201n0:4546: ‘Garupubbā rassā re ntentīna’nti catunnaṃ nte, ntīnaṃ rettaṃ, chindate, chijjate, chijjante, chijjare.
anya-e0201n0:4547: Iminā niggahītāgamo, chindīyati, chindīyanti, chindīyate, chindīyante.
anya-e0201n0:4548: Kārite-chedeti, chedayati, chedāpeti, chedāpayati, chindeti, chindayati, chindāpeti, chindāpayati.
anya-e0201n0:4549: Īādimhi-acchindi, chindi, acchinduṃ, chinduṃ, acchindiṃsu, chindiṃsu.
anya-e0201n0:4550: Mahāvuttinā dhātvantassa ccho pubbassa dvittañca, acchecchi taṇhaṃ, vivattayi saṃyojanaṃ itivu. 53, “acchejjī”tipi divādipāṭho dissati, acchecchuṃ vata bho rukkhaṃ jā. 2.22.1788.
