anya-e0201n0:5848: Pubbarūpatte kabbaṃ, cāvetabbanti cāveyyaṃ, javitabbanti javeyyaṃ, abhitthavitabbanti abhitthaveyyaṃ, bhavituṃ arahatīti bhabbaṃ. Juhotabbanti habyaṃ-sappi.
anya-e0201n0:5852: 779. Kagā cajānaṃ ghānubandhe ka. 623; rū. 554; nī. 1229.
anya-e0201n0:5853: Ca, jānaṃ dhātvantānaṃ ka, gā honti ghānubandhe paccaye pare.
anya-e0201n0:5854: Vattabbanti vākyaṃ, vākkaṃ, vāccaṃ, vāceyyaṃ vā.
anya-e0201n0:5855: Bhaja-sevāyaṃ, bhajitabbanti bhāgyaṃ, bhaggaṃ, bhuñjitabbanti bhogyaṃ, bhoggaṃ, yuñjitabbanti yogyaṃ, yoggaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:5857: Vadādīhi bhāva, kammesu bahulaṃ yo hoti.
anya-e0201n0:5858: Bhuñjibhabbanti bhojjaṃ, khāditabbanti khajjaṃ, vituditabbanti vitujjaṃ, panuditabbanti panujjaṃ, pajjitabbanti pajjaṃ, majjati etenāti majjaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:5859: Muda-hāse, pamodati etenāti pāmojjaṃ, vadīyatīti vajjaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:5860: Vadha-hiṃsāyaṃ, vadhitabbanti vajjhaṃ, vijjhitabbanti vijjhaṃ, punanti sujjhanti sattā etenāti puññaṃ, nāgamo.
anya-e0201n0:5861_0: Vihaññate vihaññaṃ, vapiyateti vappaṃ, supanaṃ soppaṃ, labhitabbanti labbhaṃ, gantabbanti
anya-e0201n0:5861_1: gammaṃ, damituṃ arahatīti dammaṃ, ramitabbanti rammaṃ, abhirammaṃ, nisāmīyate nisammaṃ,
anya-e0201n0:5861_2: visamīyate visammaṃ, phusīyateti phasso, ussa attaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:5863: Gaha, guha, garaha, duha, vaha, saha.
anya-e0201n0:5865: Etehi bhāva, kammesu bahulaṃ yaka hoti, hassa vipallāso.
anya-e0201n0:5867: Garaha-nindāyaṃ, garahitabbanti gārayhaṃ, duhitabbanti duyhaṃ, vahitabbanti vayhaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:5870: Ete saddā yapaccayantā sijjhanti, iminā yapaccayaṃ katvā tena saha karassa kiccaṃ, hanassa ghaccaṃ, bharassa bhaccaṃ, gussa gabbaṃ, lissa lyattaṃ katvā sijjhanti.
anya-e0201n0:5871: Karīyateti kiccaṃ, kiccayaṃ vā, haññateti ghaccaṃ, haccaṃ vā, bharīyateti bhaccaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:5874_0: Bhara-bharaṇe, bharitabbanti bhāriyaṃ, haritabbanti hāriyaṃ, bhājetabbanti bhājiyaṃ,
anya-e0201n0:5874_1: bhājeyyaṃ, upāsitabbanti upāsiyaṃ, icchitabbanti iccheyyaṃ, adhigantabbanti adhigameyyaṃ iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:5875: Rundhitabbanti rundheyyaṃ, chinditabbanti chindeyyaṃ, chejjaṃ iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:5876: Dibbitabbanti dibbeyyaṃ, dibbaṃ, bujjhitabbanti bujjheyyaṃ, bodheyyaṃ, bojjhaṃ iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:5877: Sotabbanti suṇeyyaṃ, pāpuṇitabbanti pāpuṇeyyaṃ, sakkuṇitabbanti sakkuṇeyyaṃ, na sakkuṇeyyaṃ asakkuṇeyyaṃ iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:5878: Tanitabbanti tāneyyaṃ, taññaṃ, kātabbanti kāriyaṃ, kayyaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:5879: Coretabbanti coreyyaṃ, thenīyate theyyaṃ, nassa pararūpattaṃ, cintetabbanti cinteyyaṃ, na cinteyyaṃ acinteyyaṃ, acintiyaṃ, manteyyaṃ, mantiyaṃ, vediyaṃ, vedeyyaṃ iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:5883: Atha a, aṇa, ghaka, ghaṇapaccayantā vuccante.
anya-e0201n0:5885: Bhāve chasu kārakesu ca kriyatthā paraṃ a, ghaṇa, ghakapaccayā honti kammādimhi vā akammādimhi vā.
anya-e0201n0:5887: Kammupapadamhā kriyatthā paraṃ kattari eva kvaci aṇa hoti.
anya-e0201n0:5890: Aggaṃ jānātīti aggañño, vaṃsaṃ jānātīti vaṃsañño, magge tiṭṭhatīti maggaṭṭho-puriso, maggaṭṭhā-itthī, maggaṭṭhaṃ-ñāṇaṃ. Evaṃ phalaṭṭho, thalaṭṭho, jalaṭṭho, pabbataṭṭho, bhūmaṭṭho.
anya-e0201n0:5891_0: Go vuccati ñāṇaṃ saddo ca, gavaṃ tāyati rakkhatīti gottaṃ, parito bhayaṃ tāyati rakkhatīti
anya-e0201n0:5891_1: parittaṃ, annaṃ detīti annado. Evaṃ vatthado, vaṇṇado, yānado, sukhado, dīpado, cakkhudo,
anya-e0201n0:5891_2: dāyaṃ ādadātīti dāyādo, pāraṃ gantuṃ detīti pārado-raso.
anya-e0201n0:5892: Annaṃ dadātīti annadado, dvittaṃ pubbassa rasso ca.
anya-e0201n0:5893: Purindado, mahāvuttinā purasadde assa ittaṃ bindāgamo ca.
anya-e0201n0:5894: Sabbaṃ dadātīti sabbadado, saccaṃ sandhetīti saccasandho, janaṃ sandhetīti janasandho.
anya-e0201n0:5895: Kaku vuccati guṇarāsi, kakuṃ sandhetīti kakusandho, gāvopāti rakkhatīti gopo-puriso, gopassa bhariyā gopī.
anya-e0201n0:5896: Kassaṃ vuccati khettaṃ, kassaṃ pāti rakkhatīti kassapo.
anya-e0201n0:5897: Bhū vuccati pathavī, bhuṃ pāti rakkhatīti bhūpo. Evaṃ bhūmipo.
anya-e0201n0:5898_0: Pādena mūlena pathavīrasaṃ āporasañca pivatīti pādapo, suṭṭhu bhāti dibbatīti subho,
anya-e0201n0:5898_1: na mamāyatīti amamo, dve anatthe lāti gaṇhātīti bālo, bahuṃ lāti gaṇhātīti bahulo,
anya-e0201n0:5898_2: rāhu viya lāti gaṇhātīti rāhulo, ādīnaṃ
anya-e0201n0:5899: Dukkhaṃ vāti bandhatītiādīnavo, aṇṇaṃ udakarāsiṃ vāti bandhatīti aṇṇavo iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:5902: Ṇāpivajjite ṇānubandhe paccaye pare ādantassa dhātussa ante yuka hoti, yāgamoti attho.
anya-e0201n0:5903_0: Ñātabbo bujjhitabboti ñāyo-yutti, ñāyati amataṃ padaṃ etenāti ñāyo-ariyamaggo, paṭicca
anya-e0201n0:5903_1: tiṭṭhatīti patiṭṭhāyo, dātabboti dāyo-āmisadāyo, dhammadāyo, khīraṃ pivatīti khīrapāyo,
anya-e0201n0:5903_2: dhaññaṃ minātīti dhaññamāyo, vāti gacchatīti vāyo iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:5905_0: Eti pavattatīti āyo, sametīti samayo, veti vinassatīti vayo-mandādi, vigamanaṃ vinassanaṃ
anya-e0201n0:5905_1: vayo-bhaṅgo, udayanaṃ udayo, samudayanaṃ samudayo, samudeti phalaṃ etenāti vā samudayo,
anya-e0201n0:5905_2: aticca ayanaṃ pavattanaṃ accayo, paṭicca phalaṃ eti etasmāti paccayo, kiṇanaṃ kayo,
anya-e0201n0:5905_3: vikkiṇanaṃ vikkayo, khīyanaṃ khayo, khīyanti etthāti vā khayo, rāgassa khayo rāgakkhayo,
anya-e0201n0:5905_4: cayanaṃ cayo, ācayo, uccayo, samuccayo, upacayo, dhammaṃ vicinanti etenāti dhammavicayo,
anya-e0201n0:5905_5: jayanaṃ jayo, vijayo, parājayo, niyyati etenāti nayo-vidhi, vineti ettha, etenāti
anya-e0201n0:5905_6: vā vinayo, sukhena netabbo ñātabboti sunayo, dukkhena netabbo ñātabboti dunnayo,
anya-e0201n0:5906_0: Ri-kampane, niccaṃ rayanti phandanti dukkhappattā sattā etthāti nirayo, allīyanaṃ
anya-e0201n0:5906_1: ālayo, niliyanaṃ nilayo, sayanaṃ sayo, bhuso senti etthāti āsayo, ajjhāsayo, visesena
anya-e0201n0:5906_2: senti etthāti visayo, nissāya naṃ seti pavattati etthāti nissayo, upanissayo, anusetīti anusayo iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:5908_0: Ayanaṃ vaḍḍhanaṃ āyo, āyamhā apeto apāyo, āyena upeto upāyo, samudeti etthāti samudāyo,
anya-e0201n0:5908_1: samaveti etthāti samavāyo, pariyāyo, vipariyāyo, netabboti nāyo ñāyo?, nīyati etenāti
anya-e0201n0:5908_2: vā nāyo, bhūmiyaṃ setīti bhūmisāyo iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:5910_0: Cavanaṃ cavo, javanaṃ javo, abhitthavanaṃ abhitthavo, bhusaṃ davati hiṃsatīti upaddavo,
anya-e0201n0:5910_1: sandhavanaṃ sandhavo, mittabhāvena sandhavo mittasandhavo, bhavatīti bhāvo, vibhavanaṃ
anya-e0201n0:5910_2: vibhavo, sambhavanaṃ sambhavo, sambhavati etasmāti vā sambhavo, adhibhavanaṃ adhibhavo,
anya-e0201n0:5910_3: abhibhavo, paribhavo, parābhavanaṃ vinassanaṃ parābhavo, ravatīti ravo-saddo, lunanaṃ
anya-e0201n0:5910_4: lavo, pasavatīti passāvo, āsavatīti āsavo, paṭimukhaṃ savanaṃ paṭissavo iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:5912: Bhavanaṃ bhāvo, bhavanti sadda, buddhiyo etenāti bhāvo, sāliṃ lunātīti sālilāvo, kucchitena savati sandatīti kasāvo iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:5914: Mahāvuttinā essa āyattaṃ, mantaṃ ajjhetīti mantajjhāyo, vajjāvajjaṃ upecca jhāyatīti upajjhāyo-thero, upajjhāyinītherī.
anya-e0201n0:5915: De-pālane, attani nilīnaṃ dayati rakkhatīti dāyo, migadāyo, tantaṃ vāyatīti tantavāyo.
anya-e0201n0:5916: Vhe-avhāne, vhīyatīti vhayo-nāmaṃ, rassattaṃ, āpubbo avhayo iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:5918_0: Kamanaṃ kamo, pakkamo, abhikkamo, paṭikkamo, caṅkamati etthāti caṅkamo, hitaṃ karotīti
anya-e0201n0:5918_1: hitakkaro, dukkhena kātabboti dukkaro-attho, dukkarā-paṭipadā, dukkaraṃ-kammaṃ, sukhena
anya-e0201n0:5918_2: kātabboti sukaro, īsaṃ kātabboti īsakkaro, dīpaṃ karotīti dīpaṅkaro, aluttasamāso.
anya-e0201n0:5919_0: Āgacchatīti āgamo, āgamanaṃ vā āgamo, saṅgamanaṃ saṅgamo, samāgamo, paggaṇhanaṃ paggaho,
anya-e0201n0:5919_1: saṅgaṇhanaṃ saṅgaho, saṅgayhanti ettha, etenāti vā saṅgaho, anuggaho, paṭiggaho,
anya-e0201n0:5919_2: gāvo caranti etthāti gocaro, kāme avacaratīti kāmāvacaro, uraṃ chādetīti uracchado,
anya-e0201n0:5919_3: jirati etenāti jaro, vessaṃ taratīti vessantaro, aluttasamāso.
anya-e0201n0:5920_0: Rathe attharatīti rathattharo, assattharo, ariṃ dametīti arindamo, bhagaṃ darati
anya-e0201n0:5920_1: bhindatīti bhagandaro, yugaṃ ravi’ndudvayaṃ dhāretīti yugandharo, dhammaṃ dhāretīti
anya-e0201n0:5920_2: dhammadharo, pajjateti padaṃ, sikkhā eva padaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ, sukhena bharitabboti
anya-e0201n0:5920_3: subharo, dukkhena bharitabboti dubbharo, na maratīti amaro-devo, niyamanaṃ niyamo,
anya-e0201n0:5920_4: saṃyamanaṃ saṃyamo, sirasmiṃ ruhatīti siroruho, sukhena labbhatīti sulabho, dukkhena
anya-e0201n0:5920_5: labbhatīti dullabho, saṃvaritabboti saṃvaro, vuccatīti vaco, subbaco, dubbaco, vāriṃ
anya-e0201n0:5920_6: vahatīti vārivaho, sarati gacchatīti saro, manaṃ haratīti manoharo iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:5922_0: Kamu-icchā, kantīsu, kāmetīti kāmo, kāmīyatīti vā kāmo, atthaṃ kāmetīti atthakāmo,
anya-e0201n0:5922_1: karaṇaṃ kāro, pakāro, ākāro, vikāro, upakāro, apakāro, kumbhaṃ karotīti kumbhakāro,
anya-e0201n0:5922_2: rathakāro, mālakāro, saṅkharaṇaṃ saṅkhāro, saṅkharīyatīti vā saṅkhāro, saṅkharotīti
anya-e0201n0:5922_3: vā saṅkhāro, parikkhāro, purakkhāro, gacchanti pavattanti kāmā etthāti gāmo, gaṇhātīti
anya-e0201n0:5922_4: gāho, pattaṃ gaṇhātīti pattagāho, rasmiṃ gaṇhātīti rasmigāho, vicaraṇaṃ vicāro, upecca
anya-e0201n0:5922_5: caratīti upacāro, gāmaṃ upecca caratīti gāmūpacāro, jirati hirī bhijjati etenāti
anya-e0201n0:5922_6: jāro, kicchena taritabboti kantāro, mahāvuttinā kicchassa kattaṃ, bindāgamo, vāḷakantāro,
anya-e0201n0:5922_7: yakkhakantāro, attharaṇaṃ atthāro, kathinassa atthāro kathinatthāro, darati bhindati
anya-e0201n0:5922_8: kulavibhāgaṃ gacchati etena janenāti dāro, kuṃ pathaviṃ dāretīti kudāro, rassa lo, kudālo.
anya-e0201n0:5923_0: Bhuso kriyaṃ dhāretīti ādhāro, pattādhāro, paṭisandhāraṇaṃ paṭisandhāro, pajjati
anya-e0201n0:5923_1: etenāti pādo, uppajjanaṃ uppādo, paṭicca samuppajjanaṃ paṭiccasamuppādo, bharitabbo
anya-e0201n0:5923_2: vahitabboti bhāro, sambharīyati sannicīyatīti sambhāro, bodhisambhāro, dabbasambhāro,
anya-e0201n0:5923_3: māretīti māro, kilesamāro, khandhamāro, maccumāro, niyāmetīti niyāmo, dhammaniyāmo,
anya-e0201n0:5923_4: kammaniyāmo, ārūhatīti āroho, rukkhaṃ ārūhatīti rukkhāroho, hatthāroho, assāroho,
anya-e0201n0:5923_5: rathāroho, labbhatīti lābho, paṭilābho, nivaraṇaṃ nivāro, parivāretīti parivāro,
anya-e0201n0:5923_6: vahatīti vāho, āvāho, vivāho, sarati addhānaṃ pavattatīti sāro, virūpena paṭisaraṇaṃ
anya-e0201n0:5923_7: punappunaṃ cintanaṃ vippaṭisāro, paharaṇaṃ pahāro, āhāro, nīhāro, vihāro, abhihāro, parihāro.
anya-e0201n0:5924: 786. Hanassa ghāto ṇānubandhe ka. 591; rū. 544; nī. 1195.
anya-e0201n0:5925: Ṇānubandhe paccaye pare hanassa ghāto hoti.
anya-e0201n0:5926: Hananaṃ ghāto, vihaññanaṃ vighāto, upahananaṃ upaghāto, paṭihananaṃ paṭighāto.
anya-e0201n0:5927_0: Ghakapaccaye vuddhi natthi, ‘manānaṃ niggahīta’nti dhātvānubandhassapi nassa niggahītaṃ
anya-e0201n0:5927_1: vagganto ca, ‘kagā cajānaṃ ghānubandhe’ti ghānubandhe paccaye pare dhātvantānañca,
anya-e0201n0:5927_2: jānaṃ ka, gā honti, nipaccatīti nipako.
anya-e0201n0:5928: Bhanja-bhijjane vibhāge ca, bhañjanaṃ bhaṅgo, vibhajjanaṃ vibhaṅgo, vibhajīyanti dhammā ettha, etenāti vā vibhaṅgo, khandhavibhaṅgo, dhātuvibhaṅgo.
anya-e0201n0:5929: Ranja-rāge, rañjanaṃ raṅgo, rañjanti sattā etthāti raṅgo.
anya-e0201n0:5930: Sanja-saṅge, sañjanaṃ saṅgo, pasajjanaṃ lagganaṃ pasaṅgo, āsajjatīti āsaṅgo, uttari āsaṅgo uttarāsaṅgo.
anya-e0201n0:5931: Saja-sajjane, atisajjanaṃ sambodhanaṃ atisaggo, gassa dvittaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:5932_0: Nissajjanaṃ nissaggo, paṭinissaggo, vissajjanaṃ vissaggo, saṃsajjanaṃ missīkaraṇaṃ
anya-e0201n0:5932_1: saṃsaggo, yujjati etthāti yugaṃ, kaliyugaṃ, sakaṭayugaṃ, pitāmahayugaṃ, nitudanaṃ
anya-e0201n0:5932_2: nitudo, panudanaṃ panudo, uddhaṃ bhijjatīti ubbhido, kovidatīti kovido, pakārena
anya-e0201n0:5932_3: kujjhatīti pakudho, bujjhatīti budho-paṇḍito, muyhatīti momūho, loluppatīti loluppo,
anya-e0201n0:5933_0: Ghaṇapaccaye-pacanaṃ pāko, paccatīti vā pāko, vipāko, viviccanaṃ viveko, siñcanaṃ
anya-e0201n0:5933_1: seko, abhiseko, socanaṃ soko, cajanaṃ cāgo, bhajanaṃ bhāgo, bhuñjanaṃ bhogo, saha
anya-e0201n0:5933_2: bhogo sambhogo, paribhogo, ābhujanaṃ ābhogo, obhujanaṃ obhogo.
anya-e0201n0:5934_0: Yaja-pūjāyaṃ, yajanaṃ yāgo, āmisayāgo, dhammayāgo, yujjanaṃ yogo, payogo, āyogo,
anya-e0201n0:5934_1: viyogo, anuyogo, upayujjitabboti upayogo, lujjatīti loko, mahāvuttinā gassa kattaṃ,
anya-e0201n0:5936: Ā, parīhi parassa dahassa ḷo hoti ana, ghaṇapaccayesu.
anya-e0201n0:5937: Paridayhanaṃ pariḷāho, ‘dahassa dassa ḍo’ti vikappena ḍādeso, dayhanaṃ ḍāho, dāho vā.
anya-e0201n0:5942: Bhāve ca chasu kārakesu ca kriyatthā anapaccayo hoti, ādantesu parassaralopo, alope yāgamo.
anya-e0201n0:5943_0: Akkhāyate akkhānaṃ, akkhāyati etenāti vā akkhānaṃ, dhammassa akkhānanti dhammakkhānaṃ,
anya-e0201n0:5943_1: paṭisaṅkhāyati pajānāti etenāti paṭisaṅkhānaṃ, saha gāyanaṃ saṅgāyanaṃ, saha gāyanti
anya-e0201n0:5943_2: sajjhāyanti etthāti vā saṅgāyanaṃ, ñāyate ñāṇaṃ, jānātīti vā ñāṇaṃ, jānanti etenāti
anya-e0201n0:5943_3: vā ñāṇaṃ, paññāyatīti paññāṇaṃ, vijānātīti viññāṇaṃ, saññāṇaṃ, nassa ṇattaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:5945: Jānanaṃ, pajānanaṃ, vijānanaṃ, sañjānanaṃ, pubbassaralopo, ṭhīyate ṭhānaṃ, tiṭṭhati etthāti vā ṭhānaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:5947: Tāyati rakkhatīti tāṇaṃ, parittāṇaṃ, nassa ṇattaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:5948: Avatthāyati etthāti avatthānaṃ, dīyate dānaṃ, diyyati etenāti vā dānaṃ, sammā padīyati assāti sampadānaṃ, apecca ādadāti etasmāti apādānaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:5950: Padahīyate padhānaṃ, padahanti etenāti vā padhānaṃ, ādhānaṃ, vidhānaṃ, nidhānaṃ, sannidhānaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:5952: Pānaṃ, paṭibhānaṃ, māṇaṃ, pamāṇaṃ, upamāṇaṃ, parimāṇaṃ, nassa ṇattaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:5953: Yāyati etenāti yānaṃ, uyyānaṃ, niyyānaṃ, vāyanti bhavābhavaṃ gacchanti etenāti vānaṃ, natthi vānaṃ etthāti nibbānaṃ, nibbāyanti etthāti vā nibbānaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:5957_0: Ivaṇṇesu-ayanaṃ vikkayanaṃ, vikkiṇanaṃ, khayanaṃ, khiyanaṃ, khiyyanaṃ, iya, iyyādeso,
anya-e0201n0:5957_1: cayanaṃ, cinanaṃ, ācinanaṃ, vicinanaṃ, jayanaṃ, vijayanaṃ, līyanti etthāti leṇaṃ, nassa ṇattaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:5958: Paṭisallīyanti etthāti paṭisallānaṃ, issa āttaṃ. Seti etthāti senaṃ, sayanaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:5960: Uvaṇṇesu-cavanaṃ, javanaṃ, abhitthavanaṃ, dhunanaṃ, viddhunanaṃ, niddhunanaṃ, bhavanaṃ, abhibhavanaṃ, lavanaṃ, lunanaṃ, savanaṃ, pasavanaṃ iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:5961_0: Edantesu-ajjhenaṃ, ajjhāyanaṃ, apacāyanaṃ, jhāyate jhānaṃ, jhāyati etenāti vā jhānaṃ,
anya-e0201n0:5961_1: paṭhamajjhānaṃ, dutiyajjhānaṃ, ujjhānaṃ, nijjhānaṃ, abhijjhānaṃ, sālilāyanaṃ, cīvaravāyanaṃ,
anya-e0201n0:5962: ‘Rā nassa ṇo’ti suttena rakāramhā parassa nassa ṇo, kāraṇaṃ, adhikarīyati etthāti adhikaraṇaṃ, saṅkharaṇaṃ, abhisaṅkharaṇaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:5964: Ākiraṇaṃ, vikkiraṇaṃ, caraṇaṃ, jiraṇaṃ, taraṇaṃ, kaṅkhāvitaraṇaṃ, attharaṇaṃ, āgantvā dahanti ettha matasarīranti āḷahanaṃsusānaṃ, dassa ḷo.
anya-e0201n0:5965: Passīyate passanaṃ, dassanaṃ, suṭṭhu passatīti sudassanorājā, suṭṭhu passitabbanti sudassanaṃ-devanagaraṃ, sandassanaṃ, nidassanaṃ, dhāraṇaṃ, uddhāraṇaṃ, niddhāraṇaṃ, ādidīgho.
anya-e0201n0:5968: Nivāraṇaṃ, saraṇaṃ, nissaraṇaṃ, haraṇaṃ, āharaṇaṃ, nīharaṇaṃ iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:5969_0: Sāmaññavidhānattā saddattha, kujjhanattha, calanatthadhātūhi ruca, juta, vaḍḍhādidhātūhi
anya-e0201n0:5969_1: ca tassīlādīsu ano hoti, ghosati sīlenāti ghosano, ghosati dhammenāti ghosano, ghosati
anya-e0201n0:5969_2: sādhukārenāti ghosano, kodhano, dūsano, padūsano, kopano, calano, phandano, kampano,
anya-e0201n0:5969_3: maṇḍano, bhūsano, vibhūsano, rocano, virocano, verocano, jotano, ujjotano, vaḍḍhano,
anya-e0201n0:5969_4: karoti sīlenāti karaṇo. Rāgo nimittakaraṇo, doso nimittakaraṇo, moho nimittakaraṇo
anya-e0201n0:5974: Vīhismiṃ kāle ca vattabbe hādhātumhā kattari ṇānubandho ano hoti.
anya-e0201n0:5975: Hāpetīti hāyano, vīhiviseso vassañca. “Kuñjaraṃ saṭṭhihāyana”nti ettha vassaṃ hāyananti vuccati.
anya-e0201n0:5980: Āsīsā vuccati patthanā, āsīsāyaṃ gamyamānāyaṃ ako hoti kattari.
anya-e0201n0:5981_0: Jīvatūti jīvako, nandatūti nandako. “Jinabuddhi, dhanabhūti, bhūto, dhammadinno,
anya-e0201n0:5981_1: vaḍḍhamāno”ti ete saddā aññathā sijjhanti, jino imaṃ bujjhatūti jinabuddhi, dhanaṃ
anya-e0201n0:5981_2: etassa bhavati vaḍḍhatīti dhanabhūti, bhavati vaḍḍhatīti bhūto, dhammena dinno dhammadinno,
anya-e0201n0:5982_0: ‘Kattari ltuṇakā’ti ṇako, so ca sāmaññavidhānattā arahe sattiyaṃ sīle dhamme sādhukāre
anya-e0201n0:5982_1: ca sijjhati, akkhāyatīti akkhāyako, ‘āssāṇāpimhi yuka’iti yāgamo, akkhātuṃ arahati,
anya-e0201n0:5982_2: sakkoti, akkhānamassa sīlaṃ, dhammo, akkhānaṃ sakkaccaṃ karotīti attho. Kālattayepi
anya-e0201n0:5982_3: sijjhati, pubbepi akkhāsi, ajjapi akkhāti, pacchāpi akkhāyissatīti attho. Evaṃ sesesu
anya-e0201n0:5983: Itthiyaṃ-‘adhātussa ke…’ti suttena akassa assa ittaṃ, akkhāyikā-itthī, akkhāyakaṃ-kulaṃ, saṅgāyako, jānātīti jānako.
anya-e0201n0:5984: Vikaraṇapaccayato paraṃ nāgame sati vikaraṇassa rasso, jānanako, ājānanako, vijānanako, sañjānanako.
anya-e0201n0:5986: Nāgame-ñāpanako, viññāpanako, saññāpanako, adhiṭṭhātīti adhiṭṭhāyako, adhiṭṭhāpetīti adhiṭṭhāpako, detīti dāyako, dāpetīti dāpako.
anya-e0201n0:5987: Ṇāpimhi yāgamo natthi, samādapetīti samādapako, ubhayattha rasso. Vidhetīti vidhāyako, pajahatīti pajahāyako, avahiyyatīti ohiyako, āssa ittaṃ iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:5988_0: Ivaṇṇesu-ajjhetīti ajjhāyako, mantaṃ ajjhetīti mantajjhāyako, kiṇātīti kāyako, kiṇāpetīti
anya-e0201n0:5988_1: kāyāpako, ācinātīti ācinako, vicinako, parājayatīti pārājiko, alopo, puggalo, parājetīti
anya-e0201n0:5988_2: pārājiko, alopo kāritalopo ca, dhammo, bhāyāpetīti bhayānako, nāgamo ādirasso ca.
anya-e0201n0:5989: Bhūmiyaṃ setīti bhūmisāyako, sayāpetīti sayāpako, pāhetīti pahiṇako iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:5990: Uvaṇṇesu-punāti sodhetīti pāvako-aggi, bhavatīti bhāvako, vibhāvetīti vibhāvako, lunātīti lāvako, suṇātīti sāvako-puriso, sāvikā-itthī, juhotīti hāvako iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:5991_0: Apa-pāpuṇane, pāpetīti pāpako, sampāpetīti sampāpako, upāsatīti upāsako-puriso, upāsikā-itthī,
anya-e0201n0:5991_1: upāsakaṃ-kulaṃ, karotīti kārako, kārikā, kārakaṃ, upakārako, kāretīti kārāpako, saṅkharotīti
anya-e0201n0:5991_2: saṅkhārako, abhisaṅkhārako, khipatīti khipako, ukkhipako, nikkhipako, khepako, ukkhepako,
anya-e0201n0:5992: Gaṇhātīti gāhako, gaṇhāpetīti gāhāpako. Evaṃ gopako, pādamūle caratīti pādacārako, pupphaṃ ocināyatīti ocināyako, edanto dhātu.
anya-e0201n0:5993: Chindatīti chedako, chindako, chedāpetīti chedāpako, chindāpako, janetīti janako-puriso, janikāmātā, janakaṃ-kammaṃ, kāritalopo.
anya-e0201n0:5997: Ṇāpa-pesane, āṇāpetīti āṇāpako, tudatīti tudako, santussatīti santussako, visesena passatīti vipassako, sandassetīti sandassako, dūsetīti dūsako, ādidīgho.
anya-e0201n0:5998: Pacatīti pācako, pācetīti pācāpako, āpādetīti āpādako, nipphādako, sampādako, paṭipajjako, paṭipādako, pūretīti pūrako, garupantattā na vuddhi.
anya-e0201n0:6000_0: Bhājetīti bhājako, bhindatīti bhindako, bhedako, kārabhedako, bhuñjatīti bhuñjako,
anya-e0201n0:6000_1: bhojako, gāmabhojako, bujjhatīti bujjhako, bodhako, maratīti miyyako, māretīti mārako,
anya-e0201n0:6000_2: muñcatīti muñcako, mocako, yācatīti yācako, yajatīti yājako, yuñjatīti yuñjako, anuyuñjako,
anya-e0201n0:6000_3: yojako, payojako, yujjhatīti yujjhako, yodhako, rundhatīti rundhako, avarodhako,
anya-e0201n0:6000_4: vacatīti vācako, ovadatīti ovādako, ovajjako, vīṇaṃ vādetīti vīṇāvādako, bherivādako,
anya-e0201n0:6000_5: garuṃ abhivādetīti abhivādako, vidatijānātīti vedako, vindati paṭilabhatīti vindako,
anya-e0201n0:6000_6: anuvijjati vicāretīti anuvijjako, paṭisaṃvedetīti paṭisaṃvedako, vijjhatīti vedhako,
anya-e0201n0:6000_7: aṭṭhiṃ vijjhatīti aṭṭhivedhako, pattaṃ vijjhatīti pattavedhako.
anya-e0201n0:6001_0: Bahulādhikārā kammepi dissati, antare vāsīyati nivāsīyatīti antaravāsako, pasīdatīti
anya-e0201n0:6001_1: pasīdako, pasādako vā, dīpappasādako, udakappasādako, sibbatīti sibbako, sevatīti
anya-e0201n0:6001_2: sevako, hanatīti ghātako, gāvo hanatīti goghātako, hanassa ghāto. Haratīti hārako.
anya-e0201n0:6002_0: Kamme – “pādehi paharīyatīti pādapahārako”ti vuttiyaṃ vuttaṃ. Titikkhatīti titikkhako,
anya-e0201n0:6002_1: tikicchatīti tikicchako, vīmaṃsatīti vīmaṃsako, bubhukkhatīti bubhukkhako, pabbatāyatīti pabbatāyako iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:6008_0: Paṭhamaṃ cittena ādīyatītiādi, taṇhādiṭṭhīhi upādīyatīti upādi, khandhupādi, kilesupādi,
anya-e0201n0:6008_1: vidhānaṃ vidhi, vidhiyyati etenāti vidhi, nidhiyyatīti nidhi, sandhiyate sandhi,
anya-e0201n0:6008_2: abhisandhi, paṭisandhi, sannidahanaṃ sannidhi, samādhānaṃ samādhi, samādahanti etenāti
anya-e0201n0:6008_3: samādhi, paṇidahanaṃ paṇidhi, odhi, avadhi, upanidhi, paṭinidhi, udakaṃ dahati tiṭṭhati
anya-e0201n0:6008_4: etthāti udadhi, mahanto udadhi mahodadhi, vālāni dahanti tiṭṭhanti etthāti vāladhi.
anya-e0201n0:6010: Dhātūnaṃ sutisaṅkhāte sarūpe vattabbe kriyatthā paraṃ i, ki, tipaccayā honti.
anya-e0201n0:6015_0: Sīlaṃ vuccati pakaticariyā, abhikkhaṇameva abhikkhaññaṃ, punappunakriyā, āyatiṃ avassaṃbhāvī
anya-e0201n0:6015_1: avassakaṃ nāma, sīlaggahaṇena dhamma, sādhukārāpi saṅgayhanti, etesu sīlādīsu kriyāvisesesu
anya-e0201n0:6015_2: gamyamānesu kattari ṇī hoti. Ādantesu ‘āssāṇāpimhi yuka’iti yāgamo.
anya-e0201n0:6016: Akkhāyatīti akkhāyī, akkhāyanasīlo, akkhāyanadhammo, akkhāne sakkaccakāritā yuttoti attho. Kālattayepi sijjhati sāmaññavidhānattā.
anya-e0201n0:6017_0: Avassakaṃ pana anāgatameva, dhammakkhāyī-puriso, dhammakkhāyinī-itthī, dhammakkhāyi-kulaṃ,
anya-e0201n0:6017_1: gītaṃ abhiṇhaṃ gāyatīti gītagāyī, kappaṃ avassaṃ ṭhāssatīti kappaṭṭhāyī, saṃvaṭṭamānaṃ
anya-e0201n0:6018: Adinnaṃ ādadāti sīlenāti adinnādāyī. Tathā dinnameva ādadātīti dinnādāyī, annaṃ dadāti sīlenāti annadāyī.
anya-e0201n0:6019_0: Dā-suppane. Niddāyanasīlo niddāyī, majjaṃ pivanasīlo majjapāyī, majjaṃ abhiṇhaṃ pivatīti
anya-e0201n0:6019_1: majjapāyī, sīghaṃ yāyanasīlo sīghayāyī, sasaṅkhārena sappayogena avassaṃ parinibbāyissatīti
anya-e0201n0:6019_2: sasaṅkhāraparinibbāyī. Tathā asaṅkhāraparinibbāyī, āyukappassa antare vemajjhe avassaṃ
anya-e0201n0:6019_3: parinibbāyissatīti antarāparinibbāyī, āyukappapariyosānaṃ upahacca avassaṃ parinibbāyissatīti
anya-e0201n0:6020_0: Ivaṇṇesu-mantaṃ niccakālaṃ ajjhāyatīti mantajjhāyī, dhammajjhāyī, dhaññaṃ niccakālaṃ
anya-e0201n0:6020_1: vikkiṇātīti dhaññavikkāyī, bhāyanasīlo bhāyī, bhūmiyaṃ sayanasīlo, bhūmiyaṃ vā niccakālaṃ
anya-e0201n0:6020_2: sayatīti bhūmisāyī, kaṇṭake apassayanasīlo kaṇṭakāpassayī iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:6021_0: Edantāpi idha vattabbā, uddhaṃ vaḍḍhanasīlo udāyī, vuddhesu apacāyanasīlo vuddhāpacāyī.
anya-e0201n0:6021_1: Evaṃ jeṭṭhāpacāyī, jhāyanasīlo, jhāyanadhammo, jhāyane sakkaccakriyāyuttoti jhāyī,
anya-e0201n0:6021_2: niccakālaṃ jhāyatīti vā jhāyī, pajjhāyī, ujjhāyī, nijjhāyī, abhijjhāyī, bhāyanasīlo
anya-e0201n0:6021_3: bhāyī, tiṇaṃ abhiṇhaṃ lāyatīti tiṇalāyī, tantaṃ niccakālaṃ vāyatīti tantavāyī, palāyanasīlo
anya-e0201n0:6022: Uvaṇṇesu-yathābhūtaṃ atthaṃ vibhāvanasīlo vibhāvīpuriso, vibhāvinī-itthī, āyatiṃ avassaṃ bhavissatīti bhāvī, sāliṃ lunāti sīlenāti sālilāvī iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:6023: Byāpanasīlo byāpī, kāmeti icchati sīlenāti kāmī, dhammakāmī, atthakāmī, karaṇasīlo kārī, pāpakārī, puññakārī.
anya-e0201n0:6024_0: Avassaṃ āgamissatīti āgāmī. Rassatte-āgaminīratti, āgaminī-puṇṇamāsī, ācayaṃ vaṭṭaṃ
anya-e0201n0:6024_1: gacchati sīlenāti ācayagāmī, apacayaṃ vivaṭṭaṃ gacchati sīlenāti apacayagāmī, sakiṃ
anya-e0201n0:6024_2: avassaṃ āgamissatīti sakadāgāmī. Tathā na āgamissatīti anāgāmī.
anya-e0201n0:6025: Ādhānaṃ vuccati daḷhaṭṭhiti, ādhānaṃ katvā gahaṇasīlo ādhānagāhī, daḷhagāhī, dhammaṃ carati sīlenāti dhammacārī, brahmaṃ seṭṭhaṃ carati sīlenāti brahmacārī.
anya-e0201n0:6026_0: Apicettha dhammo nāma kulācāradhammo, taṃ dhammaṃ carāmīti daḷhaṃ gaṇhitvā yāva na
anya-e0201n0:6026_1: vijahati, tāva avītikkamanaṭṭhena dhammaṃ carati sīlenāti dhammacārī nāma. Tathācaranto
anya-e0201n0:6026_2: ca antarāvītikkamanīyavatthusamāyoge sati taṃ dhammaṃ apatamānaṃ katvā dhārento saṃvaraṇaṭṭhena
anya-e0201n0:6026_3: dhammaṃ carati dhammenāti dhammacārī nāma, tathādhārento ca taṃ dhammaṃ attukkaṃsana,
anya-e0201n0:6026_4: paravambhanādīhi pāpadhammehi anupakkiliṭṭhañca appicchatādīhi santaguṇehi supariyodātañca
anya-e0201n0:6026_5: karonto pariyodāpanaṭṭhena dhammaṃ carati sādhukārenāti dhammacārī nāma.
anya-e0201n0:6027_0: Brahmaṃ vuccati tato seṭṭhataraṃ sikkhāpadasīlaṃ, tampi gaṇhitvā avijahanto antarā
anya-e0201n0:6027_1: ca apatamānaṃ katvā dhārento anupakkiliṭṭhaṃ supariyodātañca karonto tividhena atthena
anya-e0201n0:6027_2: brahmacārī nāma, samādāna, sampatta, samucchedaviratīnaṃ vasena viyojetuṃ vaṭṭati,
anya-e0201n0:6027_3: yo pana gaṇhanto tathā na dhāreti, dhārento vā upakkiliṭṭhaṃ karoti, so ekadesena
anya-e0201n0:6028_0: Yo pana tividhena atthena mutto hutvā kadāci taṃ dhammaṃ carati, tassa caraṇakriyā
anya-e0201n0:6028_1: tassīlakriyā na hoti, so dhammacārīti na vuccati, etenupāyena sesesu pāpa, kalyāṇabhūtesu
anya-e0201n0:6029_0: Brahmacārinī-itthī, visesena dassanasīlo vipassī, atthadassī, dhammadassī, piyadassī,
anya-e0201n0:6029_1: sudassī, dussanasīlo dussīmāro, dhāraṇasīlo dhārī, iṇadhārī, chattadhārī, bhusaṃ
anya-e0201n0:6029_2: nahanasīlo upanāhī, pariniṭṭhitapaccayekadesattā āyatiṃ avassaṃ uppajjissatīti uppādī,
anya-e0201n0:6030_0: Bhara-dhāraṇe, mālaṃ niccakālaṃ bharatīti mālabhārī, bhājanasīlo bhājī, uṇhaṃ bhuñjanasīlo
anya-e0201n0:6030_1: uṇhabhojī, attānaṃ maññati sīlenāti attamānī, attānaṃ paṇḍitaṃ maññatīti paṇḍitamānī,
anya-e0201n0:6030_2: labhanasīlo lābhī, vacanasīlo vācī. Evaṃ vādī, atthavādī, dhammavādī, yuttavādī,
anya-e0201n0:6030_3: muttavādī, vibhajjavādī, niccaṃ vasatīti vāsī, gāmavāsī, nagaravāsī, bhāraṃ vahanasīlo
anya-e0201n0:6030_4: bhāravāhī, dhammaṃ paññaṃ anusarati anugacchatīti dhammānusārī. Evaṃ saddhānusārī,
anya-e0201n0:6030_5: virūpaṃ pāpapakkhaṃ paṭimukhaṃ abhiṇhaṃ sarati cintetīti vippaṭisārī, pāṇaṃ hanati
anya-e0201n0:6031: Haritabbaṃ sabbaṃ harati sīlenāti hārahārī iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:6032_0: ‘Kagā cajāna’nti suttavibhattiyā aghānubandhepi cajānaṃ kagādeso, samaṃ vipācetīti
anya-e0201n0:6032_1: samavepākī-udaraggi, samavepākinī-gahaṇī, upadhi phalaṃ vipaccatīti upadhivepākinī,
anya-e0201n0:6032_2: socanasīlo sokī, sokinī-pajā, mutto hutvā cajanasīlo muttacāgī, saṃvibhājanasīlo
anya-e0201n0:6032_3: saṃvibhāgī, kāmasukhaṃ bhuñjanasīlo kāmabhogī, visuṃ avibhattaṃ bhogaṃ bhuñjanasīlo
anya-e0201n0:6042: Bhā-dittiyaṃ, obhāsanasīlo bhāsu-pabhā, jeṭṭhavacanaṃ ādarena suṇāti sīlenāti assavo-putto, assavābhariyā.
anya-e0201n0:6045: Vidati sīlenāti vidū, lokavidū, paracittavidū. Itthiyaṃ paracittavidunī.
anya-e0201n0:6051: Sabbaṃ jānāti sīlenāti sabbaññū, rattaññū, atthaññū, dhammaññū, kālaññū, samayaññū.
anya-e0201n0:6053: Kammupapadā gamamhā rū hoti kattari. ‘Rānubandhentasarādissā’ti sabbadhātvantalopo.
anya-e0201n0:6054: Pāraṃ gacchati sīlenāti pāragū, vedaṃ vuccati aggamaggañāṇaṃ, vedaṃ gacchatīti vedagū, addhānaṃ gacchatīti addhagū.
anya-e0201n0:6059: Itthiliṅge vattabbe bhāvakārakesu a, ṇa,ti, ka, yaka, yapaccayā ca ano ca hoti.
anya-e0201n0:6060: Ka, a, ṇa, yaka, ya, anaiccetehi ‘itthiyamatvā’ti āpaccayo.
anya-e0201n0:6061: Kamhi tāva-attani nisinnaṃ gūhati saṃvaratīti guhā, attānaṃ vā paraṃ vā dūsetīti dūsā-dhuttitthī.
anya-e0201n0:6062: Muda-hāse, modanaṃ mudā, pamudā, sujjhati etāyāti sudhā, vasuṃ ratanaṃ dhāretīti vasudhā iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:6063_0: Amhi-saṅkhāyanti etāyāti saṅkhā. Tathā saṅkhyā, pajānātīti paññā, ājānātīti aññā,
anya-e0201n0:6063_1: sañjānātīti saññā, sañjānanti etāyāti vā saññā, sañjānanaṃ vā saññā, abhijānanaṃ
anya-e0201n0:6063_2: abhiññā, paṭijānanaṃ paṭiññā, paricchijja jānanaṃ pariññā, paṭicca tiṭṭhati etthāti patiṭṭhā.
anya-e0201n0:6064_0: Thā-ṭhāne, avadhibhāvena ṭhāti tiṭṭhatīti avatthā, upādīyatīti upādā-paññatti, aññamaññaṃ
anya-e0201n0:6064_1: upecca nissāya ca dhiyyatīti upanidhā-paññattiyeva, saddahanaṃ saddhā, saddahanti
anya-e0201n0:6064_2: etāyāti vā saddhā, visiṭṭhaṃ katvā attānaṃ dahanti etāyāti vidhā-māno, bhāti dibbatīti
anya-e0201n0:6064_3: bhā-nakkhattaṃ, pabhā, ābhā, nibhā, upamīyate upamā.
anya-e0201n0:6065: Jhe-cintāyaṃ, pajjhāyanaṃ pajjhā, vajjāvajjaṃ upajjhāyati pekkhatīti upajjhā, abhimukhaṃ jhāyanaṃ abhijjhā.
anya-e0201n0:6068: Ikkha-dassana’ṅkesu, apekkhanaṃ apekkhā, upekkhanaṃ upekkhā, upaparikkhanaṃ upaparikkhā, icchanaṃ icchā, byāpituṃ icchā vicchā.
anya-e0201n0:6073: Oja-thambhane tejane ca, ojeti taṃsamaṅgine satte saṅkhāre ca samupatthambhati samuttejetīti vā ojā.
anya-e0201n0:6074_0: Kala-saṅkhyāne, kalīyatīti kalā, khamanaṃ khamā, gajjanti etāyāti gadā, girīyati
anya-e0201n0:6074_1: kathīyatīti girā-vācā, ghaṭīyati saṅghaṭīyati etthāti ghaṭā-yūtho, bhuso cāreti paricāretīti
anya-e0201n0:6074_2: accharā-devī, mahāvuttinā cassa cho, jaṭatīti jaṭā, antojaṭā bahijaṭā saṃ. ni. 1.23,
anya-e0201n0:6074_3: jiyyanti etāyāti jarā, jiraṇaṃ vā jarā, āpajjati ajjhāpajjatīti āpadā, sampajjanaṃ
anya-e0201n0:6074_4: sampadā, uparibhāvaṃ suṭṭhu pajjanti pāpuṇanti etāyāti upasampadā, paṭipajjanaṃ paṭipadā,
anya-e0201n0:6074_5: paṭipajjanti uparivisesaṃ etāyāti vā paṭipadā, sukhappaṭipadā, dukkhappaṭipadā, paṭisaṃbhijjanti
anya-e0201n0:6074_6: atthādīsu ñāṇappabhedaṃ gacchanti etāyāti paṭisambhidā, atthapaṭisambhidā, dhammapaṭisambhidā,
anya-e0201n0:6076: Sikkha-ghaṭane, sikkhanaṃ sikkhā, sikkhanti ghaṭenti sekkhā janā etthāti sikkhā, adhisīlasikkhā, adhicittasikkhā, adhipaññāsikkhā iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:6077_0: Titikkhanaṃ titikkhā, vīmaṃsanaṃ vīmaṃsā, tikicchanaṃ tikicchā, vigatā tikicchā etissāti
anya-e0201n0:6077_1: vicikicchā, bhottuṃ icchā bubhukkhā, bubhokkhā vā, ghasituṃ icchā jighacchā, pātuṃ
anya-e0201n0:6077_2: paribhuñjituṃ icchā pipāsā, harituṃ icchā jigīsā, vijetuṃ icchā vijigīsā, hantuṃ
anya-e0201n0:6078_0: Ṇamhi-ara-gatiyaṃ, arati sīghaṃ vijjhamānā gacchatīti ārāvedhako, karonti nānākammakāraṇāyo
anya-e0201n0:6078_1: etthāti kārā-addu, jiyyanti etāyāti jārā, tarati sīghataraṃ gacchatīti tārā, bhāsanti
anya-e0201n0:6078_2: etāyāti bhāsā, dhāreti sīghaṃ vahatīti dhārā, khaggadhārā, vuṭṭhidhārā, mayati vividhākāraṃ
anya-e0201n0:6078_3: gacchati etāyāti māyā, likhīyate lekhā, vuccateti vācā, harati manoramaṃ pavattetīti
anya-e0201n0:6079: Yakpaccaye-saha kathanaṃ sākacchā, tathanaṃ tacchā, nipajjanaṃ nipajjā, vidati jānātīti vijjā, vidanti jānanti etāyāti vā vijjā, vijjāpaṭipakkhā avijjā, nisajjanaṃ nisajjā.
anya-e0201n0:6082: Yamhi-maja-saṃsuddhiyaṃ, sammajjanaṃ sammajjā, apecca vajanaṃ gamanaṃ pabbajjā, caraṇaṃ cariyā, paricaraṇaṃ pāricariyā, ‘ūbyañjanassā’ti īāgamo rasso ca.
anya-e0201n0:6083: Jāgara-niddakkhaye, jāgaraṇaṃ jāgariyā, seti etthāti seyyā, dvittaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:6084_0: Anamhi-saha gāyanti sajjhāyanti etthāti saṅgāyanā, ṭhāpīyate patiṭṭhīyate patiṭṭhānā,
anya-e0201n0:6084_1: pāpīyate pāpanā, sampāpanā, parisamāpanā, upāsīyate upāsanā, payirūpāsanā, esīyate
anya-e0201n0:6084_2: esanā, pariyesanā, kāmesanā, bhavesanā, brahmacariyesanā, chejjabhejjādikassa kammassa
anya-e0201n0:6085_0: Citi-cetāyaṃ, cetenti sampayuttā dhammā etāyāti cetanā, cintīyate cintanā, ṭhapīyate
anya-e0201n0:6085_1: ṭhapanā, dīpīyate dīpanā, vipassanti etāyāti vipassanā, sandassīyate sandassanā,
anya-e0201n0:6085_2: desīyate desanā, desīyati etāyāti vā desanā, patthīyate patthanā, pharīyate pharaṇā,
anya-e0201n0:6085_3: phusīyate phusanā, bhāvīyate bhāvanā, vibhāvanā, sambhāvanā, mantīyate mantanā, nimantanā,
anya-e0201n0:6085_4: āmantanā, punappunaṃ modanti etāyāti anumodanā, yācīyate yācanā, ādarena yācanā āyācanā, yojīyate yojanā.
anya-e0201n0:6088: Vara-icchāyaṃ, pavārīyate icchāpīyate pavāraṇā, vāsīyate vāsanā, āsīsīyate āsīsanā, hiṃsīyate hiṃsanā iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:6089: Timhi-bahulādhikārā anitthiyampiti hoti, gāyanaṃ gīti, saha gāyanaṃ saṅgīti, duggīti, anugīti, ayaṃ amhākaṃ abbhantarimoti ñāyatīti ñāti, jānanaṃ ñatti, dvittaṃ, ṭhānaṃ ṭhiti.
anya-e0201n0:6090_0: Dā-avakhaṇḍane, dīyati etāyāti datti, dvittaṃ, dhāretīti dhāti, dahanaṃ akampanaṃ
anya-e0201n0:6090_1: dhīti, samādahanaṃ samādhīti, mahāvuttinā āssaṃ īttaṃ, dvitte dhassa dattaṃ rasso ca, dīdhiti-raṃsi.
anya-e0201n0:6091_0: Nibbāyanaṃ nibbuti, āssa uttaṃ, saha ayanaṃ samiti, eti āgacchatīti īti-upaddavo,
anya-e0201n0:6091_1: vicinanaṃ viciti, vijayanaṃ vijiti, nīyati ñāyati etāyāti nīti, lokanīti, dhammanīti,
anya-e0201n0:6091_2: saddanīti, bhavaṃ netīti bhavanetti, vuddhi dvittañca, saddhammanetti, pinayatīti
anya-e0201n0:6091_3: pīti, bhāyanaṃ bhīti, cavanaṃ cuti, javanaṃ juti, thavanaṃ thuti, abhitthuti, pavanaṃ
anya-e0201n0:6091_4: pūti, bhavanaṃ bhūti, suṭṭhu bhavatīti subhūti, vibhavanaṃ vibhūti, suṭṭhu munanaṃ
anya-e0201n0:6091_5: bandhanaṃ sammuti, savanaṃ suti, suyyateti vā suti, pasuti, upasuti, hūyateti huti,
anya-e0201n0:6091_6: ānetvā hutabbāti āhuti, cāyanaṃ pūjanaṃ citi, dvitte-citti, apaciti, essa attaṃ,
anya-e0201n0:6092_0: Mahāvuttinā takāre karassa kuttaṃ, kriyā kutti, sarakutti, itthikuttaṃ, purisakuttaṃ,
anya-e0201n0:6092_1: janetīti janetti, īāgamassa ettaṃ, bandhīyateti bandhati, pajjatīti patti, padāti
anya-e0201n0:6092_2: vā, īāgamassa āttaṃ, vasanti etthāti vasati-gehaṃ, vasanaṃ vā vasati iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:6095: Jā-hāniyaṃ, jiyyate jāni, dhanajāni, bhogajāni, mahantī jāni assāti mahājāniyo, hiyyate hāni, vaṇṇahāni, balahāni, āyuhāni, avahāni, parihāni.
anya-e0201n0:6101: 804. Samānaññabhavantayāditūpamānā disā kamme rīrikkhakā ka. 642; rū. 588; nī. 1269.
anya-e0201n0:6102_0: Samāno ca añño ca bhavanto ca yādi ca etehi upamānabhūtehi paraṃ disamhā kammerī
anya-e0201n0:6102_1: ca rikkho ca ko cāti ete paccayā honti, rī, rikkhesu ‘rānubandhentasarādissā’ti suttena
anya-e0201n0:6102_2: disassa antassarādīnaṃ lopo, kānubandho avuddhattho, ‘rīrikkhakesu’iccādīhi samāsasuttehi
anya-e0201n0:6103: Ya, ta, eta, ima, kiṃ, tumha, amha, bhavanta, samāna, añña.
anya-e0201n0:6104_0: Yo viya dissatīti yādī, yādikkho, yādiso, yaṃ viya naṃ passantīti yādī, ye viya dissantīti
anya-e0201n0:6104_1: yādino, itthiyaṃ-yā viya dissatīti yādinī, yādikkhā, yādikkhī, yādisā, yādisī, yā
anya-e0201n0:6104_2: viya dissantīti yādiniyo, yādikkhāyo, yādikkhiyo, yādisāyo, yādisiyo. Evaṃ sesesupi.
anya-e0201n0:6105: So viya dissatīti tādī, tādikkho, tādiso.
anya-e0201n0:6106: Eso viya dissatīti edī, edikkho, ediso, etādī, etādikkho, etādiso vā.
anya-e0201n0:6107: Ayaṃ viya dissatīti īdī, īdikkho, īdiso.
anya-e0201n0:6108: Ko viya dissatīti kīdī, kīdikkho, kīdiso.
anya-e0201n0:6109: Tvaṃ viya dissatīti tādī, tādikkho, tādiso.
anya-e0201n0:6110: Ahaṃ viya dissatīti mādī, mādikkho, mādiso.
anya-e0201n0:6111: Bahutte pana tumhe viya dissantīti tumhādī, tumhādikkho, tumhādiso.
anya-e0201n0:6112: Amhe viya dissantīti amhādī, amhādikkho, amhādiso.
anya-e0201n0:6113: Bhavaṃ viya dissatīti bhavādī, bhavādikkho, bhavādiso.
anya-e0201n0:6114: Samāno viya dissatīti sadī, sadikkho, sadiso.
anya-e0201n0:6115: Añño viya dissatīti aññādī, aññādikkho, aññādiso.
anya-e0201n0:6116: Itthiyaṃ-yā viya dissatīti yādisā-itthī, yādisī-itthī. Tādisā-itthī, tādisī-itthī iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:6124_0: Ivaṇṇesu tāva-bhuso cayati vaḍḍhatīti acci, dvittaṃ rassattañca, vividhena cayati
anya-e0201n0:6124_1: vaḍḍhatīti vīci, pañca māre jinātīti māraji, bhaddaṃ jinātīti bhaddaji. Evaṃ puṇṇaji,
anya-e0201n0:6124_2: gāmaṃ samūhaṃ netīti gāmaṇī, nassa ṇattaṃ. Senaṃ netīti senānī iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:6125_0: Uvaṇṇesu-māreti cāveti cāti maccu, mahāvuttinā rassa pararūpattaṃ, vividhena javati
anya-e0201n0:6125_1: sīghaṃ pharatīti vijju, bhavanti etthāti bhū-bhūmi, pabhavati issaraṃ karotīti pabhū,
anya-e0201n0:6125_2: vibhavanaṃ vibhū, abhibhavatīti abhibhū, sayaṃ bhavatīti sayambhū, gottaṃ abhibhavatīti
anya-e0201n0:6129_0: Antaṃ karotīti antako, nandaṃ karotīti nandako, jīvaṃ karotīti jīvako, cittaṃ vicittaṃ
anya-e0201n0:6129_1: karotīti cittako, sukhena khamitabbanti sukhaṃ, dukkhena khamitabbanti dukkhaṃ, parito
anya-e0201n0:6129_2: khaññateti parikkhā, saṃ attānaṃ khanatīti saṅkho, na gacchatīti ago-nago, sīsaṃ
anya-e0201n0:6129_3: upagacchatīti sīsūpago. Evaṃ gīvūpago, ninnaṭṭhānaṃ gacchatīti ninnagā-nadī, turaṃ
anya-e0201n0:6130: Bhujena kuṭilena gacchatīti bhujago, urena gacchatīti urago, khena ākāsena gacchatīti khago, vehāse gacchatīti vihago, mahāvuttinā vehāsassa vihādeso.
anya-e0201n0:6131_0: “Go gacchati, gāvo gacchantī”tiādīsu pana “gocaro, godhano, gottaṃ, gotrabhū”tiādīsu
anya-e0201n0:6131_1: ca kvimhi antabyañjanalope kvilope ca kate mahāvuttinā upantassa ottaṃ katvā goiti
anya-e0201n0:6131_2: pakatirūpaṃ veditabbaṃ, balaṃ gaṇīyati etthāti balaggaṃ, bhattaṃ gaṇhanti etthāti
anya-e0201n0:6132_0: Kammena jāyatīti kammajo. Evaṃ cittajo, utujo, attani jātoti atrajo, pubbe jāto pubbajo,
anya-e0201n0:6132_1: pacchā jāto anujo, saha jāyatīti sahajo, thale jāyatīti thalajaṃ. Evaṃ dakajaṃ, vārijaṃ,
anya-e0201n0:6132_2: ambujaṃ. Aṇḍe jāyatīti aṇḍajo, dvikkhattuṃ jāyatīti dvijo, saha bhāsanti etthāti
anya-e0201n0:6133: 809. Kvimhi gho paripaccāsamohi ka. 538; rū. 595; nī. 1123; ‘…pacca…’ (bahūsu).
anya-e0201n0:6134: Pari ca pati ca ā ca sañca o ca etehi parassa hanassa gho hoti kvimhi.
anya-e0201n0:6135_0: Parihaññatīti paligho, rassa lattaṃ. Patihanatīti paṭigho, tassa ṭattaṃ. Bhuso hanati
anya-e0201n0:6135_1: bādhatīti aghaṃ-dukkhaṃ pāpañca, visesena bhuso hanatīti byaggho, diṭṭhi, sīlasāmaññena
anya-e0201n0:6135_2: saṃhatoti saṅgho-samūho, devasaṅgho, brahmasaṅgho, migasaṅgho, ohanati adhobhāgaṃ
anya-e0201n0:6135_3: katvā māretīti ogho, kilesogho, saṃsārogho, udakogho.
anya-e0201n0:6136: Suttavibhattiyā aññatopi gho hoti, mātaraṃ hanatīti mātugho. Evaṃ pitugho iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:6138: Kriyatthā bhāvakārakesu ṇuādayo honti, upari vuccamāno sabbo ṇvādikaṇḍo imassa suttassa niddeso hoti, tasmā idha kiñcimattaṃ vuccate.
anya-e0201n0:6139_0: Karotīti kāru-sippī, ayati vaḍḍhatīti āyu, ayanti vaḍḍhanti sattā etenāti vā āyu-jīvitaṃ,
anya-e0201n0:6139_1: sobhāvisesaṃ rahanti jahanti canda, sūriyā etenāti rāhu-asurindo, hitasukhaṃ sādhetīti
